name: Blue Tansy BHA and Enzyme Pore Refining Mask
about: What it is:A calming gel mask powered by blue tansy, a naturally sourced BHA, and fruit enzymes to visibly clarify skin and minimize pores..Skin Type:Normal, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Dullness, and Acne and Blemishes.Highlighted Ingredients:- White Willow Bark Extract: Decongests pores with naturally occurring salicylic acid (BHA)..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This fan-favorite, truly natural mask gently and thoroughly cleanses pores with fruit enzymes and white willow bark BHA while soothing with aloe and blue-tansy essential oil for skin that feels energized and refreshed.
ingredients: -White Willow Bark Extract: Decongests pores with naturally occurring salicylic acid (BHA)..-Fruit Enzymes: Visibly dissolve dead skin cells for a smoother, softer feel. .-Blue Tansy Oil: Soothes irritated skin and the appearance of redness. ..Aqua/Water/Eau, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Leaf Extract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Salix Nigra (Willow) Bark Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Gluconolactone, Sodium Phytate, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Flower/Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Tanacetum Annuum Flower Oil, Jasminum Sambac Floral Extract.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply a thin layer to clean skin, avoiding your eye area..-Slight tingling is normal with this mask, as it works to gently exfoliate and visibly resurface your skin..-Leave on for 15 to 20 minutes or until mask is completely dry..-Rinse with warm water..-If you have sensitive skin, leave on for five to 10 minutes and rinse with warm water..-For the first five days, use every other day for best results..-After day five, use two to three times per week to maintain results...Precautions:.-For external use only..-Although slight tingling is normal with this product, if discomfort occurs, please remove the mask immediately with warm water..-Avoid direct contact with eyes or mouth. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water..-Discontinue use if skin becomes irritated..-The color of this mask may vary due to natural ingredients or fade over time, but this does not change its efficacy..-Store in a cool, dry place out of direct sunlight...Recycling Instructions:.Place outer carton into paper recycling..Once you've finished your product, remove the thin disc that sits atop your jar, clean it, and recycle. .Gently peel the thin liner from the cap and dispose of  it. Then clean the cap and recycle. .Remove the label, rinse the glass jar thoroughly, and recycle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This had an odd smell, which I didn't love, but I liked what it did for my skin. I'm a rule follower and it seemed beneficial for my skin (I recommend following the directions for use). I am 40 y/o and have combination skin. I used it every other week because it did leave my skin more pink after I washed it off. Pores are truly influenced by genetics but I think this helped clean them out, which helped my face look healthier. The specs in the mask stained the brush I used to apply, which doesn't bother me, but fair warning. If it wasn't so pricey, I'd buy it again. It's just not in my budget right now.

reviews.review_title: A great addition to my skincare routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a fan of herbivore botanicals for years because they make really high quality natural products. The gel mask is easy to apply and while it has a thick texture it's in no way heavy. I've been using it for a couple of weeks and I found that my skin looks more clear and I'm having fewer breakouts. It has a pleasant natural fragrance which is not overpowering for me is when I'm wearing it (this is significant because many fragrances give me headaches, but thankfully this product does not). I've noticed that my pores definitely looks smaller and are far less prone to getting blocked since I've been using it.

reviews.review_text: I love Herbivore products and this did not disappoint! I appreciate the use of clean, natural ingredients in skincare. There was a slight tingle but nothing too crazy! My face feels super clean and texture seems to be disappearing. I received this gifted by Herbivore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, my experience with the HERBIVORE Blue Tansy BHA and Enzyme Pore Refining Mask did not meet my expectations. First, I want to acknowledge the attractive packaging and the brand's commitment to using natural ingredients, which initially sparked my interest. The Blue Tansy extract, coupled with the promise of refining pores, sounded promising.  However, upon application, I found the mask to be quite disappointing. The texture was thin and runny, making it difficult to apply evenly on my skin. I also experienced a slight tingling sensation, which, although not painful, was not particularly comfortable either. I understand that some people may enjoy the tingle as a sign of effectiveness, but it did not resonate with me.  Regarding the pore refining claims, I did not notice any significant improvement in the appearance of my pores after using this mask consistently over a few weeks. I had hoped for a noticeable reduction in pore size or a smoother skin texture, but unfortunately, the results fell short. I found the fragrance of the Blue Tansy BHA and Enzyme Pore Refining Mask to be quite overpowering. While some may enjoy the herbal scent, it was too strong for my liking, and I prefer skincare products with more subtle or fragrance-free options.  Please remember that skincare is a journey of trial and error, and what may not work for me might work wonders for you.  *gifted by Herbivore *

reviews.review_title: Must try if you suffer from enlarged pores

reviews.review_text: Gifted by Herbivore, this mask does such a great job on working on my pore size. I absolutely love the texture of it itu2019s gooey. It feels great going on. This is a magnificent mask. That does this job. Iu2019m obsessed with all the natural ingredients in it blue tansy happens to be one of my favorite ingredients. It has a very light Fragrance, but itu2019s just a natural fragrance. I do highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

Looks beautiful. Has a gorgeous close to it. I love that all the product ingredients are natural. This is an incredible mask. I am truly blown away by it.

reviews.review_title: Excellent addition for oily acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the past decade or so, I have been very consistent with my use of clean, cruelty, free, all natural skincare whenever possible. My skin is extremely sensitive with a lot of adult hormonal cystic acne, particularly in my chin area, and large pores mainly concentrated to my T-zone. I do have a lot of textural, irregularities and hyper pigmentation on my cheeks. I am ashamed to admit that I had not tried Herbivore prior to my receipt of a blue tansy mask complimentary from Herbivore Botanicals to try in return for my honest opinion. First impression was that the packaging was very luxe and classy, which is always important to me as I am not attracted to anything trendy in appearance. Upon opening the box, the container that held the gorgeous ocean blue mask was also high-quality. Unscrewing the lid, I was a bit surprised to notice that there was no inner seal and the mask was immediately exposed. Herbivore stayed true to their name as when I open the lid, I could immediately smell a violet- like scent that had some herbal undertones and almost a light nonoffensive medicinal smell. The first thing I noticed about the mask was how it was a bit like a jelly, but then upon dipping my finger in it, it seemed more like a medium serum consistency. Reading the directions, I applied it to my entire face but concentrated, particularly in my T-zone to make sure all of my challenge areas were fully covered. Please do not be scared by the dark blue color of this mask and think that it will leave a heavy layer of that color post application. Because of the serum like consistency, it is so thin and easy to move across the face. It feels like a water-based gel moisturizer rather than a heavy mask. In fact, it has no color at all when applied properly. I left it on for 20 minutes and noticed in the beginning a very, very mild tingling sensation, but no burning or discomfort. As directed, I rinsed it off after 20 minutes was over, and there was no irritation or redness to my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m SOOO excited that they added a stabilizer to this mask because it used to be one of my holy grail products but I had to find an alternative because it didnu2019t last more than a month. I can see this becoming a holy grail product again as long as the stabilizer works! The mask doesnu2019t feel any different to me, it has the same smell and even more importantly the same benefits! Iu2019ve always found this mask to one of the best resurfacing masks on the market, I feel like I look like a baby after using it lol my skin is so smooth and glowy afterwards. Iu2019ve also found that if Iu2019m breaking out it tends to help that get under control. I have somewhat sensitive skin and when applied this mask tingles a bit but Iu2019ve found itu2019s just part of the process, Iu2019ve found 10 mins to be a great application time for me. It also doesnu2019t leave any irritation behind! Lastly I just have to say herbivores packaging is always aesthetically pleasing, I love the look of the label! Highly recommend! I received this product complimentary from Herbivore in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color looks very dark when itu2019s in the container, which almost like mud, but when I applied to my face itu2019s becomes more transparent. Donu2019t really like the smell to be honest, the smell is plant ish but not so fresh. Texture was good, not too sticky wonu2019t feel like harden your face once itu2019s dry. Easy to use. I would wait a few more weeks to see how it works. Gifted by Herbivore Botanical.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Herbivore. This mask is interesting, as itu2019s almost a clear blue gel once on the face. It smells really unique too, like crips but herbal? I put it on after washing my face and it goes on clear, and doesnu2019t feel heavy at all. After 15 minutes I took it off. My face felt hydrated and smooth. Iu2019m excited to see with consistent use of my pores will look smaller and my face will look brighter

reviews.review_title: A must for my breakout days

reviews.review_text: Even prior to receiving this free, this has been one of my favorite clarifying masks ever, a consistent repurchase for me! I love that my skin also looks brighter. Itu2019s gentle enough I can use this mask a couple of times a week. It is a bit runny, so just beware of this!

reviews.review_title: Cleanses and brightens without drying my skin

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s not Mold. Do your research

Thereu2019s literally pictures from the company that shows the different colors and videos. This mask is perfect for acne. My holy grail

A little goes a long way with this product you do not need to layer it on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was only able to use it for a week before it started growing mold! Broke out pretty badly after the first two uses (after which I had to pitch it), but I can't say if this was the product itself or if I might've had a reaction to any mold spores I couldn't see yet.   Had two Sephora employees try to steer me away from this brand in the past and I should have listened :,). Evidently this has been an ongoing issue from Herbivore.

reviews.review_title: DO NOT BUY THIS EXPENSIVE, ROTTEN COMPOST
reviews.review_text: I checked EVERY container of this on the shelf and ALL were a murky green-brown, with clear mold inside. There is no expiration date listed on the packaging, yet there are no ingredients to help preserve all of the organic ingredients.  essentially, this is a compost mask.   I also notified an employee and showed them a picture of what the mask should look like vs what all the ones on their shelf look like, and pointed out the mold. she had no intention of removing the product from their shelves.

reviews.review_text: I was getting breakouts from using the Oculus VR headset. I play Beatsaber, so I tend to sweat quite a lot, and the trapped sweat was giving me fungal acne.  I've been using it for 2 years now, and I can definitely see an improvement in my skin overall! I rarely, if ever, get the acne I used to (the occasional breakouts tend to come from not washing my face after working out).  I've noticed the texture on my skin has smoothed out as well!   Highly recommend this mask, it's amazing :)

It worked so well for her I tried it for my breakouts and I can confirm first hand, it produces on what it promises. When you first apply them mask you can feel it cleaning your pores without your skin tightening. The sales rep at Sephora also said you can use it at night for spot treatment, which I have not done yet but would definitely try. Love the product, definitely worth a try if you are trying to deal with acne prone skin without over drying.

You only need a thin layer, so you will get a lot of bang for you buck despite the price tag. And with a product that works this well Iu2019m happy to pay for quality.

This mask rinsed very easily and left my skin feeling very smooth.  My serum glided in and moisturizer sunk in like a dream. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start with, I love this product. I find it helps my breakouts A LOT! However, Iu2019ve received jars where the product has leaked everywhere in the box before because they donu2019t seal this product well (their other products have a better plastic seal, the one in this one is paper thin and not airtight). The colour range can be very large from beautiful teal blue to musty old grey green with black oily looking splotches, this is due to the nature of the product and is not that it has gone bad; however, it doesnu2019t look very nice like is advertised, so I understand other reviewers concerns. With the gross colour I find the product still works (the black dots are from separation not mold), but I do also keep mine in a mini fridge just incase. The smell is strong but tolerable unless itu2019s been opened for awhile or opened before. I find it gets stronger the longer itu2019s opened or if the u201csealu201d or lack there of has been opened. I will say I have had to return one that was obviously opened as the inserts were gone and the smell was insanely overwhelming.

reviews.review_title: Is there any quality control for this product?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Well, I loved this product. But the amount of times you get it delivered and itu2019s past itu2019s expiry is unacceptable. I get it says it can come in any colour from blue to dark green.  But receiving a black product with moldy spots throughout it is very disappointing. Sephora needs to keep track of their products. reviews.review_text: I tried a sample of it that was good for 2 applications. I've heard a lot of comments about horrible smell but it was not there; my sealed product smelled herbal minty, perhaps rather strong but it's not bad. It's gentle and did not dry my skin - yay - but at the same time it did not have an effect of a stronger peel (think Lactic Acid 10% + HA 2% Exfoliating Serum ) that really leaves your skin refreshed and pores smaller. it's a nice to have for me - I'll be happy if I got it as a gift but I might not go out of my way to purchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone/oily skin and I've been using this mask for 5 years.  I'm on my 5th jar because it's that good.  It clears up redness and my pimples almost instantly, and a little goes a long way as well!  I know I'm probably not supposed to keep a jar for a whole year, but I haven't had any reactions to an old jar so I keep using it...  I also told a co-worker about this as well and we're both fans for life.  The smell is pretty strong and definitely won't please everyone, but I'm willing to put up with it for the clear skin that I get in return.  It might sting a bit if you have sensitive skin. I recently tried to use this with Herbivore's Aquarius Cream and Lapis Blue Tansy Face Oil and I think that might have been a bit too much BHA for my skin to handle, so I stopped using the oil and reduced the mask time to 15 minutes (usually I do 20 mins, twice a week).  I also have never received a jar that wasn't a greenish colour.  I've ordered this from Sephora, Detox Market and from Herbivore's website themselves and the jar always had the greenish colour.  I'm not sure what colour it is actually supposed to be, but as long as my skin reacts positively, I will keep using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this mask. I feel like this mask is underrated for what it does for redness as well as how nice it makes the since feel after use. I always have a flushed appearance on my cheeks which has over time gotten worse as I have gotten older. I didnu2019t mind it when I was younger but Iu2019m getting older, the redness started to overpower the colour on my face. I use this mask around once a week now and enjoy the overall experience of it - how it feels immediately when applied, the cooling sensations, the immediate reduction in redness, but also how it also seems to clear up/polish up my skin once I wash it off. Will definitely repurchase when I am out. I know some people find the aroma and look off putting but neither of those things bother me, as long as I can see it working Iu2019m good.

reviews.review_title: thee best thing to happen to my face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally a miracle product. I have had a long battle with acne and was having a horrible breakout on my chin and finally bit the bullet and bought this for its good reviews. CRAZY the difference I had after one single use. My jaw actually dropped when I looked in the mirror the morning after. My acne was calmed and less red, and the actual pimples were smaller. The whole texture of my face was smoother (I have some annoying bumps on my forehead--they were gone). AFTER ONE USE.   The scent is wonderfully herby/earthy and the feel of it is very cooling and soothing thanks to the menthol. I just stick my finger to the bottom of the jar, and pull straight out, and that's plenty of product for my face.   Absolutely follow the recommendations: use for 4-5 days straight, then 2-3 times a week to maintain. Nothing has made my skin look or feel better. The hormonal breakout I had was pretty much gone in 1.5 weeks when it would've probably taken a month otherwise. HIGHLY recommend for the acne-fighting girlies.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

Every other time I've used it I've had a spot appear on my skin that does itch. Since I'm not using it frequently, that's something *I* can look past.   I have dry to normal skin with pretty deep blackheads. I've noticed blackheads have visibly reduced but not from this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: The jar I received is a dark green, and while a strong smell, it smells exactly like the blue tansy oil, so I know itu2019s not rancid. Personally, I like it. I like the goopy texture, I just use a spatula that I got with one of my cleansing balms. I donu2019t know if itu2019s really helping my acne too much, but my skin does feel so much smoother after using it. I think I saw a couple reviews saying that it burned them, but if it leaves your skin red, you clearly have more sensitive skin than you think. Leave it on for 5 minutes to start and see how your skin reacts.  I only have a couple small issues with it. First, itu2019s kind of hard to wash off. I now only use it before I shower because I hate washing it off in the sink. Second, I saw all the reviews saying it grew mold after they had it a while, so Iu2019m trying to use it quickly and am storing it in a skincare fridge. I wish herbivore wouldnu2019t use just u2018naturalu2019 preservatives and would actually use safe/effective ones, but that kind of goes for all of their products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe some of them were damaged during shipping, temperature, or Sephora got a bad batch? I got mine in a subscription box, then purchased another in store. Both were the same.  Mine is black, has a bit of a deep teal undertone I guess. The smell is pretty overpowering, and itu2019s very liquidy in comparison to most masks. I use a mask applicator brush I snatched up on Shein for a buck to apply. Itu2019s a little messy, so I just use this one when Iu2019m in the tub. I have this trio of reusable fluffy facial rounds, each was for a different use but Iu2019ve long since forgotten. I use one of those to wash it off because theyu2019re great at removing makeup and just using my hands and water to rinse results in black stuff being left on my face.   I have hyper sensitive skin and this cleared up a mask breakout after one use. If you wear masks as often as I do and hate maskne, this helps. It also helps with hormonal breakouts. I usually will have 1-3 blemishes but theyu2019re gangster and wanna live rent free for 3 weeks.   I did just order the mask spray after I saw a TT video, so hereu2019s to hoping that helps.   I hope they keep making this because Iu2019ll be a lifelong customer.

reviews.review_title: Good for my sensitive acne prone skin

reviews.review_text: I have sensitive and acne prone skin. Oily in the summer and dry in the winter. Due to severe hormonal acne, I have pretty bad scaring on my high cheeks and lower around my jaw line. I needed something that got the job done, but wasnu2019t too aggressive or drying on my sensitive skin. When I found this I knew I had to try it, and Iu2019m so glad I did! It has done wonders for my skin! My skin is so bright and healthy after I use the mask. It has definitely helped my scaring and smoothed everything out. I feel like it helps unclog my pores, but also lightly exfoliate dull, dry skin. Itu2019s also non irritating, I believe thatu2019s from the tansy. Anyways, I cannot say enough good things about this product! I used to use the Lancer Caviar mask, and I think this one works just as well, but is less sensitizing! Itu2019s also half the price. I would absolutely recommend this product. I have no pore fillers or smoothers on in my selfie. No filters. Just some light powder foundation and my skin is healthy, smoother, and glowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Anytime my skin needs some TLC I reach for this mask! It clarifies while soothing! It smells amazing! Hands down one of my favs!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If there was only one thing I could purchase for the rest of my life, this would be it. Seriously it is the most amazing mask I have ever used!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy heck this is my new holy grail. I bought this because the reviews were saying how incredible this product is, and Iu2019ll have to agree. When used as directed (5 days in a row and then alternating days) this product works super well to surface acne and kill it. My face went from being a pizza-esque minefield to a silky smooth canvas. Iu2019ve never been happier with a product. I tend to use this with the lapis oil as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite masks. I use this a couple times a week and truly do believe that this helps keep my skin clear. I personally like the smell (it's very herbal), although I know some people don't care for it. I just wish Herbivore would use preservatives in their products, considering that this changes color and separates very fast. If you're not going to use this as often as I do, there's no guarantee it wouldn't mold or lose efficacy, hence four stars instead of five.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay Iu2019m WOWED.   First off, I want to clarify for those of you concerned that your product went green - itu2019s SUPPOSED TO. This product ranges from beep blue to deep green - the colour is not consistent from product to product. This doesnu2019t mean itu2019s gone bad! There is info about it on the Herbivore website!   I have been using medical grade skincare for years and couldnu2019t continue paying that price. I was stuck with 2 deep cystic pimples and used this and woke up to both as completely massive headed whiteheads (which is great since cysts hurt and are so hard to get rid of). I also noticed a difference in the overall colour and texture of my skin - less red, more smooth. Iu2019m obsessed on day one. Canu2019t wait to incorporate this weekly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After 2 uses my scars on my face disappeared!!! This is the best mask Iu2019ve ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The only mask Iu2019m willing to pay $50+ for. Iu2019ve seen results next day with breakouts and smoother texture with consistent use within a few weeks. Iu2019ve repurchased this multiple times and will continue to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t know why people are saying it stinks.. it smells so good! My skin loves this stuff and whenever I have a breakout itu2019s cleared up the next day after usage. Definitely a repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Expired without having used it at all! Consistent with other reviews, I found brown residue and moldy looking liquid. The masks did not contain the gooey texture at all, and this was on first use! Very disappointed

reviews.review_title: SMELLS AWFUL but my skin likes it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love what this mask has been doing for my acne prone skin so far (only one week in). BUT I find the scent SO awful that I can hardly stand it. It makes me instantly nauseous and gives me a temporary headache. Not sure which ingredient is causing this reaction but I like how my skin responds to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The first mask Iu2019ve genuinely loved that gave me real results. Whenever I break out I use this mask every night three days In a row and my face is completely clear again. It reduces inflammation like no other product. It is expensive but you get a lot of uses out of it, and itu2019s the first thing thatu2019s been effective on my acne in 8 years of trying product after product. Of course, everyoneu2019s skin is different but for me itu2019s my go-to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product made my skin all red, it burnt my skin so bad I had to apply cold pressure. I really wanted to like this product. Very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am literally only writing a review because of the negative ones. My friend gave me this product and I rarely use masks, but this one is something different. People comment on my skin after I use this. It smoothes and clarifies my skin and leaves it feeling firm, clean and healthy without being overly dry. Yes the smell is different but nothing I couldnu2019t get used to. Definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my skin dewy & glowyu2026I donu2019t care for the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am not super impressed by this product. all I can say is my skin is smooth, that's it. it's a weird liquid form that gets everywhere when applying it and it stinks horribly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only expensive mask I don't cringe at buying. It is the only product that gets rid of my forehead wrinkles if I'm consistent with it. just make sure you stir it up, I use a silicone mask applicator for this part. It separates and looks funky if you don't mix it.  If you like chemical exfoliating mask you have to try this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I have tried a few other products from Herbivore and loved them and then came across this and after reading through the reviews of people saying they received a moldy product that maybe it was just bad luck and to give it a shotu2026 wellu2026 nope. They were 100% correct and itu2019s apparently a gamble if you get a good one or not. Right after taking it out I could tell something was off as it was super dark, then when I took the protective plastic part off there was black mold all over it. Inspected the bottle with a light and thereu2019s black mold all throughout it as well. :( super disappointed as I really was looking forward to trying this out. Taking it back to the store tomorrow and hopefully the ones in store are a bit fresher than the warehouse. Will update review if better results. Be warned may be best to buy in store and inspect before leaving.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have now purchased this mask 3 times. I have hormonal acne along my jaw line and this is the ONLY product that keeps it away.  Yes, the applicator is useless and the color varies. I shake the mask in the jar for 15 seconds and then careful remove the lid. Use a cheap flat foundation brush to apply. The one I use is by Sonia Kashuk. I use my fingers to rub in any spots that might drip. Leave on for 20 minutes and rinse. My face is smooth and any bumps or breakouts are noticeably smooth and gone the next day.  I will always buy this mask. It did burn when I first started out but I use it 2-3 times a week now and I forget I'm wearing it until my timer goes off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: MOLD. You can SMELL it. Do not listen to the picture saying to ignore the color. You can smell when a liquid has turned rancid.

reviews.review_title: Great Relief for Acne-Prone, Oily Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is a game changer! I pull this out during the chaotic breakout times. When all of my usual prevention tactics fail and shark week denies me any form of happiness, this mask really comes in clutch. When the acne is flared up, I do this every other day until itu2019s been 3 applications and the breakouts are GONE. I also try to use it once, maybe twice a week when Iu2019m feeling a bit more congested. I sort of just found what works well with my skincare and this mask is just an awesome rescue product that I slide in when needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Life changing! This paired with Lapis oil have transformed my skin. People are mentioning color changes and residue in the reviews here and the mini.. itu2019s an all natural product that has minerals in it and can change color because itu2019s not chemicals that have consistent color lol. Just like when you buy natural juice, color and consistency varies bcs itu2019s not full of fillers. Stings a little, immediate feeling of smooth skin after and consistently changed my skin from its worst to its best. The smell is just a heavier natural herbal aroma - at least itu2019s not artificial fragrances! Once I got over the initial shock of the smell, I ended up loving it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this the lady in Sephora Philly sold me this swearing up and down it was life changing, but after 2 months of using this 1x a week I see no noticeable results. The ask barely stays on and the applicator sucks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: The smell is relaxing. A little goes a long way. Itu2019s refreshing to put on your face. I have very oily skin so this makes my skin feel clean but not overly dried.   The only thing that bothers me is that it takes a while to wash off but itu2019s not that big of a deal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product recently and had to wash it off within 2 minutes of application as my skin started to irritate and turn red. This product is recommended for combination skin and the reason I purchased. I would not recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im in my late twenties and noticed some cystic acne starting on my cheeks and chin. I have combination skin and was using the ordinary glycolic acid toner, niacinamide serum, and HA moisturizer for years before this. I purchased this mask and the lapis oil to use together. Itu2019s been a few weeks since I stopped all my other products and stuck to just this mask every two days, and the lapis oil every morning and night. I am so happy with the results: no more breakouts, scarring has gone down significantly, and redness is a whole lot better too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s great for a gentle but effective exfoliating and doesnu2019t dry out your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: iu2019ve used this mask 4 or 5 times and i already see a difference in my skin. i have texture on my forehead and my right cheek and i get break outs in those areas but nothing too severe. my skin is already so much clearer and looks less textured and my hyperpigmentation is not as noticeable. a little bit goes a long way so even though it is pricey it will last you a pretty long time. the mask also smells like a spa product and feels pretty refreshing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i tried everything to clear up the milia near my eyes for years and nothing has worked. i got this, used it 20 mins/day for 3-4 days the first week i got it (as the directions say) and it was gone!! one week and it was gone is some serious results. if you have stubborn milia, here is your solution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS. My skin is super sensitive and Iu2019ve tried various BHA products and masks throughout the years. This is the only one Iu2019ve kept repurchasing because to me itu2019s a skin saver. Use it alone or right before a clay/charcoal mask and I donu2019t keep it on for too long because I find less is more. Itu2019s easy to build up how long you apply it for over time but start small I would say.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mask! A little goes a long ways and I genuinely feel like my pores are cleaner after rinsing. Scent could be strong if you donu2019t like fragrance, but overall, I enjoyed. Would buy again.

reviews.review_title: Smooth skin, leave on for at least 15mins
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Never do I write reviews in my 10+ years shopping at Sephora, but I felt the need to write a review for this mask. Never has my skin been so smoothu2014even my husband commented on how smooth my skin looks / feels and he never EVER notices that kind of stuff! The key though is to rub it in gently almost like a cleanser and first then leave it on your face for at LEAST 15 minutes. The first couple times I only left it on for about 10 and noticed nothing, so make sure to leave it on (but I wouldnu2019t say longer than 20 mins). Definitely will be buying again and is worth the splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is a game changer for me. Iu2019ve used it twice and I canu2019t believe the difference already. My skin looks and feels amazing. I will use this until I die.

reviews.review_title: Great for a night time routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by Herbivore Botanics, and I love this mask for my night time routine! Itu2019s the perfect addition to wake up with fresh, smooth skin! The aloe in it is super soothing, and thereu2019s a visible difference in my skinu2019s texture after using for a few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

It exfoliates skin and helps to eliminate dead skin. Only use twice a week. I will buy another one after this one is finished

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I almost never rebuy masks of any sort, but I fell in love with this blue tansy mask. I know some people have mentioned a weird smell, but I personally was really enamored by it - it does smell kind of herb-y but to me that just signified that there isn't any artificial scents or fragrances in it, only natural stuff. Even if the smell did bother you a bit, I personally think it would be worth it. I used this about two times a week, and my skin always felt rejuvenated, less red, and soft.   I will agree about the short shelf life that others have mentioned - I noticed some specks of something (assuming mold? not sure) around the lid and the glass walls of the container when I started running low, but at that point I had had the mask for at least four months. Because this is a natural based product, I think that aspect makes sense. For me, I was able to finish it before I thought I needed to toss it, but if you are not planning on using it every week I would maybe be wary!  Overall, I love this product and Herbivore in general. I have very sensitive skin that is prone to redness and acne so it is always really refreshing when I find a product that not only doesn't worsen those two things but actually helps mitigate them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this mask that I was gifted by Herbivore Botanicals. Iu2019m not a huge mask girl because of the textures and feelings but this one was a breeze to use and left my skin feeling AMAZING!! I will be  using it multiple times a week, new post shower ritual for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *gifted by Herbivore Botanicals. Iu2019m obsessed with this herbivore mask!!! reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Herbivore Botanicals. I really liked this mask! perfectly cleanses my sensitive skin. pleasant texture. I can talk about the scent constantly! I love it. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying anything from Herbivore and this mask has been on my wishlist! It has a gel-like texture, almost like maple syrup consistency and the color can actually vary from deep blue to mossy green depending on the type of blue tansy oil used. The scent is nothing like Iu2019ve ever smelled before and itu2019s pretty strong! It smells like a mix of something herbal and medicinal. I left mine on for 10 minutes and felt a slight tingling sensation, which is apparently normal since it gently exfoliates and resurfaces the skin. It left my skin feeling energized & refreshed, pores looking less visible, and with an overall healthy glow. Iu2019m excited to see the benefits with continued use. This mask was gifted by Herbivore Botanicals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this through jcpenney Sephora online so I could use a gift card and after about two months of having it I started to notice mold growing around the rim and on the lid, itu2019s such a shame bc I actually like it as a more gentle exfoliating mask compared to the ordinary 30% aha bha 2% peeling solution, it also doesnu2019t smell the best if you donu2019t like mint, if you donu2019t want to risk the mold situation Iu2019d recommend the peeling solution from paulas choice itu2019s 25% aha 2% bha.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Herbivore Botanicals. Iu2019ve heard so many good things about Blue Tansy but I was surprised to see when I opened the jar that it was not blue, but green. Also the fragrance was very strong and I didnu2019t love that. Iu2019ve been using the mask for about two weeks and I can see a slight difference in the appearance of my skin. It seems smoother but it didnu2019t clear up any of the maskne I have on my chin. Iu2019m ok the fence about this one. Iu2019ll continue to use but Iu2019m not sure Iu2019d repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received my herbivore blue tansy resurfacing clarity mask complimentary from herbivore and I am so happy that I did. This is a truly natural mask that cleans deep into your pores using fruit enzymes, aloe, white willow bark, and the magical moisturizing blue tansy essential oil. Fombined, these ingredients leave your skin feeling plump and refreshed.  The instructions recommend leaving on for no longer than 20 minutes and suggest cutting the time in half if you are prone to having sensitive skin. the mask comes in a thick glass jar with the screw off lid. The mask is high in Azuline which provides soothing benefits to blemish prone  and irritated skin. My mask is more of a teal color rather than blue but this is completely normal due to the natural ingredients in the mask.  After only one use my skin was visibly softer and the texture was less apparent. As with all skin care products, I recommend doing a test patch to ensure you donu2019t have an adverse reaction

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_text: I love this resurfacing clarity mask. It is amazing how gentle it is on my skin. I love that it helps my skin feel energized and refreshed. I also really love the amazing cool blue shade of this mask. The blue tansy resurfacing clarity mask by herbivore was gifted to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this mask the smell is so good and my skin looks so beautiful and is glowing this a must have in my skin care routine such a great texture highly recommended. gifted by herbivore botanicals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Herbivore Botanicals for an honest reviewed in Quite impressed with this mask. reviews.review_text: i received this complimentary from Herbivore Botanicals!   first thing i noticed was the scent is kind of a lot, it smells kind of natural and almost minty but not exactly minty, i canu2019t think of it right now lol. if you donu2019t like scented skincare, i donu2019t think this would be for you. it is gentle on my skin, but it does give a slight tingly sensation. i did have a bit of irritation on one of my cheeks, but it went away a little after taking the mask off and it didnu2019t hurt for me. it did also soothe my skin lol itu2019s such an interesting feelingu2014soothing and tingly. after i rinsed it off, very gently with a damp washcloth, my skin was soooo soft omg. itu2019s a very nice pick me up mask, i would just be careful of over exfoliating and over masking !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Herbivore Botanicals recently gifted me the Blue Tansy face mask.First off let's talk texture. This mask has a bluish green color  that is gel like and in-between thick and liquidy. The blue tansy incorporated in this mask is the main ingredient. Its high in azulene which is what gives it the color and scent.  I was a little surprised that it was more green than blue, but because of the natural ingredients it can be either color. Now the scent is a whole other story. I'm not going to lie , I am not a fan. I love a good natural and herbal scent, but this one is too strong for me. I'm still able to wear the mask for the full 20 minutes , but with the off putting aroma I don't find it very pleasurable like some other masks. Still even with me not caring for the scent of it , I love the results I got from it.  All I can say is WOW!! I had a breakout in a couple areas on my face and this literally got rid of my acne. I was stunned at how well it worked. It reduced the redness and size of my pimples dramatically where they were pretty much non existent. I've never used a mask that worked so well for my acne. Not only did it help with my breakouts ,but it made my skin extra smooth and my complexion has been glowing everyday since I used it. Days ago my skin looked a hot mess, and this literally saved it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask. I love the smell of it. Every time I smell this sweet earthy florally scent, it calms my nerves down. It has a watery texture that dries down to transform skin to glossy texture. I havenu2019t gotten any issues with it going everywhere. Just add a little at a time to cover the face and neck. Easily washes off. Doesnu2019t leave my combination sensitive, acne/eczema prone skin irritated. Instead calms my skin, leaving it brighter, smoother and softer. Absolutely love this mask. Iu2019ve knocked out with it for an hour a few times and have no irritation, dryness, nor redness whatsoever. Iu2019ve even left it on and forgot about it while doing chores lol. Anyways definitely give it a try. Complimentary from Herbivore Botanicals but love is real for years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: This is amazing. I never write reviews for makeup, but I have to for this face mask. I have had terrible acne for years. I also have had very large pores, and it's been difficult for me to wear makeup, even with other products I use to minimize my pores. Well this cleaned/ made my pores smaller after just one use!!   I also have VERY VERY sensitive skin, and this gave me no reaction whatsoever. I look forward to continue to using this!!!    Just be careful when taking this out of the box. The container is pretty slippery. I dropped it because it slipped out of my hands, making me loose like half of the bottle :( But still worth using. I recommend this to anyone with stubborn acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have sensitive and acne prone skin, try this mask. My skin is easily aggravated: pretty reactive to a lot of products, prone to dryness, but also quite prone to acne (especially hormonal and stress-triggered acne). So--it's pretty hard to find the right balance of products for my skin, and it's REALLY difficult to calm my skin down when it gets upset (which is, like, way too often).  But this mask? I almost can't believe how well it works. It calms my redness and inflammation, smooths away texture, and stops breakouts in their tracks. The effects are immediate and also long-lasting.   A lot of other resurfacing masks are way too harsh for my skin (for example, Herbivore's AHA mask burns a lot and damaged my moisture barrier when I was trying to use it), but this mask just feels calming, with an almost cooling effect. Seriously--it saves my skin time and time again.   Also, it smells like heaven. Do your self a favour and try this one out.

This mask does have a very strong scent which took a lot to get used but eventually I didnu2019t mind. If you are someone who cannot stand strong scented masks then I would stay away from this one. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is incredible for acne. It takes away redness, shrinks the size, and dries everything bringing it to head. I highly recommend this to anyone with acne, oily skin, or large pores.

I have combo skin tho so I do use a clay mask on my forehead and this on my cheeks. just a Meh product nothing amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favourite mask of all time, which is saying something as Iu2019m quite the collector and connoisseur. I have repurchased this time and time again. As soon as I stop using it within a month I will get a deep, blind, pimple that hurts and I know I need to restart my use. It has a pleasant tingling sensation, but I know it can be too much for some, and for them Iu2019d recommend the prism mask. It does an amazing job exfoliating my dry spots and keeping my oil production down in my t zone. If you arenu2019t sure if this mask is right for you, you should try it!

reviews.review_title: Makes a huge difference in my skin's appearance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've never found masks to be very effective or to make a difference in my skin until now. This mask applies like a gel and when I wash it off, my skin is immediately radiant and the redness in my rosacea prone skin is diminished greatly. I've been wanting to use an AHA/BHA product because I want some amount of exfoliation in my routine, but they are usually too much for my sensitive skin. This one calms my skin down completely while exfoliating it and since I started using it a few weeks ago, I've had no clogged pores, more radiant, healthy looking skin, a huge decrease in redness, and my skin is incredibly soft. It makes more of a difference in the appearance of my skin than any other product I use with the exception of sunscreen. Sure, it has a strong scent. But it's just sort of herbal and, honestly, I don't care how it smells when it works this well. And if yours is green, that's ok! It's supposed to vary in color from blue to blue/green to green.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

Really amazing & I have very sensitive skin and found this didnu2019t sting or irritate it what so ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

Iu2019ll definitely go back to it once my skin adjusts to my new regimen.

I also noticed my acne cleared up way faster when I used this mask. This mask has a scent kind of like Jello, and I did notice it starting to go bad (change to a darker color) but only a couple days ago, but luckily I only have about 1 mask left in the jar.. and like I said i've had this jar for 5 months which is impressive considering its a clean product! Overall I would 100% re-purchase this product but I will try something new for a while so my skin doesn't become immune to the magic in this.

reviews.review_text: Okay I suffered from extreme acne in my teens which left scarring on my cheeks, forehead, and nose. I wanted to do something about it at home before I went for a laser procedure or micro needling. I saw this being recommended several times and I honestly balked because the price is a lot but after some saving I decided to go for it. Iu2019ve been using retinol and on the days Iu2019m not I exfoliate once or twice a week with this. Believe it or not I have noticed a difference. Iu2019ve been using it for more thn a month now. I recommend it but make sure you are integrating it properly into your skincare routine.

reviews.review_text: -I have oily skin, larger pores, not acne prone, dry only around the creases of my nostrils.  - Iu2019ve been using this 4-5 nights a week for a month.  - I like the mask, not my favorite, probably wonu2019t repurchase just because Iu2019m not seeing any change.  - My Day routine: Cleanse with Tatcha deep cleanse gentle exfoliating cleanser, YTTP Air-Whip moisturizer, supergoop unseen SPF (if I leave the house, but I donu2019t these day bc, well, 2020), all ilIa makeup products are amazing! -My Night routine: Cleanse with Tatcha deep cleanse gentle exfoliating cleanser, Josie Maran Argan Beta Retinol Pink Algae Serum, Drunk Elephant Protini Polypeptide Moisturizer or Drunk Elephant Lala Retro Whipped Moisturizer (think I love the Lala a little bit more than Protini) -If I pm mask: Herbivore Blue Tansy followed up by Josie Maranu2019s pink algae serum OR Drunk Elephant Babyfacial, wash off then follow up with Summer Fridays Jet Lag and leave it on overnight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

This is by far the least traditional face mask I have ever tried - from the dark green color, the interesting not so feminine smell, to the thick consistency; I was skeptical the first time I used it. But while it sits on your skin, it is cooling and refreshing. It seems to have lightened my skin and helped with blemishes so much. Itu2019s my favorite part of my skin care routine after a shower. The directions suggest to use it every day and then down to a few times a week. I canu2019t help but use it almost every other day just because I enjoy how it makes my skin feel and look. Bought my first jar two months ago and already halfway through. It is pricy but a little goes a long way. Tldr: Moisturizes and soothes, doesnu2019t make me break out and in fact helps with blemishes. Good product and will buy again.
