reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a lot of acne scaring, uneven texture, huge pores and I deal with hormonal breakouts/ boils on my face. This stuff is magic. I was thinking about going on accutane but A Sephora employee recommended this is me and Iu2019m so happy with the results. My skin hasnu2019t looked this good in years. My pores have shrunken/donu2019t look that noticeable, my skin has less dents and my acne scars have diminished. I even noticed that I donu2019t break out that much anymore, which Iu2019m grateful for! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mask after seeing people raving about it online, and I was not disappointed. I have lots of scarring on my face and this helps minimize them and leaves my skin nice and soft and smooth afterwards.  It's easy to take off with a warm wet cloth  and leaves no residue. my skin looks and feels great after every use. Definatley work your way up with how long to leave it on for, but this is definitely a worthy purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle yet effective. It wonu2019t dry out or burn your skin like many other resurfacing masks do.  I would highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ce masque est tres efficace sur mon acne hormonal. En moins d'une semaine j'ai vu une grande amelioration. Comme conseille, j'ai utilise ce masque 5 jours en ligne et ensuite une fois par semaine. J'ai reu00e7u ce masquent format miniature dans une bou00eete decouverte et je risque tres probablement de le racheter en grand format! Gros coup de coeur.

reviews.review_title: One of my masks for life :D
reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love it. First time was scary lol it smelt strong and almost like menthol minty... it tingled to the point I got a little concerned so I only wrote it 10 minutes to be safe because my skin can be very sensitive. I decided to give the mask another go as directed on the jar and the second time there was no tingling and I wore the mask for the full 20 minutes... washing off was easy and afterwards my skin felt amazing! Normally bha products make me break out but this just... like wow. For me personally I have to repurchase this mask for life because my skin and I are in love with it. I saw reviews saying it's hard to wash off but if you use the small amount as directed and wash off with lukewarm water it comes if very easy. The smell becomes pleasant with time and the texture it's a watery gel so a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this item changed colors and separated, the scent was horrible.  the texture changed, it became gooey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask! it has kept my skin beautifully clear all year long. It has become a staple in my beauty routine, I will repurchase routinely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! Brightening, smoothing, tightening even.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently bought this mask and when it came I saw it was green from outside the container. When I opened it, it was this disgusting, opaque green! With flash on you could literally see the bacterial colonies growing in it. Absolutely disgusting. I reached out on the Sephora chat and the person I talked to was super helpful and got me a replacement. When my replacement came today, it was the exact same thing! (picture attached) It could just be the store I was ordering from, but Iu2019m not taking any more chances. But props to Sephora for the great customer service.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mask about 6 months ago and ever since I did, I stopped using other masks. I used to break out around my chin and forehead. Then I found this mask. I have combo skin (dry/oily) and Iu2019m sensitive to some products because of the dry parts of my face. This mask is a miracle in a jar! My skin has never been so clear. I use it maybe twice a week and have done so for half a year and I still have half of my standard sized mask! A little really goes a long way with this mask. I prefer to use this mask before bed because I can use hydrating sleeping masks and the much heavier herbivore lapis oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: truly resurfaces the skin, makes you feel baby smooth, and gives you a glow. make sure to use SPF during the day if you use this product, though!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is probably my favorite mask. I will be repurchasing without a doubt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask has been great for my mature 47 yr old skin. I still breakout, have acne scarring and combination skin. This leaves my fave smooth and glowing. For those leaving negative reviews because of the mask changing colors. Itu2019s stated on their website that:  Please note: Color of the mask may vary from deep blue to mossy green, and may also change in color. This variation/change does not indicate that the product has lost its efficacy.  Just a heads up before you decide that it doesnu2019t work or throw it away!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is normally fairly sensitive to strong exfoliating products so I was a bit hesitant to try this mask - but, it has been great! I only leave it on for about 10 minutes, and while it does tingle, my skin has been feeling great since I started using it.   As well as just being overall clearer and softer, my hyperpigmentation has finally began to fade thanks to this mask! I will definitely be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As of December 2019 I got 3 herbivore products. I was SO excited because I wanted clean, vegan, cruelty-free products. The products were Blue Tansy, Pineapple Enzyme Glow Mask, and the Moon Fruit Superfruit Treatment. I'm not sure of which product screwed up my skin, but I have cystic acne for the first time in my life after using Herbivore products. I have gotten facials to try and fix it, I have cut out all junk food, I have simplified my skincare routine, but it always comes back. Additionally, I have acne scarring for the first time in my life. I really debated on whether I should share my experience, but all I wanted was a mask to help when I had my occasional acne and to make me glow. Instead, I have WAY more skin problems . I recommend you avoid it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEST MASK EVER! When I get a breakout I use it as instructed: 3-4 days in a row, then every 2 days and so on.. can see a difference the second day of use. This is a holy grail for me!! Doesnu2019t dry out the skin and clears up my skin!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't want to say this face mask is magic, but... I have been having problems with adult acne all of a sudden after never really having issues with breakouts before.  Using this at night before I go to bed has really helped calm down my skin, not to mention it just feels so great on my face!  I've been keeping it in the fridge because I love the chilled feeling!  It's a great splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been buying this mask for about 3-4 years and I feel like it has genuinely worked for me. Whenever I used this I noticed that the next day my skin felt baby soft. It was one of those products where I felt like when I didnu2019t have it in my routine my skin was worse and I was breaking out more. Despite all this though Iu2019ve decided I wonu2019t be repurchasing anymore. I had a mini jar of it as a backup that I purchased about 4 months ago stored in a box and the box was inside of a drawer so it never saw light and it was in a dry environment, but when I cracked it open today it was definitely expired. It had turned into a dark green colour reminiscent of the bits that would stick to the bottom of the jars that I had almost used up and had for months. Disappointed that something Iu2019d thought of as a HG would go off like that but Iu2019m not surprised since Iu2019d seen many reviews about people saying theirs had gone bad as well. Herbivore doesnu2019t seem to use preservatives in their products so I shouldu2019ve known it would happen eventually.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've had great results very quickly with this product. I'm almost 30 and have always had moderate acne of every kind. I used this as directed- a few days in a row to begin with- and by day two I could see my blemishes diminishing. I currently use it about once per week with a VERY poor face care routine due to having a newborn, and still have impressively clear skin. I contribute most of that to this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had the product for a few months (purchased in April) and only used a couple of times. Went to use it today to find it had turned dark brown green and had obviously gone bad. Not sure what the shelf life is but i feel it should be longer than this. Very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great and love how it felt on my skin but this product is NOT for sensitive skin. Even just leaving it on for 5-10 minutes instead of the instructional 20 minutes left my skin red for hours afterwards. Wish it worked for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mask.Smells like the Northern Ontario forrest after it rains. Not only does it calm my skin and reduce redness, it actually resurfaces the skin and leaves me softer than a baby's... skin. Has been wonderful to help get rid of the acne I've been getting and also cleared some deep cysts. I am definitely ordering the full size this stuff rocks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is a game changer. No joke. I have sensitive skin, but I actually bought this for my back and chest. I have struggled with body acne for years and years, sometimes it flares up so bad that it hurts. Thatu2019s what happened recently, so I was desperate. I put this on for only 10 minutes and the next day I was actually speechless. I couldnu2019t believe how NOT red my skin was! The skin was smooth and it didnu2019t hurt to touch. I canu2019t wait to keep using it and have clear skin finally!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! I love the smell of this personally, it reminds me of the spa. It makes my face so moisturized and soft afterwards I will definitely purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has been a bit of a game changer for my excessively oily skin.  Helped regulate and works to make my oil free moisturizer really work to regulate the oil production.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have pretty acne prone skin, cystic and whiteheads and this did soothe and shrink them. it also doesn't leave your skin feeling dry, it's moisturizing as well. however this won't be replacing my proactiv acne treatment and i don't want to use both and aggravate my skin. i recommend this for people with more mild acne. also, i couldn't find this in the blue colour advertised, only dark green. this should be kept in the fridge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every other day and it definitely tames my maskne. My face did purge the first two weeks of using this and it was painful and ugly but for an exfoliator I  expected that, now my face is clearer than ever! I also love the smell idk but I like it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The 1st time I tried it my face BURNED, like felt very hot, got red, I was concerned. I have never used a chemical exfoliant so maybe was SUPER sensitive. That being said the next morning I woke up and my skin looked AMMMAZZING. Like I'd gotten some light botox. My pores looked smaller, my skin tighter. I love it but it definitely took me some time to work up to it. I can still only keep it on for 15 minutes before I feel it start to burn too much for my liking (the recommendation is 20). I may want to try a different mask after but I can't deny the results have been solid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do not purchase this product - this product went mouldy and was a completely defunct product. Customer service would not exchange or return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: makes my face look so bright and tight after and my acne scars look a lot less potent after using this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, the good first. Idk why people complain about the smell I love it. It smells like eucalyptus which I enjoy. Beyond that mmmmm this isnu2019t doing anything for my skin. It does have the cooling effect...until about half way through the jar. I noticed too that after a while the product gets this moss green color. Herbivore says this doesnu2019t change the efficacy of the product which I believe. Just giving you a heads up in case you notice. And the product is messy. Beyond that no change in my hyperpigmentation. For my melanated hyperpigmentation folks out there be careful with the AHA/BHA percentage in chemical exfoliants. Some products arenu2019t made for us. Back to Google I go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask.  I have very sensitive skin.  I also have hormonal acne and congested pores on my nose.  This has done wonders for my skin within the fist week.  It is also recommended by Hyram....so that says a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this mask, it smells earthy and herbal. As if you grabbed a bunch of herbs out of the ground and squeezed them into this jar haha The mask works well! You just honestly have to be patient because it is a mild exfoliation so you need to be consistent and wait. I would give it 5 stars, but since you won't get big results off one jar alone that's the only drawback. So I got a second one :) I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve almost used up all of my first jar of this, and honestly I donu2019t see the hype.  I really wanted to love it, given all of the really positive reviews, but it just didnu2019t live up to my expectations at all.  I canu2019t say anything bad happened from using the mask, but it also didnu2019t improve my skin at all.  Also, I really did not enjoy the fragrance in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a free sample of this with one of my purchases and it really works! I have super sensitive, dry, acne prone skin. After one use, this got rid of a stubborn pimple and changed the texture of my skin. This was convincing enough to buy a full size.   To preface, I use this once a week (Sunday) in conjunction with daily vitamin c use, retinol every other day, and a bha Toner on the days I donu2019t use retinol. It fits perfectly in this routine and keeps my skin baby soft :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only skincare product I've bought consistently for 2 years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this mask for my acne. It feels pretty light and gentle. It was okay. Iu2019ve used it for a couple of months now. It doesnu2019t dry out my acne. My skin is pretty sensitive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: used it regularly for a month or so, didnt see a difference at all. also veryyy fragrant for those w sensitive skin it may irritate you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Only giving it 4 starts bc I just starting using it, but I will say that it is giving me a GREAT feeling. The smell is either you love it or hate it, kinda reminds me of what I think the forrest in Twilight smells like. Iu2019m excited to incorporate it into my weekly routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give it zero stars I would! It smells absolutely awful, the u201cblueu201d colour quickly fades from a deep blue to a mossy green that is very off-putting. In addition to colour and awful smell, it did nothing for my skin but give me major irritation and redness. I have very normal go dry skin and I do not normally have reactions to any skincare, but this really did not work with my skin. I had it on for only 5 minutes before I couldnu2019t bear the smell anymore and when I took it off, it looked like I got slapped in the face I was so red. I donu2019t recommend this to anyone whatsoever

reviews.review_title: Good product but recently watered down
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is effective, in that it noticeably exfoliates the skin such that it is smoother and glows the next day. Importantly, it doesn't irritate my highly sensitive skin (and basically everything irritates my skin).   However, over the past year or so, the company has started to water down the products -- I guess to save money. This makes the product extremely runny and difficult to apply without spilling it all over the sink counter. Not to mention the fact that the little spatula they include for scooping is rendered completely useless. Just charge us slightly more for the real product, rather than forcing us to use an inferior product. Very disappointing.

reviews.review_title: Great for acne, but the price is really high.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did notice results bu the next day, and really helps with acne.  Smells weird, but thatu2019s not a concern when it works. Only reason Iu2019m not go it 5 stars is because itu2019s ridiculously expensive. If you can get your hand on the Ordinaryu2019s AHA/BHA face peel, thatu2019s also really good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have incredibly sensitive skin and am weary of any chemical exfoliator. This mask however is amazing! Iu2019m on day 3 of using it and I would say I saw results on the first time! I bought this to help with my random acne Iu2019ve been getting from my mask but it has helped with so much. My texture is pretty much gone, acne is under control, and my skin looks so clean and glowy. Iu2019ve used a lot of masks but they often fix my issues and create new ones. This mask is worth your time trying!!

reviews.review_title: Great for Sensitive/ Eczema prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: the only resurfacing or exfoliating mask I can use on my extremely sensitive skin

reviews.review_title: Not Magic but a Good Mask
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So Iu2019m giving this product 4 stars, taking off 1 only because with how amazing most of the reviews are, I was expecting something way more magical to happen when using this product. FIRST OF ALL I HAVE NO IDEA how people say that this smells badly?!? It literally smells like basil and tea tree which is like the best way to describe it, if youu2019ve used or tested UFO by Sunday Riley it smells very very similar & like refreshing, like you just mashed a bunch of garden herbs! I loved the way it felt on my skin during and after, my skin did feel really soft after, and quite glowy. I didnu2019t notice any crazy changes, I was going through a bad breakout when I tried it and it honestly didnu2019t do much for my breakout unfortunately but I do somehow still like this mask haha idk what it is but like I said I actually like the way it smells and it just feels nice to have on your face! Iu2019m going to be trying it again tonight now that my breakout has cleared up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is AMAZING ... yes the smell is different.. it might not be well liked by some.. but itu2019s not as nasty as some people are making it out to be. Thatu2019s the tansy oil smell.. so suck it up buttercup because it works magic. There are lots of amazing products that smell aweful but hey- THEY WORK! The texture is beautiful it melts on my skin and when I wash it off my skin glows and the next day my cystic acne improves so much too.  Definitely try it if you struggle with bad hormonal acne . I love this and will definitely buy the bigger size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was just ok, it didnu2019t seem to do anything after multiple times of using it. It started to burn my face if I left on longer than 5 minutes & the color became a dark green over time which apparently is normal but for the price of this jar I was really unimpressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask smells so bad. Iu2019m usually not sensitive to smells and this made me so nauseous I had to take anti-nauseous medicine. It also irritated my face.... not worth.

reviews.review_title: Awful, strong bathroom air freshener scent. gross.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my. Usually Iu2019m not sensitive to scents, but this one is POTENT. It smells like a bathroom air freshener youu2019d buy from the dollar store. Itu2019s awful. Itu2019s like fruity gummies mixed with pine and body odor. I left it on for the suggested 20 mins anyway just to see how my skin felt afterward but it was minimally effective. 100% not worth dealing with the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Alot of the reviews compared this mask scent to some strange things..like moldy pizza..the fact that you have had moldy pizza in your company is a bigger concern than a face mask scent hunny. The smell is light and spa like. I saw a difference in my skin the first time and I haven't stopped using it and wont. Also I contacted Herbivore an they told me the color does not mean it isn't working ,that's just what natural ingredients do..also it does not have to dry to be beneficial either..because mine stayed wet for over 20min unlike the model video showed. Love it an will continue to purchase but from the actual site for fresher product ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my all time favorites. I personally give it 5 stars, but I think the scent MAY turn people away from wanting to use it. Itu2019s a slightly herbal smell. I donu2019t always have this in my collection, but I highly recommend putting this in the fridge so itu2019s nice and cool when you apply it.

reviews.review_title: Great product for non sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this face mask but once I received I noticed that it does have a strong scent to it which isnu2019t as bad as other hav said but can cause a minor headache if scents bother you in products. I have very sensitive skin so once I tried it for five minutes my skin immediately turned red when I took it off. Even though my skin turned red it did make my skin appear better and feel smoother right away. Itu2019s a great product for people who donu2019t have sensitive skin; I had to return because the redness lasted longer than 10 minutes in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask. I am not someone who uses masks -- until I found this product. It so gently exfoliates the skin and has rid me of all of my mask-induced chin acne. The one thing I will note is that it has a STRONG, herbal scent.

reviews.review_title: not as effective as i thought it would be
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is the first product i've used from herbivore and the texture is so different. it's smooth and jelly and you only need to use enough for a thin layer on your skin. i usually left mine on for 20 minutes (i don't remember how long you're supposed to leave it on for) and i found it left my skin feeling clean and faded my hyperpigmentation a bit?? (i can't really say for sure). i didn't notice a long-term effect though, it didn't decrease my acne or noticeably fade my scars. i also didn't use it consistently though and that might be why.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally hands down, best mask I've ever used by a LONG shot. You may experience some tingling due to the lactic acid especially if you have sensitive skin, but I didn't experience a burning rash like I often do with other masks, especially natural ones. This mask actually makes a big difference in smoothness and skin clarity. Was shook.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. It smoothed over all my redness and acne and really cleaned out my skin to make it look a lot less res.

reviews.review_title: Not for me but maybe for sentive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Weird smell and very runny so be careful as to not drip everywhere. Struggled with what to rate it because it's not a bad product but for me personally it did nothing and was wayy too gentle. Left my skin feeling more on the dry side rather than a deep clean feeling. But the price is no bad and it is a more natural product and love that it's cruelty-free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: the mask works really well. Itu2019s gentle and kept my hormonal acne from flaring up. I knocked a star off because the smell is so strong. Itu2019s like a cross between chemicals and perfume. If you donu2019t mind the strong smell then I would recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good mask. It exfoliates well, and you can see an instant improvement in the skin. It is a little pricey for the amount you get, but it doesnu2019t irritate my sensitive skin. It starts to discolour after a while, so itu2019s best to finish in 3 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING! Itu2019s helped reduce the appearance of scars and helps get rid of any breakouts faster. It is also the only thing that has helped get rid of my blackheads. Miracle face mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is  a lil strong i have no idea how to describe it reminds me of listerine mouthwash but i still rate this 5 stars because my skin the past two weeks of using it has been so bomb i legit have no acne rn and after taking the mask off my face feels so soft so this mask is magical for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: iu2019m so glad I bought this mask. for me itu2019s worth the money-itu2019s making my skin look amazing and is gentle enough to use often. I struggle with inflammation and this has been really helping. personally I like the scent but it is strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Scrubs irritate my skin, so after trying Tata Harpers resurfacing mask and not being thrilled, I tried this one. Love it! My skin is so smooth and the tone is beautiful. Itu2019s a little pricey, but you donu2019t need much and you get quite a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask so much. Every time I take it off it feels like I have new skin, and it helped a lot with stubborn acne scars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mask, makes my skin so calm after I use it, zero redness and really helps with breakouts. I love the smell and the color. It is a more natural smell so if you prefer synthetic fragrances or more perfumey scents you may be turned off by it. They color does change over time but does not effect the results of the mask. A little goes a long way so it lasts a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It exfoliates gently and my skin feels soft and fresh after use. I donu2019t think it does a great job at reducing acne though it really helps exfoliate dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this product before committing to buying a full size, so when I saw this was available as a sample, I gladly chose this as a sample with my order. I watched lots of reviews of this on YouTube to ensure I was using it correctly. The color of the sample had gone slightly greenish/gray but I read/saw this was normal. Texture was fine, no problems with the mask per se. Applied the mask to my clean skin and only noticed very mild tingling which wasn't bothersome at all. Waited, then rinsed off like usual with no noticeable issues. Although my face felt very smooth and soft afterward, what I was bothered by was the SCENT of the mask. Even after washing it off, the smell wouldn't go away. That smell is not appealing. It reminds me of an weird toothpaste sort of smell. I think the smell is off putting enough that I won't purchase the full size. Blech!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I couldnu2019t digest itu2019s smell , forget about the result . I throw it literally itu2019s giving me headache. Such a strong nasty smell . 0 star

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is okay, I found that the first four days of using it I found it made a big difference, but only using it twice a week isnu2019t as significant. I think itu2019s a great introduction to actives and Super gentle but if you already use aha and bha I donu2019t think itu2019s necessary

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this three times a week for the last few weeks and have not noticed any difference. In the summer my skin gets oily and I get the odd breakout. I was looking for something to refresh my skin. Unfortunately, I am not a fan of the smell or consistency. It didnu2019t make me break out, and immediately after my skin feels clean, so I will give this a 2.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a no go for me because the fruit enzymes turned my face bright red and really irritate my skin. I would try something else with papaya/pineapple enzyme before dropping the money on this just to make sure you don't have a sensitivity. I now have a $48 tub that I can't use and is going to go bad pretty quick.

reviews.review_title: loved it at first then eh
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it at first as it does what it states. My target issue was 1. Textured skin on semi dry/Normal skin 2. Reducing the mild acne bumps (underneath skin) on chin area PRO: Resurfaces your skin texture to a smoother skin.  Finished 1 jar then bought the second.  CON: leaves skin feeling a bit red & raw with a stinging sensation on my cheeks. Reduced the time by leaving it on less and doing more infrequently. I eventually found myself not doing it at all.   Switching to Herbivoreu2019s PRISM 20% AHA + 5% BHA Exfoliating Glow Facial to see if this would help with the texture of my skin in a more milder way.   NOTE: color of the Tansy will change jar by jar. I store mine in a mini fridge which I mix the contents before using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blue Tansy used to be a holy grail in my skincare routine. I donu2019t know if the formula changed or I just got a bad batch, but Iu2019ve been using blue tansy twice a week for the last year and a half. On my latest refill, I noticed it smelled different and there was more sediment in my jar. It left my skin raw and red. Bring back the old formula!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is literally so good! it helped me with pore size, blackheads, whiteheads, acne scars, and getting glowing skin. it also is a good size for the price, because a little goes a long way. definitely recommend, especially if you have oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i actually have never tried this but hyram loves so we approve and i think you should just go for it but it does cost a bit so we're gonna bring it down to a four star for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: got it as a sample and almost didn't try it because of the smell. left it on for 5min and quickly rinsed it off. to my surprise my skin was baby soft and just felt so new and refreshed. I couldn't believe it. it was nice all day. I had to get the big bottle. the smell is still bad but it feels so great.

reviews.review_title: Works perfect, but a few things to expect...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how it worked on my face after I tried it! It does make my skin smooth and renewed. A few things to expect: 1. Itu2019s not as blue as itu2019s shown in the photo 2. Not everyone will like the smell 3. It may hurt a little if you have sensitive skin, so leave it for less time if you want

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this as it did not break me out and for the most part did as it said. I tend to have sensitive and at times dry skin. I also use Retin A every other night. This did not work wonders, but it did help exfoliate my skin and add a glow. One issue is you cannot put your hand in there as it will make it go bad faster, thus the scoop they give you is required. Also, it lasts longer if you keep it out of the light and in a dark space. I wish the glass jar it came in was dark. It is a good product though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far one of the best peels I ever used. I recommend this product to all my clients. I first got this product as a sample to use on myself and my boyfriend. He was having really bad skin congestion and breakouts. It helped cleared everything up after consistent use once a week. The peel is gentle enough that you do not have to worry about it burning if you are sensitive. And I personally love the smell. Everyone should try this mask. Yes problematic skin or not. Itu2019s nice to wake up with skin feeling like a polished pearl

reviews.review_title: Mold in my mask? No thank you!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really exited about this product but as soon as I opened the box I knew something was wrong. First thing the color. It was forest green with no hint of blue in it like you see in the pictures. I understand it could have been photoshoped but I don't think they would have gone to that extent.  Second the protection lid was barely stuck on to it. So this means it was basicly an opended product. The air, bacterias and things you don't want in your face mask was seeping in since the product was made.  And finaly there was some of the product that was sticking to the sides of the jar and had started to mold. This company uses very little preservatives and already had to recall some products because of mold problems. I returned mine and was told that this is a commun problem with this product. Don't buy! Run!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone complaining about the smell I donu2019t get. Itu2019s really not strong. Itu2019s herbal for sure, kind of reminds me of spas Iu2019ve been to in Paris. I wouldnu2019t wear it like a perfume, but listen that isnu2019t this babyu2019s job. And she does her job! Use as directed (every other day the first week). My pores are huuuuuge and this shrinks them like no ones business! Iu2019m past week one so itu2019s in rotation with a few other masks at this point but like YES thereu2019s a notable difference. My skin feels smooth and supple, my pores are smaller, and the period-induced spots I get are way less noticeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for a few weeks now and can definitely see a difference in my skin. I haven't really had issues with acne until this last year or so and I've been having trouble finding things that work to clear it. I do really think this helps though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like this really works! My face feels better when I rinse it off. Took off a star for the scent, it is very strong. The smell isn't bad necessarily but it lingers even after I was it off.  However, I would still recommend this if you aren't sensitive to scents. I can be sometimes, but using this hasn't caused any irritation. I like this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made my skin super irritated, red and dry, tried it out twice- 10 minutes the first time and 5 minutes the second time. Really bad. Smell is intense but okay if I could actually use it- basically have to throw out a new (expensive) product. Waste of $.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you're like me, you run as fast as possible away from any skincare at this price point. But I received a sample of this mask at Sephora along with the Lapis oil and tried it one night while I was breaking out with some pretty harsh cystic acne.  The next morning I saw noticeable improvement on the inflammation and redness of my skin. It even shrunk down some of the nodules and gave me back an even tone to my skin. I recommended it immediately to my girlfriends and will probably give it out as their Christmas presents this year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When I put this mask on, I immediately regret it because I really really hate the way it smells.  I count down the minutes until I can take it off.  But then I wash it off and I remember why I keep coming back for more: it is SO good.  My skin absolutely loves this mask.  It looks better and feels softer immediately and I will buy it over and over and over again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this mask with a Sephora order. The scent is interesting though I personally found it more herbal rather than stagnant pond algae as some other reviewers described. The sample lasted one use, my skin felt very smooth afterwards and it didn't cause any break outs. I liked it but I didn't love it. I wouldn't consider purchasing it, as there are so many high efficacy resurfacing and clarifying masks on the market at similar and lower price points.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: There's not a HUGE difference after using it a few times, but it doesn't disrupt my skin or cause any dryness. And I definitely notice a difference after only a few uses. I mostly feel like my skin is less dull, and I have smaller looking pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product changes its smell and color so quickly that u canu2019t even trust the benefit.. I finished two bottles with no results .. do not waste ur money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this as a sample- it feels like on my skin but the smells is nauseating. Had to breathe through my mouth because the scent was so bad. Itu2019s unfortunate since I like the ingredients that are in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: at first I got this as a sample and liked it but didnt see results really after one use even though my skin felt smoother. but after taking the leap and purchasing the full size I can say I LOVE this mask! I have oily/acne prone skin and blackheads. my skin always feel smoother after use, and after using consistenly for just a few times it really improved the texture of my skin! it was tingly while waiting the 15-20 min with it on my face, and left my skin a bit red after washing it off but that fades soon. it's super expensive but worth it as the liquidy formula seems to go pretty far on my face for a small amount, and I saw results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. It makes your face smoother. Besides, I donu2019t really mind regarding the smell or the colour of the mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOOOOVE this mask. Everytime i take it off my skin my face is so bright and smooth and feels great. Doesn't strip your skin or anything of that nature. It says you should leave it on for 20 but sometimes I leave it on for 25 maybe a little longer because it doesn't irritate my skin and I have really really sensative skin. Some of the reviews say they hate the smell of it but you get use to it. I always feel relxed when using it. I do wish the jar was bigger for the price. But i will be repurchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this mask for three months, once a week, got about 12 uses out of it. I actually like the earthy smell and didn't mind the tingly feeling, but I literally saw no difference in my skin. I struggle with blackheads and a bit of hormonal acne, and my spots were completely indifferent to this mask. Definitely wouldn't buy again, there's no results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like old tires. I couldnu2019t handle the smell long enough to leave it on. But it goes on all gel like and dries clear. I have now had this mask washed off my face for an hour and put on my usual moisturizer and I still smell old tires.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THE BEST MASK Iu2019VE EVER BOUGHT! I struggled with hormonal acne during & months following my pregnancy.  When I say I tried everything to clear up my skin, I tried EVERYTHING. reviews.review_title: Love the blue tansy smell, wish it came in a mini

I would suggest buying the smaller size (with the mini lapis oil) since Herbivore does not use preservatives. I wish they sold a mini size by itself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

The reason I give 4 stars is because the jar packaging is not suitable for the goopy, liquidy texture of this mask. They give you a completely useless spatula- lame. I'd like to see this mask in a compostable or recyclable tube instead please!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing. I use it on any pimple like area and it is  magic! I love it

Beggars aren't choosers and if you want clear skin; complaining about smell won't help you. Not everyone has the luxury to complain about smell lol as long as my cane's out, I'm happy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ordered bc i felt like the masks i wear at work everyday are making my pores clogged but it smells like a mix hookah & wet dog so i couldnu2019t stand to leave it on longer than 30 seconds.. if you can stand the smell it may be a nice mask, but I couldnu2019t get there

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask! Makes my skin look smooth and my pores nearly gone. Lovely herbal smell. I have sensitive skin and many products cause problems but not this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do believe this is a great mask if you have a little patience.   When I first purchased it and followed directions, I was a little disappointed when I received it having a mossy green colour instead of the blue that Iu2019d seen online everywhere.  But fret not, itu2019s still good to use.  At first my skin became filled with red splotches and dry spots when I used it the first couple of times.. I gave my skin about a week break from this and I noticed during the break my skin looked and felt extremely smooth, blurred, my pores looked much smaller and tighter.  My make up applied much smoother and stopped looking dry and and cakey. The little bumps on my face I have due to extra sebum production are starting to smooth out as well.  I donu2019t only credit this mask.. but also life style changes.  My skin looks a looooot better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: it works great but weird smell.

reviews.review_text: it's good! it works great but the smell you have to get over. I broke out bad yesterday and I used this mask last night and today my face looks noticeably brighter and my spots are less red.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I only got a sample, but this mask smells so badly so I wonu2019t be buying full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
