reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was wanting to try The Ordinary AHA/BHA peel but was hesitant because I didnu2019t know how my skin would react. So I splurged and got this after reading about it in a review about The Ordinary peel. Let me tell you... WORTH IT. BUY IT. I am recovering from getting off the pill after 10 years and all the lovely facial side effects that go with it.... so my skin is pretty wrecked with hormonal acne.... ugh I could go on and on about what all Iu2019ve tried, but let me tell you.... BUY THIS. Read all the other reviews and just do it!! If youu2019re on the fence.... just do it! I am getting to the point where I can probably get away with feeling confident in a tinted moisturizer vs my normal Estee Lauder double wear foundation. Not 100% there yet, but I have only been using this for a week so I am looking forward to seeing continued improvement! I followed instructions on using it 3-4 days in a row at first, and then I started using it every other night in rotation with my retinol. Contrary to a lot of these reviews. I LOVE the smell. Love love love. Even if I hated it I would still use it. Best mask ever. Buy it!! Will post an updated review with before and after pictures.. like I said, itu2019s only been a week!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent product, makes my skin glow and smooth. Many reviews comment on a terrible smell, but I actually quite like it? It smells herbal and green, definitely a noticeable scent but not a bad one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got compliments on my skin after a few nights of using this. I had a few breakouts the first time I used it (purging) but they were minor and I didn't experience it the second time. I didn't experience any noticeable tinging unfortunately and I've decided to purchase something with a little more AHA/BHA, but I'd recommend this to people more sensitive to acids. As for the smell, I didn't think it was that terrible haha. I mainly smell willow bark and menthol (kinda combines into a eucalyptus type of scent). I was expecting the worst but it was ok.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it didnu2019t do anything to my face, i had a hormonal acne breakout and i saw no difference

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this mask so far, but the smell is hard to handle at times. I'm usually not sensitive to skin care fragrances, but even after I wash this off, the scent lingers on me. I honestly want to wear nose plugs when I use this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not that impressed, I had high hopes for this product because of all of the awesome reviews on here as well as how much the youtuber hyram raves about it. To be honest I havenu2019t noticed any transformational differences. This would be good for people who have sensitive skin because this is very gentle. I use a retinol and the AHA BHA mask by the ordinary in my weekly routine and this product is definitely the most gentle out of the three.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this with the Blue Tansy oil about a year ago as I started to develop late 20u2019s hormonal acne. I initially thought these were making my skin worse but it has literally been because of late hormonal issues, NOT the productu2019s fault. I have started re-using these a few months ago as I am still dealing with acne. Iu2019ve been taking medications and using curology which is great but isnu2019t enough. All of these combined have been wonderful. This mask is gentle, feels good and remains good for a long time. It turned from blue to a missy green, but after research, it is still ok to use as it changes colors. It smells great but could irritate the eyes as it is a bit mentholated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a free sample with purchase. Firstly there was barely enough in it to cover entire face. Second the smell overtook me as I did not expect it to be that strong. Third, it made my skin red within 5 mins of it being on so I instantly washed it off. So no difference expect red, irritated skin and my skin isnu2019t sensitive as I have quite tolerant skin for all the products I use or have used (retinol, peels..etc) I would not buy as there are too many cons. It did leave a cooling effect so I guess thatu2019s a plus since it looked like it burned my skin instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used every other day at night. I felt the difference after couple of uses. I don't feel sting on my skin. Love it! I will re-purchase for sure. It helps to minimize my pores a little bit as well.

reviews.review_title: Color change is normal!!!  Stop throwing it away!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask!  My mask did turn green, but this is normal and the product is still effective.  It even states this in their website.  u201cMask may be dark blue to missy green in color, a change in color does not effect the efficacy of the productu201d.  I can attest to this as my mask arrived a nice blue, then changed to missy green.  I still used it (itu2019s expensive!), it worked perfectly and I had no adverse reaction.  People, youu2019re throwing away an amazing $50 mask for no reason.  If you still donu2019t trust it, do a patch test, which you should do anyway.  That being said, itu2019s not worth the price.  I get a custom formulated prescription trentinoin from Curology for $19.95 per month. I have mature, acne prone skin, so my custom formula is Retin A, clindamycin (antibiotic) and azelaic acid.  This product has been a game changer.  No more breakouts, my lines are lessening and my pores are clean and have reduced in size.  Spend your money on Curology instead!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It works so well, but it smells so bad.! :( I'd recommend this if you're not sensitive to smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use in the morning weekly. Itu2019s fantastic the skin turnover and reduces redness around my nose. It doesnu2019t sting but it leave a odor behind that doesnu2019t bother me. DO NOT USE AROUND EYES.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, regardless of what all the other reviews are saying, I loved the smell. It smells exactly like blue chamomile essential oil. I used it 2 times a week and it gave immediate brightening effects. I didn't give it 5 stars because it's very expensive and the color and texture changed after a few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is very acne-prone, and this mask has not only kept my new acne to a minimum but has also helped smoothen out my skin and brighten some of my pigment scarring from past acne. Although the smell might take some getting used to, this is the only mask I am using at the moment and am not regretting it one bit! I have been using this mask for four nights in a row and with typically sensitive skin that reacts easily to products, I can leave this mask on for 20 minutes with no bad reactions. So if you have sensitive, combination, and/or acne-prone skin, I highly recommend the spend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good mask, it works well to clear spots. However! Boy does it stink, like sweet minty barf. I wonu2019t be getting again. I shove Kleenex balls in my nose when I use just so I donu2019t smell it. It makes me want to throw up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample YEARS ago, and I havenu2019t stopped thinking about it since. I finally got around to buying it, and it is just as good as I remember. I have sensitive skin, and it does sting a little but definitely not bad whatsoever. I would recommend it to everyone!

reviews.review_title: If you are scent sensitive this isnu2019t for you
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample, was really stocked for it but the smell made me gag. Itu2019s atrocious, smells like an old wet dish rag thatu2019s been forgotten over weeks! The skin stings during the application, becomes red and just unattractive

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At last a mask that really works! I had been looking for true results for a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: PROS: smoother skin, more even tone.  CONS: bizarre smell, the first use was rough but you get used to it. I did have some initial break outs but I reached out to herbivore & they said it was normal. (My skin purging)  Overall: I like it, itu2019s not a holy grail product for me. do I see a difference? Kinda? Is it life changing? No. If you have the budget itu2019s worth a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve heard such good things about this product so I really wanted to try it. However, it stung, made my skin red, made me break out and dried out my skin. Iu2019m sure this works better for other people but it just wasnu2019t for me.

reviews.review_title: Best for sensitive, redness and oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask has worked wonders for my skin. I donu2019t get acne but I do get stubborn bumps. This is the only product that evens out my skin so that my make up does not appear u201cCakeyu201d. I have very sensitive skin so this product might not be for you if you want a stronger resurfacing agent.   I started using this mask in 2018 and tried other cheaper masks but eventually decided to go back to using blue tansy. It has been the only mask worth the price  paying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The mask worked ok but I could just not get over the smell!! After taking off the mask I had to wash my face twice to get the smell away. I had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Less acne and smoother skin after continuously using for a week. The smell is strong and weird but acceptable for me. But it ran out quite fast for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is amazing, I donu2019t typically give reviews since all skin type is different. I use this 3 days in a row and 3 days off for 1 month and it has transformed my skin being smooth, no patchiness and a major glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this mask as directed for the past 3 weeks and I can honestly say that I have seen a positive improvement in my skin. My redness has decreased and my skin appears smoother. However, I cannot continue using this mask due to the smell! It is very overwhelming and I found myself breathing through my mouth instead of my nose while using this mask in order to avoid smelling it. I do recommend this product based on the results I saw in my skin, as long you can get over the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does what it claims. I followed the directions when I first received it and used it twice a week to maintain. This product came in a bluish/ green color and thin in consistency. With consistency, it does reduce the little bumps on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really had high hopes for this product. Iu2019ve used it maybe 4 times. I cannot get over the smell. Itu2019s awful and Iu2019m not a person who normally cares about scents, but I couldnu2019t get over this. I felt like it did an okay job for a clarifying mask, but will def not repurchase and probably throw the rest away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great as itu2019s an exfoliator and mask. It gently bulldozes all the excess serum and dead skin cells on my face. The smell sucks though, thatu2019s why Iu2019m only giving it 4 stars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product that always leaves my skin feeling fresh and radiant! One of the few products that I purchase again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't do much for me. As with many others, mine was extremely watery and green. Glad I received a sample before spending the money. You can definitely find better exfoliating masks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this mask back on April and was disappointed to see the product had gone bad when I receive it. (Green and liquidy). I reached out to Sephora and they refunded me no problem. However, I am a bit concerned because i went to a Sephora store today, and saw that their display of this mask was green and moldy! I took a look in two boxes as i was going to purchase, and they were also green!  For reference, i have used this product before and loved it, so i know what the consistency and colour should look like!  There are no preservatives in this mask, therefore the shelf life isnu2019t as long as other products. My concern is that maybe Sephora has too many old blue Tansy masks in inventory that they are trying to offload.  Fantastic mask for congested acne prone skin. Hoping Sephora is able to resolve this apparent issue soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't mind the products smell, it was kind of woodsy but very potent. The texture was really runny and slimy. Mine was a green color (which they say is normal. you either get green or blue from what the website says) The packaging says to leave it on for 5 to 10 minutes if you have sensitive skin (normally 20) and I don't,  but I took it off at around 13 minutes. My face got red around the perimeter of my face and under my eye theres a red patch that has been burning for a few minutes already, as well as a large red patch of skin next to it on my cheekbone. I normally handle new products well but this irritates my skin badly. As a side note the smell does linger. Even with the rest of my products on my skin at night, it's the only thing I smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Would not recommend. The smell is so strong and I did not like it at all. Irritated my skin and didnu2019t find it helped with anything.

This is one of the best skincare products Iu2019ve ever used, and my absolute favorite way to use chemical exfoliants. This mask is really gentle and soothing for my sensitive, acne-prone skin, but noticeable gives smoother, softer skin and lightened acne scars. I canu2019t live without it. Usually use 1-3 times a week, but the label says you can use every day during a particularly bad breakout. Itu2019s gentle enough that daily use sometimes isnu2019t overwhelming. Please buy this. Your skin will thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the worst face mask I have ever used. The smell was so awful that it almost made me throw up. Also, the mask burns a lot and it didnu2019t do much to my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skinu2019s very high maintenance - oily/combination, acne-prone and uneven skin tones. This mask just happens to address every single one of these concerns and I absolutely fell in love!!!!  It leaves your skin feeling clean, clear/brighter. Itu2019s a bit tingly when first applied, but otherwise quite gentle and does not irritate my sensitive skin.   It has a strong smell as fellow users note, and the consistency makes it a bit harder to apply evenly or to wash off - neither of which bother me. I find you need to use regularly for best results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is strong and kind of makes me nauseous while applying. But it does smooth out your skin. Bought this especially for period skin- breakouts and dryness. It does the job. Results arenu2019t immediate though, didnu2019t see any until the following morning. For the price point I probably wouldnu2019t buy this again as the ordinaryu2019s red serum peel gives me the same results for $8

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write a review but this product does everything it says. I use it 2-3 times a week and my skin is no longer red and has taken care of my hyperpigmentation. My skin literally has never been better. As for everyone saying it changed color - itu2019s normal, itu2019s all natural...thatu2019s what happens. If you think itu2019s u201cexpiredu201d check the bottom of the bottle. Mine turned green and works great! As for the smell...itu2019s strong but after a minute you get used too it. I will recommend this to everyone I know!

reviews.review_title: color is mossy green instead of blue
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: runny mask color is green and smell so strong  was spilled over bottle wen arrive tough to apply over face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is really great. Itu2019s one of only a few masks that I can say actually do what they claim to do. My skin always feels calmer and less congested when I use it as well as it helps clear up my skin when I get breakouts. The only small downside is the smell isnu2019t the most pleasant but Iu2019m very sensitive to smell so if I can get used to it Iu2019m sure most people can to. Itu2019s a natural kind of smell, not like a pretty fragrance but you get used to it. Itu2019s also pricey but you need very little to cover your whole face so it lasts quite a long time. I think itu2019s very worth trying if you have irritated, red and breakout prone skin! I do highly recommend :)
My skin got irritated after using this product. I wonu2019t buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of herbivore products. This mask is nice but not my favorite. It didnu2019t do much for me, and I donu2019t love the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: the best face mask for oily skin! im obsessed with this product. its a great chemical exfoliant! makes my skin feel clean and free of any bacteria! ( I also love that it comes in a glass bottle- so easy to repurpose this container when i run out)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Product arrived a dark greenish grey instead of the blue as shown in pictures. Had a strong smell of alcohol and was sort of sour and minty, with a layer of spotted fluid on top and along the sides. Was supremely disappointed, didn't even bother using it as it was obviously off. Seems like this has happened to a few people over the years and might have something to do with how quickly this formula goes bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have ance-prone, dry/ combination skin. This mask works so well for me! I use this whenever my skin is breaking out, dry, dull, or all of the above. I always wake up with soft skin, and it helps clear up my breakouts. Itu2019s my go-to pick me up because it actually does work for me. It has a medicinal smell, that I personally really enjoy.  It was recommended to me from a Sephora worker, and Iu2019m about to make a re-purchase.

reviews.review_title: Does what it claims to do
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My pores really feel cleaner after just a handful of uses. Iu2019ve used it 5 times and it has barely made a dent in the product. Itu2019s a good bang for your buck for that reason.   It does smell odd, almost like menthol. It smells strong but not terrible. The smell wouldnu2019t prevent me from re-purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, doesn't do anything. It has a bad smell that smells like buckleys

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product! I use it 2-3 times a week and my skin is looking clearer than ever! Definitely recommend if you are on the fence about trying it out!

reviews.review_title: Gentle on sensitive skin & EFFECTIVE AF
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the effectiveness but equal gentleness of this mask. I have sensitive, acne prone/combination skin at 30 and itu2019s the worst. This mask goes on and feels super cool which I love. It smells very earthy/natural & it is strong for those reading other reviews.  I donu2019t mind the smell but I can see how those sensitive to smells would. Not a deal breaker at all for me.Once itu2019s on, you feel a bit of tingling after a few minutes but itu2019s not painful. The next day my skin is GLOWING. I feel my pores are cleaner/tighter & any acne on the edge of emerging is kept at bay after I use this. Usually, masks this effective also dry my skin out considerably and this one absolutely does not. Itu2019s now a staple for me. :)

reviews.review_title: Calms, Reduces Redness, Smooths / Mild Exfoliation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hmm. I donu2019t wanna say this mask completely decongested my pores because it didnu2019t. My closed comedones are still chilling.   BUT, this mask does calm down redness, and it does make your face smoother! There may be some kind of exfoliation as it does tingle... but not enough for visible results of clogged pores for me personally.   I still rated it 5 stars because of the calming nature of the mask. It would always make my skin feel less irritated. It would also be great for someone looking to maintain their clear skin rather than really change it.   Iu2019m not sure if I would repurchase... testing KBeauty atm :).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I mean there isnu2019t enough good things I can say about this mask. If you have redness you can literally see this mask taking it away as itu2019s on. It makes your skin flawless and itu2019s amazing for acne prone skin. Iu2019ll seriously cry if this is ever discontinued.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t even Exhadurate how amazing this product is. Over the past year Iu2019ve struggled with severe acne and acne scaring and I have tired everything under the sun and this is the holy grail. It helps to keep new breakouts at bay and has completely lightened and brightened my scarring to a point where Iu2019m comfortable not wearing makeup. If you struggle with acne I highly recommend this product!!

reviews.review_title: One of the best masks for blemish-prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In have repurchased this mask twice. I have blemish-prone skin and was very nervous to move from my dermatologist prescribed skincare to more natural products. This Blue Tansy mask (along with the Herbivore Lapis oil) have been gamechangers for me. My skin is clearer than it ever was on the products from my derm.  When I first got the mask I used in for 4 nights in a row (what the instructions recommend) and I saw an improvement in my redness and blemished after 3-4 days. I now use it once a week and I love what it's doing for my skin. I know what it's like to spend money on products that don't work, but this one works. I'll purchase again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly the best face mask Iu2019ve ever used. My skin is so glowy after I use it, itu2019s gentle, my face doesnu2019t get all red after using. I canu2019t rave about this enough

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product, but it burned my face so bad... I literally lasted 5 minutes in the sink washing my face with cold water to relieve the painful burning sensation it left me with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell was so strong I couldn't even keep it on for a minute. The smell literally makes you gag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: some people dont like the scent but omg I love it. its earthy and delicious. the mask is my holy grail. the only product that truly exfoliates skin super gently AND calms the skin at the same time. it helps calm down redness and inflammation right away and overnight. definitely helps with acne too. absolutely love and will repurchase for lifeu2764

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried it once and my face felt very clean afterwards. There was no tingling or stinging that was mentioned as a possible effect in the instructions. I ended up returning the item because the smell is so strong and it is not pleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, my skin is smooth, but the smell is SO overwhelming, I couldnu2019t handle it. It lingers after you take it off and I had to shower to get it out of my nostrils. I just canu2019t !!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this today and unfortunately I already know Iu2019m gonna have to return it. I wanted to give it a fair shot, try it out for a month and see what results I got...but I just CAN NOT tolerate the smell! :( Itu2019s sooo pungent.  I was not expecting it to smell pleasant based off of some reviews, but itu2019s worse than I thought. I have the lapis oil and thought maybe it would be similar to that... nope. Itu2019s like cough syrup, super strong pine, and moldy wet towels. I applied the mask and it made me so nauseous. It actually made the back of my throat feel dry just from breathing it in. I took it off and can still smell it lingering, ughhhh... I thought I could push through it to try it a few more times but I really donu2019t think I can. For the price, I want a mask that I will enjoy and actually be able to make it through the whole jar.   Also the one I received is not blue, its green. Their pictures online are very misleading. Iu2019m wondering if that means itu2019s an older product and that explains why the smell is so off putting?? I wonder if the non-expired thing smells better?   Anyways- still giving 2 stars because I like herbivore as a brand their packaging is aesthetically pleasing, and the product did make my skin pretty soft after 1 use... but itu2019s just not enough. Iu2019m thinking I will exchange it for their prism mask instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So so so sad to be writing this review. Iu2019ve been waiting for this to arrive for close to a month now. I received the item today, and before I even had a chance to try it out I couldnu2019t. I opened the box and the container and my mask was leaking everywhere not to mention it was green color! So sad. I will definitely give it another chance once the stores open back up. As of right now, 1 Star

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Meh.  No seriously, mehhhhhh.  Itu2019s not bad not amazing I donu2019t think Iu2019d purchase again felt like it did nothing

reviews.review_title: Does what is says it will do
