reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth every penny! I have stubborn hormonal acne and this product really helps to get deep down into the pore to kill that acne while also being super gentle and non irritating. My most favorite mask for clearing acne!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am amazed at how clarified my skin looks after I use this product! The consistency is a very liquid jelly but itu2019s easy to scoop up with the spatula that is included. I use tretinoin 7 days a week and for those who donu2019t know, itu2019s basically vitamin A on crack, it thins the skin thus making the amount of masks I can use safely very small. I have to be very careful that it wonu2019t further strip my skin. So far, this one hasnu2019t! I used it three days in a row as instructed (tried to use it a fourth and skin was a bit red afterwards) after 3 days, be sure to switch to every 3-4 days. I love this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! Iu2019ve never been this dumbfounded and in love with a product like this before! Iu2019ve read so many great reviews on this, but Iu2019ve read so many great reviews on other products that claimed to clear up acne, and reduce the appearance of acne scars too but always failed me. So when I finally made this purchase I didnu2019t get my hopes up, but within the first application I noticed remarkable results! I would pay $100 for this product if I had to. Iu2019m grateful to have finally found something that makes me feel comfortable in my own skin and even more grateful it was only $48, worth every penny! I know I should stop, but I canu2019t stop touching my face! So in love!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my 1st review ever and is going to be a bad one unfortunately. When I first opened the bottle it smelled horrible but since itu2019s natural I thought itu2019s normal. The texture is nothing like what I see online and it has brown spots and a film of oil on top. Thatu2019s when I realized the product might is defective and I immediately returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a moldy, green product with brown bits. No thanks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been barely using this product and usually wait a few weeks before reviewing something, but it's been so amazing I can't wait. I saw results immediately after using it the first time. My skin was noticeably clearer and less red. Sure, it didn't make my blemishes disappear but everything just seemed so much more smoothed out. There are a few downsides I've noticed to this product so far, but none significant enough to get me to stop using it. It find applying it with the applicator to be a bit tedious and time consuming, though I don't want to use my fingers because I don't want to waste any product. I also find it difficult to wash off and really don't want to resort to any soap or scrubbing to remove it. And finally, I do have sensitive skin so initially (maybe a minute), there is some heat (I wouldn't necessarily call it burning) though it subsides very quickly and I'm glad the description actually gives you a heads up about that because there are a lot of products that burn my face that aren't supposed to and I stop using. I don't find the smell overwhelming like some people. Sure, it's odd, but I can get used to it. And it's SO worth it for these results. Initially, it says to just it daily for a few days, and I would HIGHLY recommend following that instruction before slowing down to once or twice a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite products! Iu2019ve used this mask many times, before and after going on prescription acne solutions, and it has always helped my skin. I just recently got off the prescription solutions since my skin was getting way too dry and sensitive, so the switch back to normal products really made my skin break out. Using this almost everyday for the first week, then switching to twice a week, helped clear my flare ups. I also paired this with the lapis oil and the charcoal soap bar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve worked in the make up industry for about eight years and in those  eight years Iu2019ve tried a lot of things this is one of the few products I can say actually does what it says it does it really smooths uneven skin texture, Iu2019m have very sensitive acne prone skin almost everything makes me break out or irritated but not this I appreciate this mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! I was having a really bad breakout for almost 3 months and nothing was working. When one would go away 3 more would pop up. All my usual pimple fighting products werenu2019t cutting it. But this mask completely cleared it up and brought my skin back to normal in about 2-3 uses. I am a big believer in nourishing my skin and moisturizing it during breakouts. A lot of acne products I feel like (I am not a professional) damage your skin. This product stood out to me as it had decent ingredients. I have since used up my bottle. If my skin is ever in a situation like that again I will buy this product in a heartbeat.  I will say it does go bad and you can visibly see it. This just means you need to use it in the specified time you have it. Which is both sad and good. Sad because I have a hard time remembering to use masks, especially when my skin is good. Good because it means I am using products for their specified time and not hoarding products that have gone bad but still work.  I would definitely recommend this product if you are having issues with breakouts or texture. The smell isnu2019t nice but I didnu2019t hate it. It smelt kind of a little like seaweed and dirt, which I would prefer than having something full of fragrance as they donu2019t benefit your skin. It reminded me of some medical creams that have strong earthy scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just received this and was really excited to try this product but when I opened it, I noticed there was mold under the cap. I was well aware that there could be discoloring from the product details and reviews but MOLD???Will be contacting the company about the shelf life and safety of this product.  Giving 2 starts because I LOVE Lapis face oil

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really helps with redness associated with acne, helps to calm down any breakouts I have and keeps them from coming back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Since working from home started I decided to use this time to step up my skincare game and take advantage of the break from my usual makeup routine. This mask has changed my skin!  It is more smooth, even, and my hyperpigmentation from past breakouts have almost disappeared. I canu2019t believe it. My only complaint is that the smell is kind of sharp but it fades quickly. Will be repurchasing for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Would honestly give it 10 stars if I could. I re-bought this product at least 3 times because the results are incredible! I never minded the smell because to be honest it's not that strong in my opinion...But even after one use your skin really looks brighter and more alive. I have acne prone skin and I usually at any given time have have at least 2-3 cystic acnes on my face. This not only helps with that but it helped so much with my acne scars that made it look like I had more acne on my face. Just buy it, it's worth the money. It's the most gentle product that does so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff, especially when my skin is acting up. When my skin gets irritated I get tons of whiteheads, some redness and cystic acne. I will always go to this when I need it because it helps so much with all of my problems. It is also helpful to use when my skin is just feeling dull. It smells nice, it's easy to rinse and the price isn't out of this world expensive. I love Herbivore products, just use them fairly quickly or they will start to go bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell. I cannot take the smell. I had high hopes with this product as it has gotten many good reviews. I tried it 2 days in a row and my reaction to the smell got worse the 2nd time around. Smells do not usually bother me but the smell of this product is so strong I could not take it. This is definitely being returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask contains ALCOHOL. They mysteriously left out the ingredient that was likely causing consumers to breakdown from their mask from both this Sephora listing AND their website. I'm very uncomfortable with this, and now I don't know if I trust the other products this brand makes.  It seems they use this shorter ingredient list posted here for the mini sizes of the masks (as I've bought a set with the mini size and fell in love), to get you to buy the full size. And then they put ingredients that break you out in the full size so you use it more quickly because you think it'll help your breakouts. I used to love this brand. I cannot support them anymore.  I've attached the real ingredient list of the full size mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure if I had the misfortune of getting a bad batch (quality control, where you at?) or if the product just has a short shelf life, but the product looked like muddy swamp water when I opened the jar. To my disappointment, the colour and consistency were way off from the pictures on here, and there was an oily film on top that kept resurfacing even when mixed. I didn't mind the smell as much as some have mentioned in their reviews, but it was quite potent and perhaps not for everyone. Sadly, a few others in their reviews mentioned they received the product in this condition. Hope I can repurchase this when stores reopen, be wowed, and change this review!

reviews.review_title: Great at first, but no long term results.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had very high hopes when I bought this mask (I enjoyed a trail size I had used before), but was rather disappointed. I get bad hormonal acne and this mask did little to nothing to help reduce it. When I use it at night, my skin looks amazing when I first wash it off, but all visible benefits are gone by the morning. I'm at the bottom of the jar currently and really haven't seen any long lasting benefits. Using as recommended, the jar also goes surprisingly fast. I'll be looking to other resurfacing products in the future to help with my hormonal acne and milia.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Would have given this 5 stars after the completion of my first jar, as it really helped smooth and refine my skin.  I'm quite disappointed with my second purchase that I didn't open immediately as I was still finishing up the first jar. Upon opening it, I realized it wasn't properly sealed and leaked all over the inside of the box, and had something odd residue that looked like mould all over the inside of the jar.  I contacted Sephora customer service to find it out if it was ok to use, and they told me it's hard to say and that I should probably discard it to be safe, as I had just exceeded the possible return date.  Lesson learned- inspect your products as soon as you receive them, especially if you don't plan on using them right away.

reviews.review_title: Could be mold if it's green/spotted!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm only posting this to help out anyone who might be wondering if their mask arrived expired/moldy. I can't fairly review the product itself because I didn't try mine out. It was dark green with some darker black spots and smelled horrible. The other reviews do say that it smells strongly/badly anyway, and their own website states that there might be discoloration or spots so I couldn't be sure whether or not mine was bad. I sent a photo to customer service and received confirmation as well as an immediate refund. So, if yours smells exceptionally bad or is dark green and spotted- it might have gone bad and you should find out before using!

reviews.review_title: FINALLY I HAVE AN EVEN SKINTONE!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It calms my sensitive skin and leaves me with a beautifully even complexion. Itu2019s a chemical exfoliant so be sure to wear sunscreen after using this! It stings a bit but SO worth it.

reviews.review_title: Great instant differences that don't last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do love the way my skin looks after I use this but I haven't noticed any long term differences. My skin looks bright and healthy, and my pores are noticeably smaller for the rest of the day when I use it in the morning though! Also the smell is strong in a minty, eucalyptus, floral mix, so may not be for everyone. overall would recommend but you could also find a cheaper version but I found it worth the money for such a clean product that makes me skin feel so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really couldnu2019t get past the smell it really was wayyyy too much. If you like the smell or can push through it then power to you! I donu2019t know if this works or not but itu2019s a no for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have terrible hormonal cystic acne around my jaw line and this is the only product I have found that clears up my breakouts or prevents them altogether. I have super sensitive skin and it took a few tries to keep it on into it dried but I have gotten used to it and no longer experience the tingle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to help with pores but it only made it worse. I canu2019t keep it on for a long time and it irritates my skin and leaves it red after. The next day my skin looks fine but I donu2019t think Iu2019d wanna keep using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mask! Helps with acne for sure, I tend to get red bumps and white heads. The only thing I dislike is the color. I know the mask did not expire in the time I had it but it started a blue/teal color and ended up a moss green. This is supposed to be normal I just didnu2019t really like the random color change in the product with age.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love blue tansy effects of Luna oil so I thought I would try this mask.  Bad idea.  Iu2019m very scent sensitive.  Tried for the first time and found the smell unbearable.  I kept it on for the 15 min but ugh.  Have never returned anything, this might be the first.

reviews.review_title: Eliminated cystic acne and deep texture
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this as recommended for the first four days and then every two-three days thereafter and noticed a huge difference in the texture of my skin. It helped to get out all the gunk (which resulted in white heads the first few days) and eliminated some of my most serious acne on my chin including deep cystic acne. I keep it on for 30-45 minutes right after a shower. It cleanses and hydrates. The smell isnu2019t great, but itu2019s not as bad as other reviews claim. Iu2019d rather have clean ingredients that work over harsh fragrances on my face. Itu2019s truly one of the only masks that has shown noticeable results. A must have for problem skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I couldnu2019t even keep this mask on for the time it says because the smell is so strong and made me sick. it smells like cough medicine and didnu2019t do much anyways. bummer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Have used this for years always loved it. Itu2019s a very gentle calming mask and you get used to the smell. But not sure if they changed the formula because this recent jar I bought smells worse than usual.

This product smells awful. My head legit kills from the smell. Itu2019s such an uncomfortable scent. I will definitely be returning super upset Bc I ordered it during the sale , I should have got something else that was worth the discount!!!! Awful awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been trying out this product for a little over a month and I have been loving it! I have uneven texture, acne prone, pores, and combo but mostly oily skin and this mask has been absolutely amazing! My skin has never looked more beautiful, soft, and clear! I started off by using this product as recommended.. 3-4 days straight then 1-2 times a week, I try to use it at least twice a week now. If you have sensitive skin Iu2019m not sure that Iu2019d recommend because it will sting at first, it wasnu2019t so bad for me because I do no have sensitive skin. I havenu2019t had a breakout since about a week after first using this product. The texture is kind of like a gel that will dry and sit on your face for 15-20min. When you wash it off it takes a bit longer, the smell is lovely to me.. super earthy! I would definitely recommend this product, it will be added to part of my skin care routine! Will definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is expensive, I get why people hate the smell, it does sting and it's not a total miracle worker (but like what is???) But I find it really helps with reducing acne related inflammation and and texture pretty much immediately and it leaves my skin super soft ! I like it a lot and most masks either dry me out too much or don't  do a lot for me that a toner/moisturizer/essence or other leave on treatment wouldn't do. No one needs this but it really works for my routine and i would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's a decent mask. For me it doesn't do much, since I've used so many harsher exfoliants that my skin is obviously tougher.  I usually apply it as my first step of nighttime skincare after cleansing and leave it on for about an hour or more until it's completely dried. I do feel my skin is less oily the night and even the next day, but I'm not sure if it does any change to my skin texture-wise.  I wanna remind y'all though that from my personal experience with this product how much I use each time does affect how great it works - if I put a thick layer on the anti oiliness effect stays longer. With this being said this jar still lasted me a good three months so I'm not mad about it (I use it 2 or 3 times a week).

reviews.review_title: smelled horrible and didnu2019t do anything
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not see a difference in my skin at all. Iu2019m 30 years old and was looking for something more natural that can help with dark spots, acne, and redness. First of all, this smelled really bad and I couldnu2019t wait to take it off. Second, i followed the directions and didnu2019t reduce any pores or calm my skin what so ever. My skin looks the same before the mask. I love herbivore CBD oil, but this was not a winner in my book. My skin is combination-dry, with breakouts during that time of the month, and Iu2019ve been into skin care for 10 years now so Iu2019ve used my fair share of products! Also, I always check the ingredients list to make sure it doesnu2019t have any bad alcohols, and making sure itu2019s paraben, sulfate free and clean, and almost natural ingredients!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like face mask but I could NOT! first of all the size is so small for the hefty price tag! I have other masks from Other companies and comparing them to this one I get more product in the others and for much cheaper. I also would like to note the mask smells very stinky, the smells reminds me of Childrenu2019s cough syrup and thatu2019s the smell I just canu2019t get past. I can still smell the essence on my face even after I washed off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t get past the horrendous smell to give this product a fair chance. Will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It worked very well. I used it 4 times a week the first week and second week. It seems to help resurface all the acne trapped under your skin. Also it tingles a little bit in the beginning but after 5-10 min it stops. My skin got used to it by week 2.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. In 3-4 uses, my skin was completely restored and any concerns of redness gone. Definitely worth buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask definitely reduced the appearance of my acne scars and left my face feeling soft and bright. I took away a star because it's messy to apply. The consistency is very goopy which does not pair well with a glass jar, it gets all over the place and you waste product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is so nice. The Calming angel of blue tansy is a great plus. My son feels baby soft after I use this and it looks moisturized and clear. I'm impressed with this mask every time I use it and I will definitely repurchase this when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only used this once so far so weu2019ll see if the pros outweigh the truly, honestly horrendous, unbearable smell. It smells like Buckleyu2019s mixed with strong menthol, pine and camphor. Itu2019s very very strong. So much so that my husband could smell it from the other room, and even after I washed it off, we could still smell it. Just had a shower, threw my clothes in the wash and it helped, but- oof. I donu2019t know if I can use that again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried just about every product on the market for my acne, Iu2019ve had hormonal acne on my chin & a few cystic pimples on my cheeks for the past few years and literally n o t h i n g  helped. This product SAVED my skin. Iu2019m not exaggerating when I say the results are overnight.  I worked it into my routine over the past 5-6 weeks and use it every other day or every 3 days and not only has my skin cleared, but I already see a HUGE difference in my scarring & the texture of my skin. I canu2019t recommend this mask enough.  I donu2019t use a spot treatment or anything extra or special anymore, literally wash my face, moisturizer, and a sunblock; my old routine was set up by my dermatologist & she even started using this herself. Holy grail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10. my chin pores get clogged causing cystic acne but since using this product I havenu2019t had a SINGLE blemish on my chin. it makes my complexion look even and keeps my pores clear without over drying or causing irritation. Please buy this product itu2019ll save your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is a great addition to my skincare routine, and has helped greatly in soothing and controlling my adult acne. I typically use this mask after my post-workout shower. The mask has a wonderful cooling affect which feels nice after cardio. Pre-mask I use a cleanser (or cleansing oil followed by a cleanser). Post-mask I use a Niacinamide + Copper serum and a moisturizer with HA. That routine has proven to work to reduce new acne from forming, ease lingering red spots, and heal any active acne. I find myself reachung for this mask over my other AHA+BHA treatments/masks. Unlike those products, this product has been much gentler on my skin, and for me, this product has been more proactive/productive.   Note that this mask is of a gel like consistency that can range slightly in both consistency (some batches being slightly more gel and some a little more liquidy) and color (ranging from blue to dark green). This is normal for this product. The smell is not my favorite, and I found it quite pungent for the first couple uses, but I'm better able to tolerate it now. It doesn't smell bad, just different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this- I bought based off Skincare by Hyram recommendation for my acne and unfortunately this did not work for me. It gave me deep painful breakouts granted my skin may have been purging however it made my skin so sensitive I couldnu2019t use it through the proper purging period. I followed the directions to use 3-4 days back to back then 1 once a week. I did 3-4 days and followed up 2 after 1 once a week leaving it on for less and less time. This hurt my skin so bad I couldnu2019t put makeup on it stung I couldnu2019t use other skin care products to help even just cleansing hurt ! Now my skin is sensitive it gets red when I gently wash my face and it has never done that before.
Great product! I have very sensitive skin so I was adamant about using a clarifying mask but it has made my skin clearer and smoother.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle from acne due to a hormone condition and this mask used 2-3 times a week combined with using the Lapis face oil daily, has been the only thing to help me thus far. I have tried several natural acne treatments and products but this is the still the only thing that has worked. I saw significant relief in 1 week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask has done wonders for my skin. I never had issues with acne as a teenager but for some reason after turning 25+ battling adult acne has been a challenge. This has been finally a saving grace. In just one week Iu2019ve seen a significant decrease in my acne sizes, my skin has cleared up during a normally high break out time (my time of the month), my complexion appears brighter and smoother. The smell is a bit strong but honestly itu2019s WORTH the result if youu2019re struggling. I like that it comes with instructions to use back to back and then use a upkeep for your skin. I also like that it doesnu2019t dry out your skin and has a gel like consistency. It just sloths off all the dead skin and rejuvenates your skin. Iu2019m so happy I found this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m surprised first that all of the reviews here say the smell is bad... very surprised! I think it smells like a mix of gummy bears and natural floral scent... like a flower I canu2019t put my finger on, with the sweet smell of candy. Anyway...  This mask literally does nothing. Iu2019ve got it twice now as part of larger orders and both times Iu2019ve been unimpressed. It goes on fine - although a bit too viscous to be easy to use, and dries does to a tighter mask feeling. You wash it off and the next day... nothing. I expect more from something this price.   (Mine has never been mouldy or gone bad for the record - atleast that I can tell. I can tell it starts to change because when I first get it itu2019s a vibrant teal, but after opening usually subsides to a deep blue, but the smell and texture stays the same. I do believe what some people consider mould is just the product drying. Because itu2019s thin it gets on the lid, and then settles again, causing the leftovers on the lid to oxidize and dry, creating what looks like u201csplotchesu201d but what I believe is just dried bits of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I pored over reviews for weeks before ordering. When it arrived, the smell was overpowering, but nothing I couldn't work through. I noticed it was very watery and slightly discolored. I decided to try it once anyway in case I was wrong, and I started to break out after one use. And I almost never get breakouts! I had read that the shelf life is very short and some are delivered expired so I surmised that must have been why. Customer service shipped me a new one right away and I was disappointed to see that the new one was even worse - a deep, unsightly color with visible mold spores. Neither looked remotely like the photos on the site. Unfortunately, I had to give up on trying this one after two spoiled products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you can get passed the smell then itu2019s a good mask! Made my skin feel so smooth after only one use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: did nothing but make my skin soooo sensitive i could barely put sun screen on without it burning. sadly not worth it :(

reviews.review_title: I donu2019t know about all that...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought people were exaggerating when they said the scent of this mask was horrid u2014 they werenu2019t lying. I had to pinch my nose to get through 15 minutes of this mask, and even without being able to smell it I felt absolutely nauseous and sick to my stomach. If I had looked at this mask in a Sephora store I would have never purchased it... but I bought it online disregarding the warnings. When I took this mask off my skin was red but I didnu2019t feel any tingling prior. My skin does look brighter and my acne scars donu2019t look as visible but then again my skin had a red tint so the scars kind of blended in. Also, something that I thought was pretty strange is that my pores were enlarged and visible... not exactly sure why. I will continue to use this mask and get my moneyu2019s worth but I kid you not itu2019s been at least 30 minutes since I rinsed it off and I still feel nauseous. My skin is still red. My pores are still huge. Hoping itu2019ll cool down so I can see the true results of this mask. The things we do for clear skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff smells SO BAD!  I gagged when I opened the jar, no exaggeration.  I used it once to find out if the smell got better, but it did not.  I don't understand how this mask has such high reviews!!  Is everyone nose blind?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Decent product but im really considering just throwing this away. Ive only used it 3 times & each time i use it the smell gets more foul. Worst of all it lingers. My mom smelt it in my room hours later. Seriously nauseating. So sad :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On one hand my skin was smoother and brighter after just one use. The tingly feeling was pleasant and not overpowering, and it does not dry out on your skin. On the other, the smell is unlike anything Iu2019ve encountered. It has been hours and Iu2019m still nauseous. Iu2019m not sure if anything was wrong with mine but to be frank, the smell resembled mint and bile. I could not get through a full 20 minutes. I love this brand but this smell and I are not compatible! Give it a try if you donu2019t have a sensitive nose but otherwise look elsewhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ce masque n'est pas parfait : la texture est tres liquide, il ne sent pas tres bon et la couleur est assez decevante (c'etait plus gris que bleu)... Mais malgre tout, ce masque est un des meilleurs que j'ai teste! L'effet est saisissant, apres une seule application j'ai senti que la texture de ma peau etait amelioree. Et puisque c'est l'effet qui compte plus que les aspects esthetique du masque lui-mu00eame, je le conseil vivement !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The consistency is strange u2014 very liquid-y, so it doesn't feel like you're putting enough on. However, it's an amazing mask. I noticed a difference in my skin's texture after one use. It resurfaces, but remains very gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely the most gentle, noticeably effective exfoliating mask I have tried! It feels nice and cooling, and you can leave it on for 20 minutes so you actually have time to relax. My blackheads were gone after 3 uses and some bumps I had went through the process of becoming whiteheads to healing much faster than usual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cleared up red marks and acne. I use it every other day because it can be drying. This is my favourite product ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is an absolute dream and leaves my skin feeling incredibly soft. Some uses I find that the slight burning/tingling sensation is quite strong, however it's never enough to cause redness or irritation. As someone who requires more than just chemical exfoliation, I use this after exfoliating so that it can really get deep into my pores. I have repurchased this many times and don't see it leaving my routine any time soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask. It really helps clear up and brighten my complexion especially after travel and/or heavy makeup use. I enjoy the herbal smell and light feel on my skin.  And a jar lasts a LONG time because you only use a little bit at a time

reviews.review_title: I never got compliments about my skin until I use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never left a review on Sephora, but I needed to spread the word about how great this is for virtually anyone. I am 24 and have had acne my entire life, this marks and scars left behind. Iu2019m fair skinned and when I breakout it takes a while for the redness to fade. The results from this mask have been INSANE. I use a lot of ahas and bhas in my skincare so I only use this mask twice a week but it helps calm inflammation, heal blemishes, even out the tone of your skin, and literally WIPE AWAY acne marks. It does nothing for acne scars (pitted) but nothing typically works for those aside from actual procedures like microneedling. If you breakout occasionally and already use something like a retinoids, glycolic acid, or any other strong ingredient, this would be amazing to add to your routine. If you have sensitive skin and a tingle freaks you out, itu2019s not for you. Personally, I like treatments that actually do something. If I could give it 10 stars I would.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This may be the first product i have ever reviewed and i have lots of them! I consider myself a skin care fanatic. When I first bought this product i wasnu2019t thrilled. I decided to give it another try and actually follow the recommended uses. I did and let me tell you within the first week i noticed a huge difference in my skin. I am now using it faithfully 3 times a week and donu2019t plan on stopping! Must try, i promise you wonu2019t be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this mask. I bought it on a whim after reading some reviews, and it is just as good as they said. I have bought this 3 times and will continue to buy it for as long as they make it.    I will say, the smell at first was a little strange, but I powered through and have gotten used to it so it doesnu2019t bug me.   2 words: BUY IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great for dark spots and acne scars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with it when i first used it and it clears all of my dullness of the day and makes my black head more easy to get out. And I just love the smell of it. really good product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have try many many mask in my life and this is hand down the best. Iu2019m struggling with acne and this totally cleared my complexion. I stop using it for a month and my acne came back. Definitely worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS, but the smell is awful. resembles rotting vegetables. HOWEVER if you can tolerate the smell (like my daughter and I) it does work great for clearing acne and redness. Definitely try this if you've used other masks from brands like Peter Thomas Roth/Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall I'm pretty impressed with this mask. It's nice to find a mask that helps acne but doesn't have clay in it (which I honestly think does nothing for acne). It cleared up my close to surface acne in pretty much a single use, meaning this seems to be a good product if you are a little neglectful in your skin care (like me). I have yet to see if this helps with my hormonal acne, and it does not seem to do much for large pores or blackheads. But it definitely not only helped diminish pimples but also brought the redness and soreness down too which really helps. It's pretty much a liquid, which I guess is nice because a little goes a long way. I have sensitive skin and unlike other reviews, don't think this product is harsh or overly tingly on skin. My only biig drawback is the smell. Honestly, this product smells like someone tried to spray a fruity air freshener over a lake. Going off the ingredients (I see a fermented component), I guess this makes sense. So if you have regular troubles with surface acne, and don't like the drying out feeling of clay-based masks, this is definitely worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product and it appeared to be already used or tampered with. The top of the lid of the product and the spatula scoop that came with it both had dried product on them. When I opened the lid, the inside protective cover was also dirty. The product also had black specks inside, which does not appear normal, as I have not found any reviews that mention these specks, nor photos with black specks visible. I am wondering if this is mold or bacteria that has grown inside the jar, despite the expiration date on the bottom being 2022. This is extremely disturbing, and I have not heard back from Sephora customer support about this issue.

reviews.review_title: Warning: THIN layer, less time for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just tried this mask for the first time and can't believe I can't find a review like this....I might have put too much on (I'll put a thinner layer on next time), but after 13 minutes (box says 15-20), I started to notice a faint redness on my skin. I washed off the mask and could see every stroke my fingers made while applying the mask in different places. My face is sunburnt-looking red. I plan to continue using it, but for much less time (5-10 minutes) and with a thinner layer. PS....don't judge the crazy photo, just wanted to show you an estimate of how red my face got. I don't usually have redness like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This really didn't make a noticeable difference in my skin whatsoever. It smells plantish and it is quite watery

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love! Took down my 50 pimples (I was sick and as a result my face got neglected for 4 months) in the last week. Took down the redness. My skin is combo so it is a normal and it gets a bit oily in Tzone during spring and summer and very dry in the winter.  I noticed this mask is a bit drying the morning after I use, so I would suggest you use a hydrating mask I couple times a week if your skin feels tight or dry after using this mask. My skin is a lot more softer as this is an exfoliating agent and almost all of my pimples are gone. I got compliments last night that my skin is glowing. I know itu2019s the mask.   Iu2019m using this product as per the instructions that came in the box with the mask...NOT as per the Sephora u201chow to use sectionu201d.  Definitely a new holy grail product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This mask was decent the first two times I tried it. Could tell I had slightly more smoothness But that was about it. The smell is awful but tolerable. However, the third time I used (I should mention nothing in my skin care routine had changed) after leaving the mask on about 3 minutes it started to burn horribly. I immediately took it off and realized my skin was RED. I mean swollen, horrible sunburn red. I do not have sensitive skin and have only ever reacted to one other mask like this in the past few years. Extremely inconsistent results and tolerance coming from this mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing results with this mask! I was a little skeptical when I got it since the aroma was quite strong and I wasnu2019t too sure about the texture but once it was on my face it was great! I have pretty sensitive skin so the only reason I took a star off is the first few applications were uncomfortable while the mask was on (a bit of a tingly/burning sensation and redness that you will recognize well if you have sensitive skin haha) but my skin normally adjusts to a product after a few uses so i stuck it out and Iu2019m SO GLAD I did! My skin has never felt so soft and so clean after doing a mask! It is my all time favourite- made my face feel so light and smooth and even :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far one of my favorite go-to masks. I really enjoy how this makes my skin feel and look. It is really gentle on skin but still seems to clear out my pores and help the redness of my skin as well. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have adult hormonal acne and not consistent on my dermatologist meds. I use this and my face clears up almost overnight. If used consistently, will keep skin smooth and glowing. Btw- I usually use clay masks to declog but keeping this one too!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask does it all I'm so glad that I got a sample and tried it! Whenever I break out I use this and it dries them up, sometimes same- day. It also evens out my skin and reduces redness- all this without leaving your skin dry and flaking  I'm a huge fan!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like this mask, but you have to use it very regularly to get the full results. It also isnu2019t the easiest to remove. I prefer other enzyme treatments, such as Elemis and dr. Dennis gross peel pads and amorepacific enzyme powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this mask. A strange smell but over time Iu2019ve come to love it. This lasts a really long time because you only need a tiny bit to cover your face. Redness and inflammation is immediately reduced after 1 use and Iu2019ve definitely noticed overall brightness and less texture. Honestly the best mask out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love the vegan and cruelty free mask. despite the weird semi strong smell, it definitely was a smooth, gentle and cool application. Did not feel harsh on my skin whatsoever! will keep using product hoping I do see a difference over couple weeks. I would reccomend this product for sensitive skin folks like myself. I might purchase again when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product reeks! It smells like someoneu2019s slathering Pine Sol up the inside of your nose, and the smell does not go away after multiple washes. I left it on for 5 minutes, and I already had chemical burns on most of my face. It definitely resurfaced, but itu2019s just too strong in smell and effect, especially for the provided instructions. The 2 stars is only because it ate a couple of acne scars and inflammations alive (at the cost of all the healthy, unblemished skin on my face).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Strong herbal smell, i've been using it every other day for 3 weeks. It feels refreshing and tingles for a couple minutes. After having a small break out and redness on my face, I left the mask on for 3 hours and my skin wasn't red and the break out calmed down. miracle product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I use this product in the AM, I would have glowy skin for the rest of the day. It's tingly and does have a slight burning sensation but my skin doesn't get red or irritated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: really like this mask! it tingles when you apply it. a little goes a very long way which is great! Leaves my face feeling super refreshed and clean when i rinse it off

reviews.review_title: Expired product. Short shelf life. Not worth.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had it delivered to my home since the stores are closed because of the pandemic. This is my 3rd time purchasing this product and I must admit that the product sent to me was quite old. This product is already known for having a very short shelf life and when I receive it, it was dark green and lumpy and almost had a stomach acid scent to it. The previous time I purchased this product had a nice light blue slippery, gel-like consistency. And smelled like blue tansy and other chemicals. Still better than the nauseating stanch coming from the new one. Either the company changed their formula or sephora needs to keep track of the freshness of the products they sell. Sadly can't even return the product since it's a massive hassle with the whole quarantine and all. Save your money for now and don't purchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Second week of using this. Love love love this product. Will be repurchasing once I finish it. The texture of my skin has noticeably gone down. My pores look and seem to be a lot cleaner and less noticeable. I will say though my skin did purge this first few days of using this. 10/10 would recommend. The smell isnu2019t bad at all. When you put it on it feels like when you put tea tree on your face, it tingles in the nicest way. The only thing I donu2019t like about this product is the price. But Iu2019m hoping it will last a decent amount of time and i can get a lot of use out of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a holy grail mask for me. I use weekly and it significantly helps with acne, acne marks, and scars. Exfoliates but it gentle enough to not make you flake. LOVE LOVE. For reference I use prescription acne cream so I know the suffering that acne can cause.

reviews.review_title: Holy Grail Product For Skin Texture/Congestion
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am currently on my 4th jar of this masku2014i think that says it all!  My skin can vary from normal to dry depending upon the season. Oil and acne are not typically an issue for me, but the one skin problem that has plagued me most of my life is texture. My skin gets rough and bumpy at the drop of a hat. Weu2019re talking full on sandpaper appearance if I donu2019t address it. This is the best product Iu2019ve ever found for getting rid of that congestion. It works much better than any of the glycolic acid products Iu2019ve tried. I use it a couple times a week and it keeps my skin texture looking smooth as glass. I also suffer from splotchy redness and this helps with that as well. Personally, I really enjoy the bracing, medicinal scent of this. It makes me think of an Icelandic spa. I find that for me, this product pairs really well with Sunday Riley Tidal Enzyme Water Cream (I guess my skin really likes enzymes), and Sunday Riley Luna Night Oil. I will rebuy this again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product saved skin completely. At the beginning of last year right after turning 20, I began getting painful cystic acne on my cheeks and tried multiple different skincare routines and couldnu2019t get rid of it. A few months later I finally found this. After a few weeks, my skin was completely clear and the acne hasnu2019t returned since. I use it 1-2 times a week and just use enough to cover my skin and Iu2019ve just recently finished the product. I still get the odd pimple, but this mask has made my skin glow and kept it 95% clear. I canu2019t go without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely sensitive skin, and I love this product. I leave it on for the recommended 20 minutes, and my skin GLOWS after. It is so smooth, and acne marks are noticeably smaller. I have a pretty involved skin routine, but I was looking for a mask that would help my skin resurface. After years of using harsh acne medications, my skin has had a almost leathery appearance, but this mask has helped the appearance dramatically. The smell isn't bad, and a little goes a long way. The price point isn't awful, and I like that it's a clean product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a decent mask. This was recommended to me by a natural skincare professional as something that would help keep my skin exfoliated and resurfaced so that other products would absorb better. I think it does help with skin texture, but to reap benefits, I have go use it very regularly and diligently (like every 2 or 3 days) and usually leave it on for longer than the prescribed amount of time. The scent is kind of earthy and floral, it doesnu2019t bother me. To be honest, given the price point I expected a little more of a skincare miracle, so Iu2019ll probably shop around for other resurfacing enzyme masks before repurchasing this one. However, that might be a while, because a little bit goes a long wayu2014I guess that justifies the price to some degree. Iu2019d say itu2019s worth a shot if youu2019re looking for a natural exfoliator and you like masking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't really noticed a difference in my skin since adding this in my routine. Definitely was not worth the money for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I AM OBSESSED. Initially I donu2019t notice much of a difference when I wash it off, but the morning after doing this mask... WOW. Hyperpigmentation noticeably faded, skin texture smoother, skin tone brighter. I simply canu2019t say enough good things about this product. So worth the money. One strange thing is that the texture and colour can vary. Iu2019m on my second one and the first one was greener and much more runny, but my new one is thicker and is bright blue. Still doesnu2019t change the performance, so if you see your mask looks different than another, donu2019t worry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask, i tried a sample and noticed great results so i bought the full sized, my spots appear noticeable better, and helps the healing process along nicely while resurfacing my none problem areas leaving the skin looking so glowy and smooth.

reviews.review_title: hard pass, there are better masks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just used this for the first time and it left me with chemical burns on my face. I didn't even leave it on for the entire recommended time. I now have red, sensitive splotches all over my face. I don't have sensitive skin and can use other potent products so I'm not sure why this one had such a dramatic effect on my skin. On top of that it also smells awful and it stained my sephora face mask applicator.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had this on my wishlist for probably a year before I finally gave it a try. Holy cow! It's pretty liquidy but once you apply it, it stays in place,  it doesn't get hard or tight which I enjoyed. I have sensitive skin and this did dry out my cheeks a little but a little extra moisturizer and I was fine plus it didn't exacerbate my redness. The instructions it comes with say to use for 3-4 days in a row and then maintain a couple times a week so that's what I did. I'm on day 4 now and I can definitely see a difference!  Day 1: Slight tingling felt throughout masking time but not unbearable. Scent is strong but not unpleasant. Once rinsed off my skin was so soft and smooth. Blackheads in my nose that I've probably had since high school were gone! No joke. I have large pores and they almost looked bigger after but they were 100% cleaned out. Day 2: Some pores had kind of gotten gunky again but this cleared them up completely again! Pores right around my nose are still a little big (which is normal for me) but everywhere else seemed smaller before and after masking again. Day 3: A few small spots came to a head but were much easier to get out than usual. Majority of my skin is completely Scot-free, pores still appear smaller and cleaner than usual. The tingling was also less noticeable this time.  Day 4: Woke up to 1 spot, all others are gone. Pores still appear smaller and cleaner. My skin does feel somewhat drier than usual but nothing drastic.  Plan to mask one more time tonight and then transition to 2-3 times per week as suggested. I love this stuff! Check my IG for pics @thewurst01

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mask! Gave it 4 stars only because the smell is pretty bad but you get used to it after a few uses. Makes my skin texture noticeable more even when I use this. I enjoy putting the lapis oil on top before bed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t know how I would feel about this mask, but I went ahead and bought it. The reviews say a lot and I havenu2019t been disappointed with high rated products from Sephora yet. I have a few masks/peels already, Iu2019m sure we all do. I tried this last night and it is confirmed, it was not a mistake buying this! It is very tingly and smells delightful. It is cooling but you can definitely feel it working. I have sensitive skin so it was on my face for about 10 minutes, maybe more? As directed I wiped it off with a warm washcloth. Within 30 minutes my skin was smoother, less red, and my previous breakouts were now almost gone. It did SLIGHTLY burn for a couple minutes after but that is not a complaint. Iu2019m not an idiot and know itu2019s a resurfacing mask. This was a nice addition to my masks and am glad I gave it a chance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For anyone that says that the product is defective because itu2019s not blue, do some research. The Herbivore website states that the product may vary from blue to a mossy green. Itu2019s normal. I found that the product has a nice fresh natural scent which I liked. Leaves my face feeling clean but not stripped. I have very sensitive skin and too many products can give me more acne than my norm. This product neither caused more acne nor did it help what I already have. Pore size is still the same. Overall a good product to promote clean looking skin but not groundbreaking life changing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It makes my skin really smooth afterwards. It has a very strong smell in the jar but I find it bearable when I apply to the face. I donu2019t recommend for sensitive skin as it made my skin red even though I only left it on for three minutes. Will continue to use until empty but I donu2019t think I will be repurchasing. If you have normal or more tolerant skin, I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Did not work for me at least.. not recommended.. too pricy.. I have tried glam glow and so much better than this one.. I tried using this product for a month and it was of no use..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Trust me when I say this is the best mask for acne. Iu2019ve had bad acne for the past 8 years (I am now 20) and Iu2019ve tried hundreds of different products. This is one of the best products Iu2019ve ever tried. This is a must!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product. I was super excited to try it out and unfortunately didnu2019t even get the chance. I have ordered this mask two times and BOTH times the product received was spoiled before itu2019s expiration. This mask is supposed to be a pretty jelly-ish BLUE and instead what I received was dark moldy green & super watery. It also smelled kinda funky. Itu2019s supposed to smell Earthy and sorta refreshing but instead I just got the scent of pure dirt with Eucalyptus. Maybe Iu2019ll have better luck when the stores open back up, this way I can actually inspect the product before purchasing. For now, itu2019s a no.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My jar is pure liquid. So itu2019s super hard to get onto my skin. I thought it was supposed to be like that until I watched a video and saw that it looked gel like?? It does leave my skin soft but not really worth it for the price and how annoying it is to try to get a watery liquid Onto your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think that this mask is extremely overpriced for the exfoliation it gives you. It gave me no difference in result than if I had used an exfoliating product from the ordinary

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not very good, and definitely not for this price. It is overly drying, but doesn't help with blemishes. The farmacy honey face mask is very similar and does a way better job, for about $10 more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product changed my skin! The tingling sensation makes it feel like it is truly working to repair and resurface your skin. This is a must from when you are dealing with texture or breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask so much! I have acne, texture, and dark spots and this mask was a holy grail for me. The first week I used it every day as directed and then once a week from then on. My skin smoothed out and my dark spots began to fade. Sadly with this unexpected coronacation I packed it up and put it in storage when I was moving out of my dorm. My skin is holding up fine but I definitely miss this mask in my regimen.

reviews.review_title: Holy Grail in my skincare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this face mask on a whim after reading multiple reviews and it has honestly been one of the best skincare purchases I have ever made. I normally won't write reviews for skincare but for anyone that has been suffering from cystic acne scarring, textured and dull skin- you must try this product! I have spent countless hours researching products and spending money on so many face masks and skincare for acne but this face mask one has truly been changing my skin. I have been getting compliments on how radiant my skin has become. The smell may be off-putting to some people (but I don't mind it) and I don't have extremely sensitive skin so I have rated this product 5 stars because there is A LOT of product compared to other masks I have purchased.

reviews.review_title: Smell can be a strong - still my holy grail mask!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow I think I found my holy grail mask without even realizing it? First time using Herbivore as well. I have sensitive, combination skin with lots of blackheads. During the end of my cycle I also get some cystic acne. Recommendations were 5-10 minutes for sensitive skin, so I erred on the side of caution. The smell of this isn't my favorite, but it's something I've adjusted to (but that first night it kind of gave me a headache so knocking off a star for that since scent sensitive people should be on the lookout). I've since upped it to 10 minutes at a time and definitely notice a difference between the time when I don't use this mask consistently and the times that I do - namely, that my skin seems more congested and oily, a lot duller. LOVE THIS.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail mask for clearing up breakouts. When my skin is breaking out I use it every day for four days then once a week after that. Since it's got natural ingredients I'd recommend using it up within a few weeks for the best results.

reviews.review_text: Lu2019odeur ! Ju2019adore les produits de la marque Herbivore que ju2019ai teste jusquu2019u00e0 present, particulierement ce masque.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask! I was looking for something to get rid of my blackheads and to keep acne away without stripping my face of essential moisturizer or rubbing toxic ingredients on it! I was surprised to find an all natural, vegan and cruelty free brand from Sephora. Though Herbivores prices are high, I still needed to try some of their products because I was having a very hard time finding any clean skin care at the drug store. I bought mask in the blue tansy facial oil and mask duo set and I loooove the Lapis oil in the set and I loved this mask, though I didnu2019t get enough of the mask to use more than 4-5 times. Thankfully the directions say to apply a thin layer. So I was able to spread it out to 4-5 uses. I didnu2019t follow the directions, sadly. I did the mask once a week instead of every other day for 5 days. I really wanted to make it last and not waste it but I feel if I had followed the directions, I would have gotten better, longer lasting results. However, everytime I used this mask it helped to heal acne scars, acne and cleaned a lot of blackheads out of my pores. It also evened my skin tone, hydrated and make my skin soft! Iu2019ve also tried the prism mask and the brighten mask and I feel that the blue tansy gave me the best, immediate results. I have only tried trial sizes of the 3 masks though and I did not do any of them as frequently as the directions said to do them. I am going to buy this full size to really put the directions to the test and see what kind of results I will get. Since I switched to clean skin care, I havenu2019t gotten any acne and I have barely gotten any blackheads!!! Herbivores PHOENIX, Lapis and Emerald CBD oils are my favorite that I have tried! Their all amazing and I honestly donu2019t know which one is my top favorite. I have stopped using moisturizer since I have gotten them and I use a different one every day! I cannot wait to try some of Herbivores other products and it is going to take some time to do so given their high prices.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know what I expected but this mask far surpassed anything I thought it would do. A few weeks in and my skin is softer and more even. I have been using the lapis oil as well (which I also love). Buy it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have struggled for a very long time when it comes to finding a skincare routine that actually worked for me. Like YEARS of searching. And finally with this product I am seeing my desired results! I did exactly what it said to use for 4 days before reducing to a few times a week and the results are incredible! My skin has never been so clean, soft and it has such an incredible even texture!

This mask is honestly amazing. It has significantly helped my skin and i've been using it for about 2 and a half weeks now. It's really hard to find a good product especially when you struggle with acne, but seriously this has made me feel 10x more confident in my skin. 100 PERCENT RECOMMEND!

reviews.review_title: The KEY to making this mask work!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, this might be a bit lengthy but hear me out: Since about a year ago I've been dealing with this rash-like pimples on my lower chin and cheeks. It would start pretty red, and than dry out and flake of. Still unsure what provoked it but only thing that seemed to have helped at that time was heavy duty prescription hormonal ointmnet (much heavier than hydrocortisone).  Wanting to go off of hormona stuff I was looking for a good mask in hopes it will take care of it.  Based on research of ingredients  and reviews I got this mask a while ago (5 months plus), and used as directed for a few weeks. It did have small effect on my pores but nothing to be crazy about. So ive neglected this product for a bit.  Last month I came across blogger's article which said that, basically, certain masks (especially of peeling or resurfacing categories) should be really left on for an hour or more, depending on skin's sensitivity.  I decided to give this mask another go but leave it on for much longer and ...holy mother of god, my pimple-like rash started to heal and is almost gone! My skin overall looks better, I wouldnt say it has retexturized it completely but its on its way.  CONCLUSION: I think the KEY(and only if you can handle it, at your own risk and discretion)  is to try leaving it for a longer period of time , and use it every 2nd or 3rd day consistently.Dont have to use a lot of it either (learned it the hard way) but thin layer will suffice. Happy masking!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: omg i have been using this for 1 week and already i see a HUGE difference in my skin. the directions say to use it everyday for the first 3-4 days and then switch to 2-3 times a week. i had 2 small pimples that were starting to form prior to using the mask, and after just one application, they began to fade. like literally just disappeared. besides eradicating all blemishes, this mask also makes the texture of your face 10x smoother and more even. this is truly the best face mask i have ever used i cannot recommend enough

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay Iu2019m going to try to keep this short but help as well. I have acne prone skin and Iu2019ve struggled with acne for 10 years as Iu2019m 25 now. My skin is also pretty white therefore my scars show easily. My life changed about a year ago when I started using the Clarisonic (holy grail) as well as using the Sephora vitamin c serum. Scars started to fade away and acne started to diminish. I still noticed my large pores on my cheeks and nose though and it bothered me so I decided to invest in this (a little pricey)... Iu2019ve been using it for about two weeks now (3 days in a row at first) and DUDE... My skin is amazing. My pores are barely visible and I feel so confident without even using makeup. Itu2019s not a lie when they say resurfacing. Also, it does sting at first. You can literally feel the old layer of skin being resurfaced.. itu2019s insane. The stinging stops after using it for a while and itu2019s heaven. BUY.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: you literally donu2019t need any other face mask except for this one. itu2019s the best thing in the whole entire world. i did as the package instructions suggested (different from the instructions online) and used it 4 days in a row before moving to twice a week. the smell isnu2019t great, but that doesnu2019t really bother me. it doesnu2019t excessively dry out my skin or strip it either, but it makes me want to use a light moisturizer or a moisturizing toner immediately after washing it off. itu2019s color correcting and calming and keeps my acne at bay as well as correct blemishes i already have. i love this mask and i highly recommend it to anyone and everyone.

reviews.review_title: Not for me, but maybe for you

I am on day 3 of using this product and am IN LOVE with how soft and clean this leaves my face. It has minimized my forehead bumps/pimples in just these 3 days and it is one of my biggest insecurities. I could not find anything that helped for the past years. I leave it on for 10 mins since I have EXTREMELY sensitive skin (hence my cautiousness) and wipe it with a warm/damp face towel to wipe off the dead skin sells. I follow this with the Fresh - Deep Hydration Face cream and it is just... wow. I finally feel like I found something that works for me. Thank you for creating this jar of Heaven!

Unfortunately the day I recieved this product in the mail it had mold growing in it. The product was a more green than in the picture and was very liquidy to the point I almost spilled some when I opened the container. I went to use this mask as soon as I got it and finding brown spots inside it was increably disappointing. I did some more research and found that due to Herbivores tendency against preservatives, it is not uncommon to find mold in their products long before you should. Due to this experience I'm not buying from them again. And I would urge the company to use preservatives or take the product off the shelves.

I definitely will be repurchasing this one and using it more frequently to see if the results are better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is fantastic. I have dry skin that somewhat acne prone (very much for smaller spots, though the odd massive guy like under my skin maybe twice a year). Iu2019m also mixed African/Northern European, so Iu2019m a deeper tan shade and prone to scarring for extended periods of time. This mask brightened my skin in the first 3 uses (consecutive days) and pretty much cleared all my small spots by day/use 3. Now I use it for maintenance to keep scarring minimal and I do the same 2-3 consecutive days of use around the beginning of my period to clear any breakups gently. I follow up with lots of hydrating products and sun screen during the day. Awesome mask, will definitely be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never written a review before, but I figured I should for my all time favorite product.   Please never discontinue to product! In the past year I have become a skin care fanatic, I have tried multiple different brands and products and this one right here is by far the best one to date. Once the mask is on you begin to feel a slight tingle and that is when you can sit back and let the magic begin. The smell is herbal, yet soothing. The bottle is beautiful. And we aren't even to the results yet. Once the mask comes off (which takes a little more effort than I am use to) you are left with very soft, glowing skin. I use this mask three times a week and I just cannot get enough. I am a nurse and during the winter time we have to where masks most of the time. This has caused my skin to become dry and red because of the constant irritation, this product has saved me.  When I started to get into skincare I thought that $40 for a mask was insane, especially when the bottles were so little. But you pay for what you get. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_text: Very effective!  I noticed an immediate improvement; more refined pores, smoother texture and no irritation :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had doubts about this face masku2014 but every single time I use this I kick myself for holding off on this for so long. My skin has recently been in total chaos as I transition from a decade+ of birth control pills to my natural cycle. Dry, scaly patches on my cheeks and jaw mixed with oil city in my t-zone. Under the skin, completely unpoppable pimples on my cheeks and blocked pores galore. I was devastated after always receiving compliments on my skin while on BC.   First of all, no other u201cresurfacing masku201d does itu2019s job quite as well as this one does without making my VERY sensitive skin very angry. I would definitely recommend following the directions and using it 3-4 days in a row at first because my skin transformed in front of my eyes. I am very disciplined about my skin care and I use all higher end products, which unfortunately ladies, I think does make a difference. But after adding this Into my routineu2014 OMG. My birth control skin (even, clear, radiant) is back AND Iu2019ve seen a serious improvement in texture, too. I also feel that when I use it in the evening time after I wash my face and before my serums, everything absorbs a lot better.   Iu2019ve read other reviews that complain about the smell, which is definitely strong, but I donu2019t mind it, I think itu2019s nice and naturally floral.   So LONG STORY SHORTu2014 you need this mask. Your mom needs it. Heck, the dog needs it. If clear, even, smooth, bright skin is what youu2019re looking for, this ones it, babe!!
