reviews.review_title: I don't know why this doesn't work for everyone!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the most combination skin you could ever see in your life. My forehead, nose and chin are major grease pits. The corners of my nose, mouth and chin are often times flaky. And I have seasonal and hormonal acne breakouts! And addition to it all, my skin is typically red and sensitive.   Only the first week of using is and this mask has helped calm my skin when it's irritated, moisturize the dry spots, balance the oily spots and bring out deep congestion the the surface! Just remember - sometimes things get worse before they get better. More white heads seems typical for this kind of mask since it draws out impurities.   Wipe off with a warm damp cloth, you see better results this way rather than rinsing it off with water.   I will say this: my skin is typically worse when I eat like garbage and drink little water.   A few tips:   THIS MASK WILL NOT DO YOU ANY GOOD IF YOU CONTINUE YOUR UNHEALTHY LIFESTYLE CHOICES. Drink more water than alcohol, eat nourishing foods, SWEAT, wash your face, moisturize day and night, wash your hands before you put on face products, pat dry with clean towels, make sure you're applying your regimen products in the correct order, read a self love book and enjoy this friggin awesome mask!

Now, after using the mask twice a week for a month now, my skin is less textured, calmer, and my breakouts have been far and few. The scent is something to get used to at first but Iu2019ve grown to really like it now. Iu2019d definitely recommend.

I have some major adult acne that I have been dealing with for the past couple of years.  I went to a number of medicated treatments topical and pills but it seemed none of it was working.  Until someone recommended the blue tansy mask.  I followed the instructions to use the mask frequently the first week and then slow it down the following week and so forth and I have to say, WOW.  This mask minimized the zits on my face and had them disappear. Not only zits but some white/blackheads as well disappeared.  I know some people are complaining about the smell but honestly it isnt that bad and also I would take this smell over acne any day!  This is great mask if used with the Emerald Hemp Seed Oil by Herbivore as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as free sample from sephora clean box. I was very cautious about this product, but i put it on my face, then washed an oohh, how lovely my skin was, even for oily skin it feels so gooood. it has a little bit tingle but that's fine, I have sensitive oily skin and for me worked perfect!.  minus one point for price :( I wish i could buy it, but for now, zero chances.  :(  therefore, love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It doesn't do anything for your skin. The pores don't feel cleansed after the used it, and no white or blackheads come out. The skin is tight after the wash and needs to apply lotion immediately. The feeling of use is particularly bad, the liquid is specially diluted. Fluid can run down and get stuck in your eyebrows or all the way down your chin and dirty your clothes.

reviews.review_title: Love this brand and this product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful mask! The smell is interesting, but not at all bad. I can feel it slightly tingling in the first few minutes following application, but it goes away quickly even on my sensitive skin. I recently purchased the full size after trying out the sample. Love a good natural mask!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is a life changer when it comes to dull, clogged, and bumpy textured skin.  With just a single use of this mask my skin became resurfaced, smoother, and brighter.  I suffer from hormonal pimples and with the use of this mask those annoying pimples and blackheads vanish and are prevented form popping back up!!! Any uneven texture on checks and forehead disappear leaving skin sooo smooth. Mask doesnu2019t over-dry skin but leaves it clean, detoxified, and clear!  highly recommended for combination and oily skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far...no. This was a bit disappointing. I diverged from moon fruit to try this exfoliant. Moon fruit is thick and rich and does the job. This isn't bad but the consistency is like leaky watery honey. It falls off and its not strong enough. It does subtly purify the skin but I will get moon fruit next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is it supposed to be a fluid liquid? As in very runny? Guess I wasnu2019t expecting that. If so what a mess!! As a suggestion maybe think about repackaging in a more user friendly container ... maybe an air free top pump like the Drunk Elephant moisturizers. The product itself seems beautiful, but I donu2019t think I would repurchase based on the packaging ... not very sanitary or tidy. Disappointing : (

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the way this smells and feels on my skin. I have very sensitive skin and this doesn't irritate it at all. My skin feels nice after use, but I wouldn't say I see any extreme improvement. The smell is kind of like a menthol smell that may bother some people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this to help with closed comedones. for how much it cost plus how much comes in the jar not worth it. i was using it twice a week with a slight improvement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask SAVED my skin! My acne is basically gone and my skin is always glowing. Pair this with the Lapis oil they have. works wonders!   I only reccomend if you are used to using acids (aha/bha) and can handle the smell. 10/10 reccomend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this in a kit that also came with an oil. I had never tried a resurfacing mask that contained Azulene oil and I have had great success with peels/masks that help with exfoliation, clarity, scarring and acne but while being gentle. I didn't find this product effective and is likely for those with uncomplicated acne. The acne along my jawline does not appear lesser, or more healed the day after using this mask. My skin looks much more clear with other peels/masks available at Sephora. Not recommended for those with complicated, serious acne and will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A little of this product goes a long way. Itu2019s very runny so I recommend buying a cheap foundation brush from ELF and using it to apply. This mask assists with keeping my skin clear. I have purchased multiple times.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mask- doesn't turn me beet red test is so effective, leaves soft, glowy skin. Love the clean smell, too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mask and used as directed. It did make my skin soft, smooth and bright. But I had a huge issue with the packaging. At this price point I expect better packaging. Not sure why it does not come with a pump or a similar dispenser. The current packaging does not work with the product consistency and makes the application really messy. Also, in my opinion, The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution works way better at 1/3 of the price. Will be returning..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a sample of this mask, expecting great results based on all the rave reviews. I was disappointed when I didnu2019t notice any changes to my face and even woke up the next morning with new blemishes! Iu2019m not sure why I reacted so poorly but Iu2019m disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m really disappointed. I bought this mask last summer and recently decided to use it again because it cleared up my acne. I used this mask four times in a week and I was very confused why my skin was getting worse with more redness and more breakouts than actually doing good. I decided to look on Herbivores site and it said u201cthe shelf life of this mask is 1 yearu201d. I looked more closely at this mask and noticed mold growing on the lid and in the container. No wonder it was breaking me out. Sephora please put the shelf life information for this product!

reviews.review_title: Donu2019t be scared dry skin babes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This isnu2019t marketed for dry skin and I donu2019t know why. The chemical exfoliants left my dry skin feeling soft and supple,  and a thin layer is all you need. This container will last forever. I have redness and it help to soothe that as well.   I was hesitant because with dry somewhat sensitive skin any clearing mask can upset it and be too harsh. This is the first that doesnu2019t HURT removing.

reviews.review_title: best mask for red, sensitive, acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: if you are looking for a mask to gently exfoliate, completely clear up breakouts and help with redness and texture, DO NOT HESITATE TO BUY THIS. you only need a very small amount so this jar will last a long time. after having second degree burns on my entire face about a year ago, my skin has become EXTREMELY sensitive. it breaks out from any little thing, and nothing could ever make them go away. i was already acne prone before the burns, but itu2019s amped up significantly following. iu2019ve used this mask 3-4 times and my skin is almost 100% clear. i have 2-3 blemishes left on my entire face and iu2019d definitely say itu2019s my skin purging from the mask pulling everything out of my pores. it is very tingly/cool on my skin, but does not have a burning feeling. iu2019ve been using this mask paired with the Lapis oil, rose+witch hazel toner from boscia and some different products from the ordinary. i have never gotten so many compliments on my skin before. i have hardly even been wearing foundation. do your skin a favor and BUY THIS MASK.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample, used it 2 times thus far(at night) skin was soft. The next day my skin was NOT as oily as usual, which was a miracle, as I live in the Caribbean and it is always humid, so my skin is always oily...Will buy large size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I see instant results after I use this. I'm on my second day and my skin has already improved dramatically. I find myself excited to use this every night and I can't wait to see the improvement as I keep using it.   It does tingle/sting a little while on, but I don't mind. The smell isn't bad either, my boyfriend actually says he likes it. It smells like Chinese medicinal herbs/medicine and is pretty strong, just heads up for people who are sensitive to smell.   After it dries and you wash it off, it does take a bit more effort than usual, but just be patient. After just one use, my skin is VISIBLY brighter, smoother, and even. It really is amazing. I use this alongside my regular skin care and it works beautifully.   Haven't experienced any of the molding that other people talk about, but I keep mine tightly sealed and in it's box in my mini fridge just in case.   I know it's expensive, but don't save it. Using this as directed (4 days in a row first, then 2-3 times a week after) is how it will keep working!!!   My first product at Herbivore - bravo!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the best beauty product I have purchased hands down! This has cleared up my acne and has faded my acne scars. Face feels refreshed and clean after use. Definitely, recommend if you have oily skin because it cleans your pores so well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not going to lie, this is the best thing since sliced cucumbers for redness. Iu2019ve always struggled with uneven skin tone, especially on my cheeks and forehead. I received a sample for this and I was so shocked. After just one use, no redness, no uneven skin tone. My skin felt refreshed and baby soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am sensitive to synthetic fragrance, and this mask is unbearable.  Having such a reaction to a natural/green product is a first for me, and please be aware if you are sensitive to fragrance, you may want to first try a sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first received this as a sample, and then purchased the full size immediately after trying it. I dont get many breakouts, but I do get small whiteheads occasionally and always have blackheads on my nose. I also have redness around my T Zone (mostly from picking at my skin). This mask shrinks my pores, erases my redness, and helps to clean out my blackheads. I'm pretty sure I'm stuck using this for life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this as a sample and love the way it smelled. It also made my skin feel really nice. Unfortunately I am 50 with acne scars, so the only thing that will have a dramatic effect is a surgical peel. My skin is super sensitive and I still have acne. This product did Not make me breakout. Will probably add this to my summer routine next year

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this mask once a week since May and have noticed huge improvements to my skin. I like that it has exfoliating properties without the grit of a typical exfoliator. This is my go to especially when I have active breakouts and in a couple days my skin really calms down and the pimple will start to flatten. *i do use 10% benzoyl peroxide cream on my inflamed pimples*  I have been using the mini version that comes in the Herbivore Clarity set and itu2019s lasted 3 months! I did buy the full size since I want to be able to use the mini for when I travel. The consistency is thin and so you really donu2019t need a lot for the face as it spreads on the face easily.  Since I have sensitive skin, the acids do tingle when I put it on. I leave this on for about 5-7 minutes and then I wash it off. My skin is not red or sensitive after usage either. Like I said, because this is a pretty acid heavy mask, I only use it once a week to really cleanse my skin. I would recommend on only focusing this on your problem areas if you have sensi skin like mine.

reviews.review_title: calmed my rosacea like nothing else
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I finally understand this u201choly grailu201d status some people give products. And to be honest, I never expected it to be a herbivore product. I am really wary of using essential oils on my skin because most seem to irritate my skin and flare up my rosacea. Also Herbivore doesnu2019t use preservatives, which has caused moulding issues and recalls of several products. Despite what some want you to believe, preservatives arenu2019t the devil (including parabens if you actually read the studies done).   Anyways, I got a sample of this in Sephorau2019s clean skincare sample bag and wasnu2019t expecting much - I have many AHA/BHA products so this was probably not going to do much. I have a skincare routine down that I follow meticulously and while my skin looks pretty good, my rosacea has always never really settled down completely.  This mask has gotten rid of any remaining rosacea redness. Including the major flushing I still seemed to get. In just a couple uses :/ I donu2019t know how, but it sold me on the product and I bought it immediately from Sephora. Iu2019ve had a few weeks to use it now and still having consistent results so I will absolutely repurchase. Bonus is that itu2019s a fairly gentle aha/bha product and so it keeps my skin exfoliated (although I still use my stronger products on some alternate days). Although if youu2019re solely looking for exfoliation, I donu2019t know if Iu2019d start here since the price tag is so steep. (The Ordinary has a great, and cheap glycolic acid toner)   I highly recommend!

this mask will change your skin over night!! iu2019ve been using this for about a month now and it is incredible. iu2019ve seriously tried everything from sephora to clear up small blemishes and this is the best iu2019ve found! smells like the spa and seriously love how clean the product is. the mask also lasts a very long time. seriously recommending this to all my friends!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not much of a reviewer but this product deserves one. On day 2 and my face and neck are smooth and soft like a baby's bum (some baby's bum). But honestly took the risk in buying this very expensive product and not regretting it one bit. It also is visibly brighter and my acne scares are literally diminishing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love it. Had great reviews. But the smell made me so nauseas. It was potent and my face smelled like it for the rest of the day. Tossed it after one use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product as a sample and have had it on my face for 6 minutes. I donu2019t know if it works, and to be honest i donu2019t care if it works because it smells so bad! This could make me look 14 again and i would still not purchase the full size. Thatu2019s how bad it smells.

reviews.review_title: THE  S M E L L
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this in my Play! box a while back and this is the first product I COULD NOT get over the smell of. I see products I can tolerate the smell of get a star knocked off. It would have only been 2 stars off, (it's POWERFUL)  but it also gave me these weird red little dots on my upper cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It was eh. It does NOT smell good. And itu2019s weird on the skin because itu2019s a clear blue and I feel like it didnu2019t help my acne/blemishes at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used the entire bottle and didn't seem to do much for me. However I liked how smooth my skin felt right after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this during Hervbivore's birthday sale because I don't think I would've spent this much on this product otherwise. It's catered towards oily/normal/combo skin, so since I have dry skin I largely use this in the week before my period.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is amazing!!!! I never write reviews and needed to for this, my skin has never looked/ felt better from this!! It does kind of tingle a bit but once you get past that it is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE the smell of this mask! It smells so refreshing and clean. Iu2019ve i my had it for a few weeks so I donu2019t know how well it works yet but I love that a little goes a long way. You get more for your money. Tip: I like to wash it off with cold water. It makes it even more refreshing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have had difficult skin for 2 years since my pregnancy. I tried absolutely everything (no exaggeration) to get rid of the blackheads on my nose and cheeks, to get rid of little white pimples on my chin, the corners of my mouth and around my nose- even prescriptions. I was defeated, being 31 and having acne- it took effect on my self-esteem. Anyways, I bought this as I had nothing to lose at this point, and I WISH I WOULD HAVE TRIED THIS SOONER!!! I can already notice a dramatic difference after only 2 uses. I am so glad I treated myself to this. The way this works, I am hoping my skin issues are totally cleared in a month (that maybe total optimism but like I said, it's already better after 2 uses). It was runnier than I expected, it smells a little weird, and it tingles... but it is completely tolerable for results. Buy it! I promise you won't regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! This has helped my skin become so clear. I use it at night before bed, and have noticed that my skin has been breaking out less. Skin is glowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very lightweight gel mask that reminded me of the Laniege water sleeping mask. It had a very u201ccleanu201d smell and my skin felt a little dry afterwards but very refreshed! Definitely follow up with your moisturizers and serums in your regular routine after using this. I noticed very little tingling but other than that I loved this mask!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got as a sample but found it almost to runny and applied thinly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this mask in the duo along with the lapis facial oil. I love both. After reading the reviews, I was worried about the smell but honestly, I come from an essential oil background and this was fine -thats what blue tansy smells like, even the flowers. Also, I have sensitive skin and the tingling is not that bad. It's like if you put on a mint mask from the drug store.  The mask combined with the lapis oil is amazing and I instantly noticed my blemishes were less red and the next day they were virtually gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have hormonal acne and this mask is incredible. Really helps keep inflammation down. It of course doesn't cure my acne, only prescription medicine can cure real hormonal acne, but this really helps the recovery after it comes to the surface. It has quite a strong smell but not a bad one. Will repeat purchase FOREVER.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. My coworker recommended it to me since I have a slight obsession with face masks. This isn't your typical mask. The consistency is very liquid-y, almost like a gel/water hybrid. It feels amazing going on to your face; almost like a hydrating moisturizer. I usually leave it on for about 20-30 minutes. While it dries, it tightens your skin but doesn't hurt at all or get SUPER tight and drying like some face masks do. I did feel a slight tingle the first time I used it but my skin is now accustomed to it so I don't feel anything. After washing it off with warm water, my face feels clean, refreshed and renewed. No breakouts at all. A must buy if you have oily skin or acne. 5 stars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best masks I have tried for texture. Skin is visibly smoother after a couple of uses

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love. And have been for 2 years now. I've been using the Blue Tansy resurfacing mask and am on my third bottle. I use it about 2-3 times a week if I'm not lazy and very into my skin looking its best. It helps revive my skin post-breakouts, reduces how long my skin breaks out for and I think it even has prevented my skin from breaking out. I have combination skin and have monthly hormonal breakouts and this has been KEY in managing my skin. I'll never not use this mask. I don't understand the use of the utensil with it, since the mask's consistency is too goopy to use it, so wish Herbivore just didn't include it and reduce the one-use plastic, but oh well...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this mask! i like the smell it smells like fruity sweet bark. After one use of this mask my skin feels so smooth and silky soft! i like that this mask is natural and uses good ingredients

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed this product and it did not irritate my sensitive skin. I left it in for around 10 minutes no burning or nothing. I liked the smell of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So so good! Really helped clear up my skin and reduced redness!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! It feels great on the skin and I do think that it helps with my breakouts, black heads, pores and overall skin texture and tone! Highly recommend. My skin can be a pain and I do feel this helps quite a bit. Plus it smells amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is suppose to be a resurfacing mask. Any aha and bha it has is really weak. Iu2019ve used many acid masks and they typically at least tingle. Nothing here. No change with consistent use for a few weeks. Smell is horrible and very thin. I really wanted to like this but Iu2019m not impressed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in hoping I could find an alternative to the Drunk Elephant Sukari Babyfacial. I liked the Moonfruit mask a lot, and the Lapis oil, so I thought I would try this.  Ultimately, though, it's not the product for me. It didn't cause any breakouts, and it may have helped reduce period acne. (Hard to tell.) But the packaging and the liquid nature of this product makes it very hard to use. I accidentally spilled some of it when I was about half-way through, and applying it without dripping isn't easy.   I really wanted to like this product. It smells nice, it leaves my skin a bit softer. (My skin has a very high turnover, so I prefer pretty heavy-duty exfoliation.) But because it's in a jar, you can see the product oxidize, and it's easy to make a mess. Putting this into a pump would really save a lot of grief, making it easier to apply and not spill. Yes, I could buy a pump but for $50, I think the onus should not be on the consumer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mask has transformed my skin. This was the first product that I ever purchased from Sephora and the only reason I returned and gave other products a chance. Gave me a reason to believe that products that actually do what they promise exist. The mask stings a bit upon application, but the sensation subsided after a minute or so. After 2-3 uses that sensations goes away all together. I personally saw instant results after just one use- my skin became softer, smoother, cleaner, and clearer. My small pimples subsided and red spots disappeared all together. My pores were significantly smaller and all blackheads were gone. I cannot praise this product enough. I recommended it to all my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this product 3-4 days in a row when I am starting to break out because it takes inflammation and prevents my breakout from getting worse. i have really oily t zone and redness on my cheeks and it takes both of these things as well for a really nice and even complexion. Iu2019m on my third box of this stuff and plan to continue buying!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this mask! It honestly prevents breakouts and makes my skin feel so smooth. Definitely recommend this to everyone!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product but didnu2019t find it did anything for my skin at all. I didnu2019t find it irritating, I just didnu2019t find it to be effective.

reviews.review_title: Good product with very short shelf life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the mini kit with other Herbivore products and fell in love with it after just one use.  I have combination oily acne prone sensitive skin and this didn't break me out in the slightest.  Since I live in SoCal I keep most of my skincare in the fridge and I always use a scooper/spatula for everything.  I used it every 3 days and noticed my skin was smoother and brighter.  Fast forward 3 weeks and I notice black mold growing on the side of the jar and had to throw out a third of the product that was left.  I'm glad I didn't waste my money on a full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m shocked people donu2019t like the smell! I think it smells incredible, and itu2019s worked wonders on my bumpy skin on my forehead and cheeks. Iu2019ve noticed I need to leave it on an extra 10-15 minutes longer than the suggested time to be effective, but donu2019t mind doing so at all. Obsessed with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mask really calms down my skin - especially the redness.  I would highly recommend this product if you are looking for a gentle exfoliator in a form of a mask.

reviews.review_title: Effective, yet gentle enough to wear to sleep
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve slept with this mask on for several days a week with no ill effects whatsoever. Itu2019s effective enough to shrink my angry acne and resurface my dead skin, but gentle enough to have never irritated me, even when my skin was at its most sensitive. I usually shop around and like to try different acid masks, but I genuinely plan to buy this again. It also smells amazing, bitter and earthy but lightly sweet in a very pleasant way.   The only u201cconu201d for some folks would be the time it takes to wash this off your face once itu2019s dry, as it does take a while to rub it off with water. However, I like to spend a lot of time cleaning my face anyways and think the gentle circular motions help resurface dead skin anyways, so itu2019s never been an issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My reason for using this mask is a bit different.  I recieved a small sample and fell in love with the scent and the refreshing feel it gave my face.  I loved it so much I bought a set that included both blue Tansy mask and the lapis oil which are wonderful together or alone.  My skin issues are more focused on aging and tone but it certainly doesnu2019t hurt to clarify my pores and use this for the relaxation benefits.  Itu2019s not just a mask, itu2019s part of my self care ritual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try out this mask as so many people have indicated that they received good results from it. I had read that the color of this mask could be different from the blue that is advertised, so when I opened it I was not over surprised that it was more of a dark green then a blue. However, I was shocked to find brown mold on the lid, rim, and floating in the product. The oils in the product had also separated, resulting in a light blue oil slick on the top of the mask (which also looked like it had growths in it) and it had a rancid smell. I had heard that is brand has issues with products going bad before their expiration date, but I did not expect this from a brand new jar. I will be returning immediately.

So, I haven't been able to see if this delivered on skincare results. Since then, I've read other reviews and everyone mentions the smell being earthy and fresh and clean. Skin is left clear and smooth, there are times I have slept with it on. If I have a period breakout I will use this for 2-3days straight and pimple dries right up. Reason for 4stars and not 5 is I do think the packaging needs to change, a pump will be better to not damage the rest of the product every time the jar  is open, but the product itself will forever be part of my skin care routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best mast in ever going to have. Before I go into the review i just want to say that it should be five stars but the packaging takes one star away. I think a pump would help keep this product clean and allow its highest efficiency.. but anyway. THIS MASK IS A HOLY GRAIL. I donu2019t see myself not living with this and Iu2019ve thrown all other masks away. I have struggled with acne my whole life, had to go on accutane twice and still get a few pimples here and there, although accutane has helped the rate at which they disapear. I feel like this masks helps almost instantly. I personally love the smell, because i tend to favor more earthy herbally smells. The texture is runny which is why i think a pump would work with this. You only need a thin layer and you hardly see it on, but it tingles and feels soothing to me (unless you use it too much or have it on for too long haha). When i wash it off, my face instantly feels smoother and any breakouts i have are instantly calmed. I recently had a few breakouts and weird little bumps forming around my mouth, i put this on in haste and my skin was clear the next morning. If youu2019re on the fence about this, GET IT. Itu2019s so amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This mask literally did nothing to my skin, in fact it even made it worse. I was really hoping to like this, along with the other Herbivore products, but it just simply did nothing but to make me breakout. I tried it for 2 weeks but I returned it because literally nothing happened. Really mad that It did not work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great mask for natural chemical exfoliation: removed dead skin off, unclogged pores, helps with texture, brightening effect.   BHA (salicylic acid) to unclog pores. AHA (pineapple and papaya enzyme) to remove dead skin. And aloe for hydration.   One of my favorite mask! A slight tingling when applied, but nothing uncomfortable. This was actually gentle enough to use every 3 or 4 days. But did not dry out my skin. As always, moisturize after use. This product is a thin watery gel consistency, so it kind of goes quick. The blue color is very pleasing to the eye. Went through the jar, and will definitely repurchase. I put mine in the fridge before use, so its cool on the skin. A good price as well!   I would compare this to the Tata Harper resurfacing mask, my holy grail.   As far as pricing, it's reasonable 2 oz for $48.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic brightening mask-- even for those with dry, sensitive skin (or even redness!!). The small bumps on my face decrease greatly and it evens out my skin. The only con is that the smell can be a bit strange. I will definitely repurchase this during the next Sephora sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell of this is really nauseating like a lot of people mentioned here. I very rarely (if not ever) get thrown off only because of scents but this is something else. I put the mask a few hours before bed and rinsed it off and used other products on top of it and its still very there. I want to vomit and I cannot sleep. I will give this a week to prove it does anything that is worth the smell. Iu2019ll add another review if it gets better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is incredible. You always hear people say I saw results after the first use and I always roll my eyes like yea okay sure you did, sis. Well this product totally left me speechless after rinsing it off. My skin felt sooo smooth. What texture?! It looked so bright and even. It does tingle when applying and the instructions on the insert that the jar comes with does state that that is normal. This is a chemical exfoliant. The tingling goes away after a minute or two and my skin was not irritated at all. I urge you to give this a try. I love this waaaay more than the Drunk Elephant Babyfacial and it's a fraction of the price. You won't be disappointed with this mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I opened it it spilled EVERYWHERE. Literally half the jar spilled out. The smell is nauseating. did nothing for my skin  and my skin smelled really bad after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No results.  I couldnu2019t see that I received any benefit from this product.  Used twice and donu2019t even care for how it smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the worst thing I've ever smelled in my entire life. Not the worst product or the worst mask, the worst thing ever. That's in comparison to trash, roadkill, skunks, expired food. Honestly don't understand how people even use this product. I used it once and it did nothing for my skin so I instantly decided it wasn't worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far one of my favourite skin care products.  I have sensitive, combo/oily skin and for me this product has worked wonders! Even though I donu2019t have intensive scarring or a lot of acne, I do get post -acne hyperpigmentation which has been a big frustration.  This mask has helped to even out my skin tone and I notice a huge difference from this one product alone (which is rare, because sometimes itu2019s hard to tell).  I use it once a week, giving my face a break from other AHA/BHA exfoliating products the day of. I leave it on for the full 20 min and my sensitive skin does not react poorly, although I would recommend easing in for the first tries. Best. Product. Ever.

reviews.review_title: COOLING AND CLEARING BUT ROTTING FRUIT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm on the fence with this mask - I really enjoy it as a cooling and clearing mask (especially since clay masks can be more harsh sometimes) but the smell is God awful. It smells like rotting fruit and detergent. I was worried about going through it quickly because it's more runny and is rather expensive but I havent picked it up as much because the smell is so off putting. I didnt notice a bug enough difference in my skin to get over the smell and power through.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got this mask in a smaller size because I couldn't bring myself to splurge on the larger version without knowing if my skin would like it first. My skin isn't sensitive, but it does react quite strongly to masks, and a lot of them end up burning my skin and irritating it.   This mask DID burn a bit the first few times I used it, but I just took it off a bit sooner than directed. After a few uses, my skin adjusted and I no longer have any issues.  This is a great mask for combination skin; it isn't overly drying  and I really find it improves the texture of my skin over time. I agree it does have a bit of a strange smell, but it wasn't overpowering/intolerable, and I got used to it quite fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Brought it because it says it helps with acne. There is always one or two acne pop out on my face. This mask didnu2019t help at all. I also didnu2019t see any changes of my slight redness skin. Disappointed. Wouldnu2019t buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every morning before I start my makeup routine. It does have a strong fragrance and can tingle A LOT but this keeps my skin clear and after a while I have found that my skin has even become less oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What else can I say? If you are suffering from acne and redness, Just buy it. Buy it please.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone who I have ever talked about this mask has said they LOVE it, but unfortunately for me they did not warn me about the smell. It is extremely pungent! I really wanted to love this but the smell is not worth it. It smells like when you walk into a hookah bar and everyone has some different type of candy/fruit flavored tobacco hitting you right in the nose. Its so powerful. I really wanted to use it and see the benefits of the mask so I put some strong smelling essential oils next to my nose to cove the smell. And if i have to do that to be able to even wear a mask for 20 minutes, its not worth it. If you think you can handle the smell then by all means go for it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 4 Stars because of the smell. OMG, this works really well. I can see the improvement, but the smell.. I almost get disgusted by the smell and it seems getting worse and worse. Please try the smell and if it's okay this is the best clarifying mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely disappointing. I was very excited to try this product but after using the full bottle - every other day for the seven days then 3 times a week - I have had no results.   With such a big price tag and amazing reviews I thought that this would help clear up some existing acne, help remove redness, or at the least prevent new acne, however I have had no such luck and just finished the entire $60 bottle.   Would not recommend, or would recommend trying a sizeable sample before investing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask and it smells really nice, its not that strong. I use this probably 3 times a week on average and i have noticed a difference in my pink scarring from zits. this doesn't irritate my sensitive skin at all i really love this product and herbivore is becoming one of my all time favorite brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask!!! I have recently been struggling with hormonal/cystic acne along my jawline and generally not great skin and this mask perfectly compliments the prescribed Retin-A I have been applying to my face. The splotchiness/redness/dryness/puffiness and heat I usually experience has calmed down significantly after only a few applications. Furthermore, my skin feels cleansed and firm, my pores appear smaller, and I see improved elasticity and glow. All around my skin feels a million times better and healthier. The mask itself is not thick and is somewhat viscous and I have an easier time applying it with my fingers as opposed to the applicator that is included. Other purchasers have commented on the smell, and while it is a bit strong, it dissipates fairly quickly and the closest odor I can compare it to is tea tree oil. Definitely an amazing purchase for the amount and quality of the product. I expect it to last at least 3 months with near daily use. For reference, after washing off with a damp washcloth, Iu2019m following up with Murad SPF 50 in the mornings, and continuing with the Retin-A and Murad Hydro-dynamic Ultimate Moisturizer in the evenings. Have not applied makeup since using this mask, but I feel that the rehabilitated texture of my skin will improve the appearance and longevity of makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IN LOVE. Makes my face feel smoother and reduces the redness and size of acne blemishes. Smell is strong but refreshing and soothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Blue Tansy is so amazing. I wish I could give it 7/5 stars because of how well it works. It feels slightly tingly when you first apply it, but it is also cooling and relaxing. After just one treatment, my skin was noticeably less red and my acne was better. After applying it for a few days, much of my acne had cleared up and my skin was significantly less red.I use it a few times a week to help reduce and limit my acne and redness and its amazing. I have never used a more natural and clean product that works as well as this to combat acne and redness. This is my favorite skin care product. I am so amazed by how well it works. The smell is a little strong, but I got used to it right away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this product after all the great reviews but unfortunately this did nothing to keep my new breakouts away or lessen them. Was religiously using but saw no results after a month of using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample/ travel size of this. It certainly smells nice, and the packaging is aesthetic. I used this about 10 times, and at best it did nothing but sting and turn my face red, at worst I got these weird pimples around the edges of my face where I never get pimples. I wanted to like it, but overall it's too harsh for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best natural peels you can get at sephora. Definitely not for people with sensitive or dry skin. You'll get a lot of tingling the first couple uses like a lactic acid peel at a spa before you get used to it. I apply onto emerging breakouts as it helps to exfoliate the pimple while the tansy gets rid of the redness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has quickly become a holy grail for me in combination with the Lapis Balancing Oil. Iu2019ve been struggling with my skin when it comes to texture/little red bumps for a while now & I truly believe that this mask has helped reduce that for me! I tried a sample first & saw such a significant difference that I just had to buy the full sizes. I started off by using this product for 5 days straight & then switched to using it every 2-3 days! Keeps my skin looking balanced & smooth! Highly recommend this for anyone struggling with the same thing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with redness, large pores, texture and oily skin. I have used this for 3 days in a row as suggested for about 20-30 mins, and let me tell you my skin has not looked so calm in a LONG time. Redness is almost completely gone and my skin looks SO smooth. I've noticed my foundation looks much better too. Over all a must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is worth it itu2019s a little expensive Compared to other products who can do the same thing but the difference is that this product is natural and great for my very sensitive skin I canu2019t use any products which have acids or anything my skin gets dry and ugly . I love this itu2019s works amazing even my boyfriend noticed it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love everything about this mask! It smells great, and has a cooling effect, and keeps any rough texture away which makes makeup application so easy! Have repurchased and will continue to repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this mask! I have acne prone skin, I find that it really works for my smaller breakouts and helps healing time of my larger cystic acne. I don't notice a huge difference when it comes to blackhead but I didn't buy it for that so I'm really happy with it! Would definitely recommend for those with acne or textured skin:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am skincare obsessed, have tried what seems like every mask under the sun, and while there are plenty of products I love, this is the only mask that has such dramatic results so quickly. This is my favorite mask when I see a breakout forming, as it works instantly overnight. Have recommended to all of my friends. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely one of the more...interesting masks I've used in terms of texture (I'm also not a fan of the smell but that might be just me), but it works far better than I expected. It's been particularly helpful for me in reducing redness and just overall evening out my skin tone, which is more than I can say for a lot of other products I've tried for these issues. This one jar seems like it will last a while too, which is always nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This natural mask removes dead skin & leaves my skin smooth & bright. I have quite sensitive skin so I only leave the mask on for five minutes. I havenu2019t experienced any issues or sensitivity, just good results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is a game changer. I have tried countless mask and this is my favorite by far. I am always looking for something to calm redness and help with breakouts, finally I found this! I had one of those giant zits that never seems like it will go away and after just one use could see a huge improvement. I love love this mask and recommend it to anyone who wants to calm inflammation. It is now a staple for me!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best mask I have used in a while!! It works almost immediately and it makes any of my blemishes diminish within a day!! Itu2019s defi a miracle worker!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. This mask has really helped to calm down my stubborn adult acne. I used nightly for 6 days and now use it every other day. While Iu2019ve done through the jar in almost one month, I donu2019t anticipate that trend to continue. Highly recommend. I was my face with DE pekee bar (juju bar once a week), then apply this mask, followed by Briogeo B. Well tea tree oil. This combination seems to have really helped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff works on my acne prone skin. I got my first (full size) jar in the Sephora favorites mask set. My face feels so soft and it lightened up my acne scars. I use it every other night and I am now on my second jar. Plus it smells good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this is honestly the best mask i have ever used! it smells nice, itu2019s clean, and IT WORKS! i just bought it today after having my eye on it for weeks and i definitely do not regret it. i used it just once and my over-sensitized (retinoids) and acne-prone skin is already smoother and much less red! would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I suffer from cystic acne around my jawline and have combination skin. I bought this mask on a complete whim barely researched it, saw the reviews and thought why not. Long story short I have never loved a mask more, and I have tried millions. This is the closest to physically going and getting a facial. The consistency is almost like jelly which makes it so neat and easy to apply, and take off. It goes through stages of heating and cooling and the scent is unlike anything. After 3 daily uses my cystic flare up is almost completely flat, less red, and most importantly doesnu2019t hurt anymore! All in all I canu2019t believe I accidentally purchased this holy grail, super thankful highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: HONEY LOVE YOURSELF W THIS SUGAR DADDY
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i work with kids messy kids... so that in addition to my easy acne prone skin has had me hopping products from caudalie drunk elephant etc while those helped.....none gave me the crazy noticeable transformation that this product did. I am in love and gona try some more of their products for sure. If u struggle with acne THIS IS A MUST HONEY<3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So glad I picked this up. Started wearing more makeup for a new corporate job and my skin was not happy. Had breakouts and redness, dry spots and bad texture issues. Noticed pretty decent difference in 2 maybe 3 uses. I usually use it every 2-3 days to not overdo it. Will definitely repurchase when I run out, which will be a whiiile because a little goes a long way. Also really enjoy the tingling feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Mask has genuinely saved my face! I started getting adult acne in my mid 20s out of nowhere (thanks grad school), and tried just about everything to get it to go away from Proactiv to Curology (for >1yr), and nothing really worked to clear anything faster or prevent new pimples from cropping up. I FINALLY found this mask while sifting through skincare in the Sephora app. I used the first jar pretty heavily, applying it every day for at least 20 minutes for a solid 7-9 days straight and then backed down to every other day. About halfway through that first jar my skin was BRAND NEW. Honestly I can't overhype it enough. Before, my forehead was straight up cobblestone, even when I didn't have big red pimples, it never felt or looked smooth. And now it's incredible and perfectly smooth. I haven't seen or felt my skin this smooth since basically pre-puberty Era (let's get real though, it'll never look or feel as perfect as it did when we were kids and couldn't have cared less about it). But if you're on the fence about this product and you're struggling with adult acne (not sure about inflammatory acne-- it may react different) TRY THIS. You absolutely won't regret it. I put it on right after the shower 3 days a week now, and just chill for 20 minutes while it dries on my face. The smell is pretty strong, but it's fruity so I got used to it and enjoy it now. I do recommend following it with at least a light moisturizer afterwards but I haven't found it dries me out super crazy without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So so so hard to get past the awful smell. Itu2019s also not a homogenous consistency. The Tata Harper mask, while more expensive, is so much better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a really good mask for acne prone skin. But it somehow volatilize in the air when I stop using it for two weeks. I read an article online, saying BHA is the real deal, but AHA has the possibility to thin out your skin(sry here, donu2019t know how to word it). However, AHA does help get rid of the blemish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used once or twice a week this product has completely saved my skin from acne. Couldn't recommend more highly.  Don't use it more than 3 times a week, my skin got irritated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From all these raving reviews, I wanted to love this product but unfortunately altering using it for about three weeks, I notice no difference in my breakouts and I was even getting more break outs than normal. I'm not sure if it was one of the ingredients of the product or what but it did not work for me at all..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with super reactive and sensitive, I'm always on the hunt for a good enzymatic mask that won't give me a reaction. This guy is one of the best things that has ever happened to my skin. Make sure to follow the instructions of using at least 2-4 nights in a row and I guarantee your skin will be looking its best like mine does after the right use! I use this leading up to an event or day that I really want my skin looking amazing and I always get compliments on my skin after use! This mask is so clean in terms of ingredients and doesn't compromise effectiveness!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the balance+clarify set back in December after i received a sephora gift card for christmas. everyoneu2019s skin is different so take this VERY lightly.. this mask did not work for me at all. It gave me little bumps on the side of my nose and a cluster on my cheekbone. i tried it several times.. i thought my skin would be u201ccleansedu201d by the third time but no, bumps kept on coming. Funny part is, it only happened to one side of my face. I stopped using it (kept the rest of my routine going) and surprise surprise, bumps went away. I saw another review a few years ago stating the same effects. But like i said, everyoneu2019s skin is different and you wonu2019t know how something works until you try it out yourself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This definitely works for redness

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve struggled with acne and after only a week of using this I can see a big difference. The redness has gone away and Iu2019ve been getting less spots then before. This product is great and I totally recommend, the only downside is thatu2019s itu2019s time consuming considering youu2019re supposed to use it often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only been using this for about a week, and Iu2019ve already noticed a difference in my skin tone, itu2019s evened out and my pores do look smaller. The inflammation I have from hormonal acne when I use it has shrank, and it instantly soothes it and makes the redness go away or to a minimum. I have VERY sensitive skin (I break out or react to everything) and this stuff doesnu2019t bother me whatsoever. Took about 3 times to get used to the tingling, but so far I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wa really excited to try this product because I heard so many good things about it. However, Iu2019ve been using it for a few weeks now and Iu2019m not noticing any improvements in my skin. It might work for some people but I will not be repurchasing this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING. Tingles a little upon application, but then turns into a cooling sensation. Completely tones face and smells incredible. Highly recommend using the Lapis oil after for clear, smooth, and radiant skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried to live without this product and gave in and purchased it again. I have not found another mask that leaves my face so smooth and does not irritate my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it drips so be really careful when using it, some dripped into my eyes from forehead so be careful when apply to areas above eyes. also smells funny, wouldn't recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To me this is one of Herbivores best products (that and the facial oils). This mask has a nice, light fragrance to it. I can't attest to it helping acne since I haven't had much to combat recently, however it didn't break me out either. I like the glass packaging, however I don't always want to get the plastic applicator, as I got one from the first purchase that I reuse.  I've bought this product twice already and will continue to buy in the future.

reviews.review_title: The smell is driving me crazy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this a couple of times over the last few days. I definitely notice that my skin is smoother and softer after I wipe the mask off.
