It's such a unique smell and it honestly brings on a migraine. I know some people like it, but I just can't do it. I'm going to keep using it because it was not cheap and I see some positive effects after use, but I don't know that I can purchase it again. If you can handle the smell, then I definitely think this is a product to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely repurchase masks as there are so many great ones out there and love trying a ton of different products. This mask however I repurchased the day I ran out of my first jar (which lasted several months of regular use). I have acne prone combination skin and this mask checks every box. This mask helps clear my skin, even my skin tone, smooth out texture and minimize pores. The smell is pretty awful and initially I thought it would end up being a deal breaker but I have grown accustomed to it despite still not liking it at all. Herbivore products are u201ccleanu201d and this mask definitely smells very natural with the blue tansy scent very prominent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is wonderful! It burns ever so mildly when you first put it on, but itu2019s not unbearable. I slap this on when Iu2019m having a bad breakouts, and it really helps heal my skin and help it purge a little better. The smell hits you hard at first, but after a while it really grows on you. Definitely going to buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Does exactly what it says it does! I use this at night and my skin feels very smooth the next morning. The only downside is the strong smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become an absolute MUST in my routine. My skin is very reactive and sensitive: it's red in the summer due to heat, and in the winter due to cold. Blue Tansy helps so much. I use it once to twice a week, and it definitely keeps redness down. I also use Herbivore's Lapis facial oil daily. These two products together keep my skin its normal colour and texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this with the lapis facial oil when it came in a set. This does help with redness after you apply the mask, but I feel like it doesn't have a lasting effect. I was kind of disappointed after reading all the glowing reviews, as this product does work but it's not mind blowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best mask I have ever used.  I followed the recommendation and used it once a day for the first 4 days and the once a week for a few weeks now. It has made my skin smooth and clear.  Hands down the best results I have had from any mask.  It does what it says it's going to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mask for about 4 weeks now. Wonderful clarifying mask!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Has a strong smell and doesnu2019t do what is meant to be doing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this mask but I require a moisturizing mask afterwards

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To date, the most effective resurfacing product Iu2019ve used. Smells great, softens, and obliterates bumps and imperfections. I use this 1-2x a week and experience no issues with irritation. Only baby soft, smooth skin for days afterward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great and leaves my skin glowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this Blue Tansy mask along with the Lapis oil for about a month now. I have dry, sensitive skin that is prone to breakouts. I was interested in these two products because of the claim to control acne and redness (the two things keeping me from going makeup free). Immediately after using this mask, my face was much softer and felt more supple. After about a week of use, my face started to purge. The areas like my chin and forehead where I always had bumps under the skin before began to breakout. This lasted for two weeks..  I have stayed consistent with using the mask about every other day and the lapis oil each night. Iu2019m happy I stuck with it! My skin is now very soft and my breakouts have improved greatly. I am happiest, though, with how much these products have improved the red patches on my face! The mask is gentle and did not dry out my skin. Combined with the Lapis oil, I have no dryness whatsoever anymore.

reviews.review_title: If it sounds too good to be true, it probably is.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I thought this product was working well but after a few weeks of using it regularly (as directed) my skin went back to how it was before... The smell isn't bad like people are saying, and although it does sting a bit the stinging only lasts the first few minutes. I really wish I had better results though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. I use it to get rid of the dry skin I get seasonally in the winter. My skin glows for days afterward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw major results after about a month use and minor results after the first week. I used it 4 days in a row the first week and 3 days every other day the second week until I eventually started using it once a week to maintain. My skin is combination skin (oily tzone and dry around my nostrils). It is quite sensitive to products so I tend to be picky about what I put on my skin. I get cystic hormonal acne and have tried so many products with little to no results. A little goes a long way with this product. Iu2019m sooo thankful for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this mask 4 stars because it feels amazing when it's on and the results are pretty great! My skin looks and feels amazing. The smell is rough though. I was surprised to read other reviews that said it smelled great. Other than that, I feel like it works really well and I would buy it again if it weren't for the horrible smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went in for a 15 minute facial and the person working suggested this mask for me. My skin is acne prone, has a lot of acne marks from past pimples, and really could use an improvement on its tone. This mask made a difference with one use. I didn't think it was too tingly, but I had it on for probably five minutes. I follow this mask with drunk elephant B-hydra serum, first aid barriair cream, and farmacy SPF (from the worker's recommendations as well) and my skin feels extremely calmed and balanced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have really been loving using this mask! It immediately feels cooling and refreshing with a little bit of tingle. My favorite part of this mask is that I have a deep clean feeling without drying my skin out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am on my second full size jar of this face mask. It has become a staple in my skincare. I've been having trouble with acne for years and while I can't say this has cleared my skin, it does help tremendously when I get a breakout. This mask does have a tingle/sting (especially when you have active breakouts) but I don't mind it at all. It really does smooth out my skin and helps make my breakouts go away much quicker. Another bonus, I've never had any irritation or dryness form using this mask, it's actually the opposite, I find after using this mask my moisturizer really absorbs and I feel more hydrated. I usually use the mask before bed then follow up with a nice hydrating night cream like pink cloud and a bit of Ren's overnight recovery balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell and feel of this mask on the skin. It feels cold when you apply it but I actually love that! A lot of people have complained about the smell but personally, I love it! It smells like candy or something. I found that this helped my active pimples to shrink and go away much faster! It isnu2019t uncomfortable on the skin and doesnu2019t burn, itu2019s soothing. Overall, I actually enjoy this mask and found that it helps clear my skin. I will repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a product that you donu2019t know you need in your life until you use it for the first time.  Your look and see how smooth, glowing, and amazing your skin looks.  It shrinks pores, resurfacing the face for sure but itu2019s so gentle. Love it!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. Skin feels softer, acne is better. My new favorite obsession!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin feels great after using this mask and it smells great but I donu2019t see and was expecting the awesome results that others have seen. A bit disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good product. After using this, my skin became very smooth. No trouble, easy to use... I love this mask!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am on my second jar so I do like the product, itu2019s true itu2019s hard to get off I use baby wipes. Otherwise smooths, calms and brightens the skin. With my first jar I had no issues with the smell, it smelled almost like green tea (I also got it from a store), the second jar was so awful I almost returned the product. I am pretty much convinced that Sephora warehouse is not storing it properly. So if the smell is really bad go exchange it in a store for a new one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Smell is a bit different but not bad. The essential oil settles a bit on the top so use the spatula to mix a bit before applying.  This has done wonders for my pores on my nose and redness on my cheeks. (So cool one product helps both these issues!) I use twice a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Will be repurchasing for the third time! I have struggled with hormonal acne for several years and I saw immediate results after using this face mask. It does sting a little bit when you first put it on, but it is not uncomfortable. After the first use my existing acne was reduced in size as well as redness. After using regularly for a few weeks my skin has cleared up and I have had a reduction in new breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It actually works for my acne prone skin! It is not only help vanish the acne but make my skin more stable. And you will see the change really after the first time you used it! It does not make my skin irritated either, very gentle. But the smell is really wired... but after a while you will get used to it...

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve struggled with hormonal acne for years and tried so many different ways to treat it, both natural and prescription. This is the one and only product that I can actually say with confidence truly works to clear my skin AND heal marks and discoloration from acne. This is truly a miracle product. I used it years ago and noticed it was very effective in healing some particularly stubborn acne marks on my chin but got lazy and didnu2019t repurchase. I came back to it recently after a particularly nasty breakout and it is amazing how quickly and effectively it cleared my skin. I am very diligent with using it now, at least once a day and sometimes even twice a day, and I will put extra product on problem areas. Works great, feels great and smells great too! This product has saved me so much stress and frustration and the fact that itu2019s an all natural product is amazing as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have adult acne and scars and let me tell you this stuff is AMAZING!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! My skin feels so smooth after and it visibly reduces the look of my large pores. Helping me through some hormonal acne issues. Great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is pretty good at clarifying. Iu2019m not sure about anti aging or anything (I donu2019t have wrinkles or anything), it does make my face feel tighter but all masks kinda do. I saw some reviews saying the smell is horrible or that it burned, but if you have NORMAL (sensitivity wise) skin (that you still wanna be very gentle with) and combo/normal (occasionally a bit oily) skin type, listen up   1)the smell is not that bad. Sure some may not like it, but it just kinda smells like a natural cough medicine (in a not so bad way). Donu2019t let it deter you from getting a sample or buying the product (unless youu2019re sensitive to that stuff)  2) it definitely does tingle a bit, but itu2019s not bothersome. I kinda like the feeling, itu2019s cooling but it also feels like itu2019s working. You also get more used to it as you leave it on.   I used it for 3 days in a row like the package said, and the morning after the second use I noticed some bumps and things popping up especially around my nose, where I tend to breakout if Iu2019m going to get a breakout. It wasnu2019t crazy breaking me out, but it is supposed to clarify so a few things popping up as your skin adjusts itself should be expected. I really do like this mask. It comes off easily and I think it will be good for keeping my occasional cystic acne breakouts and clogged pores/white heads at bay. I think if your skin is really congested and acne prone, you should get a few samples in store and try it out, but I think youu2019d really like it:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Only had a deluxe sample of this so I got three uses out of it, but it feels lovely on my face and my skin feels very smooth afterwards. I just canu2019t bring myself to purchase it due to the odd smell! Almost medicinal?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mask for two weeks now and I love it! I use it for 3 days straight and 3 days off. It smells funky at first but as it dries on your skin, it gets better. The blemishes Iu2019d had on my cheeks and chin for months are now barely noticeable. Couldnu2019t be happier with the results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this face mask. I have combination skin and Iu2019m not normally prone to acne when I have a breakout this worked very well for me. It didnu2019t dry out my face and helped eliminate any developing acne and excess oil.   Pros: -helped eliminate acne -very smooth formula  Cons: -strong smell -expensive   OVERALL: I will likely buy this in the future. I originally got a sample of this and it lasted me maybe a year when applying it about once a month. It does has a strong smell,  whatever ingredient used that causes that color and smell Iu2019ve had in other products and itu2019s always been beneficial to my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The difference in my skin is so noticeable the day after I use this mask, I look like a different person. I have moderate to severe cystic acne and this mask clears it without irritating my dry and sensitive skin. It's a life saver and I'm in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Probably my favorite product from Herbivore. If I have the occasional pimple or redness, or even for dullness and pore size as I age, this mask is a champ. I use all over for clarity and pore size reduction, about 30 minutes. It takes a bit of manipulation to remove it - it's not harsh, just sort of re-wets before it finally wipes off. It's easier in the shower. I use it as a spot mask for occasional pimples, about 20 minutes. Inflammation is generally reduced by 30% right away, more if I follow it with their Lapis oil. The combo takes inflammation down by at least 70% the next morning. My teen daughter loves it, too, and she's experiencing some forehead acne. It's the only mask that clarifies and reduces redness without any side effects. For her, using it several times a week gets the best results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product may not smell the best and is a bit of a fuss when applying and using. However, this product has amazing results! Your skin will be nice clean, soft, supple with a renewed tightness to it. My pores were closed and less apparent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was very happy with the fast results this product provided. I was worried that while resurfacing my skin that there would be excess dead skin, but this never occurred.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a kit with the lapis oil and it fixed my skin this summer during the 120 degree days when my oily skin went haywire. This product got me back into masking again and Iu2019m on my second jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEST exfoliator for the winter/cold season! It is a clear mask and I love how it IS NOT messy. I see results of pores shrinking and scars fading in just 1 week. I read reviews before purchasing and I thought that it is too good to be true! This product works and is definitely worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this mask!!!! I do it at night so my skin isnu2019t sensitized in the am. I have bad hormonal acne and redness. I did the 5 days in a row and WOW!!!!!! My skin pinks a little when I put it on but when I wash it off and wake up the next morning holy crap my acne is calm and the size of my acne are reduced and my face is GLOWING!!!!!! You donu2019t need much at all either!!!!!! Will definitely purchase again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Have repurchased this several times!  Def improvement in texture and moisture.  Only call out is that it can be a little tricky to work with.  Great for dry, easily irritated skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this mask. Anything with blue tansy in it I am like YES PLS. My skin looks better after, brighter and less red. It did not make a huge difference with my hormonal acne - but I know that nothing really does for the couple of days it plagues my face. This mask is great and I will for sure purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years! I follow it after washing my face with my Clarisonic and it makes me feel like my skin is refreshed and cleaned deep into my pores! It does have alittle tingle so if you have sensitive skin really cut the time down until your skin builds up to it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this in combination to the Herbivore Blue Tansy Oil and the Prism Exfoliating Glow Potion. I saw my acne clear up, skin smoothen and soften, and it helps my skin glow. I feel you have to be a bit patient and use it for a couple of weeks before you start seeing effects. I had started using a sample size and saw some differences towards the end of it which got me to buy the full size. Am really happy with it and definitely adding it to my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this months ago... and Iu2019ve barely made a dent in it after using it 20+ times. I wasnu2019t so crazy about it at first, only using it here and there rather than consistently 2-3 times a week. I went back to it and WOW. It has made a noticeable difference in my skin, managing my oily skin daily and reducing breakouts. I love that it is a more u201cnaturalu201d alternative for a AHA + BHA mask, as I was using the DE Framboos serum before and it did not agree with my super sensitive skin. This is an awesome alternative that works awesome too, as long as youu2019re consistent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot get enough of this mask. I love the way it feels on my skin. I've noticed a difference to the surface of my skin after one week. I will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried this out for a month now, about once or twice a week. The first time, I rinsed it off with warm water and didn't notice any results. I really recommend adhering to their advice suggesting that you should wipe it off with a wet wash cloth. I think leaving a little on your skin will help the product work on it for longer. I don't find that it helped with any existing breakouts or prevented any others, but eventually it does help make the rest of my skin feel fairly smooth and seems to be helping with my PIH marks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This broke me out soooooo bad like thereu2019s no tomorrow. My skin is not even sensitive or acne prone and Iu2019ve never broken out like this before. I donu2019t even wanna go out of the door now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING! Instant glowing smooth soft skin. Instantly improves texture. Perfect strength and didnu2019t stress my skin out. My skin loves this treatment!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this in store, Iu2019ve been looking for a good at home peel weekly mask. This seemed like it would tick all the boxes and be exactly what I wanted but Iu2019m glad I sampled it before purchasing. I wanted to love it but I just donu2019t, it is a bit too thin to really spread a good thick layer on that would stay put, youu2019re supposed to leave it on for like 10-15 min but I found it was dry in 5, then itu2019s impossible to rinse off it sticks to your skin like dried egg whites and I just didnu2019t really find that it did much for my skin.

reviews.review_title: formula changed, now it stains your face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: unsure of how many stars to give because I used to love this product, but I believe the formula has changed. I've purchased this and used it up completely 2 or 3 times before and liked it a lot - when I was struggling with a particularly bad hormonal acne flare-up, this helped calm and heal my skin. It's not a miracle product, it's just better than a clay mask (which literally anything is), but nevertheless was something that worked well and I obviously liked enough to repurchase several times. Now I am all but certain the formula has changed and that they are skimping on blue tansy oil - this mask stains my skin blue, and it's so difficult to remove the stain that I suspect some kind of dye (even if natural) is being used to make it appear to be more potent with blue tansy than it really is. Just from spreading the mask on my face, it immediately stained my fingers blue. My face is stained blue, didn't wash off with cleanser and toner, and took until the next day to gradually fade. Really disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has been absolutely amazing for me. I am currently pregnant so I have a lot of hormonal acne and hormonal cysts on my face that are pretty painful. My skin has also gotten extremely sensitive and my favorite face product actual gave me a chemical burn so I was incredibly nervous to try this. I also am a regular full face girl as well. I wash morning and night and moisturize regularly as well.  Hereu2019s my personal experience:  Night 1: my face was still incredibly flakey from getting a chemical burn and I was also in a lot of pain. I put this mask on for thirteen minutes in total. In the morning my face had barely any dry skin on it at all, essentially my face was reset to itu2019s normal oily, acne prone self and also glowing (Iu2019m not talking pregnancy glow either) which was a whole lot comfier than the burn I had. The redness and irritation from my acne and burn had died down not completely but almost there.   Night 2: I left this make on for roughly twenty minutes. The next morning; my cysts were noticeably smaller while small bits of acne and acne that had been picked at were gone. The redness of my acne was still there in the slightest bit but the glow of my skin kinda of cancelled that out.   Night 3: accidentally left this on for thirty minutes; my skin felt absolutely amazing the next morning. So soft. Acne was also almost completely gone, cysts were still there but so much smaller and much more comfortable in my own skin. I was bragging about my skin on Snapchat which I never ever have done before. The redness had also completely gone away so really all I was left with was glow and these skin toned bumps on my chin.   Night 4; it was well over thirty minutes (I got distracted on Netflix) so I was incredibly nervous about the next morning. THE NEXT MORNING MY FACE WAS CLEARED!!! So soft and luscious looking honestly. So many compliments too. Loved all of it.   I use roughly every other day now, Iu2019m in love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic for sensitive skin. What we are smelling is the actual smell of blue tansy... not the greatest but that is what it smells like. Blue tansy is great for our skin!! Very natural. Iu2019ve noticed this has helped my acne scars heal much faster there is less redness with each use. No negative side effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great mask, especially for tightening and retexturizing. I did find it a little drying for my skin, but that was easily remedied with extra moisturizer and the results are definitely worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great mask. Doesn't irritate my skin, but I imagine it would to an inexperienced AHA/BHA user, so ease into it by leaving it on for less time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty good mask, helps calm down active inflammation, but not great for hyperpigmentation or redness left after a breakout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this product. Iu2019m always super iffy about face masks, they either never work or cause me to have a reaction. But this actually works! I use it 2-3 times a week and my acne has significantly reduced. Iu2019ve never really had a problem with acne until this year, all due to stress, hormones, and the occasional ice cream splurge. The redness and irritation is all gone, my blackheads are nonexistent, and it doesnu2019t dry out my skin. My skin is so soft afterwards as well. Safe to say this is a new ride or die for me

reviews.review_title: HG mask for the (clean) beauty obsessed!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fabulous face mask. I heard a review done by Annie Lawless and when I saw her vouch for it, I knew I had to pick it up. And boy, and I glad I did.  This mask is now my HG. Itu2019s amazing and the results are immediate. It has a very strong smell (which grows on you), has a gel-like consistency, and is very cooling upon application. Let dry for 10-20 minutes (the longer the better) and the feeling goes from tingly and sometimes stingy (not painful) to feeling very dry and stiff.  Results are amazing- my skin feels so much softer, looks brighter and glows from within.  I use it about twice per week and will continue to do so until I run out. Iu2019m on my 2nd bottle and will continue to repurchase! Beautiful product and a must in my beauty regime!

reviews.review_title: The scent is addictive and it works!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Keeps my mature yet acne prone skin balanced and I'm addicted to the scent. And it's clean beauty!

reviews.review_title: A true miracle for my sensitive, acne-prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 32 and I've been struggling with sensitive skin, hormonal nodular acne, and big red patches on my cheeks for almost two years now, ever since I went off birth control after 11 years of use. While I've recently found products that helped a bit, nothing compares to what this mask has done for me in such a short period of time! The redness is virtually gone, acne is shrinking to oblivion, my one large sinus tract of cystic acne (look that up if you want to lose your lunch) has almost completely dissipated, my pores are smaller and tighter, and my skin texture is so smooth. My husband has been commenting on how much better my skin is and that I look younger.. and that's just after using it three nights in a row, for 5-10 mins as recommended for sensitive skin. I'll finish up four in a row and then probably use it every 2-3 nights as needed. The smell is a little strong at first, but I got used to it quickly, and the results are well worth it for me. Please don't ever discontinue or change this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical buying this mask since thereu2019s so much hype around it but decided to try it during the vib sale. Iu2019m so glad I did. First, I LOATHE the smell. Itu2019s so strong. But, after using it for two weeks every other day, all the texture and clogged pores are almost gone. Really love the results so I can get past the smell. Iu2019ve started getting used to it. Also, be VERY CAREFUL opening it every time. Itu2019s insanely liquidy and can accidentally pour out if youu2019re holding it at the slightest angle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. I use it once a week and always see results. My skin is always so soft and bright after using this product. Would definetely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Non irritating and effective. I was still getting breakouts in my late twenties and my dermatologist said that after the teen years it's usually caused by buildup on the skin and that non-physical exfoliation is super important. This mask does the trick very nicely.  It comes with a little spoon so you don't have to put your fingers in the jar and contaminate it (wash the spoon after each use). Lovely blue color, consistency somewhere between gel and liquid so it spreads easily. Only downsides are that the smell is very strong. It's not entirely unpleasant, I don't know how to describe it. Like fruit and perfumed soap almost. The scent lingers for a while even after rinsing it off very thoroughly. I am not a fan of strong scents so this isn't great for me personally. And it is a steep price. The container is of a decent size though and a small thin layer goes a long way so I anticipate it will last for a good amount of time. Definitrly needs to be followed up with a light moisturizer after use. I've tried a few other exfoliation type masks and this is the one I will re purchase.

reviews.review_title: Do this mask 15- 20 minutes, not 5-10 Minutes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mask and had mixed reviews at first but soon came to love it and repurchased it. I did as instructed on the box (multiple times the first time then once a week for 5-10 minutes per session). I didn't really see a difference that justified the price tag.  However, I went back on the Sephora website to check the ingredients and noticed that the recommendation on the site said 15-20 minutes. I decided to try that and it made such a difference. My face was glowing right after and a lot of people have even commented that my skin was just glowing. I love it and I use it as my go-to before any special events to guarantee glowing skin.  Only docking a star because the instructed timing made the difference for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

I think it makes my skin more dewy but that is it so far. I will update if anything significant changes. Due to the consistency and how far it spreads.. this container is going to last a long time.

By stubborn I mean no face wash, peel off mask, pore strip or any other mask has been able to make a difference. Blue tansy has made a huge impact. My pores look tighter, and the amount of black heads on my nose has been reduced significantly. My chin is in better shape too and I am so happy. A little goes a very long way with this so its worth the price tag. I've caught my boyfriend dipping into this as well now. If youu2019re tired of breakouts , pair this up with a good, but gentle, glycolic acid peel. Used daily itu2019s transformed my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW. Just WOW. I am pretty much a mask explorer. I stopped for awhile due to a bad breakout from a mask. Whatever,  here I am again. After much research I decided this was my mask to attempt next. Something I can use once  or twice a week with my normal night time regimen. I have combo skin, cystic acne, and  texture issues. The consistency of the mask had me skeptical... Its gel like and thin and goopy. Bizarre. A little goes a long way though so it will last me at least 9 months. But, it stays on well while I get ready for bed and I can feel it working! I've never used a mask that I saw and felt immediate results until this little number. The little bumps on my cheeks and forehead were gone the second I rinsed it off, my entire face actually felt clean, pores are tight, and ready for my toner,  serum, night cream routine (clinique smart line). It was super easy to rinse unlike many mud or peeling masks. I am using it again right now, 2nd time this week, and have no doubts.  The ONLY reason this got 4 stars was because the smell is RANCID. I know some people will return a mask over a smell, that's not me- It works so well that if it was dog doo doo in a jar, I would still keep using it. It has a pine tree, christmasy, medicine, sap smell but does not last once its washed off. So, I'll happily take the 20 minute hit.  Do yourself a favor... if you have: Acne Bumps Texture Issues Scarring Clogged Pores Black Heads ANYTHING ELSE...

reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this mask based on the other reviews and I really like the results of it. It leaves my skin soft and glowy, I am excited to use it for a few days in a row. The only reason I am taking off a star is because I really dislike the smell and it is very runny. Luckily, I bought the Sephora mask applicator in the same order so I used it to apply the mask. I would recommend purchasing the applicator with the mask because if I had used my hands, I think I would have unnecessarily wasted a lot of product. With that being said, you only need a thin layer of the mask for it to do it's job so I think the jar will last awhile because the consistency is thin. Overall, I like the mask, I am excited to see results over an extended period of time.

reviews.review_text: Amazing.   WATCH OUT, it is still an EXFOLIATOR. Repeated use more than just once every other week WILL PREMATURELY AGE YOUR SKIN. Be careful and be gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow... this mask is SO good. It's been a long time since I've seen visible results from a product. I have extremely sensitive, reactive skin with rosacea and I have to be extremely careful with acids/vitamin C/retinol and the like. I struggle to find chemical exfoliators that are affective but that don't make my skin erupt in a dry, scaly, rash. This product made a visible difference in my skin but is ultra gentle and non-irritating. I used it for 5 minutes every other day the first week and then once a week there after. I do feel tingling with use but it goes away. My skin is SO clear and is literally glowing everyday. It also feels BABY soft. My nose seems clearer and less congested too. Somehow my skin doesn't turn red or irritated. Wow! I'm just so impressed!!

reviews.review_text: This is a nice mask and does a nice job clarifying your skin. It is very refreshing. I use this mask is combination with about 10 other masks bc Iu2019m a product junky and I know that there will never be one mask to do it all. This mask I usually do last because it feels like it tightens my pores. Itu2019s not my favorite mask and Iu2019m not sure if I will purchase again only because there are so many other amazing masks on Sephora to try!   I do recommend this though and I do think it is an experience everyone should have! Itu2019s unique!

reviews.review_title: USED IT ONCE AND IT WORKED WONDERS!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this from my local Sephora because I read the good reviews and it intrigued me. I had a little bit of congested pores around my mouth and I had a big under-the-skin pimple. It was red and a big lump. That night, I washed my face as I usually do with my Clarisonic, dried my face off and applied the mask. Even though the mask is blue, it applies sheer. I left it on for 25 mins and it dried down. I washed it off and followed up with my regular night time skin care routine. Let me tell you... a good night's sleep later, I wake up in the morning and the congestion is GONE. Not only is the congestion gone but the pimple on my chin SHRUNK and BECAME FLAT and was NO LONGER RED. I will say though that it doesn't shrink your pores as much as a deep cleansing clay mask would. But it never claimed to. I know this mask is expensive but I definitely think it's worked it! I will buy the full size in a few days!

reviews.review_title: HOLY GRAIL! SAVED MY SKIN!!! BUY THIS ASAP!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Buying this mask is the best thing that I've ever done for my skin. AFTER ONLY THE FIRST USE ALL OF MY REDNESS DISAPPEARED! My skin is looking better than it has in years. All redness, acne scars, dark spots, and cystic pimples are virtually gone within the first three weeks of use. I have some tiny pimples under the skin that never really do anything, and this mask has helped to start clear those up. It has also started to clear up the black heads from my chin and nose. Physical exfoliants make my acne flare up and irritate my skin, so this mask is the perfect alternative to get rid of all the irritation, damage, and congestion.  I have normal, acne prone skin. My skin can tend to be a little sensitive or dry so I have to be careful not to use harsh products. This mask has been absolutely perfect for me. It's important to me to use products that don't have harmful ingredients and I love how clean this mask is while still being effective.   When I first got this mask, I used it for four nights in a row. After the first four days, I started using the mask 3 times a week and I haven't looked back. I use it at night and it leaves me with an amazing refreshed glow. I did not experience any tingly or stinging with this mask, maybe a very very slight sensation if I really paid attention.   The smell is quite lovely! It smells strong when its in the jar and while you're applying it, but once it's on your face you don't notice the smell at all. It is a fruity and herby smell. So thankful there is no synthetic fragrance!  The packaging is beautiful and the jar is super chic. It comes with a little plastic spatula to retrieve and apply the product with. The mask is a little bit runny when you're scooping it out of the jar to your face, but if you just put a little bit on your spatula and quickly apply it to your face it doesn't run or drip.  Honestly, there is nothing bad about this product, no cons. If I could only use one skin care product, the Blue Tansy mask would be it.

reviews.review_text: I have combination skin: oily t-zone, large pores, some redness, and dry cheeks. Since using this my skin tone has evened out and acne has been healing a lot quicker. My pores have even gotten smaller, and they didn't get clogged up using this. Easy to use, smells nice, and you only need 1-2 scoops from the spoon they provide. This mask is the only mask I'll ever need!!!

NOT THIS ONE! No redness no painful tingle so the following week I tried this 5 days consecutively. My skin started purging which is normal! reviews.review_text: Skin feels clean, soft and refreshed after use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used a lot of masks in my life to help fight my acne: lots of small tiny blackheads on my nose or lots of tiny little bumps all along my jaw, cheek, and chin that have never gone away.  I also have some redness and a few small scars.  Iu2019ve used lots of the hottest masks out there: Fresh, Origins, GlamGlow; and they all failed to do anything to my acne or made it even worse.  This is different.  It isnu2019t gimmicky, itu2019s not too overly drying, and itu2019s not irritating.  This product comes in very cute simplistic packaging and a little goes a LONG way; this mask will last me almost a year by how little you need for your whole face.  With two weeks of treatment as directed, these little tiny bumps all on my face and nose are heavily fading away! I occasionally get some bad hormonal almost cyst like acne too, and this mask calms it down from being so red, and it makes them disappear twice as fast and they appear two times smaller when they pop up.  I can easily see this mask eventually making that acne and my scars disappear forever with continued use.  My pores looks so much cleaner and theyu2019re actually getting cleaned out with this mask without striping my face of its natural oils.  (I have oily skin and if it gets stripped, it overproduces oil the next day so itu2019s important for me not to get stripped).  This mask does have a strong smell in its jar, but when itu2019s applied to the face itu2019s not nearly as strong as in the jar (but still stronger than Iu2019d like but it isnu2019t irritating to my skin).  My skin doesnu2019t get sensitive from this mask and it doesnu2019t get too dry either from it.  It feels very refreshing while wearing it, and there were no tingles for me.  I suggest using a cloth to help wash it off to really make sure youu2019re taking off all the residue since itu2019s clear and it dries onto your skin.  If lots of other masks have failed you, I URGE you to give this one a try! It was the final key to my perfect skin care routine and I hope itu2019s the key to yours too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The texture of this mask is cool - it's kind of a gel-ish liquid that dries down translucent. I also think the results are noticeable, and I didn't experience tingling (I'm a regular AHA user). However, I find the scent straight-up disgusting. Usually I'm not too fussed about smells but I have a really hard time sitting with this on my face for 15 minutes. It seems like a lot of people don't mind it (which surprises the heck out of me, but to each her own), so I'd suggest sniffing it in the store if you can before purchasing.

reviews.review_text: Stop reading and buy this. I've tried a lot of masks. This really works. If you think you might benefit from a little bit of a 'peel' sort of thing, try this first. Even with sensitive skin, I don't get that horrible burning feeling that a lot of 'resurfacing' products give me. At the same time, it seriously works. Put on a thin layer, let it stay on until it dries, and then take it off with a wet cloth. Follow it with something moisturizing if you are dry.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019m hesitant to even write this review since talking about products that work on my skin seem to be a bad omen ; as soon as I say itu2019s helping, it stops working. I suffer from adult hormonal acne and I have really sensitive combo skin, so finding facial masks and oils that donu2019t cause a flare up under my normal breakouts is really, really difficult.   But this stuff? My god, is working miracles on my skin! Two days ago my chin and jawline were littered with huge, painful cyst like bumps. And today, those bumps are still there...but they are significantly smaller, less red, not painful, and the best part? Disappearing right before my eyes! I can not recommend this mask enough!

reviews.review_text: This mask is amazing. I recently for the past month was breaking out & had those breakouts that were underneath the skin.. Although, I used a few other products to help clear up my skin I think this really helped make my face become smoother, softer, brighter, & hydrated & it helped with some of those pimples. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been dealing with acne for a long time, which has mostly cleared up thanks to Differin, but now I have scars, redness, congested pores, and larger pores around my nose. I have dry, sensitive skin, so I used this mask every other day for 5 days (so 3 days in the week) for the first week as the directions suggested. I noticed an immediate difference. I have less redness, more even skin tone, and clearer and smaller pores. I now use this mask twice a week and the results just keep getting better. Plus it has a light, refreshing scent! This is my favorite skincare product I've ever used, and I've used A LOT. This is truly a game changer for anyone struggling with redness and acne!

If you're sensitive to smells I would suggest smelling this in store before purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: FRIENDS, this stuff is MIRACULOUS. I have been a die hard fan of the Tata Harper Resurfacing mask, which I have used and loved for years. It faded my old, persistent acne scars and kept my skin clean and clear. HOWEVER, BLUE TANSY IS BETTER??!! I have been using this for only a week and there is a drastic difference in my skin. The acne scars I have had for years and did not respond to any other treatment have significantly faded. My skin is oily and acne prone, and this has really cleared up my skin.  This may not be how the product is advertised, but I have worn the mask to bed and it is really miraculous. The mask is all natural, and it works so well overnight, so why not! When I wake up, my skin is so so soft, clean, and clear!
