reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews unless itu2019s absolutely incredible. And this blew my mind. Iu2019ve had acne for quite a while and they always leave behind those nasty, deep tissue scars and dark marks. Itu2019s been a week since Iu2019ve purchased it. Oh my gosh, I only use this mask for 15 minutes every other day, and my skin has shown so much improvement. The texture of my skin evened out drastically, the dark marks have been fading nicely, overall my complexion is clearer. I highly recommend this product, it sounds pricey, but using a silicone mask applicator, a little goes a long way. I would totally repurchase this again.

reviews.review_title: Really works, smells and feels AMAZING
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am seriously going to miss the way this mask smells and feels on my face!! I would buy another one right now but it is a little pricey and Iu2019m new to skin care and still exploring masks. But this baby is AWESOME! Totally leaves my skin feeling fresh, clean and smooth. I bought it bc I was looking for something to help with my redness and I heard this was great. My redness has def reduced since using it, along with some other products from Kiehls. My only tips would be to apply conservatively- you only need a thin layer and the stuff goes by quicker than you think. And to leave it on for a few extra minutes and let it dry a little more. Love love LOVE THIS.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I couldn't believe how smooth my skin felt the next day after using this. In conjunction with the oil, I've never seen my skin more matte either. You use very little product as well so this jar will last quite some time. Would definitely recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is TOP NOTCH. I've been slowly but surely delving into more diverse skincare, some failures, some successes - this is a major success. I have combination edging onto oily skin with cystic acne primarily on my chin and jawline, visible pores on my nose and small red pimples on my forehead. I have scarring from past cystic breakouts and general uneven skin tone.  I can see the difference in my skin instantly after using this product. It's smooth, plump, and more even toned - I put it on in the evenings as soon as I get out of the shower with a clean face and leave on for 20 minutes. I dampen a washcloth with warm water and gently buff it off once dry. I follow up with a serum, moisturizer and I'm set for the night! I typically use this about once a week - maybe twice if I'm being diligent. Worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! The smell is so amazing like a chamomile tea with hints of jasmine. I have sensitive noise but this is nothing too powerful just soft notes of this smell. The mask itself is amazing! I use to have acne all the time around my chin and jaw line and out of the blue black heads started showing up I tried everything else in Sephora but this. I am completely in love with this line now all thanks to this mask. I have a glow people canu2019t stop talking about! 10 Years is fighting acne finally won!  Thank you for saving my skin!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!! A lot goes a long way so and I personally like the smell. I have noticed a big difference in my skin even after a week or two. It leaves my skin feeling so clean and nice. I highly recommend splurging on this product if you have oily, acne prone skin!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't been able to get rid of my face, shoulder, and chest acne until I started using Herbivore. I use this, Lapis, and Phoenix and have impeccably healthier skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am SHOCKED about how well/quickly this product works. I have oily, acne prone, sensitive skin (legit the devil of all skin types) and this is the first product I've found that helps my skin concerns without irritating another. The redness in my skin, GONE. Pimples, GONE and I haven't gotten a new zit since. I only have it 4 stars because I just used it 4 days in a row (per instruction) and now I am going to back it down to 2 times a week and see how that goes! Would highly recommend if you have ance and or very red skin because of it. Amazing product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's hard for me to keep this product on for the recommended time because of the smell. Very flowery and overpowering. As far as the results, i've never noticed a difference after using this product. That being said, it could be because you have to apply it regularly to see results after a bit, and for that I give it 3 stars. Potentially great, but not for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first bought this in the mini size. Its a great no fuss mask. Use it a few times a week and my skin looks better than ever. I've used it for spot treatments and it literally shrinks the problem and takes away redness in half an hour. A little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells off a bit, but I think it works great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin prone to the occasional breakouts and every once in a while when my skin gets particularly capricious I splurge on this mask and it saves me every time. I just recommend following the instructions and initially using it for three days straight and then using it less frequently.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has uneven skin tone and acne scarring, I have spent a lot of $$$ on numerous products to fade those spots and this has been the most effective. My skin looks smoother and brighter after each application and I noticed a difference within a week of daily use.  Many people have an issue with the smell but it doesn't bother me especially since I put up with PerriconeMD's cold plasma fishy smell for 6 weeks! Love this product so much I bought a second jar before the VIB sale was over!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this solely based on the reviews. I suffer from adult acne and I believe this is a huge reason for my depression so Iu2019m ready to try anything! Anyway, this stuff really, truly does resurface your skin with zero burning, redness or pain. Iu2019ve used it often - perhaps too much...? And I feel like with more time my skin will continue to improve. Some people mentioned the smell - I donu2019t think it smells bad at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mask!!!  It makes my skin feel super soft and I think my pores are less noticable, but I have been breaking out on my chin (even before this purchase) and was hoping this would clear it up but it hasnu2019t seemed to help.  Still love the results on the rest of my face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually I start breaking out as the weather gets warmer, but using this mask twice a week has really helped to keep my skin clear and clear up scarring from previous breakouts. My scarring is not completely gone, but it really does seem like it's fading away. The smell isn't the best, but it's not terrible either. I would definitely recommend this product for anyone else with oily and acne-prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love that itu2019s all natural but it doesnu2019t do anything magical for my skin whatsoever. I have also purchased the brightening mask I hope it is better than this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Overrated. I think people get overly excited bc itu2019s organic but itu2019s not that great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just have to begin with that I absolutely HATE the scent. H.A.T.E it. I LOVE what it does with my skin though, so I will deal. My deep blackheads that wouldn't come out with just an AHA toner are no longer black and are up and sticking out of my skin, nearly ready to be extracted. I now pair this with Ole Henriksons oil control cleanser (smells very fresh) and Drunken Elephants TLC AHA/BHA night serum and in 3 days, they went from being barely visible (but there), super deep blackheads, to mostly closed skin-colored bumps on top of my skin now. I really neglected my skin before figuring this out and this is really helping purge everything and new acne breakouts are to a minimum. I don't feel a burn, barely a tingle on some days, and you use so very little to cover your face you get a lot for the price. Be sure to shake well before using, every time. PS. I don't wear foundation make up, ever, so I don't can't help you there. I also got this as a sample before I bought the big one and used it twice and THAT was what made up my mind. It really is a wonderful mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely the best mask I have tried in terms of exfoliating and clearing up my skin! The results are seen almost immediately. My skin is soft, clear and refreshed. It doesnu2019t dry my skin out like Luther products and it really does what it says.  Iu2019ve tried many masks and treatments and this is one the I continue to rebuy.

reviews.review_title: The best skincare product I have ever used!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never bothered to write a review before, but THIS PRODUCT HAS CHANGED MY LIFE! IT IS SO AMAZING! I've tried glam glow masks, I've tried SK-II products, and nothing has made an effect on my skin like this mask! There is no gimmick to it, no crazy colours or glitter in the mask, it goes on clear and you apply a thin layer and it's AMAZING. It absolutely does the job. I followed the instructions, using 4 days in a row and by day 3 I already saw the difference of my pores being minimized and my skin feeling so much softer. I had really bumpy (whiteheads) and acne prone skin and this has truly reduced it. It hasn't completely cleared it, but I'm still using it every second day. The smell is pretty off-putting when you put it on, and there's a burning sensation which is pretty uncomfortable as you apply it but goes away after it sits on your face for about 10 seconds. But it is totally totally worth it! Will continue to purchase forever!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely get your moneys worth with this mask! Lasts a long time, although I'm already on my second jar. I find the smell soothing (I know other reviews have complained about it). It completely leaves your skin refreshed, glowing and hydrated - which for a mask with AHA and BHA is amazing! Definitely recommend, even if you don't have acne prone skin.

reviews.review_title: Amazing Except on My Seborrheic Dermatitis
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have seborrheic dermatitis around my mouth and this messed it up big time. It gave me a sunburn goatee (not what I was going for!) for three days, and honestly, it's still not back to normal. BUT on the other areas of my face, it has made a huge difference in taking away redness and lessening the appearance of acne scars in just three uses. I will continue using it on the areas of my face that don't get inflamed, but it's a no-go on my skin condition.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, super sensitive skin with rosacea.  Iu2019ve been trying for two long years to find a product that calmed my rosacea without triggering my reactive skin.  I was to the point where I just expected every new product to light my face on fire.  The directions say that sensitive skinned users should mask for 5 min vs the standard 15-20.  It stung just a little bit, but quickly subsided and became kind of cooling. I was pleasantly surprised when I rinsed this off after first use to find that my skin was not angry - it looked pretty regular, so I was pumped to continue use the next night (they recommend 3-4 nights in a row initially, then reduce to a few times per week).  When I woke up in the morning, my redness appeared to have lessened just the slightest bit.  After the second use, however, my face was CHANGED.  I couldnu2019t believe when I looked in the mirror.  My rosacea bumps on my cheeks were still there, and still red, but the majority of the skin around the bumps was no longer red.  This is huuuuuge for me - usually my cheeks are super flushed and the red bumps really blend in.  I am a believer!  I couldnu2019t even complete the 4 days before coming here to write the review.  This stuff is for real!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: seemed to tint my skin blue and I saw no difference in my skin. The odour didnu2019t bother me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin so I was looking for a way to exfoliate my skin without damaging its protective layer. This is perfect for me. The fruit enzymes eat my dead skin cells away without touching my healthy cells and the AHA/BHA exfoliate gently and help to regulate my skin tone. I can leave it longer if i need to ( 30 to 40 min ) or just leave it for a fast 10 minutes. My skin is clear and my tone more regular. With continued use my dark spot is going away and i get less breakouts although I must say I do not suffer from major blackhead or pimples. I have been using this since January and I am really happy!  *also we dont have to worry about any of its ingredients! Bravo Herbivore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is truly a miracle mask and does what it claims. It leaves my skin smooth and clear and the next day my breakouts look much smaller. Onto my second bottle and excited to try more products from Herbivore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is amazing! It's the first AHA/BHA that doesn't turn my face bright red, or cause lingering dryness the next day. Your face looks amazing right after washing the mask off, and I can use it more often than the typical acid mask because it feels gentler. It has a strong sour-fruity smell, but I kind of love it. I definitely prefer over Babyfacial, which I wasn't expecting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down an awesome mask when I feel like my skin is getting rough and uneven. After rinsing I do see a difference in my skin. I mainly use this product during summer to fall months as my face finds it too drying during the winter months in Toronto.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was actually amazed by this product. Bought it because I've been breaking out lately, and based on the reviews I thought I'd give it a try. Used it for the first time yesterday and the few pimples I had were immediately less noticeable and my pores were SERIOUSLY diminished. I was expecting my skin to feel really dry after this but it just felt super smooth and soft. I would recommend following through with the rest of your skincare routine/moisturize asap just in case you do dry out quickly. Hopefully this will continue to be as effective as it already is! Fair warning though, the scent may throw you off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is incredible. I have tried so many face masks in my life time (I'm only 22) and I can honestly say that this is the best mask that actually works to provide results. The consistency of this mask if quite different than any other mask I have tried. It is a very runny blue liquid. And when you apply it to your face it is quite sheer. You don't need a lot of it so don't be put off if it looks like you have minimal amounts of product on your face! It just isn't a thick formula. BUT, this helped me so much with redness and any active blemishes I had. I noticed a difference right after one use. I used it for 5 days in a row and then slowly transitioned to 3 days per week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: - Less redness - Reduced scars - Less oil production  I first used this product when I did the in-store hydro facial that was offered with a $75 purchase. At first I thought it was a little gimmicky, but I ended up adding this and the Herbivore Lapis Oil to my purchases. I have never felt so strongly about a product in a while, and this is definitely worth it! I have very deep acne scars and ridiculously oily skin, but I've noticed after just a week and a half of use, my skin has gotten so much better. I don't know exactly if it was the combination of these two Herbivore products and the hydrofacial, but I am loving my skin now and even felt compelled to write a review, which I never do.

reviews.review_title: The most effective face mask I have ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My biggest skincare concern was the enormous pores and blackheads that were on my nose, around it, and on my chin and forehead. I tired all sorts of clay masks, pore strips and toners to try and suck the gunk out and shrink my pores, but nothing was helping. I bought this at the recommendation of a Sephora esthetician only last week and the results are MAGIC. Per the instructions, I used the mask 4 days in a row, and two of those days I followed it up with the Murad Pomegranate mask in my T-Zone (the lady at Sephora recommended this step). 4 days later and my pores are cleaner and smaller than they ever have been and I could literally cry tears of joy. If you're at the end of your rope trying to deal with enlarged, clogged pores in your T-zone, this is your miracle cure!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let's start by saying that I have yet to experience a miracle product. Most skincare products don't do everything they claim to do so this is where I'm coming from. Here are the pros and cons that I gathered after using it 1-3 times a week for the last 3 months:   PROS:  I know some find the scent unpleasant, but I don't mind it and actually grown to like it. The scent is a cross between Listerine and some sort of citrus fruit? I don't know it's distinctive.  I have extremely acne prone skin that gets easily inflamed and red (especially around the mouth and nose) and this didn't cause me redness or excessive tingling (there is some tingle when I first apply it then it's a cooling sensation).  This mask doesn't harden and crack on your face so you don't get that strong drying and tugging effect. I liked that.  Because of the feature above, the mask is relatively easy to rinse off. You don't have to scrub your face like crazy. And finally for the effect that I bought it for...this mask does soften my skin, but didn't seem to loosen the gunk that stays in my pores on my nose. Lasts forever and doesn't seem to dry out like the clay based masks.  CONS:  For whatever reason, even though it may feel as though I rinsed the mask off I'm often left with a grayish-blue cast on my skin. This is why I use it only at night. The effect is gone by morning.  The soften effects of the skin does not last long on me. My rough patches are back the next morning...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this stuff! It resurfaced my skin and made it super soft and healthy looking. Also faded my old acne scars. I use this every other day on my face and neck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product so much. After researching tons of resurfacing peels/masks, I decided to go with this one based on the reviews. I was very disappointed. After 2 applications, my facial redness was worse than it was before. I didn't see any improvement, and in fact, my face looked worse than before using it. I returned it due to the price. Disappointed. Also, several people mentioned they liked the smell. The smell wasn't awful, but I definitely did not find it appealing whatsoever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok so right now is the second time Iu2019ve used this mask, but I love it so much. I started getting cystic acne a few months ago, and have a persistent psoriasis patch on my chin, so most of my face care adventures end in disappointment and/or itching.  I used this for the first time last night and noticed a good amount of reduction in the redness and flakiness of my spots, but most importantly NO ITCHY SKIN!  This morning, I put my foundation on and the difference was amazing. My spots are all pink and flat, where 3 days ago they were bright angry red with tons of dead skin.  A little bit goes a long way. I can see myself getting a couple dozen uses out of this at least. Also, with regards to the smell... I adore it! Iu2019m not a huge perfume fan so I can appreciate a nice natural floral smell. Itu2019s hard to describe but thereu2019s kinda a hint of grape popsicle smell mixed in with the pretty flower smell. Idk, but if my skin concerns sound similar to yours you should def try this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and my nose, more than anything, is prone to being clogged and black heads form. Unfortunately, I also have fair skin and itu2019s not a pretty sight. Being a busy mom, I canu2019t go for facials more than once or twice a year so this product has saved my skin. Yes, you might have to get over the weird scent but itu2019s effectiveness will win you over. You have to be discipline and use it as your skin requires to see results I.e twice a week initially to get rid of all the gunk then maybe once a week. Tone and moisturize well after use. Oh and donu2019t leave it longer than the suggested time or it can dry your skin out. My nose has never been clearer!

reviews.review_title: Calms down my complexion and clears redness!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I was a Sephora Play! subscriber I got this in one of my boxes back in fall of 2017. I really wasn't expecting much, but I ended up absolutely loving it and used up the entire little jar. Then I bought the full version because this is my new favorite mask. I feel like every time I use this it helps so much with my acne. It calms down the redness on my face (because I have red cheeks with acne scars) and overall makes my complexion look so much better. I am acne prone and I definitely feel like it helps when I have breakouts. I use it a few times a week but wouldn't mind using it more. Some people either love the smell or hate it. I really really like the earthy herby smell but my husband absolutely hates it. Hah, it's great when I want him to leave me alone. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels amazing when on my skin. Skin is so wonderful after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great clarifying mask. The smell is absolutely amazing. Love love love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the mask the past couple of days and can already see a difference in my skin! I actually like the unique smell of it...kind of has a hint of blueberry ? love the tingle and don't find it hard to wash off at all. just follow the instructions. highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this mask twice now and quite enjoy it. When I remove it, my face feels amazingly soft. I'm not a huge fan of the scent. It is herbal, but in their description called a calming herbal scent, however I feel this is quite strong and almost really overbearing. Getting past the scent issues, I did have a strong burn feeling when I initially dripped some onto my face; this might be because I might actually have sensitive skin despite thinking that I don't have much skin sensitivity when using products. With continuous use the initial burning feeling should reduce in severity is what most say. I am hoping to use this continuously to see some results as acne and redness are some of my biggest issues. Otherwise, this has been a great product to use so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfection. On my 3rd purchase of this mask. Worth every penny. Love the earthy sent.

reviews.review_title: HG for my oily - breakout-prone skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is oily and breaks out occasionally. I got this as a gift and began using it everyday for a week as per instruction, and then twice or three times per week, and WOW! I saw a huge improvement in my skin. My acne and acne scars faded, and my face has gotten brighter! I suggest using this at night since AHA

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this in combination with the lapis oil and really like the changes I've seen in my skin. I didn't give it five stars because it is hard to remove unless you use a brush or cloth. When I only use water it's pretty stubborn and takes a lot of scrubbing. There is some tingle but nothing like burning. I don't love the smell but don't find it unpleasant. I've overall noticed clearer, smoother skin after using it as directed (every other day for first week and then 2-3 times per week).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am 24 years old and have suffered from moderate hormonal acne since I was 12. This is the first product that has cleared my breakouts. Iu2019ve tried all types of prescription medications orally as well as topically, none of which have worked as well as this mask! The smell isnu2019t the greatest but itu2019s totally worth sitting through when you see benefits like these. I use the Lapis oil morning and night which I find compliments this mask really well. If youu2019re contemplating this product, just buy it! Your skin will thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: HOLY GRAIL PRODUCT! Believe the hype. After literally one use, I went to work the next day and was complimented on my u201cglowingu201d skin for the first time ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best! really detoxifies and clears my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sadly, this made me break out.  I'm in my late 50s with combo skin and never get blemishes.  But I do have sensitive skin.  So, be careful if you can react to essential oils or other botanicals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a game changer for me. Iu2019m 26 and I got off birth control for a while and my skin started to break out like never before. Cystic acne and just could never catch a break. This has changed my face for the better. Not totally preventing breakouts but it has cleaned my face. My pores are visibly smaller, and the mild rosacea I have is nearly gone. I noticed a big difference after 2 weeks. Black heads and white heads are basically gone. I recommend this if youu2019re trying to clean your pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin feels so soft and firmed after just one use. I only gave four stars because my skin doesn't look any different after using; no decrease in pore size or appearance, doesnt help with acne, and didn't decrease redness. This product is great for making your skin soft but that's all it does.

reviews.review_title: Amazing Results for my Troubled Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried tons of masks over the years, but none have made such a positive difference in my skin as this mask has. I have very finicky skin - redness around my nose and mouth, and Iu2019m prone to hormonal and stress-induced breakouts especially on my cheeks and chin. I also scar easily. I feel like this masks helps with all of this. The masku2019s smell reminds me slightly of Vicku2019s Vaporub, but on the more spa-like/essential oil side. The mask is a clear blue-ish green that you just spread on your skin like jelly. It has a cooling effect and dries into a clear shiny and smooth texture. I use my Clarisonic to speed up the process of washing it off, because with only warm water and your hands, you basically have to wait for it to melt off in the water a little at a time. Immediately after using, my skin is so calm, even-toned, & glowy. With regular use my skin becomes clear, balanced, and healthy looking. I notice a difference when I donu2019t use it. The instructions recommend using a few days in a row when you first purchase and then backing off after that. The product does change color over time - from blue to green. The company says this is because the ingredients are natural, but the change in color does not affect the integrity of the product. Iu2019ve had my jar for months and it has turned more green, but works just as well as ever. I would definitely recommend giving this mask a shot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me just start out by saying this has become a PERMANENT part of my skincare routine! This mask does EXACTLY what it says it does. There was a point where I used this every day (even though the directions say only use a few times a week) and my skin was flawless until I ran out.   For me, it cleared my acne and got rid of a lot of redness due to post-inflammatory hyper-pigmentation. I had really bad acne in high school, then in my early 20s it got much better (wasnu2019t completely gone though), and recently my skin has been freaking out on me, but this mask helps a LOT.  Plus, AHA and BHA exfoliate the skin so my skin never looks dull.   The best part is the price! I know that $45 seems like a lot, however, this mask works SO well that Iu2019m shocked it doesnu2019t cost more. Basically, this is a $45 mask that works as well as an $80-$100 mask. Hands down one of the best masks Iu2019ve ever usedu2014 top 3 for SURE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure if I got a bad batch, but this mask stained my skin with a blue tint. Took a couple of washes for it to go away. Watch out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After going through a period of adult acne I was looking for something that would help clear and resurface my skin. I found this and it had amazing reviews. The good... It smells great.  I was hesitant on the price but you need such little product that it will last for some time. It doesnu2019t hurt. Resurfacing your skin can be painful and leave you with sensitive skin, this did not.  It didnu2019t leave me red after using it.  Easy to wash off.  After a week, my skin was clearer.  I canu2019t think of any cons. Iu2019ve really enjoyed using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A really good mask. I don't have anything negative to say about it: it calms redness, softens skin, etc. I recommand getting the True Blue pack though (comes with Lapis Oil). You get a good amount for what you pay (the quality is worth the $) and the two products do a great job together. In love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for 4 months now and itu2019s changed my life!!! It reduces my acne scarring bit by bit, it makes my day 100% better, I get less acne now because of this wonderful mask!!!!  I actually like this smell will definitely re purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is well worth the price! It not only helped clear my blemishes, but left my skin feeling smooth and feeling great. I do recommend using it with the Lapis oil for the full effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used a LOT of masks and exfoliation treatments since I'm addicted to exfoliation and detox, and this is one that's not only fun to use since it's like jelly but also quite effective at clearing any impurities. The AHAs in it, including fruit enzymes work to clear texture and dead skin to make way for the BHA and blue tansy. It features white willow bark, a natural BHA high in salicylic acid, to help clear out the pores and reduce inflammation. The blue tansy in it helps to reduce inflammation and redness, which is an incredible perk! It's definitely a heavy hitter worth buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm going to give this another try, but my first impression is that I absolutely never have pimples, and I have full fledged acne.  I'm willing to believe that it is just the resurfacing, enough to try again, but I'll probably return it if it doesn't work.    Also, maybe I've had too much gin in my life, but this smells like a $20.00 cocktail and I do not find this appealing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the way this feels on my skin, like it's working with all the tingling and cooling feels :). The smell is okay with me, dries nicely. To wipe off I just use a damp cloth, as washing it off its just slimy. Wish it came with an application brush though as it is really runny.

This thing is like a miracle worker. I was breaking out like crazy on either side of my mouth and forehead and was trying anything to clear it up. I used it according to the directions and my skin is looking great! I used the whole jar and itu2019s been about a month or so since I used it last. My skin still looks great! The only thing that sucks is that I only got about 9-10 uses out of it. But definitely worth it and definitely delivered!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is incredible! I have normal to combination skin with some sensitivities. I decided to purchase this mask based on the over 700 reviews and that over 540 of them are 5 star reviews. I have normal skin when it comes to acne. However, I do get hormonal cyst, which are definitely my main skin care concern. I tend to get these cysts in my t zone area, especially on my chin and the only thing that seems to be effective is getting in injected by my dermatologist. These constant reoccurring hormonal cyst have raised my concern for scaring and texture. I got this mask recently and have used it 3 times. I know that's not a ton of time using it but I have noticed just in 3 uses that it has cleared up most of those stubborn blackheads on my noise and the t zone around my noise. It has helped to reduce texture from previous cysts as well on my chin. When I first applied the blue tansy mask it did sting and I did experience a burning sensation but haven't used AHA's and BHA's in awhile. I'm assuming it was from that. The second use I didn't experience any burning sensation. You do have a slight stinging sensation, which is more of a tingling sensation. This mask doesn't smell the best from it being natural ingredients. The smells not bad enough to make me not want to use it and you get used to it. Definitely will continue to use this! It seems to be effective and doing what the product claims to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot say enough about this product - it has changed my skin.  I highly recommend it for improving the overall clarity and smoothness.  I look forward to using it each evening (or every other).  Do not hesitate on purchasing it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews, but I made an exception for this product. This mask really does what it says. After using this mask only one, my skin was noticeably brighter. It does tingle when going on, but subsides after a minute or so. Using this mask a few times a week, has definitely improved the clarity and texture of my skin. Will definitely be a staple product in my skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a mask/skincare junkie and have tried millions of masks. I can't believe I'm saying this, but this was the worst face mask I've ever used.   I have normal, insensitive skin that randomly started breaking out on my chin, and sides of the face. This mask made my skin break out so much! It also made my face super red/pink. My skin just kept getting worse and worse after every use.   It smells like Hennah mixed with blueberries, has a gel texture, and is easy to apply but kind of hard to remove.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Immediate results: more even tone and texture as well as softness and reduced pores. I received this as a sample and will definitely be buying it! Minus one star for the smell... it is sooooo bad!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE!!! I highly recommend doing as it suggests in the instruction (using it for a few days back to back then switching to every few days). I can explain how this product removed the texture on my face. I assume magic! I have repurchased many times and make sure to keep back ups!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask works so great!  However, the smell makes me want to vomit every time I inhale it.  Wish this mask came without the smell but I will still continue to use it because it does such a nice job clearing up the skin.

reviews.review_title: Strong scent but still love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask! It exfoliates my skin pretty well without irritating my sensitive skin. When my skin looks extra dull and tired, I use this mask to exfoliate and follow it up with the Fresh Rose Face Mask to soothe the skin. Then I use the Herbivore Rose Hibiscus Face Mist and finish it off with moisturizer and sunscreen. Absolutely love Herbivore and all their products!  Only downside is that the mask smells very strong, but the scent isn't that noticeable once its on your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product used in conjunction with benzoyl peroxide has seriously been a miracle worker for for skin!

reviews.review_title: Great mask but why did Sephora raise their price?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just ran out of my first jar and Iu2019m so sad to see that Sephora jacked up the price since the last time I purchased it! Last time it was $42. I absolutely LOVED this mask and recommend it to everyone and anyone. I thought that since my skin was so used to AHA/BHAs it wouldnu2019t be effective, but it uses natural sources so itu2019s not only effective but gentle.  The scent is strong pleasant and I agree with another review, itu2019s hard to wash off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a teenage boy that struggles with clogged pores and redness and this stuff is amazing!! With continued use my skin becomes sooo smooth, clear, and bright!!! Some people donu2019t like the smell but I LOVE it. A bit hard to wash off but so worth it. 10/10 would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with sensitive, red, uneven skin. I had a guttate psoriasis outbreak that effected my face and after just one use my skin was completely even, hydrated and clear of any psoriasis.  My skin hasnu2019t looked this good in 10 years and Iu2019m completely blown away!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Brightens my skin so much and goes a long way, definitely recommend this mask! My skin feels so clean and fresh after using blue tansy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This will definitely be a staple in my routine. Love the way it smells, love the texture and mostly, love the way my skin feels afterward! Canu2019t wait to use more products from this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this mask.  My skin looks so clear and smooth after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a large sample of this. Used it a few times and threw away the rest so as not to waste space in my cabinet. This didn't do much for me and I didn't really care for the smell and texture. It is gentle - but that's also because it's not effective. When I spend time with a mask on my face - it better do something. This so underwhelming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This Mask really helps unclogging pores and refining texture. A little goes a long way, so it will last a long time. I use it once a week since I have a few masks in my routine for the week. Blue tansy soothes my redness but doesnu00b4t make it disappear. Also, natural ingredients, nothing toxic or chemical in it, which is A  for me. Will repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is dehydrated and flaky.   Iu2019m in my late 40u2019s.  I have a big problem with clogged pores.  This makes me want to scrub my skin constantly.  Iu2019ve recently been told this actually exasperates the problem so I bought this product to try to exfoliate without the harsh scrubbing.  I use it 2 - 3 times a week.  I use it mainly at night and leave it on for the full 20 minutes and then wash off with warm water and a cloth as directed.  When I first wash it off I really donu2019t see the difference.  I still see visible flakes in my skin but by the next morning I can see and feel the difference.  My skin is much smoother and when I look at my pores in my 20x mirror I can see that it has helped with the clogged pores.  The smell isnu2019t great but I love the natural ingredients that Herbivore uses and would pick this smell over added fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after reading that it was really great for redness left behind by acne and for acne in general. I have to say it kept my overall skin nice and redness free, maybe even shrunk my pores a bit but didnu2019t really have an effect good or bad on my acne. It does dry skin out of course so if you have sensitive or dry skin spots like myself, youu2019ll need your winter moisturizerizer to counter the effects of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many expensive skin care products. This is BY FAR my favorite. I have oily, acne-prone skin and this stuff keeps my face looking bright and clear. Ever since I started using this I have experienced minimal to no breakouts. I will definitely be repurchasing this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Changed the texture of my skin in a week! I bought this on a whim. I have a few other masks I rotate between with AHA and BHA and didnu2019t really expect much of this mask. I used it 4 days in a row and then went to every other day. If you arenu2019t used to these acids I wouldnu2019t use it everyday but my skin reacted so well! The texture of my skin is smooth. No more little bumps under the skin! It helped clear up the breakouts as well! Give it a try, I canu2019t imagine youu2019ll be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Herbivore is changing my life with their products. Just like the Lapis Oil, this mask does wonders to my face. Because of my sensitivity due to rosacea with acne, I leave it on my face until it feels irritating, which is almost the recommended time. My boyfriend leaves it on the entire time and has no irritation (I make him wear it. lol)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just finished the jar after 5 months. Iu2019d use it twice a week at night and extra when I have my monthly hormonal breakouts. I have combo oily skin in the summer and combo dry in the winter. It has been a game changer helping to keep my occasional breakouts under control and quickly heal existing acne. Even when my skin is clear, I use it regularly and it keeps my skin smooth and balanced. The key ingredient in this is the blue tansy which helps to soothe, calm, and provide antibacterial properties. This product stands out from other resurfacing masks in that it is effective with consistent use and has natural ingredients without all the unnecessary chemicals. I will definitely purchase again and again. Canu2019t recommend enough for anyone looking to move away from conventional masks with too many ineffective ingredients and towards a more natural, healthy mask. I trust all the ingredients in Herbivoreu2019s products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off I do not like the lapis oil that comes with the mask in the set and I am unsure if the mask or the oil is causing my additional breakouts. I will say I used the mask alone many times and felt that my skin looked clearer, smaller pores and redness was not as prominent. But as life goes you only remember the most recent experiences and for the past two weeks I have used both products in conjunction and know that one of them is causing small pustule type pimples instead of the cystic acne I would rarely but mostly suffer from. And when one goes away another pops up along side it. I honestly think itu2019s the oil but from the ingredient list one would not think the oil would cause breakouts. I have been one of those rare people who can have adverse or breakout reactions from salicylic acid. Not all of them though maybe just the stronger types. I would say if that is you as well maybe use this mask once a week.  I enjoy the smell of the mask but it is strong . It revives your senses. If you like essential oil scents you shouldnu2019t have an issue with the smell. I still give this 4 stars because I am on my third jar of this stuff and I have been using this so long that I feel I do like this product and just made the mistake of using the oil. Either that or used this too much in one week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Truly the only thing that helps my acne overnight! I used to work at Sephora, and have never written a review but after years of dealing with acne and trying countless products, this mask has done wonders! It reduces inflammation, calms irritation and noticeably reduces the size in my breakouts! I use it once a week, but Iu2019d use it more if I had the free time! 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mask because I wanted to incorporate some chemical exfoliation into my skincare routine. I had some dark spots I wanted to lighten and was looking for a generally brighter complexion. This mask did the trick! I use it about once a week and have seen results such as fading of dark spots. My skin feels softer, too. The mask smells herb-y and I find it pleasant. I've repurchased twice already and will continue to do so. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff has changed my skin. My skin is so smooth, and my pores are virtually gone. When I donu2019t use it, the texture on my skin comes back, so it is definitely this stuff working the magic!

reviews.review_title: Great for texture and clogged pores!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just amazing! I have horrible texture all over my face, and tiny bumps that never turn in to full blown pimples, but never seem to want to go away. This has really helped with both! It makes my skin so smooth, and with consistent use helps get rid of those tiny bumps. I used to use the glam glow mask when my pores would start to look clogged and blackheads would form, but this is preventing that. A little goes a long way, I use a facial spatula to put a thin layer all over, and Iu2019ve barely made a dent in it after using it 2 times a week for at least 2 months. My skin is so clear, I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve literally never left a review, but this deserves one. Itu2019s done wonders for my post baby, sensitive, acne prone skin. Iu2019ve only used it twice so far but can already see a difference. It works beautifully with Luna night oil by Sunday Riley.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is amazing. i notice immediate results. i always use it when i have a important day the next day. smells really nice and calming to me. nevee going to live without this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is amazing and worth every penny. I did have some purging at first (probably about 10 days), but after that my skin was brighter and clearer. I find this mask especially helpful for healing acne, as this mask helps cell turnover and regeneration. This mask also made my blackheads fade considerably.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As an avid AHA   BHA user, this is effective and surprisingly gentle. Paired with the Lapis Oil, it feels like it's working alongside my skin rather than fighting it.

reviews.review_title: finally took the plunge and I love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome mask! I use it twice a week and even 3 days after using it my skin feels smooth and soft. Iu2019ve been using it for about a month, and while it hasnu2019t gotten rid of my milia (which I was lowkey hoping it would) I feel as if it has made a major difference for my skin! My skin is crazy sensitive to exfoliation, but this mask is all it needs and isnu2019t too harsh, so my skin is exfoliated without any breakouts! At first I thought the scent was a bit much as itu2019s very herbal (especially during the 3-4 day period in which you use it every day) but Iu2019ve gotten used to it and donu2019t mind it at all now! 10/10 would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot say enough amazing things about this mask! After I felt like I had tried everything for my stress/acne prone skin, I discovered this! It significantly changes the look and feel of my skin after using it! I use it 2 times a week and it has helped keep my skin clear! My face feels like I just got a facial when I rinse this off! If youu2019re debating this, BUY IT! The smell isnu2019t even bad!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this product. It helps me skin stay so clear and has really helped wth my skins pigmentation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing !!!! It is worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing mask for acne  Must try must buy. Calms my skin and really tightens pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask does a good job at exfoliating my combination skin. It works best if used consistently. Feels very soothing and refreshing going on and my skin looks glowing and less red afterward. It does have a scent, I donu2019t personally mind it but that can be an issue for some. It does not linger after removing the mask.

reviews.review_title: Has truly changed my skin - worth a try
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When it comes to skin care, I love trying new skincare and rarely restock on products unless they are truly exceptional. This is the ONE mask I canu2019t stop repurchasing. Iu2019m on jar #5 right now!  Any time my skin feels congested or I start to get dry patches, I put it on and it helps. My skin loves it!  Donu2019t be alarmed by the smell... you get used to it! I have very sensitive and reactive skin so I usually stick to scent-free products, but this one doesnu2019t bother my skin. In fact, it calms it as itu2019s exfoliating. I notice my skin is less red afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to wait a month and a half before I reviewed this mask because I wanted to give it a fair shot. To be honest, at first it wasn't really doing much for me. After hearing such great things, I was a little disappointed and a little skeptical. Then about 2 weeks into using it, I broke out with some hormonal cystic acne. I used this mask in tandem with the Ordinary's salicylic acid treatment and it was the fastest I've ever seen a cyst disappear. I was lucky enough (trying to see the silver lining here) to break out with another cyst the following week, and rather than using my blue tansy/ordinary combo, I used Glossier's Solution and it did Nothing to clear my cyst. It felt like it was just sitting there on my face-- no improvement whatsoever until I gave in and tried my blue tansy/ordinary combo one night. The next morning I woke up and it looked so much better. Not gone, by any means, but vastly improved, smaller in size, and less red. In general I find that it gives me a nice glow and makes my skin feel soft.  I'm sold. Will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty awesome mask for oily and acne prone skin. Downside: hard to take it off as it is very slippery. A lot of people complain about its smell but i have had worse smelling masks ao this doesnt bother me. I was sceptical at first but it is DEFINITELY worth buying and give it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think all those ridiculous words on that little jar scream buy me which is exactly what I did. You got me, Herbivore, good marketing. Clarity, what the heck does that even mean. So subjective. Despite my overwhelming disgust at myself for my continued focus with the words on this jar, when I finally dig into this slimy-blue mask of goodness I feel a great sense of whatever clarity must be when it sits on my skin for a few minutes. It is like it is actually doing something magical to my pores. It doesn't burn it tingles. I love this mask. No clue what the heck it means but it feels productive for a 35 year old trying to achieve 25 year old skin.
Very nice mask-gel-cream. I love the grassy/earthy smell! It leaves skin soft and smooth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is so good!! It smells wonderful and feels cooling on your face as it drys!! I am so glad I purchased it! Time will only tell how it effects my skin long term but so far I love it!   I have the pineapple brightening mask as well and now all I need is the purple one once itu2019s back in stock!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn't do anything. I was expecting to be blown away since the reviews were so good and the price was so high. It was just meh but it didn't irritate my skin, so that's a good thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t really notice too much of a difference, but it did make me feel clean and fresh after. Did tingle and feel boarderljne uncomfortable on the skin for the first few uses but felt fine after. Was excited to try because of so many rave reviews but I donu2019t think Iu2019ll be re purchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Typically I have oily/combo skin, but lately I have been having extremely horrible breakouts as well as a lot of redness. I heard this was good to reduce breakouts as well as calm the skin so I tried this out. Here are my thoughts: 1. Love the smell (smells like blueberries to me) 2. Gave my skin a cooling sensation while it was on. 3. Calmed my skin (reduced redness, breakouts were slightly less irritated and did not dry out my skin). The only downside I see is that since this mask is pretty much all natural it does tend to expire quite quickly. I will say it does start turning a sort of greenish color after a few weeks upon opening. I am not sure if that is just because it is exposed to oxygen or what. However, I have continued to use it and it works just the same. Just something to keep in mind. Also since it does not last as long as other face masks that are not all natural, it is quite pricey in my opinion. I wish they would sell a mini sized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone
reviews.review_text: Amazing amazing amazing. I thought all of the reviews couldnu2019t be real since they were all SO positive but dang, this stuff is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did nothing for my pores, oily skin, or ance. When I washed it off it didnu2019t leave my skin unclogged or even refreshing. Big disappointment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works really well. I like the ingredients list is short and not with extra filler.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Used this for clogged pores and oily skin. Very clarifying and very nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this prob 10 times and have only used 1/4 of a jar. It helps with softening and making my skin more radiant. I use it twice a week and really am happy with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, here's the deal. I'm 64 and have had oily skin all of my life. I have always battled whiteheads on my chin. This is the first mask that has addressed my chin issues, and believe me, I have tried a myriad of masks and treatments. Does it smell funky? Yep; however, I have learned to love the scent. reviews.review_text: This is my go to mask.  First of all, masks are designed to go deep into your pores.  Why does it seem there are so many still that have parabens, sulfates etc? I also still have texture left, and itu2019s reducing that to darn near nothing.  I look like I went to the spa and paid hundreds every time.  Iu2019d def pick up a sample at the store if you are hesitant, a little goes a long way.  When I use it, I steam my fave after a shower which isnu2019t necessary but you can pick up a steamer on amazon for $15-$20.  It does help get the nasty out of pores. The fragrance of the mask is a combination of sweet and herbal that is almost medicinal in nature, which can be off-putting for some.  I did not take issue with the smell, but I saw absolutely no difference in my skin.  No noticeable improvement in texture or clarity whatsoever.  I realize that you have to allow time to see the full effects of beauty products, but I absolutely expect to see refreshed,  brightened or smoothed skin immediately with a mask that is as expensive as this.  I've paid less for masks that were far more effective.  I don't mind paying for quality products that work, but this fell short. It applies and dries like a gel with no discernible sensation to indicate that it's activating (e.g. cooling, tingling, tightening).  I admire the philosophy of Herbivore and I am pleased with the lapis oil so far, but this mask was a disappointment for me.  I will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have these 2 big clusters of clogged pores and pimples on my left cheek and on the right side of my neck, just under my jaw line. Iu2019m using a skin care regime that is making my skin very happy but is doing nothing to get rid of those clogged pores. Clay masks just dry out my skin, so they arenu2019t an option for me. When I told the skin care specialist at Sephora about my needs and skin type, she immediately recommendef the Blue Tansy mask by Herbivore.   So far, I have used it 5 times. The first 2 times I used it, I forgot to stir it up. As a result, it didnu2019t work all that well. But I was amazed at how well it worked after the first time I used it stirred up. Both clusters on my face because noticeably smaller. My skin seems to get better with each subsequent use. I canu2019t wait to see what my face is going to look like after a month of using this stuff.  People on here have complained about the smell. Iu2019m on the fence about it. Some days I really enjoy the earthy smell. Other days it makes me want to gag. But when a product works this well on your skin and this fast, putting up with the smell is a small price to pay.   I really do recommend that you stir it each time you use the product. The active ingredients settle at the bottom of the jar. If you donu2019t stir, you may not get the full benefits of the mask.   The up front cost is high: $60 CAD. But it lasts a long, long time. I could see this one jar lasting as long as 8 months. And Iu2019d rather pay a little more for a superior mask that works.   Next time youu2019re in Sephora, as the consultant to give you a sample and try it out for yourself. I donu2019t think youu2019ll be sorry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first (albeit, very hesitant) step into any sort of skincare product specifically marketed as a u201cHydroxy Acidu201d item. I am deeply and consistently surprised by the results I get from this mask. My initial impression was the texture and smell, both of which are unique and affirming. I would much rather apply something uniquely-scented to my face than something heavily perfumed. The texture also ensured that I was easily able to apply evenly upon my skin, and it comes with a little spatula to distribute, so that the jar itself is easier to keep hygienic. Now, the results of the product: the effects of the jar stretched much further than I thought they would, and the jar itself lasted quite a while. If used sparingly and not too frequently, a jar could last you several months. The hydroxy acids also ensure that you are getting a deep resurfacing of old, dead skin cells. The AHA, water soluble and operating primarily upon the surface of the skin, helps to diminish sun-damage and dry skin. Any sort of BHA, works deep in the pores, greatly benefiting those with combination, oily, and acne-prone skin. I think Herbivore has formulated a splendid combination of the two, and added just enough soothing ingredients (Blue Tansyu2019s calming and anti-inflammatory benefits, yay!) to greatly diminish most, if not all, negative side effects from the more intensive ingredients within the line. Thanks for the clear and radiant skin, Herbivore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin and have used other exfoliating products that include AHA/BHA which caused my skin to react negatively (red splotches). I was aware of this when I purchased this mask but still wanted to try due to the great reviews this product received. reviews.review_text: Definitely worth buying.  I have had horrible acne for years.  I get it every month right before my period. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the weirdest, yet most effective mask I have tried. Itu2019s a weird jelly goop mask that dries on your face and then you wipe off with a warm towel. I have been struggling with clogged pores and cystic acne for a year. This is gentle enough to not aggravate my skin but effective enough to exfoliate. I will never use another mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first mask Iu2019ve used that has dramatically helped my acne.  I had fairly clear skin for most of my teen years and I followed a strict skincare regimen to make sure it stayed that way.  This past year has been filled with stress and lots of change in my life and my habits (including going off birth control) and I found that my normal skincare routine just wasnu2019t working anymore.  Over the past year my forehead has slowly turned into a bumpy mess with visibly clogged pores and angry red breakouts at my temples.  My nose developed lots of blackheads and my chin was always bumpy and breaking out.  I tried all different types of masks and washes and creams.  I tried benzoyl peroxide, salicylic acid, and a whole bunch of natural u201cmiracle curesu201d that either made my skin worse or did nothing at all.   I bought this mask as an early birthday present to myself and started using it the other day.  Iu2019ve used it nightly for 3 nights now and my skin has improved drastically.  Almost all the tiny bumps on my forehead are gone.  The inflamed pimples on my temples have been reduced to light pink spots.  The breakouts on my chin are healing well and even the large cystic lump I had between my eyebrows shrunk to half its original size.  Iu2019m blown away by these results and canu2019t wait to see how my skin improves over the next few weeks as I continue using this mask. As for the product itself, a little seems to go a very long way and is definitely worth the money.  The spatula it comes with is very handy for scooping out the product and ensuring the jar isnu2019t contaminated.  Thereu2019s a noticeable tingle when the product is applied, but it never feels painful (my skin is fairly sensitive and other AHA/BHA products have left me red and burning).  The scent is very strong, but not unpleasant.  I think it smells like those chalky flintstones vitamins.  Overall a wonderful product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When i first start using the mask it was $46 CAD, now it's $60. It dose work but well, only going to pick it up during the sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is my u201cresetu201d button.   When Iu2019ve been bouncing back and forth with different makeup products, my skin can end up looking horrible. Pores are enlarged and looking clogged, dullness, and hyper-pigmentation.  I honestly donu2019t understand how after 20 min of this being on my skin, how all of those issues seem to mellow out and my skin looks radiant and baby soft. 20 minutes. Like really??  I have used this three times a week in addition to Herbivoreu2019s Lapis oil (try it out if you love this mask, Iu2019m telling you it will do wonders). I can honestly say that I have never tried anything as amazing as this.  I grew up with an esthetician and skin care consultant as a mother in her salon, so there are few things I havenu2019t tried in my lifetime, from high end to cheaper products. This product blows my mind every time, and I swear its the most pure and wonderful thing you can do for uneven skin with patches of discoloration and clogged pores.   I completely recommend this to anyone who needs to feel fresh and rejuvenated, and have your world rocked. Just try it and youu2019ll know what I mean.   Also, the scent is odd, but it grows on you and quickly becomes something youu2019ll end up liking after awhile.
