reviews.review_text: Love this! Really helped me with my acne and dry skin. Tingles a bit and the smell is a little strong but itu2019s all bearable. I highly recommend for this with issues with acne.

I received this product in my Play box and I must admit, I was not thrilled at first. I'm sensitive to scent and this mask has a very strong smell. Fast forward a few weeks and a sales associate at Sephora advises that I try this, and because I own it already, I do.  Oh. My. God. It's fantastic. I've never tried a product that transformed my skin so quickly. If you have qualms about this scent, let me urge you: try it anyway! The scent isn't as noticeable as you think (honestly!) and it's beyond worth it. The instructions say to use 2-3 times a week, and I have to stop myself from using it every day--it's that good. My skin is feels smooth and clear. I'll absolutely purchase the full-size once I've finished the sample, and check out the rest of Herbivore's products while I'm at it. I cannot recommend this enough, and coming from someone who fully expected to throw her sample away, that means something.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this mask a couple times now and, overall, I rather enjoy the mask. It's easy to apply and remove, and I love the cooling feeling as it dries. Tonight was my second time using it - I had an annoying pimple that had become irritated and itchy, and I found myself picking at it. Hoping it would help, I applied the mask and let it set for about 20m until it was taut, then rinsed it off. I found that my pimple was practically gone! 20m. Amazing.  I originally received a trial size in the Sephora Play bag, but I'll be purchasing the full size just for how well it works on pimples.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mask was ok on my skin, but not the miracle worker that other people reported. It did smooth and hydrate my skin a bit but my super dry skin needed a bit more. The smell is HORRID. It faded a bit after application, but not enough for me to purchase this product once my sample runs out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wish I could say this is my holy grail but it just isn't for me. However, I definitely think it's worth having on hand. There isn't a HUGE noticeable difference in my skin, but it does help with some slight texture I experience along my jaw line. I am extremely combo skin (oily T-zone, normal cheeks) but I do tend to use this when I have breakouts just because I know it will clear out any bacteria. That being said, if you have textured skin or suffer from break outs, I think you would love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is an awesome mask. I used the mask for a week and I can really feel and see the difference. My skin is sensitive, so I first let it sit for 5 minutes because it tingled a lot. The second application I let it sit for the whole 10 minutes and I tolerated it just fine. It had a peculiar smell, kind of like a cough drop. But nothing intolerable. It dries up clear and rinses out easily with warm water. My pores are smaller and I have fewer black heads. My skin feels softer and if my eyes arenu2019t deceiving me, my fine lines seem to be smoother. It is worth the money.

reviews.review_title: the smell is too much for your face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this honestly probably works great, but it smells SOOO bad i had to take it off immediately. i got it in one of the sephora favorites kits for holiday and as far as i know it was unopened but i do have to say it was more grey than blue so potentially had gone bad?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have bad texture issues on my forehead. Not scarring, just these...bumps...all over. I don't use this stuff as often as I should, but dang! When I use it, my forehead goes from feeling like Braille to smoother than a baby's butt! I do little extras, like lightly scrubbing my face dry after rinsing to add a sort of physical exfoliant, but ice never had skin like this! I think it's even helping with the Mariana's Trench sized wrinkle in my forehead, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with acne on my chin and when I use this mask my face is clear 3 days later. The smell doesnu2019t bother me too much either, it only lasts a few minutes. I would definitely recommend, Iu2019ve repurchased twice!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone that has new products every week, I almost NEVER write reviews because I am just never truly wowed enough to review. But this mask is 100% hands down amazing! I gave myself 4 weeks after purchasing the full size before writing this, just so I could really see results, and boy were they visible. It is such a gentle mask that it seems like itu2019s doing so little. BUT, any and all acne started to go away, my skin started looking fresh right away, my dark pigmented acne scarring has started to really soften to the point where I can go for my less coverage foundations and look great. I just cannot get over how smooth my face feels after every use! I love this product, and I definitely donu2019t regret investing!

reviews.review_title: THE BEST THING I EVER BOUGHT!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the BEST thing I ever bought for my skin! If you have acne prone skin, buy this immediately. Within a few days use, this absolutely transformed my skin. I have the clearest skin Iu2019ve ever had in my entire life thanks to this product. I cannot recommend it enough. TRUST ME, BUY IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received this in my play box and finally tried it! It has a nice color and the smell isn't the greatest smelling thing, but it's not the worst either. This mask does wonders you can feel how soft it makes your skin right when you wash it off. Definitely makes your face feel refreshed and moisturized

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have quickly become obsessed with this mask! My skin feels so amazing after using this and also works great as a over night spot treatment. I want to try more products from this brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask.  It really makes my skin feel baby-soft right after.  However, I think it smells like those toilet deodorizers you hang on the back of the toilet bowl.  I canu2019t stand the smell and it gives me a headache whenever I use it, but, the results are worth enduring.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Herbivore has never let me down! This mask truly delivers, after just 2 weeks my skin looked so clear. I don't have any issues with breakout but i do have a hard time keeping my pores on my nose and chin from being plugged up. If you follow the directions you are going to see results. It does string for the first few minutes but i never have red skin after i remove the mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask. I think it does absolute wonders when I need a revamp during the week. I use it 1x weekly and it not only looks, but feels amazing- highly recommend to anyone with combination skin. (If you are super oily and decide to use this, just make sure you hydrate appropriately. :) )

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This mask does wonders for my oily skin. I tend to only use this only once a week but that is enough for me to keep my skin glowing and looking healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a deluxe sample of this product and upon the first use I knew this was an HG product.  After washing and toning my face I had bright red splotches and a few pimples trying to come out.  I put this mask on.. after 20 min waiting and washing it off....NO redness...Pimple went on vacay!!! amazing :-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to help with my cystic acne. I didnu2019t notice a huge reduction in acne itself but I did notice my scars fade much faster when I use it regularly. My expectations for this may have been too high after seeing the reviews but overall Iu2019m happy with it. I love the smell even though itu2019s weird and itu2019s also not irritating but it has a gentle burn like any good AHA product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. This was my first time purchasing an at-home peel, and with my sensitive, dry and acne prone skin I was a bit hesitant. I only used it for 10 minutes a few times a week initially, but now I use it once a week for 20 minutes. It smooths my skin, helps brighten it, exfoliates and reduces blemishes. I love how it is a natural product and never irritates my sensitive skin. I would make sure to adequately moisturizer afterwards though because it can be drying. Will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It has a very strong scent, kind of reminds me of menthol it doesnu2019t really bother me. It is very liquidy so be careful opening it. Mine spilled all over my first time opening it. Thereu2019s a tingling for the first minute or so which is pretty pleasant. My skin definitely felt tighter and just refreshed after. It does make a change in brightness and evening the texture of my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is my holy grail face mask. I have acne prone, sensitive, skin and I can honestly say this mask is the ONLY mask I've used where I've actually noticed a significant difference in my complexion! I use it at night twice a week and wake up with soft, glowing skin, and that never happens to me. I've also noticed a reduction in my break outs since using this mask. I will absolutely be re-purchasing when my current jar runs out! A life-saver for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great stuff doesn't smell too great but did wonders for my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to say that I have tried Sephorau2019s top masks from sheet masks to clay/sulfur... you name it. I have been seeing a Dermotologist and I have been using their creams religiously. Still with that I was having some pretty bad break outs. I tried this mask and over 3-4 day period my acne had cleared up most of the way. Now I use once a week, to help my acne scars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this product, I got it in my sephora play box, my skin feels better instantly after I use it and the smell is really nice. It has a great tingly feeling on the skin while you use it, it's really cooling. Don't use it while taking a hot bath though, I noticed that the moisture of the bath didn't allow it to dry and thus the product seemed less effective

I can see results immediately after using this! My skin looks brighter, my texture is less, it takes away redness and looks calm, and my acne scars are going away. I am so impressed! A lot irritates my skin causing break outs so Iu2019m very picky with my skincare. I am in loooove with this. Iu2019ve been using it for a week now. A little goes a long way, this jar will definitely last at least 4 months maybe more! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First used this mask and it said u201ctingling sensationu201d but really made my face feel like it was burning. Gave this a 3 Star because i enjoy the smell and the way it made my face look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this mask! Always looking for a new one to try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone skin and I have tried many different masks. This is the first one that has really worked for me and it's not messy like a charcoal mask is. I absolutely love the smell of it and it washes off easily. My skin always looks glowing after and if I get a bad break out I just use this mask for a few days and it clears right up. Will definitely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mask! Super hydrating and really targeted my my dry areas. Thus made my skin feel so soft and smooth. The scent is also so relaxing and herbal. I received in this months play box and will definitely purchase the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best masks Iu2019ve used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mask for 5 months no and I haven't seen any difference. I love the ptr pumpkin enzyme mask and even the boscia ones.  I don't think this mask will ever make a difference on my face.

reviews.review_title: Faster results than with anything else I've tried!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for a couple of weeks and the difference in my skin is noticeable. I've never used anything before that has showed such results, my face looks brighter and clearer. I have a couple of little bumps under the surface that I've been unable to move for years. This has lifted one and I think with continued use it'll tackle the others.   I apply with a spatula brush, use a thin layer, and leave for 20 mins. Minimal tingling, and no burning. When removed I apply a rich lotion and my skin feels incredibly smooth. I will keep purchasing this. And have finally understood the need for AHA BHA in my routine!   Also this pot will easily last a year, lots of product in there!

just got this as a sample in a sephora favorites kit and was excited to use this but the smell is rancid. itu2019s brand new not expired but it smells so terrible and as someone who has never been overly sensitive to smells this is just terrible. itu2019s so gross i canu2019t even use it:(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, I received this in my September Play! Box and I enjoy it. It helps clear up my skin and thatu2019s something I needed dearly due to a severe breakout that just wasnu2019t going away. Iu2019ve read other reviews that mentioned something about a smell but I donu2019t know what they were referring to. The first application does sting a little bit but after that it feels wonderful. I do recommend removing with a washcloth and warm water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is on another level from the rest of them.  Soothing, cooling, calming, and smells great.  Not only is it great at exfoliating, but it has some serious anti inflammatory effects on my skin.  I leave it on for 20 minutes before bed, rinse it off, apply Herbivore Lapis Facial Oil, and wake up to amazing skin.  It's clear, glowing, and smooth.  Because of the anti inflammatory component,  and because it's more natural, I prefer it to my usual Drunk Elephant Baby Facial.  One of the few products that actually does what it claims to do.  Definitely worth purchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good product, it works for me, but beware if you have sensative skin. It gives you a menthol, tingly, chilly feeling on your face. It is good for achne, but stay consistent when using it for the best results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This face mask is for acne-prone skin. I don't have problem with acne, but I do have a lot of random sun sports, dullness, and extremely dry skin. After using this mask for a week, I found that my skin appeared a lot brighter and the dark spots on my face were lighter. Even though my skin is dry afterwards, I just put on moisturizer. I'm loving this mask so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wear this mask every single day of my period, for 20 minutes. And a week beforehand also. It's pricey, but worth it. I don't have to deal with those embarrassing breakouts I get with 5-7 zits and crazy redness. This mask reduces the sizes of each zit in just one application, and the red pigmentation isn't as severe. LOVEEEE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask!! I have sensitive skin, dryness, texture and I break out once a month. I fell in love with this mask from the first use. I donu2019t think the mask smells bad at all. From the very first use this face mask made my skin feel firm, my pores were smaller, my blackheads were significantly less noticeable, and my skin was glowing. And the best part of all is it is very gentle. I only feel a slight tingle for the first minute then it completely disappears. If youu2019re looking for a mask that helps with texture, blemishes, pores, and discoloration this mask is really nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product, the smell is a little off but love the formula

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have sensitive skin do not use this. The smell is the reason I gave two stars , it's so heavily scented I can't even use this . Literally awful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mask smells very herbal so if you're into that I would definitely say it's relaxing. I love to put it on and feel the cold tingle of it while soaking in a hot bath.   My pores were visibly tighter and cleaner and my skin has felt more energized after one use. I frequently use masks (dr jart, kiehls, origins, lush, etc) and this has been one of the more effective ones I've used.  Taking it out of the jar is a little messy (it's more liquidy) but this is definitely a new favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this once a week to revive my skin. It smells amazing and you can feel the mask working.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in my sephora box & I have feel in love. My pores are so large and visible and this made them disappear and my face looks nice and smooth. I am 36 so I dont have aging signs but I still want this because it makes my skin so much better in appearance. Love it!!!
My favourite clarifying mask - the effect is immediate, love the smell and doesnu2019t cause breakout. Now a staple in my list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, helps reduce redness and scars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the rare masks that I see instant results from. So glad this was included in my play box,  getting the full size!
This is a great mask for oily, sensitive and acne prone skin like mine. The only thing that I didn't like was the scent, it is weird and very strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a smaller size in a favorites box about a week ago. Not only has my face reduced in break outs but the overall appearance is better. Yes, the smell is very distinct at first and I hated it...but oddly I've grown to liking it. A thin layer works wonders and its lasting me awhile... I've used four times and still have over half the container. Will be buying more :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only used this mask 3-4 times, so as I canu2019t speak to a longer term use of this product, the results Iu2019m getting already are impressive. Skin feels smoother and softer after the first use and my texture has been diminishing quickly already. Iu2019ve been using it once a day and itu2019s been working amazingly thus far. I got it in my play! box and I canu2019t wait to purchase a new one!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This seriously made my skin so soft. The scent didnu2019t really bother me but it was strong. The only downside to this is the extreme tingling that almost feels like my face is just VERY itchy. Honestly itu2019s worth it because it WORKS!

Got this as a sample in my first play bag. I don't know if the formula works well or not. I  barely got it on my face before the putrid smell hit my nose. I threw it away and scrubbed my face as fast as possible.
I love it! I had never tried blue tansy before and i have problems with redness,as soon as i washed my face the redness was almost invisible!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Cleared my skin and smoothed out my texture in one use- love!!
Really helps with redness and breakouts, all the while making skin incredibly soft. Plus, it smells fantastic. I'm sold!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the feel of this mask.  I personal love the smell but I can why some people feel it's strong smelling.  When you first apply it the mask it has a nice cooling feeling and it's not too thick or too thin.  As the mask beings to dry it has sort of a tightening feel on you skin thats neither comfortable or itchy like some mask.  It feel like its tightening your pores.  After washing it off you skin feels smooth, refreshed, and clean.  This is a staple in my beauty routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask really helps to smooth uneven texture. I find that my pores get clogged and my skin feels bumpy not with breakouts but I can feel tiny bumps. A couple uses of this mask cleans out my pores and makes my face feel smooth and even textured. It is also great to reduce redness. Whenever I feel like I am breaking out this takes care of it immediately. Pimples are reduced and the redness also calms down. It doesn't eradicate break outs with one use or over night but after using every day for a couple of days it makes a huge difference it preventing a breakout actually surface into an unsightly, painful, red pimple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin so maybe this works for other skin types. I used several times and didn't see any results at all. Nothing. I read other reviews, i don't feel the scent is bad at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in this month's Playbox, and WOW! I was a bit hesitant to put this on my face because of the smell, but I'm so glad I did. I have sensitive, combination/dry, always red skin, and the benefits were instantaneous. I didn't even recognize myself in the mirror because I've never seen my face that calm before. Will definitely purchase full size, this is a dream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin that normally can't handle strongly fragranced products or products with a lot of essential oils, so I was quite surprised when I felt no burning, tingling, or itchiness after I applied this mask. I enjoyed the smell and didn't find it that strong when the appropriate amount of mask was used. This is an AHA and BHA product, so I was expecting some mild stinging, but the product only felt very cooling on my skin. It was for this reason that I didn't think the mask was actually working for me. I have using chemical exfoliants for years now, and they're usually 8% glycolic acid or 2% salicylic acid. The Blue Tansy mask performed sooo much better than any of my other exfoliants. After one use, congested pores were cleared, blemishes were less swollen, and my skin was smoooooth! I used an oil cleanser after the mask to get all the grits out of my pores and it really kicked things up a notch.

reviews.review_title: BUY IT and thank me later!!
reviews.review_text: Hands. Down. The. Best. Mask. EVER!! Like stop what you are doing and buy this now!! I had a horrible breakout and it literally cleared it over night..not to mention it cleared my blackheads and tightened my pores!! Amazing!! Like this is magic potion or something! And trust me I've tried everything from low end to the highest end products and nothing compares to this! I will never be without it!

reviews.review_title: Love the results but not the process
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask really helps with my skin texture. It makes my skin feel so soft and smooth. I am not a fan of the smell. It has a very interesting and strong scent. This mask is also hard to wash off. I use a damp washcloth to scrub it off before washing my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin

The smell is just so incredibly strong that I couldn't put it on my face (I can't imagine smelling this bad for hours, it would give me a headache). I threw it out. Others may like it but it's not for me. I'm really glad it was a sample.

I got this in my September Sephora box last night and I used to spot treat two large blemishes and I noticed a difference after I took it off they were less red and swollen feeling I wouldn't use it all over my face it does tingle as it says It will but I feel it would be to strong for my whole fave I will defiantly uses this to spot treat any Blemish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A lot of good reviews for this product and I was looking for a BHA/AHA product. Soo happy I decided to purchase this! It worked WONDERS. I broke out really bad around my cheek/chin area due to hormones and sugar (yikes) and I have a wedding coming up this sunday.. I put this thin layer mask on and I kid you not.. I saw results within HOURS. My pimples reduced in size and redness. Now I am on the 3rd day of using it and it is all almost completely gone!!  Definitely recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It did help my skin and tightened my pores but the results weren't revolutionary. Manage your expectations because after I read the reviews I was expecting completely new skin, which did not happen. If you have sensitive skin like me, this also burns like a mother for the first minute or so. I got scared that it was actually damaging my skin but it wasn't. Still a very good mask but not a miracle worker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great for blackheads/enlarged pores, pushes active acne to the surface and improves scarring, love it:)

Awesome! I was a little startled by how liquid-y this mask is. I felt like I was going to spill it everywhere. But, it left my skin feeling SO SOFT. It made my pores appear smaller after one use. It is kind of pricey for the size, but I will be purchasing again!

This product works really well with the others in my weekly regime. I started out using it once a week and now it's a bi weekly thing. After the first week I noticed that my skin was brighter smoother and all without dry spots or any tightening which was a plus for my normal to combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually hate masks. I think that most are pretty gimmicky and just take time out of my day. I have combo acne prone skin and I am a lover of luxury skin care. I use peel pads daily have used the drunk elephant baby facial in my weekly skincare routine but it does not compare to what this mask does for me. This is probably my favorite product I have gotten from Sephora. The texture is light and soothes the skin. I love how my skin feels afterwards. So smooth and pore-less! Worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: made me break out more and the smell is awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A great clarifying mask! I had tended to use microdermabrasion scrubs with strong acids and either professional-grade crystals or diatomaceous earth, but decided to try a more natural, and less abrasive, alternative. I bought this about a month and a half ago and have been using it around 3x/ week in the evening, leaving it on for 30 minutes or so. Afterwards, I gently exfoliate with a kelp-and-sea-salt-based face wash and a konjac sponge, and the dryness and peeling that I tend to experience around this time (hello, autumn!) is nearly gone. I also really like the fact that, unlike many of my previous go-to's, Blue Tansy does not burn or tingle at all. Together with the sponge exfoliation, it gives a nice glow the morning after use, and it has helped reduce the hormone-induced breakouts that I tend to get. The pot is also quite large, and even though I use a nice thick layer of this masque when I apply it, it looks like it will last about 6 months. Highly recommend!

This is worth every penny !!!! I have had acne and blemishes for quite some time. Ive tried so many masks, cream, serums... and it's the only product that actually made a difference. I have oily skin and it never looked so fresh and clear. You MUST give this mask a try !!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: THIS SHOULD BE A PART OF YOUR LIFE. Women and Men everywhere, ESPECIALLY folks with skin issues, Blue Tansy goes a long way if you use a brush and provides bang for the buck if done right. With all things skin, balance and observation is key. I would wash, manual gentle exfoliation (clarisonic is OK every 3 days), rinse  then enzyme exfoliation (Boscia exfoliating gel), letting the skin calm after each application and letting the gel absorb. Afterward do the Tansy for deep skin turnover. Once done, rinse. any time I do the clarisonic,  I make sure to apply moisturizing toner. Then a good balancing, nurturing and moisturizing serum (Caudalie and Herbivore rock).  Last is a moisturizer that you enjoy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down my favorite mask and I've tried so many.  I have pretty normal skin and was looking for something that has a good mix of brightening and clearing out pores ability (that wasn't a mud mask).  I'm officially obsessed and have recommended this mask to all of my girlfriends.  I do this mask every Sunday and it does an awesome job of brightening, tightening, and evening out my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't have any redness or acne concerns so I too was skeptical about trying this mask. It is amazing. It clarifies and brightens my normal combination skin instantly!  I always follow up with the oil (blue bottle) .. it is heaven when I wake up. Like baby smooth skin. My foundation melts into my skin because of these products! 30/f

This mask is going to be a staple of my skincare for a long time to come! I have sensitive skin and rosacea, and my skin gets really bumpy and uneven. I used this as directed and after the first week I looked like I had completely new skin! I mean, it was shiny, soft, way more even.. I was glowing in pictures. It can sting a little when you first put it on, but that goes away. Love it!

This mask is beyond amazing. I'm on my second jar bc it's completely changed my skin. My main concerns when I originally bought it was skin texture and unevenness. I occasionally breakout and I get scarring bc I pop them. This definitely helps with everything and anything. I will continue to repurchase. You seriously need to try this if you have any skin issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mask back in March and I still have about half of it left. You don't need a lot and it will not dry out your skin! I use it 2-3 times a week. Skin is noticeably brighter and clearer. I also have the pink clay soap and lapis balancing oil. Together it's an awesome routine. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because the colour changed from blue to green. I contacted Herbivore they were great and told me it will change colour over time because the ingredients are natural. Would buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can't say this did much for my skin.  I've been using it for several weeks now - 3 days a week like another user who posted here.  I feel no tingling, and after my skin feels no different.  Nor has it improved.  If it is making a difference in my skin, it's not enough for me to notice any improvement.  I bought it based on all the great reviews and couldn't wait to get started.  Seems to have worked for many other people, but personally did not work for me.  Will continue to use until the container is finished - maybe on my skin it will just required something a little stronger.

I absolutely love the Blue Tansy mask. It's even more effective when used with their Lapis oil. My skin has improved dramatically in the last few couple of weeks since switching to Herbivore products and my breakouts have pretty much subsided. I was having issues with continuous breakouts for the last month and couldn't figure out what was causing it. I started switching my makeup to oil free, more natural products and also found Herbivore while looking for new skincare products. Yes, they may be pricey up front but a little bit goes a LONG way!
Refreshing can't really say it did much to my skin but it felt very nice loved the sample bought a full size (the sample is better worth wise) but enjoyed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot express my adoration for this product. I kept spending so much money looking for a miracle for my combination, sensitive skin, and I finally found it. My face has never been so consistently clear in my life. Because this product has been so helpful, I have been able to stop spending every paycheck trying to find a miracle cure, or better make up to cover up breakouts while looking natural. Give this a try, use it frequently, and you will see results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this mask due to the skin concerns it claims to address, but I honestly could not get past the HORRIBLE smell. The smell as so strong that it was actually nauseating. The results of the mask were pretty good, but I think there are other masks/treatments out there that are just as good with a much more pleasant smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I feel bad giving this a lower rating because while I think it works, I can't get onboard with the smell. It's so overwhelmingly awful that when I have it on, I have to breathe through my mouth. While others seem to not be bothered by the smell, I don't think it's worth it and can get similar results from other products. I recommend smelling this in store prior to purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mask! Really interesting thin, gel type texture. Absolutely smooths my skin and removes dull top layer. Plan to repurchase!

I really wanted to love this product.  I used it weekly and expected to see and feel a difference in my skin.  Unfortunately, while the product felt amazing in and right after rinsing, there were no improvements at all.  My skin went right back to the way it was.  The scent has a medicinal, herbal, yet fruity scent, which was a bit off-putting.  That being said, if a product works well, the scent doesn't matter as much to me.  I'm going to use what I have, but since there were no results, I will not be purchasing it in the future.  Even though it didn't work for me, it may work for others, which is why I would recommend it.

This mask definitely helps with evening skin tone and texture. The smell is lovely. It is a bit spicy on the face the first few times you use it. A wonderful addition to my regular skin care routine. The only negative thing I have to say about it is the price. For how often it should be used, the price is just a bit too much for my liking.

reviews.review_title: Great AHA mask for people with glycolic issues!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I usually shy away from AHA products because they usually contain glycolic acid. My skin reacts poorly to using those so I stay away. I was extremely excited for this because it was full of AHAs that were not glycolic. This mask smells AMAZING. I think part of the reason why I like it so much is because of the smell. Furthermore, I have seen improvement in the clarity of my skin.

reviews.review_title: Miracle for oily and acne-prone skin
reviews.review_text: This product has seriously changed my life! I have extremely oily and adult acne-prone skin and this summer my skin got out of control. I literally tried everything to calm it but nothing worked until I tried this mask. It has not only calmed my acne, but it has significantly reduced the amount of oil that my skin produces without drying out my skin (I used to have to use at least 2 blotting papers 3-4 times a day to keep the oil under control and my makeup from slipping around my face, now just one blotting paper twice a day is more than enough). I've only been using this product for about a month but the changes are incredible! It's a little pricey but soo worth it. My skin has never been clearer and produced so little oil, and my skin actually feels so hydrated and soft!!

I have quite a few mask and this one has to be in the top 5 . The smell took a few times to get use too but the results are nice . My skin is less red its smoother and I feel like I wake up with nicer more refreshed skin . And I can use it multiple times a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping this would help my summer breakouts but it did not. Definitely makes your skin feel smoother but I have to use it quite a few times a week. Overall i'm not sure i would recommend this for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite enzyme masks.  A little goes a long way and I love the smell.  It's a bit medicinal but that's what I like about it.  There is sometimes a slight tingle if I've been being harsh to my skin, but it dissipates as it dries.  I notice very smooth and soft skin after using this. I recommend it for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: saved my skin!! i was dealing with terrible breakout, and this product truly cleared some of my issues up. it does not dry, but it does sting a little bit. also it is a little hard to get off bUT TRUST ME ITS WORTH IT
Makes my skin super soft after 3 uses

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought a couple jars of this mask already, for me it's worth every penny. I have normal to slightly oily skin, some fine lines and a few pores here and there (I'm in my 30s) and I also get hormonal breakouts. This mask brightens my skin and helps me deal with the few pimples I get. I don't know if this would be enough for someone with real skin issues such as acne or pigmentation, but for me it's a staple in my mask collection. I love the fact it has both AHA and BHA and that it's not too harsh on my skin but yet effective. I leave it for longer than recommended and it doesn't irritate my skin. It's my second favorite product from Herbivore, my favorite being their Phoenix oil!
I've tried a million masks (I'm definitely a product junky) and this by far is one of my favorites. Definitely a staple in my beauty routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't see a difference with the first use, but after following the directions of applying it daily for 3 or 4 days, THATS when I noticed its effects. I think doing that and regular use is key. I've suffered from milia for a few years now, and this has dramatically reduced them from appearing (as in I haven't had any new ones in the 3 weeks I've been using this and that's unheard of), as well as stopped the occasional pimple from forming. I use it a few times a week and it's magic. And I never say that about anything.

reviews.review_title: You need this mask in your life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask. Im so happy I read up reviews on this brand, Or I wouldn't have tried this mask. It feels super cooling and hydrating and once washed off, my skin feels refreshed and toned and even some of my hyperpigmentation is lightened! Absolutely love this mask

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this did absolutely nothing for me but it did look cool when it dried down kind of like lizard skin. but really this did nothing even when you follow the instructions

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: J'avais de grosse attente envers ce produits mais j'ai ete deu00e7u.  Je n'ai pas vraiment vu de resultats. C'est cher pour ce que c'est.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best mask I have tried, and trust me, I have tried A LOT. It's perfect for smoothing out skin texture and really helps with break outs. The only thing is the smell is really strong but its doable. 5 stars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The texture is very fluidity and not like normal clarifying mask. It has AHA and BHA which can help to exfoliate the skin. I don't mind the smell even though it is unique. I can feel acne areas are drying out after using it. Love the mask and will buy it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My fiance and I have been using this and I absolutely love it! He's new to skincare and really only dabbles with some of the products I use but even he's noticed a drastic difference in his skin texture and appearance.

Ok, so I have not bought this... YET. But after reading so many reviews on this and how incredible it was, I went in Sephora and asked for a sample. GIRL, LET ME TELL YOU!!!!! I added just a tiny bit to my face and left it on over night, I woke up the next morning and washed it off to reveal soft non textured skin!!!!!! Being dry and acne prone is tough enough but having texture is the worst because I can't ever seem to get rid of it! This did for at least a few hours and my face was incredibly soft.!!! I will be purchasing!!!   P.s. Since I'm dry this did dry me out just a bit so I had to add just a little bit more hydration into my skin. But overall result so worth it! The consultant recommended I use this twice a week since I'm dry

Another product by Herbivore that you see results from day 1.  It has a pretty strong herbal smell to it, but you'll get used to it ; plus it's from natural ingredients , so that's always a plus ! it will make your skin look and feel amazing !

reviews.review_title: Gentle, but gets the job done every time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask has to be my favorite. It helps get rid of any texture on my face without making me tight or red or anything nasty like that. The results definitely aren't immediate though. I use it at night and my skin looks better for sure, but when I wake up in the morning I'm always shook. It also seems to be giving me better oil control. Buy the lapis oil too. I've never had a moisturizer that kept me so not-oily and moisturized at the same time. Sorcery

I was skeptical that this was going to do what everyone said it was going to do. I feel like I've tried every mask at Sephora over the years but have not tried this one. I wanted an exfoliating mask but one that didn't have any beads or scrub in it and I feel like this is exactly what I was looking for! I've only used it twice and I'm seriously obsessed! It tingles a little but it's bearable and the smell is not as bad as everyone says. It actually smells kind of good to me and you only notice it for a few seconds and it's gone. I'm excited to keep using it! My skin felt so amazing only after the second time. Def worth it!
I've been using this for months and did not see any results. I'd rather spend more money on other mask

This is the best mask I have ever tried for my skin type. I have small bumps/texture on my cheeks and intermittent acne and this mask seriously changes the texture of my skin after just one use. It gets better the more consistently I use it...either way, mask is an A+ in my books and I will continue to repurchase it even though it's pricey. (but fyi, a little goes far with this mask...so that's nice)

I finally picked up my first Herbivore product the other week, but I have to say I'm not overwhelmed. I expected to wipe the product off and feel like a new woman... but not so far. It's a decent mask, but if I could I'd probably return it. I still use it occasionally, but it's not going on my must-haves list.   I hope the next time I try Herbivore I'm not so underwhelmed. I've heard such great things about their products, but didn't deliver this time.

This is the first product I have ever used that showed immediate results after the first use. It definitely does what it says it's going to do and I like the consistency of the product. Will definitely repurchase.
I love this mask, the results are amazing and obvious. My husband commented on the fourth day of me using it that my skin looked really good. I'm definitely going to repurchase when I run out

For the past few months, I have been really frustrated with my skin. Acne ( I normally only break out hormonally ), sensitivity and redness. I couldn't leave the house without foundation!! I tried the ordinary serums, about every clay and sulphur and charcoal mask on the market (no budget for skin care am I right!!) and everything just seemed to irritate my sensitive skin and make my blemishes worse. I even tried the Tata Harper clarifying mask, which was much too harsh for skin, leaving me red and sore. I tried this mask on a whim when chatting with a sephora worker about my skin. THIS MASK CHANGED MY LIFE!!!!!! After 1 week it has brought to head blackheads and blemishes that were deep in my skin, which I extracted. My skin after using looks fresh and even toned, and this does not irritate at all. It does tingle a bit upon application, and the scent definitely takes getting used to. I use a Mac brush to apply this so I get a nice even thin layer and don't dip my fingers into the product. This is the best!! I just ordered a bunch of herbivore products because this made such a good impression

This mask is amazing and my skin loves it. It smoothes the surface of my skin like no other and leaves a radiance I cannot replicate. The more you use it (over a period of time, not in one week), the better your skin will look.     I have already repurchased and will continue to do so after I run out.

Now I'm not new to skincare... I know what to look for and what to avoid (which is usually quite a bit of stuff) I follow Paula's Beautypedia like a bible, but once in a while I just have to disagree with her line of thinking. Although this isn't something her staff has reviewed, I know because of the fragrance, and jar package she would give it a 1 star rating.... something about this mask though I just adore! I love the smell, now don't get me wrong fragrance is not really good for skin, especially sensitive skin, but mine can handle this.... I love how light and cool it feels, and my skin looks glowing and fresh after I use it. I had to buy this when DermStore had its 25% sale! Wish it came in a tube so I new the antioxidants and other ingredients would remain stable, but I'll let it slide! Can't wait to try the pineapple mask next!

I have very acne prone skin and a lot of blackheads on my nose. I think that this has helped with my acne (too soon to tell if it's helped with the blackheads). I think this has really helped to heal my acne much quicker too! There is a tingle and a natural scent but I didn't mind it at all-I actually enjoyed it. I think this is a great product that goes a long way but one that I will DEF be buying again when I run out.
I tried a deluxe sample and it made me face so radiant and smooth! Had to buy the full size!

reviews.review_title: The first mask that works for me
reviews.review_text: This is the first time that I ever wrote a review for any product. I've tried several masks (GlamGlow, Kiehl's, etc) that aims for oiliness/pores/blemishes but they didn't work. I tried this twice and it works. I feel my skin is clearer and less oily. Even though this is kind of pricey for me but I believe this is good investment!
i've tried a lot of face masks and this is my favorite. it seems gentle when on but after my face feels tighter and i've never seen so much of a difference so quickly!
This stuff is majic in a fricken bottle!! If you are struggling with stubborn Redness in your face this will be a godsent!!! My redness was gone in just 4 days

Most products take a few weeks or months of use to see improvements in your skin but with this mask I saw an instant improvement. When I awoke the next morning after first use I didn't want to wear makeup because my skin looked amazing! Pores were almost invisible and I definitely glowed. I'm still in love with it! Seriously it's like magic

I'm really enjoying this mask, when I first opened I was surprised because I didn't know it was so liquid. It goes on easy with a brush. Yes, it does tingle a little, but I have rosacea and it didn't irritate my skin at all and left it smooth. The first few times I would say using it for 10m then build up to the 20m. I know a lot of people are complaining about the smell, but when you are dealing with real skincare...it shouldn't smell good. If it does it likely has added fragrance which is a no no. Also, I didn't dislike the smell, it reminded me of oregano...and kind of made me hungry! This product was provided gratis but all opinions are unbiased and my own.

I don't write reviews but this is amazing. I used it and my acne was gone or smaller than it was. It did not smell the greatest but I'm looking past hat bc it made my skin nice and it also made it smoother than before! I only got a sample of it but I'm going to splurge and get it one day
Ordered this online because of all of the amazing reviews but dear God the smell is repulsive. Wish I could've given it a chance but had to wash it off immediately to not throw up

I love this mask. It's so gentle and perfect for my oily and sensitive skin. It made my skin so soft and clear out my acne. Dont like smell that much but it doesn't matter. It helps healing my open acne quickly and my blackheads are improving instantly. Absolutely recommend this mask to anyone who are suffering with acne. I use this mask and PETER Thomas Roth sulfur mask. Both are fantastic. BUY it, it won't disappoint you.

I got this as a sample a while ago (it has lasted me QUITE a long time), and originally used it as a full face mask. I liked it as a mask, but honestly I think this stuff works better as a spot treatment. I leave it on acne overnight and it reduces redness and helps make the acne smaller/heal quicker. This also helps to dry up opened/popped acne. I use it every single night, and absolutely love it. When I finish up my free sample I will 100% buy the full size :)

Normally when the directions on a mask say to use a few days in a row for optimal results I ignore that - who has the time or money to invest in repurchasing a mask that often. However. I've been converted. The instructions state to use this 3 days in a row. I do this every week. EVERY. WEEK. I am a normal to dry ski type that is very acne prone. I have big pores but dry patches. My skin hates me. This mask has done WONDERS for evening out my skin tone AND keeping breakouts at bay. The smell is pungent and it has a slight tingle but neither of which would stand in my way of repurchasing. Reminds me of my beloved Tata Harper Resurfacing mask- less glow though and more detoxification and clarification. They work really well together. I'll never be without this.

I've only used this once and I have to say I was impressed my first try! It tingles a bit but I like that becuz it lets me know it's working!!! I left it on for 15mins and after rinsing, my skin instantly felt firmer and smooth!! You can also see the difference. I have dry skin and a few blemish and with only one try my skin is visible Hydrated and Flawless

I was so excited when I saw all the rave reviews and bought this on impulse. I have some active breakouts as well as scarring and I don't really think this did anything at all. It was relaxing and I love the colour but that's about it.   It does sting when you first put it on, and I use Drunk Elephant's TLC serum so my skin is used to AHA/BHA but alas. Will probably use it up and give it another chance but I doubt I will repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Have to try it if you can
reviews.review_text: This is such a good product! I was able to notice significant improvement in the texture of my skin after the first use. It was easy to work with and I cannot wait to see the result from prolonged use. The one thing I would be cautious about is the frequency of usage. It was very tempting to use it often because it is so effective, but I think it can be harsh on the skin if used too frequently. I do remember a slightly unpleasant feeling on the skin when I first used it, but it was nothing horrendous.

I'm floored. I've used a variety of masks for years. I'm 38 and have always struggled with acne, large pores, and congestion. I didn't think this was doing anything the first 2 times I used it. No tingling or tightening, although my skin was super-soft after I washed it off. But I kept using it per the directions. I've used it about 6 times now and I see undeniable results. My pores are smaller. But the congestion I've always had is mostly GONE. No blackheads, a dramatic decrease in acne, and very few sebacious filaments. My skin is so soft, and much less textured than it was before. I will definitely keep using this. It's very thin, and a little goes a loooong way, so I don't see myself running out of this for a long time. I don't think I even need my huge collection of other masks anymore.

Reduces my redness, takes down inflammation, light chemical exfoliation, outstanding ingredients, instantly brightens skin (that I notice on me at least), feels nice, easy to use, smells good, what else could you ask for?

I have been using this mask for about 3 weeks now and my skin is so clear!! I have aaaaalways, stress ALWAYS had issues with acne, and after a week and a half of using this I could already see the difference. It's truly a miracle, since even the strongest of acne medications has not helped for long periods of time. I hope it continues to work as good as it has! It is even helping to fade the scars I have around my chin area. SO worth it, and will be repurchasing!!

I am a mask junkie. I have either tried or bought more than I can keep stock of at home, but this mask is an absolute gem. My skin these days is dry, burned, flakey, acne prone. It's a combo of poor sleep and acne meds. Anyways, I bought this on a whim online and I'm absolutely obsessed after one week. Here's why:  1. Scent - absolutely gorgeous. Instantly relaxing. 2. Colour - dreamy, relaxing - everything you want in a mask before bedtime. 3. Miracles - I put it on my peeling, red face - a little tingle sensation and then it calms. When I washed it off, redness was almost instantly gone. The only redness remaining was along my jawline where I didn't apply it!  The only real downside is it's watery consistency, but it's a minimal trade off for the incredible results. I will continue buying!! Lovely product!

I've been wanting this for a while, but I was on the fence.  I finally broke down and bought it, and I'm so glad I did.  I don't have acne, but I do get the occasional spot, and this is so effective to removing those spots almost immediately.  It is a great at exfoliating, and it does so gently.  My husband even likes it, though he's not fond of the smell.  The smell doesn't bother me at all.  It's a very blue tansy scent.

reviews.review_title: Not just for oily/acne prone skin!
reviews.review_text: If you've heard about this mask (you probably have) it's probably been about the amazing results people have had concerning their acne or breakouts. Well even though I don't have acne or oily skin, I wanted to see how versatile this product could be since my dry, sensitive, sometimes red, uneven toned skin could use improvement. I followed the instructions for the first five days, using it every other night, and every time I washed it off, it just got better and better. On day 5 I was absolutely obsessed. I've tried a MILLION masks and this is definitely in my top 3 because of how instant the results are. My redness was almost completely gone, my skin felt super smooth, some little bumps I had on my cheeks were GONE, most of my dark marks/scars had significantly lightened, it didn't dry out my skin at all, and best of all my complexion just looked brighter! Another thing that I love about this is how little of the product you have to use! The jar should last me more than a few months if I use it 1-2 times a week, which is well worth the $48 to me, especially because of the almost instant results. I've been forcing this product onto the faces of all my friends with all different skin types and now we are all obsessed! LOVE LOVE LOVE, thank you Herbivore!!

I have had consistent adult acne and have tried everything I can to get rid of it. Clarisonic, microdermabrasion, tons of washes and lotions all recommended by Sephora reps - few have made a difference.  I used the Glamglow Supermud and it was nice but I wanted to find the perfect product.  Then I bought the Blue Tansy..... it has literally changed my life. I have had no acne whatsoever for over 3 weeks which I have NEVER HAD EVER. My pores are smaller, blackheads almost gone, and my skin is smooth as a baby's. It has a nice smell and is soothing. I see better results from this product then the Glamglow too which is great.

I've been using this mask for almost a year and it really has been a game changer for my skin. I'm in my early 30s and never had any breakouts until my late 20s. This helps keep them and my oily/combination skin in check. Since I started using it a few times a week my skin has been almost perfectly clear and it help lighten old scars quite a bit. Every time I use it leaves my skin feeling softer and smoother as well. It has a nice tingle to it when applying, but has never irritated my skin. The scent is a bit strong when first applying, but fades and the benefits are more than worth it.

The mask is so dang good. I have oily sensitive skin, and sometimes it just randomly decides to be irritated.. with Blue tansy, my skin inflammation completely goes away. So happy I discovered this product!

When I first got this I was blown away by the results. I would use it 2 nights in a row each week. My skin was clear and flawless. Mind you I started a whole new skin care routine. When I ran out I stopped using it and my skin just wasn't the same. This mask works miracles.   You really only need a thin layer.  Yes it's a little messy but who would complain if it does the job. Not me.  100% HG

I purchased this after reading so many great reviews. Unfortunately, this mask didn't deliver for me. I have light to moderate acne around my chin. I applied as per the directions and finished the bottle with no results. On some occasions, I actually questioned whether it was the cause of new blemishes the next day. Did nothing to fade scars or dark spots or brighten my skin tone. Disappointing, especially for the price. I'd recommend trying a sample before purchasing, as this doesn't work for everyone.

I have only used this mask for about 2 weeks but im definitely starting to notice improvements in my skin. I'm not a fan of the smell. It's not a horrible smell but just personally I don't like it. Skin feels very soft afterwards and my acne scars are starting to look a little better. I'm not sure if I'm using too much but I feel like I'm going through my jar kind of fast. Would repurchase again if skin continues to improve!

I quite enjoy the smell of this. Very similar to the SR Luna Oil. I apply with a brush and let dry. It's hard to clean off sometimes so I just use a paper towel or face towel under medium-hot water and it comes off easily! I think it definitely brightens and smoothens the complexion. My skin feels baby soft right after! I have used this weekly for about a month and have noticed some improvements in skin quality and texture. I am also using other products so I'm not sure if it is a result of this or the other products. Overall, an extremely well created mask!

I got this mask because of the ongoing hype of both it and the brand. At the time it wasn't held at Sephora so I'd ordered it directly off herbivore website along w the facial oils. The mask is honestly horrible, I don't care about scent that's fine, it's consistency is so runny it's an absolute mess to try and put on and when it dries it's like hard jelly impossible to get off and when it's removed there is so improvement. Even over time with use. The facial oils smell nice but also have seen no results. I couldn't return anything due to it being ordered from their website but I definitely would have. Truthfully it was such a complete waste and did not even feel luxe when using

I recently found out about Herbivore skincare after googling natural skincare.  I'm 22, and had decided it was time to start taking care of my skin. I have very oily skin, and while I was not prone to major breakouts, I did get occasional pimples, and I had large pores/A TON OF BLACKHEADS. Like everywhere, all over my face. So I found Herbivore and was drawn to the beautiful packaging... then I read the reviews and immediately had to try some of their products. So I bought the charcoal soap, blue tansy mask, rose spray, and the lapis oil. THE BLUE TANSY MASK HAS CHANGED MY SKIN. I don't even wear makeup anymore... I hardly have any blackheads. My pores are way less visible. My skin is SO SOFT. Like I find myself touching my face all of the time because it's so soft... I also have had several people tell me my skin looks perfect and ask about my skincare routine...  I really can't believe the results. It's amazing.
I can see the whiteheads coming to the surface after I use this mask, and it is so much more easier to remove them after using this.
This mask really helps clear up blackheads! It leaves my skin so soft and glowing!!

reviews.review_title: I'm buying a 2nd jar....that's how good it is
reviews.review_text: This is one of the few masks I've ever actually used the entire package of. It's a little weird at first and if you're not used to a slight tingle, it might be off putting. However, this has totally changed the way my skin looks and I can't get over it. I work in a pool so I try not to put my skin through too much and this is just enough that it still helps smooth my skin without making it too dry or sensitive. The smell is v good as well and citrusy/smells like if you went to an actual facialist. Excited to try more Herbivore products!

I'm very skeptical when I buy skin care products, just because my skin is very sensitive. I have pitted scars, dark marks that have been on my face for years - so when I saw the results, I was in shock. My scars and dark marks vanished and you will see results right away, so I highly recommend this product.

I never write reviews but this stuff saved me! My skin was freaking out, I had very inflamed breakouts that didn't seem to go away. After just one use of this I woke up the next day and my skin looked million times better. No more redness, and all major breakouts were nearly gone! Buy it, its worth every penny!

I usually don't write reviews but this product definitley deserves one.  I don't think I've ever experienced such instant results from a prouduct.  I recently broke out pretty badly on my chin.  Within one day of using this mask the redeness and inflamation was gone and within two days I was comfortable going make-up free.  It really worked like magic.  The smell is not the most pleasant and it's a little messy but I was blown away by the results .

It does give a slight tingle but doesn't last long and the scent is a little pungent/odd. I'll have to try and get used to it. The spoon that comes with it is useless. I use my finger to get product. Jar is very pretty and love the gel consistency and color of gel :p My face was super smooth and did feel so much better after first use. Definitely looking forward to completing the jar and what my results will be :) thanks !
I have dry skin and it worked well for me. My skin was clear in just after a week of usage. I love this mask and will definitely be repurchasing once I finish this bottle.
Seriously amazing!! Def follow the directions & you will see a noticeable difference!!

I've only used this once so far and I loved it so much that I needed to write a review! I have very oily skin with hormonal acne and dry, bumpy cheeks. I put this all over my irritated face for 20 minutes and I swear, when I wiped it off, all the redness in my cheeks was gone, my acne was less inflamed and overall my skin looked healthier and clearer than before. I used the Lapis oil to add a little moisture back into my skin afterwards. Very happy with my purchase and highly recommend!

I've been getting more into AHAs and BHAs. I'm 28 years old, and I've recently been getting into skincare lately. Herbivore products are expensive, but I decided to bite the bullet. After using this for two weeks, I've noticed my skin is much brighter, and less red. I haven't noticed a huge difference in my pores, but hopefully with continued use, I'll see the results. As for acne, I used to suffer from really bad acne since I was nine (moving to a different country, and changes in my diet just didn't agree with me). Now I usually tend to break out with hormonal changes (usually when I'm about to get my period), along my jaw line. It's kept the breakouts at bay so far, and my skin has felt smoother, and silkier. It's also helped my serums, oils, moisturizers, and eve makeup glide on better.   I knocked a star off for the price, but you do really get what you pay for.

This mask is amazing. It tightens my pores and takes care of any texture issues and breakouts I have. It's kind of crazy how quick it works. I didn't find that it burned or tingled either. I am using it around twice a week since I have oily skin. Only weird part about it is that it's in a giant glass jar. I misplaced the little white applicator that it came with, and so now I'm either forced to use a different random brush, or dip my fingers in it to apply. Seems unsanitary and kind of gross. It's SUPER runny, so I have to be careful not to spill this liquid gold, as it is expensive!

I saw a LOT of positive reviews here, and I bought one.  nice package, but the results are not that impressive. Feels a little bit tingle at first five minutes, and the tingle sensation's gone. Skins feels a little bit brighter after the mask, but it only last for an hour.

I got a deluxe sample of this quite sometime ago and now that I'm finally getting towards the end (a little goes a long way!) I think I'll be purchasing the full size. I have oily, sensitive, acne-prone skin and I love to use this when I feel a breakout coming on or during that time of the month. It's a little tingly, but it has never irritated or dried out my skin. It leaves my skin smooth, soft & bright - I believe it also minimizes my pores. I don't love the scent, but it isn't strong and it doesn't bother me. The super cute packaging doesn't hurt, either.

I looked at this mask for a couple of weeks trying to decide if it was worth the high price. I finally ordered it and I am so glad I did. It is worth every penny. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and it has helped with the dark spots on my face. I use it about three times a week and it has made a huge difference.

This was the first face mask I'd ever bought at Sephora, I bought it after receiving a min-facial at the store. I'd been experiencing a tonne or unevenness in my skin due to extensive swimming and stress. This completely fixes any redness and exfoliates all in one punch. I honestlyI cannot stress how much of a difference this has made to my skin. A little bit of product goes a long way making it very affordable.

I couldn't tell any difference the first night I used it but the next day my makeup applied flawlessly and my skin was glowing all day. Several people asked me what I did with my makeup and this is truly the only difference! I had no acne scaring but I have some rough texture and this mask is noticeably helping!

If you have acne scarring, listen to me: You. Need. This. Mask. I've had hormonal acne and scarring along my cheeks for 15 years, and while certain things have helped, nothing has had such an immediate impact as this. The first time I applied it, I was surprised at how thin the gel-like liquid was, and it's a bit hard to apply. The smell isn't super pleasant, and it does sting a bit. But after only two uses, I've noticed definite fading of my scars. Like, I want to cry when I think about how much I love my skin rn. I don't know what kind of witchy magic is in this, but I wouldn't be surprised if its illegal in a few years. If this has been in your cart for a while and you've been waffling because of the price, trust me, I understand. Especially for the size. But its SO worth it!!! I'll be rebuying until the end of time.

I love this mask! It really smooths and brightens my combination to oily skin. I noticed a difference after the first treatment. The mask is effective yet gentle on my skin. I'm especially impressed with how it has worked like magic on my hyperpigmentation. It's also been great at calming my hormonal acne. Buy it and use it regularly!

I just hit pan with this product and I'm ready to reorder it again. I ordered this mask with some skepticism. I had really bad acne my freshman year and, thankfully, my skin has cleared up since then. However, I still had some acne marks from it and I was looking for something that could make my skin glowy and smooth, but would also not make my oily combination skin act up. This product did exactly that without irritating or hurting my skin. It doesn't leave my skin feeling dry or tight and it always gives me an instant glow. The product is pricy, but it lasted me a year!!! In the beginning I followed its instructions, but after my skin was smooth and glowing I decided to only use it when my skin would breakout. With or without the instructions the results are great, my suggestion would be to use it according to how your skin reacts to it. Highly recommend it!

This mask is probably one of the only masks I've used that makes a difference in my skin right after using it! I have acne-prone, combo (mostly on the dry side) skin. I use this mask when I feel like my skin needs a good exfoliation after my skin starts flaking bc of all the acne products I use. It makes your skin feel nice and smooth and takes of all the surface dead skin so your pores can actually breathe! It's not too harsh also! I also like using this mask before makeup so my foundation can go on nice and smooth! Totally repurchasing!

I have oily/combo skin that has significant PIH. I used this mask everyday for the first 3 days per the instructions & noticed that my skin is smoother, brighter, hyperpigmentation is lightened, and my skin is much more firmer and clearer. I've gotten to the point that I use this every day as my skin is resilient and how found that it keeps breakouts at bay. A little goes a long way, you only need a thin layer, it does tingle (that's the AHA working), and has an herbal/medicinal scent which I have no problem with. I do wear sunscreen daily to ensure that my skin isnt damaged or will reverse the work of the mask. This is definitely a holy grail item for me. I will be purchasing another jar as soon as this runs out!!

reviews.review_title: amazing, so soothing and smooths skin! helps acne
reviews.review_text: So I tried this after watching YouTube tutorials on skin care and being recommended it by a Sephora specialist. It takes about a week to show results but is so worth it! Makes your face feel extremely cleansed, clean, soft and healthy. Helps with brightening up the face and clearing stubborn acne. Scarring is gone and I simply love it.

Would give this 10 stars if I could. It has honestly changed my face!   I have a lot of acne, acne scarring, and general redness on my cheeks. I use this religiously because it has completely cleared my face, faded my scars, and reduced the redness. I try to do it every other day, but will do it mulitiple days in a row if I feel like I need extra help. I leave it on for a 45 minutes or longer and at first the smell was overwhelming but you grow to enjoy it.   Because it worked so well for me, I bought a jar for my 18-year-old brother who has some pretty bad cystic acne and scarring. His face has completely calmed down after about a month of use, and he has much less active acne. The redness has calmed so much that he actually uses the mask because he sees the effects.   TL;DR: This mask is amazing

I went to Sephora thinking I needed a new charcoal mask. I was shown this as a gentler alternative. I have combo skin and deal with random bigger breakouts, so I decided to give it a shot. I've used this 3 nights in a row and I can see a very noticeable difference in my skin! It's calming, my usual redness is barely there, it brought up a LOT of stuff to the surface the first two days but then like some magic fairy dust made it all disappear! I genuinely DO I have healthier, smoother skin from 3 USES!

I have been avidly using this mask for about 6 weeks, and from the first use I was obsessed. I wanted to give it a good amount of time before I fully formed my opinion, so here we are. Let me say that this mask will give you everything from incredibly smooth skin, shrunken pores, reduced acne, and hyper pigmentation fading in 20 minutes. Seriously, once use is all it takes. To see even greater results using it regularly is key. Buy this, it'll save your skin.

Effective mask, it does what it claims to, and I am a sucker for instant skin care gratification! Used this as an overnight mask, followed by a very gentle (physical) exfoliating cleanser the next morning. I definitely noticed a more even complexion and worth it in my opinion

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_text: This is gentle and easy to use for my combination skin. I don't think this is superior to other exfoliators, but it is a time saver for me. I often leave it on while I have breakfast in the morning to save time. I also find that it is not harsh on the skin even if you leave it on for a few minutes longer.

I used as directed and while my skin seemed a little softer, I didn't notice any drastic changes, especially in regards to acne, pores, or blackheads. The smell is absolutely terrible but if you can get past it's at least worth trying a sample. I won't buy this again at full price.

I love this mask! I've never had my skin feel so smooth after a mask, and I've noticed a huge difference in the pores by my cheeks. I have dry to normal skin and don't find it over drying as long as I use a face oil and lotion right after. I took off one star because it burned a fair amount when I first put it on. I had to fan my face to cool it down!  But the results are worth it, a definite repurchase.

I personally have normal/combination skin and when I use a product that irritates my skin I get red little bumps on my forehead, particularly above the nose and between the eyebrows area and sometimes around my cheeks.
