I've been using this a couple times a week (3x max) for a few weeks now and I've seen a major improvement - my redness and bumps have gone down! I always use the Blue Lapis facial oil afterwards too instead of basic, chemical-filled moisturizers and I'm super satisfied. The first couple times you use this facial mask it will sting and smell a little bad but after that there's no more stinging and I got used to the smell, I actually enjoy it now. It's so soothing and refreshing. I think these products are expensive but definitely long-lasting and worth it.

I used the mask as directed but didn't see a change in my skin. I'm new to chemical exfoliation, so I was hoping to notice skin improvement. I guess this mask is fine (I didn't react poorly to it), but I can't justify spending money on it.

reviews.review_title: HOLY. GRAIL. (and I never say that!)
reviews.review_text: I never leave reviews (this is literally my first in maybe 4 years), but I felt compelled to do so for this product. First off, I don't have terrible skin, but I did struggle with acne in my teens and now with the scarring that it left behind. Now in my mid-20s, I simply accepted that my skin, while clear of acne, will never be smooth.  This product changed that. It didn't work immediately, I will admit, but it did work pretty quickly. Within about a week, my skin was noticeably smoother and softer, and people were commenting on my glow.   It somehow manages to keep the dry parts of my face hydrated (like my chin) and the oily parts of my face in control (literally everywhere else). I haven't broken out at all, and my acne scars appear fainter. I even went on a trip abroad without this for 2 weeks and my skin maintained its look and feel!  I will continue to buy this as long as it exists. It's made me more confident in my natural skin than ever before. Also, I recommended this to a friend (with dry, flaky skin), and she was shocked at how quickly her skin became soft and supple.

I usually don't write reviews but, this mask is amazing! It has worked wonders on my skin.  I had quite a few scars from previous breakouts on my face and nothing would get rid of them. On a whim I decided to try this mask and I'm glad I did! The instructions suggest you apply a thin layer daily for 3-4 days straight, then use 2-3 times a week. After the first use, my scars faded dramatically and my skin has calmed down from new breakouts. I've been using the mask for about a month now. A little goes a long way, I apply a thin layer 2 times a week as well as a spot treatment for new breakouts and I barley made a dent in the jar. Now my scars are almost completely gone. I really wish I had of taken before and after pictures.  The mask tingles a little for the first few minutes (which I oddly like) but after it drys there is no tingle sensation. After the mask is removed, your face has an amazing healthy glow and feels so soft!  It is quite expensive but worth every penny. I will definitely be repurchasing and recommending to everyone.

The smell is weird but intoxicating, I actually really love it. I suggest following the instructions. I believe it says to use 3 days in a row, then follow up with 2-3x a week. The first 2x I used it, it stung my skin for about 1 min. I have never experienced that from a mask so I got scared lol. I didn't take the mask off however, the stinging went away quickly and left me with a cooling tightening sensation. Has not stung or burned since. Been using for about 2.5 weeks. My acne scars are fading and my acne has calmed down so much. This makes my skin feel so clean and refreshed. Says what it does. I LOVE THAT. Will repurchase.

I never write reviews but after trying many products at Sephora with no success I had to review this! My skin is sensitive and fair and this didn't bother it one bit! It immediately felt smooth, and my complexion looks amazing! I definetly saw a difference instantly and I am also using the lapis oil with great success! I have combo blemish prone skin and this line is my holy grail! I used this for 4 days straight then once a week and only a thin layer.

Instant results after the first use. My skin looks and feels so incredibly smooth. This mask has improved the pigment of my skin and has also faded the majority of my hormonal acne scars! No other mask has been able to successfully do that for me. I'm looking forward to trying more from this all natural line!

at first i was skeptical about spending so much money on a face mask, but i would buy this over and over again. for the past couple years i've had really bad acne which led to really bad scarring which led me to try so many different products to try and get rid of the scarring. not only did this remove 90% of my acne scarring within 4 days, my skin looked so much healthier! i followed the instructions and used it for 4 days straight, then 2-3 times a week. i was actually looking forward to waking up every morning just to see how clear my skin got. this face mask is a must!!!

reviews.review_title: a Holy Grail for Texture Issues
reviews.review_text: My skin is something that used to make me cry, seriously.... I tried retinol (PTR Pro 3%) for a year and a few other products for exfoliation with noticeable but minimal effect. I bought this on a whim and was really surprised by the results after a few months. Like legitimately, this will forever a be a staple in my skin maintenance going forward. I now have professional microneedling done and use this in between sessions. Fantastic stuff!! I'm not quite at my skin goals just yet but buying this was a huge step in the right direction <3

ok this stuff has so much hype surrounding it and its not Bad, so like, i think my skin just didn't like it. it tingled and turned red after i used it for the first time, but the next few times it essentially did nothing and my skin looked the same after use. i followed the directions carefully and made sure i was using it the correct amount of timesu2013 i was so i don't know what the problem is. also it smells vile.

I have been searching for a more natural skin peel. Peels really help with my adult acne! I think this is the best I've tried. Needs to be used a bit more frequently than other (2x/week instead of 1x) but it only takes a little bit of product and doesn't irritate my skin. I happen to like the smell a lot, seems that others do not. I have sensitive skin, but still leave it on the full 20 min.

I have extremely oily skin (like blot every 3 to 3 1/2 hours oily) and i get breakouts often, especially hormonal breakouts. i bought this mask a few weeks ago. i used it the night i got it. this mask literally transforms your skin. my skin feels soooo soft and i have gotten less breakouts. many reiviews say that the smell is bad, but i find it alright. a little goes a long way and i look forward to using this mask every night. (the package says to use 3-4 consecutive days for the first time, it then changes to i believe once or twice a week) DEFINITELY WILL PURCHASE AGAIN

I love this mask, I use it twice a week and I definitely notice a more even complexion when using this product! I actually enjoy the smell but I could see how some would find it off puting. it has a strong essential oil type smell. But the wonderful effect it has on my face will keep me me coming back to this product!

I was sleeping on this product. I finally got the chance to use this miracle of a mask. I have terrible texture on my skin as well as some congestion every now and then. I applied the first time only on troubled areas. I don't mind the smell. It is a bit potent. The color and texture were pleasant. I was extremely pleased with the performance of the mask. My skin was noticeably softer and smoother after ten minutes of use! This mask does not play games.

I got a deluxe sample of this a while ago and didn't think anything of it until I ran out of every other mask I had, I disregarded it because the packaging felt cheap and it was just a gel mask, and I prefer clay ones  But OMG I absolutely love it! It made my skin brighter and helped my acne scars after 2 uses. The trick it to use it a couple days in a row and then follow with a couple times a week. And use a small amount but smooth it over your entire face. It does get tight and make sure to moisturize after!

I've only been using this a week or so and can already tell a difference. My skins looks and feels smoother and even my pores appear smaller. I've used many pore minimizers and treatments and nothing ever works, so this was a bonus.  Like everyone has said a little goes a long way. It shouldn't drip off your face. That's too much.  It does have an extremely unpleasant smell but who cares if the product works. After the first few minutes the smell kinda fades anyway.

reviews.review_title: Great for my acne-prone combination skin!
reviews.review_text: I have been struggling with acne for the past year and this product has definitely helped. Although I do have a few scars left, my skin texture is pretty much smooth besides the occasional small pimple--even my friends have noticed and complimented me on the outcome!  My skin isn't very sensitive so I am able to leave it on for about 20 minutes each time I use it. I followed the instructions on the box; use 3-5 nights in a row and then use 1-2 times a week after. If you leave it on for too long it will dry out your skin, so make sure to keep track of the time or go by how your skin is feeling with the mask on. I make sure not to overuse it in order to avoid over exfoliating my skin which could result in more acne.  The downside on this product that I could see being a deal breaker for many people is the smell. The only way I can describe it is it being similar to Asian medicinal herbs that my grandmother always used. However, the nose will eventually get used to the smell when it is on your face so it shouldn't be a huge problem.  The product applies smoothly and it does not take a lot to spread around, as you only need a thin layer and it spreads easily. Washing it off is very simple as well; I recommend a wet wash cloth in the beginning to ensure the product is fully washed off.   Overall, my skin has been brighter, smoother and less irritated by unwanted acne ever since I have been using this product. Any dryness that occurs is easily fixed with some serums, moisturizer and Aquaphor!

I was really torn on this mask. I usually use a mask designed specifically for acne (i don't get it as much as I used to but I always play it safe) but after I ran out of my Clinique mask I held onto this. It definitely made my face glow but I bought it specifically to help lighten acne scars. I don't think it has helped in that field. I can't say for certain that I'll buy it again based on the fact that my other products give me better results than this mask alone. So for that I give it three stars.

Works amazing! My fave feels so crazy smooth, I love it! It is a gel like texture so a little goes a long way. I used it 5 days in a row and the switched to once a week! My skin has never looked more smooth! Just remember a little goes a long way cause it asks for a thin layer that stays on for 15-20 min(:

I love love love this product and will get this as christmas gift for my mother and sister too. Can't say enough good things about this product, best mask i have ever tried. U can see results from the first use. It brightens and resurfaces the skin - what more could u ask for? I have hyper pigmentation around my mouth and dry patches on my forehead and mask addresses both the issues and dose so very quickly. Follow the instruction on the back of the box for best results. I use the mask about thrice a week. This is my holy grail mask and will continue to repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Not bad!  Maybe even pretty good!
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone combination skin and what I consider to be a terrible complexion so I'm always on  the lookout for good new products. First off, I can't believe that some people actually like the smell of this because it is AWFUL and I seriously considered returning if after the first use solely for that reason. I decided to stick with it and have been generally pleased with the results. I feel as if my skin looks brighter and feels smoother. I've noticed an overall decrease in acne, especially the smaller bumps. I'm going to keep using it, so I feel like that's a good endorsement! It does dry, you just don't need to use a lot.

I don't understand all the hype. I have tried over 100 masks in my lifetime, maybe more...and this one didn't do anything. I agree with others, the smell isn't fun, and it never dries...peels...just continues to remain slippery.

First off, the smell is horrendous. To me, it smells like a mix of cough syrup and vitamins.. But besides that, the mask itself is good. A little really does go a long way- just be careful opening the jar. Every time I open it some of the mask pours out and it gets messy, maybe because it's a super thin consistency. Overall, though, I like it and will continue to use it.

This mask is a complete godsend for my combination, acne prone skin. I ordered the deluxe-sized sample a few months ago and have been amazed with the results. I see an immediate difference in the texture and pigmentation of my skin after using this mask. Now that I'm almost out, I'm rushing to buy the full-size! A little goes a long way, so this is a great value.

I bought this mask after reading and seeing so many great reviews but unfortunately it has not worked for me. Personally, I would still recommend buying it just because out of all the reviews I've read it seems like it works for the majority and I'm one of very few! The smell is very unappealing but a little definitely goes a long way and this stuff will last you forever!
I was super excited to try this out after all the reviews, but I really didn't notice any kind of change, except for a vague greasy sensation.

I ordered this mask when a few of my other masks were running low. I was interested in a more natural option as well as something that would do some gentle chemical exfoliating. I looooove this mask! Its extremely light weight and resurfaces without being harsh at all. I've used it almost 10 times already and there seems to be no dent in the jar. I can tell it will definitely last a while which makes the steep price worth it.

I have been using good genes but it did not help with hyper pigmentation at all. I came across this mask and thought why not. I have oily but dry skin prone skin with uneven skin tone and texture... oh cannot forget the forever clogged pores. I HAVE FOUND MY ANSWER. This mask! 2 uses and I have clear, smooth, even skin tone, calmed and heals breakouts. I have one tiny bump left. This has changed my face and I could not be more thrilled. BUY THIS PRODUCT. You will not be disappointed! Enjoy the results!

I adore this mask and use it two to three times a week. I have sensitive acne prone skin that is very red. This reduces the redness instantly and gently exfoliates my skin. I leave it on the maximum 25 minutes and it doesn't irritate me at all. I will certainly repurchase again though I bought it 3 months ago and only half the jar is gone!

I bought this stuff in hopes that the high price would mean it would work really well. Unfortunately, this was not the case. I saw no improvements in my skin, but it became very dry and flaky. And I didn't even put it on for the full recommended time. Plus, the smell is overwhelming and not pleasant.

I've never splurged this much on a face mask, but I definitely feel this one is worth it. I love the cooling effect on my skin, especially if it's already irritated from washing off my makeup. I brush it on with a flat foundation brush, and I feel like it's going to last me forever because you really don't need much! It also goes on clear, which I personally find way more convenient. The best part is that my skin feels incredibly soft and smooth the next day--usually I have small bumps and clogged pores on my face in the morning, but if I used this the night before I don't have any of that! Really impressive.

I love love this mask. I have acneic skin that suffers from post acne hyper pigmentation and scarring and every time I use this my skin feels softer, and looks smoother and glowier. I am a skincare fanatic due to my horrible skin so I've tried a lot of products and this is by far my favorite mask . The texture is like a lightweight gel that sinks in within 2 minutes and washes off easily. The smell is a little weird, but i don't care because the mask works so good . Also, i just recently started using differin which is a form of Retinol and my skin has been super irritated and broken out. I decided to go ahead and put this mask on anyway and I was pleasantly surprised that my skin didn't feel any further irritated after I took it off . That shows how gentle yet effective it is . I highly highly recommend it!!

This is a really good exfoliating mask. You only need to apply a thin layer, so a little goes a long way. It's gentle enough for my sensitive skin, and can be used every other day. It has a mild, herbal scent which I find pleasant. It's got almost a honey-like consistency with a translucent blue colour. It's cooling and comfortable on my skin. I use my Foreo Luna to easily wash off this mask. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated, smooth, and glowing. I wish it were a little bit more intense, but other than that, I love this mask.

I have seriously dry, sensitive skin, it gets rough sometimes. I read about this and decided to give it a try. So far I'm on my 4th day. My skin looks soft and luminous and just amazing. Definitely worth it, and will definitely repurchase. It's like having new soft smoother skin.

While this mask did make my skin feel softer, I had a hard time with the scent. It reminded me of candy, almost nauseating, even though it's a natural product. I really wanted to get past it but ended up returning it before I could really experience any benefit. If the scent was less potent I would've loved it!!

Ok so I wasn't too sure if this would live up too the hype but I'm definitely a believer now!  Pros: -your skin feels as soft as a baby's whenever you use this mask -a little goes a long way  -does a great job of decongestant skin and working with redness  Cons: -the first time you use it you have to use it for 5 days straight and then 1-2x a week after so despite a little going a long way you have to use it frequently -didn't really do too much for my pores, was more of a resurfacing mask than anything.  So bottom line is: if you're looking for softer, smoother skin that's been resurfaced and will better absorb products than this is for you. If you're looking for some sort of pore miracle than I would recommend you try something else instead. I'm still repurchasing though because my skin looks great!

Use as directed. I have been using this mask for a bit over a week. I used it for 3 days in a row (as directed) and then a few days later. My pores are redined, any texture has softened, and dark spots have lightened. This mask smells weird but I actually like it.. kind of medicinal. I use this mask along with Farsali serum and my skin simply glows!! Very happy with this mask.

So I was really excited when I got this mask from Sephora after reading all the amazing reviews about it, but I am so disappointed that I didn't see the results that everyone has been mentioning. I have been using the Luna oil for a while, and was almost out of it and decided to try something else instead that would give me even better results. However, my skin has never been so bad before and I don't know if it's the product in itself, or it being combined with

reviews.review_title: this will actually give you a new face
reviews.review_text: This is amazing. I used it for the first time today and after I washed it off, my skin was so soft. I actually asked my mom to touch my face and we both agree, it felt like a baby's butt. My skin was so soft and glowing, my pores even looked smaller, my forehead smoother...It looks like a small jar but you really only need a very thin layer. I felt a tiny bit of tingling and I have fairly sensitive skin, so it really wasn't anything even remotely unbearable.  I never want to be without it.

My goodness, I didn't expect this product to be so effective. I'd purchased it based upon the great reviews, but was a little skeptical about the claims left by other reviewers. I'm glad to say I was wrong to be so skeptical because this product is GRAIL status and I will never not have this in my skin care routine. Just after one use, I've already seen a drastic difference in the texture and clarity of my skin. I'm so excited about this product and the wonders it'll do for my skin!

reviews.review_title: Didn't Expect it to Be So Good
reviews.review_text: I really didnt know what to think a scrub with blue tanzanite in it would be like.  The scrub itself is fine granuled so great for the face, but additionally the formula has acids in it that exfoliate even more.  I feel like when I use this product it really exfoliates and I'm getting my money's worth.  Plus I like the packaging and the brand.

OK, let me get this out of the way: this smells awful.  To me, it smells like earthy Dimetapp, like a fake grapey scent mixed with dirt.  Yes, the smell has made me gag.  BUT.  This works better than any other mask I've ever used, and I'm a mask junkie.  This is unbelievable.  It leaves my skin so clear.  I had a really stubborn patch of acne on my cheek that had been there since January.  Nothing I used could get rid of it.  I used this mask for three nights straight, and by the third morning my cheek was totally clear.  This is some kind of miracle concoction.  Seriously amazing.

reviews.review_title: Loooooove this mask! Worth every penny!!
reviews.review_text: This mask is fantastic! I'm approaching 30 and have been obsessing over skincare the past year or so and have tried many different products and this has got to be my favorite! My skin looks SO GOOD while using this! I have normal/dry skin and this clears up any blemishes quickly, moisturizing, and making my skin look radiant! Love love love this! Absolutely will repurchase!

Good as a mask, better as a spot treatment. I would put this on a zit before bed, leave it on overnight. The zit will turn from like a painful red mark to a white head overnight which usually takes a couple of days. Great for speeding up the healing of zits!

I'm in love with this mask.  I have dry, fairly clear skin but with texture.  After using this mask, my skin is so smooth and results were noticeable within the first week.  I will repurchase over and over again but I don't foresee that happening anytime soon because a little goes a long way.

This stuff is the real deal. Even after one use, my acne scars and small bumps were noticeably smaller. My boyfriend used it and his fine lines decreased after one use. Now, my skin has drastically improved and this is the only thing I've changed in my skin care routine. I recommend it to everyone I know.

I will never live without this mask again. I have cystic acne and acne pigmentation on my combination/sensitive skin and after using this mask the first week I've already seen such a difference! The cystic zits I had immediately started to deflate, and after the 4th day in a row of using the mask even my boyfriend noticed how lessened my red acne pigmentation was. Im on week two (so only using weekly) and the 10 cystic zits I had at the start are now flat, and the mask is going to work on the remaining spots. Also- NO NEW ACNE! :) I didn't have trouble removing it as some people complained, but you're supposed to remove with a washcloth & I did that, so that may be why. Purchase, you will not regret it!

I've tried so many products over the last year that haven't helped my hormonal acne. Or have only helped for a little while. Within a week of using this mask my acne marks, and all my current breakouts reduced dramatically. I've never used a chemical face make before and now I'm hooked! I have very strict rules for ingredients in my skincare and this passes with flying colors. I've even started using it on my chest and shoulders/back, places where my acne is especially stubborn. The only thing to help it is the warm weather and the sun.   I'll continue to buy this. Yes it is expensive, but with the quality ingredients and how effective it is, it's made it so I haven't had to buy other products I was using on an almost daily basis.

This mask is so nice. You can really feel the cleaning effect it has! My skin looked clearer and less hyper-pigmented after one use. It applies clear on so it's very hard to tell if you're using enough but a very little does a long way. Definitely my new favourite mask

I got this as a sample. I have extremely oily, acne prone skin. I'm in my late 20's, and I love this mask. It helps even out my skin tone. I have also found that my other products seem to worth better in con junction with this because it helps open the pores. It's also one of the most gentle, but effective masks I've tried. I have not experienced drying or redness or irritation while using this masks.
Love this! Smells like you are at a spa, and leaves my skin feeling clean and smooth.

really amazing product! a little amount brightened my skin and the cooling effect which i looooove. people who is sensitive to smell might have to try in store first. little bit difficult to rinse off though.

I've never written a review before but feel like I had to for this. If you are on the fence - just buy it. It's that good. My dry, acne prone skin was cleared up after a few times of using this and it continues to look better with each use. It really leaves your skin soft and refreshed. The smell really doesn't bother me - it's almost minty and I love that it uses all natural products.

Strong smell, not too unpleasant. Texture is nice and refreshing. Makes skin soft, not dry. Tingles a bit so its working! Ordered it Feb 1st, it's April 24th and the blue has turned blue-green and has greener spots, looks like moss. I have use the spatula and cleaned it. Avoided contamination. Stored in a room temperature drawer. Disappointing shelf life, can't ask for miracle since it doesn't contain chemicals I guess.

This is a little medicinal smelling and it does tingle a little, but my skin is so smooth and soft afterwards. I love this mask. I am looking forward to see how this continues to benefit my skin when using it every 4 days.

I wanted to hate this stuff because of the subtle stench, but my deluxe sample is disappearing so here I am - writing a review before buying the fabulous full size.  My pores shrunk immediately! Then my acne and small bumps cleared up while fine lines smoothed out as my skin softened and continued to get better over the next 3 days.   I took a break on the 4th day and decided to put this mask off for a month... Big difference! Sooo glad the ingredients and the naturally gorgeous results go hand in hand with a relatively reasonable price.

Smell is amazing. Beautiful, simple packaging. Feels great on the skin wet to dry. End results are immediate. My pores are refined, skin is soft and has natural fresh-faced shine. I'm almost out of my first jar and look forward to purchasing again.

I received this in a sample size, free with purchase. I have problematic skin and occasional redness. This face mask is mid-level in terms of how gentle it is, yet effective. I wouldn't say it is for overly sensitive skin but it does wonders for those, like me, who break out constantly. Also, a little of the gel goes a long way! As mentioned, I didn't get the full size product but I have to imagine if I had, it would last at least a few months!

reviews.review_title: great bha/aha mix for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mask! I have sensitive/eczema prone skin that breaks out easily if it's irritated, but gentle exfoliation really evens my skin out. I've used this mask multiple nights in a row, and my face tolerates it just fine. Smoothes out skin texture well, and it speeds up pimples healing/clearing out clogged pores.

I've started to develop little bumps on my forehead and one cheek which I think are closed comedones. Through research, I discovered that you need chemical exfoliation to clear these up, and my clarisonic was never helping. I always prefer more natural products, so I gravitated to this brand immediately.   I've been using this mask now for several months and I LOVE IT. I love everything about it. The smell, the cooling sensation (and even the slight stinging I have when I first put it on... it feels like it's working). Most of all though, I love the results. I try to use it once a week but I will use it several days in a row to clear up any bumps/trouble spots. I always keep it on for at least 20 minutes and it never irritates my sensitive skin. When I rinse it off, my skin is less red and is very soft and smooth. There are antibacterial properties in this mask as well. It clears my skin of the bumps/texture and helps any active breakouts heal in a jiffy.   Well worth the money. Just repurchased and will do so over and over again.

I wish I could give this mask 10 more stars! I have semi-sensitive acne prone skin with a lot of redness - sounds harsh i know - so I was a bit skeptical when I purchased this mask. The mask did feel stinging and caused more redness when I first applied it, but the stinginess faded away fairly quick. I let it dry completely - only because I was doing other things and kinda forgot about it - then I washed it off. Then OMG! My skin was so soft and smooth, and the redness was mostly gone. My pores were tightened too! I couldn't be happier with the result and I'm definitely buying more in the future! The only two cons are:1. the smell is kinda strong and it lingers, but I do see why some people would like the smell. I personally am not a fan of it but can deal with it. 2. It's a bit hard to wash off after it dries out, but the residue can be wiped off by a soaked cotton pad. I love this mask and I've recommended it to all of my friends.

I'm not a believer in masks and anything more than cleansing and toning with the occasional face scrub but I gave this a try. Honestly- results after the first time I used it! And not just those I spent so much money on this it has to work results that you convince yourself of. It continued to get better every time I used it. The directions say to use it every day for the first week and then once a week or so. Do it! Follow the instructions. My skin was so smooth, clear (I had been inexplicably breaking out) and even toned, (NEVER before in my life had the redness on my cheeks been the same color as the rest of my face) it even shrunk my large pores. I feel like I'm giving away a secret here, I want to hoard it all for myself but I'm pretty sure they'd stop making it then haha.

Would give this 10 stars if I could. This is a staple exfoliating mask for me. Saw results immediately after rinsing it off. Skin was brighter, soooo smooth, and plump. Couldn't keep my hands off my face. It even got rid of a 2 very small patches of blackheads on my temple and cheek. When you apply it, you definitely feel it working. A cooling and tingly sensation. Definite repurchase.

Really helps to improve skin texture after a few uses! Stick with it & you will see improvements! The smell is strong in the jar, but I actually like how it smells on my face now. A definite repurchase for me; I love Herbivore products.

Finally found something that works on the little white bumps on my chin/cheeks. I broke out a bit for the first few days, but I figured that was everything coming to the surface because of the AHA. Around week two my skin was clearer and smoother. Good stuff!

I didn't notice any difference at first, but after about the 7th time of using it, I noticed a definite positive change in the texture and coloration of my skin! I didn't mind the smell, just keep in mind that this doesn't necessarily give immediate results.

I love this product! It does exactly what it says that it does. I was a little skeptical when I first put it on because of the texture--I wasn't sure how a gel mask would exfoliate and smooth. When I took the mask off my skin felt smooth and refreshed. It felt like I had a whole new face. I used it for 4 nights and saw a big difference in my breakouts and stubborn acne scars. Not gone, but definite improvement to color and size. I like the smell, though it takes a little getting used to. A little goes a long way. I don't have sensitive skin, but I found that repeated usage doesn't irritate my skin at all, even if I wear it a little longer than recommended. I look forward to seeing how much better my skin gets after continued use! The next mask I want to try is the Pineapple one by Herbivore. I'm happy that I discovered this brand and this product. Will repurchase when I'm finished.

I got this as a deluxe sample. I'm not a fan of face masks due to lazyness but I wanted to give them a chance again. I added this to my skincare routine and I'm honestly impressed with how nice your face feels and looks after the first week of use. I have severe flaky dry skin and this stuff made a difference. The smell is a bit strong but nothing unbearable. It would be nice if they sold this in smaller sizes but that's just me.

I've been wanting to try this for awhile and was thrilled when it was finally offered as a sample. I was not disappointed. I have oily skin that breaks out easy and when I received this I had several pimples/ red spots on my face (greasy baby hands are hard on skin folks). Tried it out and by morning It diminished the redness and the spots trying to pop up were gone! It is a little difficult to wash off and the smell is very similar to an astringent. After several uses I am positive this product is responsible for my clear and more radiant skin. I will be buying the full size once I run out!

I have pretty good skin (combination) but my skin is normally pretty clear and using this mask for the past week hasn't done much for my skin. I do like the tingling sensation after its been applied (seems like its doing a lot) but I don't see any crazy visible differences. The smell is not that appealing but its not too terrible. One con though... super hard to rinse off after leaving on for 20ish minutes. There is a thin layer of filmy material that I have to wash off for a good 2 minutes to get off.

I used this every other day for the first 5 days and then 2-3 times a week after that, and HOLY!!! my scars have noticeably faded and my skin has become so much smoother. It is very cleansing, non-irritating, and non-drying, which is amazing for my combination oily skin. My spots and pimples are slightly reduced the next morning, any reduction is a plus. The only downside is how long it takes to rinse off, but other than that this product has become a staple in my skincare regime. Definitely will be repurchasing.

This seems to be good at softening my skin and brightening my complexion, but the one thing about it that is a deal breaker is the awful smell!! It is very medicinal and I just can't handle it! Back it goes!
This definetly feels like it smoothes, brightens, cools and resurface my skin. I love how this mask makes my skin feel!

This wash-off mask has great clean ingredients and does a nice job exfoliating the skin without making my face feel too dry or tight. My dermatologist suggested putting it on once a week before the start of a shower, as the steam helps the fruit enzymes to be more effective. My follow-up routine (toner and moisturizer) always goes on more smoothly after having used this! Good stuff, Herbivore!

I rarely do reviews but it's a must to do so for this one!  My skin's normal to oily on a regular day but during my pre-menstrual week, I tend to suffer from intense breakouts, acne-like allergies & rosacea where everything stings and my face is as red as it can get. I used to stop all my products during that week and just use cleanser to make sure my skin's clean. (it stings!!)  It used to be a hopeless case but when I got into the the skin step regimen of Koreans, I learned so much and my friend introduced me to this product and said it's worth the hype. At first I was iffy because of the price since I didn't want to disappoint and worsen my skin as I already gave up on this a long time ago..  However, I read articles about blue tansy being high in azulene that's good for inflammations ++ and so I gave it a shot and can i just saw it was worth EVERY DOLLAR!  The smell overwhelmed me at first, but when I got used to it.. It's all good now. But wow, THIS IS A LIFE SAVER!!!  4 straight days of using (together with Foam Cleanser,Toner,Essence, Oil Treatments & Creams aka my normal regimen that I used to stop during the time of the month) and my irritated/itchy skin is as smooth as baby skin!!   It goes well with the Ordinary's Niacinamide serum too! My blemishes and redness subsided SO FAST!

This is the most effective, both short and long term, resurfacing mask that I've used. The smell was off-putting at first, but I got used to it. Other masks have started out effective and then tapered off, but I'm halfway through this jar and it still works just as well. Because of the natural ingredients, it turns from the vibrant cobalt to a blue green shade. I contacted Herbivore reps & continued using the product and confirmed that the product was still safe to use. Love it, no plans to stop using this!

It's so easy to use and brings results! I use it right after the shower and let it sit while I do the rest of my routine. It easily comes off with a towel.    My skin is sensitive, oily, acne, & pores. This helps to calm irritation and keep pores clear. It smells so good! I also pair it with the lapis oil :) I plan to purchase the moon fruit asap! These products do what they say!

I love this mask.  Since the first time I used it. I clild instantly see a more brightened complexion. I definitely think this mask is very gently; I used four nights in a row (as directed) while I was on Accutane and didn't experience adverse results. I think this, in addition to vitamin C products, has helped my post inflammatory hyperpigmentation lessen. This also immensely helped my skin texture! That's the biggest difference for me. I will continue to use and to repurchase. The smell is a little off, but it works!

This mask is incredible. I have to admit, i didn't really know what it was when i first tried it- i just kind of used it because i had it- but wow, after my first use i noticed my pore area was so much smoother and the pores themselves were a lot smaller. I have dry to dehydrated skin (especially in the t-zone) and this hydrates my skin so much i don't even put on moisturizer after. The smell is a bit strong, kind of sharp herbal scent, but it doesn't linger on the skin and it works so well i can get past it.

I've been trying all kinds of masks, lately, everything from Sephora brand to Tata Harper to Herbivore, and many more. Sephora brand masks are pleasant, not sure I notice a difference but because they are so wet and gloopy I need to lie down while applying the mask sheet and it forces me to rest. They also smell good. Tata Harper burned my face. SKII is fantastic. I also tried some more. But Herbivore Blue Tansy is my favorite. It smells incredible, minty and herbal, very aromatherapeutic. The mask makes my pores look smaller, skin look refreshed, without burning the way Tata Harper mask did. I imagine that if you don't love the fragrance you won't love this mask as the smell is very strong, but if you're like me you'll appreciate the smell and how well this masks work, even on older skin. I got this as a large sample (VIB) but this is probably the one mask I'm going to buy again and again.

I'm surprised no one has mentioned the antiseptic smell of this mask-it smells like rubbing toothpaste or mouthwash all over the face!! Aside from that, it did not irritate or break my sensitive skin out. Brightens, clears, smoothes skin. Four stars- not the greatest on the planet, but very good.

I exchanged the Good Genes Lactic Acid treatment for this mask yesterday. I found the GG too harsh and what I initially thought was purging turned out to be small pimples and one huge zit due to the highly pore clogging combo of Cetearyl Alcohol   Ceteareth 20. I used it for about a week. Needless to say I was annoyed and wasn't expecting much due to the mixed reviews here. I tried this mask last night for 20 minutes. I applied with a clean flat foundation brush in a thin layer and experienced some mild tingling, it easily came off with warm water and a damp wash cloth, the scent is medicinal, but nothing cloying. I followed with my serum and moisturizer. This morning I didn't experience a WOW factor, but when I did my makeup later in the day I actually was like WOW. GG left my skin parched and flakey. Today my skin is hydrated and smooth. My makeup felt like it glided on my skin. (After my usual morning routine of serum, moisturizer, primer and SPF) Before this mask it took forever to make my foundation look smooth and natural. Which is why I set off find something to help and ended up in a GG nightmare! I will take gentle and hydrating any day. BTW I have normal to dry, sensitive, acne prone skin. I'm no spring chicken either-- mid forties. I will continue to use this as directed. Happy masking!
This didn't do anything for my acne prone skin. It didn't break me out, but it definitely didn't help with anything.

I have sensitive, and oily skin on my t-zone, as well as horribly large pores on nose. This was able to clean out my pores and minimize them significantly without leaving my skin overly inflamed. It also helped clear up black heads. I did a bargain with this and I'm so happy it works!
This didn't do anything for my skin, I've been having issues with breakouts and was hoping that this would help with the texture and sadly it wasn't what I was looking for.
The mask is basically a mini chemical peel, it helped my blackheads, acne and my scars. I'm so glad I came past this, and the brand. They have great products.

reviews.review_title: I can't live without this stuff!
reviews.review_text: I have had super oily skin and texture on my face for about 10 years now. Just recently I started breaking out horribly and developed really large pores. I was so devastated by the sudden skin change that I decided to look into a good mask. I decided to try this stuff and I don't regret it at all! I've been using Blue Tansy for about two months now and have noticed a dramatic difference in my skin. My pores have gone back to their normal size, my breakouts are gone, the texture has greatly diminished, and for the first time in my life, I don't have oily skin! I will say though that the smell of this mask can be a little overwhelming if you are sensitive to strong odors. However, if that doesn't bother you, you will love Herbivore's Blue Tansy! If you have oily skin, BUY THIS NOW!!

My skin has never felt better or less oily! I have struggled with a terribly oily T zone forever (and I mean OILY). Not only did this show immediate result after 1 use, but my face remained smooth and glowing for all the right reasons through most of the day. I used it for 3 days as directed and took two days off. Skin is still less oily and smoother than it's ever been. A little goes a long way too. Basically, in love but have to return it because I just can't stand the smell. Like churns my stomach (and I'm not that picky when it comes to scented products) I'm still giving it 5 stars as smells are subjective and if it doesn't bother you, the actual results are incredible.

reviews.review_title: holy grail for oily acne prone skin
reviews.review_text: I hardly write reviews but this one deserves high praise in my books. I have oily, textured,large pore, cystic acne skin with rosacea. (Mouthful, I know) adding this to my skincare (which is extremely simple) was a game changer. It immediately calmed down my skin, prevented break outs, and decreased the look of my pores. I've tried using it every day and it's perfectly safe and never aggravated my rosacea. Now I really use it about 3 times a week. The smell is pretty herby but I don't have a problem with it especially after seeing the results. I owe my great skin to this beautiful blue creature. YOU DONT NEED A LOT!!!! A very thin layer, let sit for 20 minutes and gently wipe off with a washcloth & POOF!!! Beautiful skin. I will continue to purchase this forever.

This stuff instantly works!! I leave it on for a while and it never irritates my skin, causes break outs or anything!! After you wash it off, you can instantly see the glowing, soft, hydrated, even toned, non-dull skin you have! Your skin truly looks cleaner and more healthy after using this stuff!!! I have normal/dry non sensitive skin. I absolutely love how 100% clean this product is with amazing ingredients and that it actually works!! I love this line! HIGHLY RECOMMEND! Good price too!! Cheaper than other masks that don't work as well. And this masks works without using harmful chemicals! Just love it!! It's nice when an all natural product gives you instant good results. Will buy again.

I've had problems with texture and bumps on the skin. I've been using this for a couple months and my skin is so much smoother and I hardly have any bumps on my skin now. This is the best my skin has been in forever! Highly recommend

I had a very deep blackhead that was stuck, and no matter what I did, it would not pop out. I used this mask and I popped it out so easily. The smell is very herbal but does not bother you, I didn't experience any tingling.
It is definitely soothing and my skin does look brighter after I've used it. However, after finishing the whole bottle, I've not seen that much of a difference in my skin.

I have been using this for just over a week and it has done an amazing job reducing inflammation from hormonal acne that I have been struggling with for 8 months! Brightened my complexion and my face is soo much smoother. I did not expect such great results. Comes with a large spatula too. No complaints ... this will definitely become a staple of mine and I usually am one that likes to mix it up.

I use this once a week and my skin feels much softer and smoother afterwards. Makeup glides on better too. I would say the effects definitely last the day. It's a gel mask so it doesn't get hard and tight- just leave on for about 20 min and rinse off- simple.

After reading all the rave reviews I decided to give this product a try. I have combo (lately more so dry) skin with large pores, occasional break outs, texture and slightly uneven skin tone. I followed the instructions exactly, but honestly I've only noticed my skin being slightly brighter. Maybe this product needs more time to actually show its claimed effects? I've only used it for about 3 weeks, so I'll definitely finish the product and hopefully I'll see better results. I do wish it came with a spatula or in a tube rather than a jar. I just feel like it's easier to become contaminated and it's also awkward and messy to apply.
Love love love this mask. Smells so fresh and clean and makes your skin feel soft and renewed. This mask is a need!!

I decided to give this a try since I was looking for a new mask to help clear up my skin.  I love how my skin feels after using, smoother and more firm.  I definitely think it helps clear up blemishes quickly. Will definitely keep using!!
Started noticing texture on my skin. Purchases this mask and after one use I had smooth soft skin! pores were minimized and my face was bright. Will be repurchasing!

I have pretty problematic skin in my mid thirties and have gone through many different approaches to my skin to try and relieve it.  I have been wowed by this product in combination with the Tria Blue light.  something about the exfoliation of this product is perfect for my sensitive dry skin.  I have never taken well to harsh peels and am (of course) prone to breakouts if my skin barrier is messed with and this really strikes a balance.  I use it often and sparingly.  I also love the Lapis oil and the rose/coconut body polish is amazing.  I have been using it for years.  They have an excellent product line!

I had been researching a great mask for over 2 hours one night and came across this product. The name of it is what caught my attention, RESURFACING. This mask is AMAZING! I am of Indian decent and I have been desperately searching for a mask TNT would brighten, tighten, and fade scarring. This does all of those plus I am left with an even complexion and glow. I already raved about this on my social media plugs because EVERYONE NEEDS THIS MASK!

I've been using this mask regularly 2-3 times a week for about two months now and I can't say enough good things. It has visibly helped clear my post-30 acne and also dramatically helped fade old acne scars. I'm so glad I gave this a shot! Already purchasing it again now and can't see why I'd ever stop.

My skin started changing as i turned 30, being all kinds of dry/pimple/bumps/oily mess. It didnt matter what i tried, everything made my skin worse. Finally, i tried this product! ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!! Cleared my skin on the first try, and everytime after! Expensive, but forth every penny! Smells great and lasts a long time....

This has to be one of my favorite masks ever. I have a more normal skin type - prone to hormonal/cystic acne on my cheeks and jawline area. I tried a sample and it lasted me about 4 uses! It takes a very small amount, I overused one of first times and it took a while to get off. I use it almost every other day, leave it on for 20 minutes and rise off.  It seems pricey but for a natural brand that always gives me great results I have no issue with $48.  You definitely want to start with the 3 day routine and keep it up a few times a week. It is exfoliating BUT you will not feel physical exfoliation, maybe a slight tingle from the AHA/BHA for chemical exfoliation. I'm astounded at how long it has lasted with my frequency of use as well, another thing that makes me want to rebuy before I run out!

Ive been experiencing hormonal acne for the last six months (after making the decision to stop birth control). My forehead acne was worse than it was when I was a teenager. I tried all sorts of other medical grade skincare and nothing worked. Then I tried this on a whim and it changed everything! The red spots are gone and less acne pops up. I use it on my forehead every night. This is a miracle worker. Thank you thank you thank you!!
This does nothing. I used it everyday for 3 days like it recommends and then twice a week for a month. It does nothing. It doesn't even tingle or anything

I think I might've already done a review for this already ...can't remember . Anyway this mask is AMAZING. It has truly changed my life. I have slightly sensitive, super oily, acne prone skin. I've tied so many different masks, cleansers and nothing worked. But this! This is a miracle worker. My acne is waaay better than it was. I use this only at night and maybe 3-4 times a week. It doesn't try out my face, I personally like the smell of it, and it's very easy to apply. I even emailed the company and told them how much I loved it. I'm glad I've found something that actually works for me. I will definitely be repurchasing !

I wanted to love this mask but there's really nothing about it that is rave worthy. I will say that I use a gentle bha liquid exfoliant daily in my nighttime skincare routine so maybe that's why I didn't notice any results. But if that is the case then this product is not any stronger than a daily exfoliator, which takes a long time to begin seeing positive results. So, for the price tag and the gimmicky claims, this face mask is a rip off. The smell doesn't bother me all that much, but cleaning it off is like cleaning off a slippery slime. And I can't even say that my skin feels softer afterwards. I will be using it up because I paid $48 for it, but honestly, every time I put it on my face I feel like I'm wasting my time.

reviews.review_title: if you're allergic to AHA BHA AVOID
reviews.review_text: It isn't the miracle worker everyone seems to have an experience with. Cause a dry spot in my nose to get worse and didnt help with exfoliating. Might as well stick with the glow tonic

This product did nothing for my face. I also tried the bar soap from Herbivore with also raving reviews. Both did nothing, actually the bar soap made my skin worse and more dehydrated even though I bought the pink soothing one. I've tried lots of masks. I've never tried one that absolutely NOTHING for my skin. I've used it for days in a row like suggested - nothing. Overpriced. I even have afeeling maybe some of these reviews are fake like they do with new brandnames.

I've been getting facials and peels for over 6 months in preparation for my wedding. I bought this mask early January and I'm so disappointed that I didn't find it sooner! My skin looks INCREDIBLE and completely blemish free! I'm so impressed! I went in for my monthly facial and she ranted and raved about how much my skin had improved since my last facial... well, it's because of this!!

I have a lot of masks. I mean A LOT. I have this one, 6 different GlamGlow masks, the Boscia black mask, 3 masks from Fresh and a plethora of sheet masks and peels. THIS ONE IS THE BEST. By far. It clears up my skin without ever drying it out, evens skin tone and fades my annoying red spots and it actually feels nice and cooling while it's on. Plus it's not even as expensive as GlamGlow. Do yourself a favor and buy it.

Love everything from this brand, this is in my top two favourite items. Makes my skin very soft! Smells wonderful! The size is good for the price I was expecting a little more but I've had it for around a month now using 2x a week and I still have more then half the jar! Only complaint is they don't restock it fast enough. I've been wanting to get another one but it's never in stock!

reviews.review_title: happy with the results so far
reviews.review_text: I've used this product as instructed (4 days in a row then 2x per week) for about a month and have noticed my complexion has evened out with minimization of dark spots and overall more even texture and color. My skin is soft and looks bright. I am overall happy with the results of this product and will continue using.

I'm always skeptical about how well a product will work for me vs other people who's skin seems to be more accepting to beauty treatments, but this is all that it promises to be. I did the first 4 consecutive uses and then a couple more times staggered and could already see a difference in two weeks. I always have acne scars (and some pretty serious ones on my cheeks right now) and little random blemishes all over that just don't give me an even complexion. This resurfacing mask really did its job and it did it quickly. My skin tone already looks more even, I haven't broken out again since using it, my acne scars are lightening, and my face altogether just looks brighter and more hydrated, I don't even have to use as much concealer as I used to. I can't say enough about how amazing the Blue Tansy mask is. And like it couldn't get good enough, the stuff lasts quite a long time, it barely takes any to adequately coat your face. The smell is also very refreshing. Seriously, this mask is COMPLETELY worth it!

Skin type: oily, adult acne  It smells meh but since you only leave it on for 15-20min I don't mind it I love the tightness feeling when it dries And the relieving moment when you wash it off with a warm washcloth. I did notice a difference in my skin texture like my little bumps went away by the 2nd time I used it. I bought this when there was 2x the points and wasn't sure I'd keep it but definitely keeping it now since it's a lot of product and you only use a little anyway. Loveeee this stuff (:

26 - Normal/Dry skin - Acne marks When I first used it, I didn't get what it did because it didn't fade my marks. But the next week I didn't use it and only used my brightening serums and my acne marks faded more than they ever had before! It resurfaced the skin so the serums sank in better and my skin began to heal again. That's how I'm using it, if you want brightening only you should try lactic acid or alpha arbutin, those work well for me to fade pigmentation and marks.

I have always battled oily and blemished skin, but throughout this winter I've experienced a ton of dry, flaky skin, with periods of my usual oilyness. I've only just started using this (they recommend using 4 days in a row then 3-4x a week); I've now used it a total of 5 times and am getting endless compliments on how glowing my skin is. I'm HOOKED. It's a little tingling to start but then goes away (I don't have sensitive skin). Goes on as a clear gel. Would recommend this mask over + over + over again!

this stuff is incredible. i was skeptical at first, because apparently i have sensitive skin and lots of products don't work right with my skin. but not this. IMMEDIATELY after rinsing off the mask (and following with the herbivore phenix oil as recommended), i noticed a difference in my skin's redness - and the difference lasted afterwards too. i will definitely keep using this stuff. i'm just a little annoyed that i read this product came with a spatula, but my box did not. if you're buying in-store, be sure to check that yours has the spatula. would have made it easier/more hygienic to apply. i'm buying a mask spatula now, as i type this review.

I was hesitant to spend this kind of money on a mask, but gave it a go after reading the reviews. I'm so glad I did!! This is honestly the best mask I have ever used in terms of actually making a difference in my skin. I don't love the scent---it's not unbearable, but very floral. Regardless, I will never stop using this product. After 2 uses, my skin tone looks more even and redness from rosacea has already improved. I can't believe my eyes! Worth every penny!

I have been searching high and low for years for a product that would help me clear my acne prone skin, and I finally found it in this product!! I am truly in love with Herbivore's Blue Tansy. I have been struggling with acne for years trying anything and everything to get rid of it. I started using this product about two weeks ago and I already have seen a major improvement. I have very sensitive skin as well.This product does not bother my skin one bit! I love that it is so natural, and the smell is wonderful. I can not wait to use other products from Herbivore. They have turned me into a loyal costumer of theirs!

I purchased this after reading all the rave reviews. Let me start by saying that I REALLY tried to love this product. I waited to write this review until I finished the entire jar. I have combination skin with pretty extreme hormonal breakouts lately. I wasn't expecting a miracle by any means but I was expecting some sort of result. The consistency and smell were nice enough and I love that they included a spatula so you did not contaminate the product over repeated uses. I just found that it literally did nothing....the next morning I was still broken out, my redness didn't go down and my skin wasn't any softer or brighter than the night before. After prolonged use, I still did not find this to be an effective treatment. Glad I tried it, but I would not recommend to those who may have more complicated acne.

I went in sephora and got a sample. The two times that I've used it, I woke up with my pimples completely vanished and smooth skin. I was not expecting this product to be that good. We'll worth the price.

I have never written a review on Sephora but I felt like I needed to for Herbivore's products. I have had no so great skin since I was a teenager. Sensitive, prone to break outs, uneven ect. This line and this product has changed that. I use this every other night, followed by the Lapis oil and all I can say is wow. In a decade of trying to find the right skin care my face has never looked so good and acne free. If you have acne prone and sensitive skin and have been searching for a product that will help give this a try.

This stuff is so fun! It smells and feels like I'm putting not-quite-ready jello on my face. There's a bit of a sharpness to the scent at first, but once it's on, all I smell is yummy blue jello.  I don't have major skin concerns on my face aside from it being dry, so I can't say I've seen anything drastic at this point. But it feels great and as many others have said, this little jar is going to last me forever!

I've been using this for 6 weeks, but granted almost every other day.  I didn't notice too much of difference because it's such a slow and gradual process. However, my friends and family did.  I haven't seen them in months and they all complimented how bright and clear my complexion has become. For $48, it's a great product.

This product is truly amazing! I have been using it for the last three days and my skin is glowing. It gently has been removing my dead skin every night. After removing the product, my skin is left with a bluish tint and looking kinda chalky (so dont apply immediately before going out, wait at least a few hours before and then you start to shed.) I have not been wearing foundation or BB cream for the last few days, which is a first! This means I am saving some time getting ready for work in the morning too. I can definitely see why this stuff is too harsh if you have VERY fair sensitive skin though...

I hardly ever write reviews and if I do, it's either because I feel strongly for or against it. For this mask, I LOVE it. I highly recommend it to anyone. My nose is very bumpy and this mask cleared it up after one use. They suggest using it for a few days in a row starting out so I can't wait to see what my skin does!

This mask has helped my mild acne and scars! The smell is slightly medicinal but honestly fine. Every time I have a bad skin day I use this and can see my skin improve. I definitely recommend if you have mild acne and need overall brightening :) It's especially good to use around my time of the month when my skin is hormonally freaking out.

This is one of those many products where some love the smell and some don't. Personally I think it's fantastic. Fresh, earthy and healthy. The product is likewise great. Highly recommend it, the Jasmine oil (amazing), Moon Fruit (favorite facial product ever, have been wearing night and day- incredible under BB stick foundation), and the Phoenix and Orchid face oils. Could die happy smelling orchid every minute!! Highly recommend this line.

I have combo/oily skin very minimal on the oily but I have been breaking out around my mouth and tried a MILLION things and spent a lot of money trying to find this. I purchased this along with the Lapis Oil and Rose Spray form Herbivore. I have been using all those 3 in combination for about 2 weeks now and my skin is on the way to looking amazing! The overall texture of my skin looks better and I have had no break outs since and the ones I did have are clearing up almost gone. I am telling you buy this if you are not sure. AND even better a little goes a long way. Barley made a dent in these products.

reviews.review_title: Clears skin of all and ANY imperfections
reviews.review_text: Not only does this work within 3-4 days to clear up any acne or small pimples you might have it even improves the over all physical texture of your skin. My looks brighter, clearer and smoother. The smell however is absolutely vile. I have to breathe through my mouth while I apply it so I don't throw up - yes it's that bad. It's a good thing it works so well - the smell has me wanting to return it until I saw how incredible the benefits of it are.

reviews.review_title: The best mask for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is super sensitive to exfoliants-- even toners that are supposed to be gentle enough for twice daily use dry out and irritate my skin. This is one of the few products that is strong enough to clean out my pores and doesn't cause me to break out in irritated red bumps on my extra sensitive cheeks.   When an eye cream gave my milia in the tear troughs under my eyes recently, I even started using this for a few minutes on the affected area and it's really helped to reduce the bumps! (Obviously this isn't recommended, just happened to work for me).   Love this mask and will definitely repurchase!

With the new year I thought about a new skin care regimen. I did research on different products and came across this one. Since the first day of use I could see the difference on my skins appearance. The smell isn't too bad when you apply it on your face. It drys clear. I didnt get any tingling sensation when I applied it. A little goes a long way. The jar will last a long time. Great product.

You definitely have to get past the smell (and that's coming from someone who loves heavily scented products and never has a problem with cosmetic smells) but once you do this is a fantastic mask! First of all I love the colour. Sadly it doesn't stay on your face when applied haha. But this is amazing for when I feel like new breakouts are coming on, or when I get home from a long day out and my skin feels clogged. I just apply this and take it off with a warm wash cloth like the instructions say and my skin glows afterwards. It also significantly reduces any redness and the severity of any blemishes. I thought it was a little pricey going in, but it's so worth the money.

If you're debating whether to buy this or not, buy it!! I have combination and very sensitive skin. This stuff is the bomb! I have to stop myself from over indulging in this because it's just that good. It helps clear up any breakouts within a day, and makes my face feel amazing afterward.
I've been dealing with terrible cystic acne, for the past few months and this is the only thing I've used that has made a noticeable difference I am absolutely in love .
The only thing that keeps my skin clear!

I'll start off by saying that I have pretty good skin overall, except for a couple small sun spots and the occasional breakout. I am a mask junkie, especially when the ingredients are all pure and natural so I knew I had to try this mask! I have been using it every day for three days since I got it and WOW. My skin has never felt smoother! I have also been wearing makeup during the day every day and usually this irritates my skin and causes me to get all bumpy. I am happy to say that this mask has prevented any breakouts despite continuous wear of makeup. I think my dark spots may be getting lighter too, but its hard to say. The mask smells very nice, and a little goes a LONG way. I apply a thin layer as instructed and it doesn't even look like I have used any of the mask yet. Definitely worth the price! Do yourself a favor, and GET IT!
The first time I used it, my skin felt soooo soft. And when I woke up, the dry patches I'd been trying to get rid of for weeks were GONE! AMAZING!!!!!

This is truly an incredible product.  It's a gel texture.  The color is blue but looks clear on your face when applied.  The smell is menthol/ floral/ green. It's definitely a interesting smell. Kinda hard to describe. It didn't bother me at all as some of the other reviews had me thinking it was going to smell horrendous.  It feels very cooling and tingling. I didn't experience any burning or eye watering.  A little goes a long way.  You put it on for 15-20 mins until it drys. It didn't tighten or crack on my skin. It was a pleasant mask to wear.   My skin looked immediately smoother, firmer and brighter after the first use. The next day I used it again and the result were the same but better. I will continue to use this frequently for another few days then use it once or twice a week.  I didn't notice any issues with peeling or drying out my skin which was one of my concerns that usually happen if I use a AHA or BHA product. Instead my makeup went on smoother and my overall skin looked nice and healthy. I look forward to see the results continue.
I bought this product because the glamglow super mud mask was sold out and I'm so happy it was!! in my opinion this mask is better than that! you won't be disappointed :)

I love this.  I just finished day 4 of the instructions to use 4 days in a row initially and then 2x a week.  I can see such a difference.  I have been trying to get rid of some acne scars and the discoloration is nearly gone after the first 4 days!  I'm so excited to continue using this.  I didn't get much of a tingle, but my skin is not at all sensitive and can handle pretty much anything I put on it.  I used a round sponge that came with another kit from a different brand and it comes off easily.  Definitely recommend it!

This mask is AMAZING.  I have combination skin that has been very acne-prone the last year. I get a lot of red, under-the-skin bumps on my cheeks and jaws. This is the only mask I've ever used that when I put it on during a bad breakout, it calms my skin back down. The consistency is a slightly runny gel, which I really like, and a little goes a very long way. As the mask dries, it makes your skin feel tight and after I wash it off, my skin feels nice and firm too.  I use a warm washcloth to rinse it off after and my skin is less red, the bumps are much smaller, and my skin feel super soft. When I wake up the next morning, my skin is glowy and smooth.  This mask has become my go-to for when I'm having a bad breakout or when my skin is tired and looks dull or feels dry and bumpy. I will definitely be repurchasing this and also looking into the other products in this line.

I've only used it once and can already see results! My skin is quite sensitive so the mask tingled a lot but didn't cause any redness. My skin was so soft after rinsing. Another plus is a little bit goes a long way so I can see this lasting a while.

This is literally my first review ever! I cannot say enough good things about this mask! I have oily skin, large pores and I ever skin tone. I get pimples every so often that end up leaving dark marks on my face. Using this mask as directed my skin feels and looks so smooth! I have left the house with no foundation, no bb cream, NOTHING! The smell for me is a little overwhelming, but it goes away after having the mask on for a little bit. It has not irritated my skin and there is no purging! I new staple in my skin care routine!
I never write reviews, but couldn't resist this time. This product is amazing. After using this mask for a week, my skin is brightened, black heads are gone, and pores are reduced. Love it!

This mask is really exceptional. It has evened out the texture of my chin in 3 days. The product itself is a watery-gel consistency that is easy to apply, and this size jar will last quite a long time.

Definitely worth the price. This is my third day using the product and I've noticed a significant positive change. My skin tone is evening out, the acne is fading, and my skin feels smoother than it has felt in years. The smell is not super overwhelming. I'd definitely try it out if you're wondering. Worst case, you return it if it doesn't work for you!

I've always had great skin.  I maybe had 3 major breakouts my whole life but they did not last very long.  Since October last year, I started getting cystic acne along my jaw line and neck area.  I believe it's hormonal but am getting frustrated as none of my usual stuff worked on me.  I was using Good Genes and Luna which normally would help rid of my pimples overnight.    I purchased Blue Tansy based on reviews and ingredients.  I used it for 4 days straight as instructed.  After 4 days, my skin was glowing, cystic acne diminished and small bumps on my jaw line visibly reduced as well. I am so in love with this mask!  Will purchase this mask forever!!!

This masks works wonders. First off, I was pleasantly surprised at the texture. It's not thick or goopy, almost a water-like texture. You don't need a lot so the jar will last quite a while, It does come with a spatula for cleaner application.  The slightest tingling and cooling sensation is felt upon first application but quickly fades. I can easily leave it on for an hour with no issues, 15-20mins is recommended. It does not crack or dry out the skin - it does dry down so you can do things around the house while you have it on.  The main ingredient is blue tansy, and that is what it smells like. If you have ever smelled Sunday Riley's Luna oil this smells pretty similar.  I was having some pretty bad breakouts and this was a big stepping stone on helping heal the acne and also resurface any old acne scarring. It's moisturizing but not overkill for my super oily skin.  If you have combo-oily, acne prone and sensitive skin, I would give this a shot. The ingredient deck alone is impressive with no added colors, animal by-products, parabens, flower extracts, etc. The company is cruelty free as well. Highly recommend.
This is the holy grail mask. Lasts a lifetime and after 4 days has already drastically reduced hyperpigmentation from y

This is my first week using this but i can already notice significant results. It says to use for 3-4 days straight at first then once a week or so. Ive used it 4 days straight and my skin looks so much better. I was struggling with a breakout that wouldnt go away but it is all clearing up now. I do not notice any irritation with this product. Gentle but effective.

I have moderate acne, but severe scarring. I have to wear makeup every day to feel good about my skin. I have spent thousands of dollars trying to achieve clear skin again. I read all these amazing reviews but was skeptical seeing as how I have been doing facials and chemical peels and still have scars. How could this be any better? Well it is. I am one night into using it and 50% of the scarring is gone. And the pimples that wouldn't head have cone to a head and are disappearing. If you struggle with acne and scars get this. It will change your life.

Day 1: Blackheads on my nose diminished and pores were slightly smaller Day 2: Purge began. 1-2 spots that would constantly reappear in the past year came to a head and washed off the next morning Day 3: Blackheads 90% gone, skin appeared firmer and acne pigmentation improved significantly Day 4: skin looks 10x better than day 1.. near flawless. AMAZING
I used as instructed 4 times in a row then twice absolutely seen no difference. It also stinks like bengay. I could get over smell if actually worked. Wish it was miracle mask

reviews.review_title: completely transformed my skin after the purge
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this. It made the biggest difference in my textured skin. I have a lot of uneven texture, fine lines and pock marks (even tho I'm only 17) and it has always made me too insecure to not wear makeup. This mask, being a cell-turnover mask completely transformed my skin. It's so clear now. It's smooth in texture and it also helps with breakouts. I have extremely sensitive skin and this worked for me . BE CAREFUL IT DOES MAKE YOUR SKIN PURGE. Most products that are cell turnover or renewal masks have AHA and BHA which are known to cause purging. So don't be too worried if you get a few spots after trying this. I was concerned I wouldn't be able to tell if my skin was breaking out or purging from trying it ...the biggest giveaway is the purging will stop within 1-2 weeks usually. It also didn't give me blemishes in places I usually don't which if I was that's a sign of breaking out. This has become my favourite skin care product and I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to improve texture and clarity

This mask is so worth the price. Instantly evened out my skintone after leaving it applied for 20 minutes. My face feels very smooth and even lifted in a way. You definitely can feel the mask in action, which I loved, and a little goes a long way!  I followed it up by using the ceramidin liquid and cream from Dr. Jartt  and the result is sooo good. My skin is literally glowing!

I've been eyeing this mask for a while and finally took the plunge and I'm so glad I did. I have combination skin with redness that isn't particularly sensitive and this mask worked wonders for me. After the first use I washed it off and was amazed at how instantly even my skin looked. My skin was incredibly soft and literally glowing.   Now for the downsides: the smell is truly awful to me but I don't find it too bad when actually applied to the skin. This mask also didn't do much for the pores on my nose and chin. My cheeks and forehead look amazing but it didn't help with those pore problem areas.  All in all, I think this is a great mask and absolutely worth the money if you love masking and/or are looking for something to even skin tone. Doesn't sting harshly (but you can feel it working) and it isn't too drying (I still recommend a sleep mask on nights you use it but I don't find that it gives me dry patches like some treatments do).

reviews.review_title: Life Saver - I feel pretty again
reviews.review_text: I'm 26 years old - have had flawless clear skin my whole life until 6 months ago when I started getting really bad acne all over my face. Still don't really know what had caused it but it finally began to clear up. Only problem is I now have red marks all over my face from the blemishes.  This is the only product that has managed to diminish the appearance of the red marks on my face.  I'm actually amazed. I have used the mask for 4 days now, and will be continuing to apply it 2-3 times a week as suggested.  Worth every penny.

This mask instantly makes my skin look better. After removing it my skin is clearer and more even. It calms skin and diminishes pimples. It just makes your skin clearer and it's as simple as that. No other mask has had this instant effect and I'm a mask junkie.   I hiiiighly recommend this product. And I think it smells great!
I'm really shocked at all the good reviews. I used the mask as instructed. I noticed absolutely no difference, and certainly not $48 worth. Returning.

reviews.review_title: My best skin purchase in a long time
reviews.review_text: Overall, I'm extremely pleased with this mask and suspect I will repurchase when it runs out. Some general impressions:  --The aroma upon first opening it is absolutely overwhelming. It struck me as an almost bubblegum or tutti frutti scent. When I first opened the jar and removed the liner disk I got just the tiniest bit on my fingertips and it CLUNG. However. once I actually got to using it on my face, a thin layer reveals that fragrance to be a pretty, pleasant jasmine scent. It's actually quite pretty once you get past the initial surprise.   --Yes, it's blue. This may or may not matter to you, but I think it's a plus! It applies almost fully clear with a slightly blue cast.   --It has a really pleasant cooling sensation when applied. It's surprisingly refreshing, and does leave the impression that it's actively doing something to your skin without any burning.   --I have had adult acne around my jawline on and off for a few years. I've got some scaring from it, and a few spots that were never quite clear even on good days. This mask seems to have drawn those outu2014it's rather remarkable actually. I haven't had it for long, but it works better than anything I've used.
