I'm using the mask in conjunction with the Herbivore Lapis Oil, which is also great, but the mask is definitely the more active-seeming of the two.  --As other reviewers have noted, the results are indeed temporary--I went away for a couple of weeks after I'd started using it and my skin did regress some. That said, I'm happy to use it on an ongoing basis, it's worth making part of a regimen.

reviews.review_title: Clears Away all the ick on my Face
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and then bought the full size. It is cooling and smooth when you apply it. It does tend to have a bit of a sting for me, but nothing unbearable. Maybe people review that it doesn't work because it doesn't dry or really BURN as some masks can. This stuff has made my aging, yet still breaking out skin clearer and more even. I have less hormonal flares up than I usually do. I highly recommend this mask for any temperamental skin types.

I was very excited to try this product out because it was from a brand with more natural products, and there were a lot of positive reviews out there. I have combo sensitive very acne prone skin, so i thought this would be perfect to help with the acne. The first night i tried this out i was so turned off by the smell that i took it off. I am not normally one to have smells bother me at all, but this took it to another level. Any time i would walk around with it on I would catch a whiff of the smell and be close to gagging. I am not trying to sound dramatic, i have no idea what was in this but i couldnt stomach the smell long enough to see the benefits. Returned it.

I have severe eczema on my lower cheeks that has always made me extremely self conscious, and also makes me prone to dark marks and scarring from acne.After the first use of this mask, the redness had already significantly decreased and my skin already feels softer. As someone with extremely sensitive skin, this product is gentle enough to not irritate but powerful enough to make a significant change. The smell is very strong initially, however it becomes less noticeable with use and is pleasantly herbal.

I bought this after getting a sample in store and out the full size a week later. I happen to find the scent very pleasant and the textures. I have acne prone skin that has completely cleared up in the three months that I've been using this mask 3 times a week. For someone that had constant acne from age 13-26 I was willing to pay anything that would take it away (with out destroying my liver) and honestly a little goes a long way
I usually don't like frangranced skin care items but I love the smell of this mask. It leaves my skin smooth and soft. I will repurchase

reviews.review_title: Don't let the price stop you
reviews.review_text: I get dark spots from any kind of acne (hormonal/cystic & whiteheads) and it's gotten worse as I've gotten into my late 20s. The redness sticks around for months and I kind of accepted that nothing would change it. But wow. I never thought that a mask would make such a visible difference in my skin, so quickly. Even my boyfriend noticed, so I know it wasn't all in my head!  Based on the reviews I made this splurge. I wanted to try more natural products and having a holiday coupon helped. I used it about every night for a week like the directions say, and then 2-3 times a week after that. The mask is a gel-like consistency and it doesn't take a lot to cover my entire face in a thin layer. This product is a good value for how many uses I'll get out of it for sure.   This is now a must-have for me. I follow it up with rosehip seed oil to help with hyper-pigmentation and it's a winning combo.

I am a skin care junkie and this mask is one of the best that I have ever tried. It helps deal with acne, congested pores and dark spots. Plus it makes your skin smooth and glowing. Literally does everything. I hate the smell. It didn't bother me at first but the more I use it the more I hate it but it's TOTALLY worth putting up with the smell for the results.

Never written a review before, but I've been using this for four days (doing what they suggest of every day for the first 3-4 days for 20 minutes and then a few times a week), and I already see a drastic difference!  I have fairly sensitive skin and it gets red insanely easy and doesn't go away for a while (hot showers, harsh face products, literally being too close to a heater). However, after just the first use of this, I instantly noticed a difference!! It feels a little intense when you first put it on for the first few minutes (slight stinging almost?) so I expected my face to be patchy and red when I washed it off. Instead it was smoother and there was just the faintest tint of red along my cheeks! It was amazing!  After using it for four days my redness has basically gone, and I notice it doesn't show up in my everyday life also!! I definitely notice it seems smoother too and more even. All in all this is fantastic and I can't wait to continue to use it!  May seem a little pricey but you don't have to use much for the thin layer they want and there's a lot packed into it.

This is going to be a staple moving forward. I get pigmentation from acne and this dramatically helps fade the spots overnight. Continuous use and my skin is heading towards clarity. Highly recommend! I've used the lapis oil and facial mist from this brand before this mask and love both of those items too. This brand should be in the Sephora stores as it is truly a great skincare line. Don't be afraid of the online only and do yourself a favor and order from this brand!

I feel for the few who found this mask 'did nothing', because I can't believe how perfecting this mask is!  Definitely start by using the mask 3-times-in-5-days, recommended course.  I have tonnes of masks (thanks Sephora) and this stands out.  After two months, I gotta buy a new one.

I like to do a different mask every night and this is the one I've reached for the most! I like to change it up depending on how my skins looking that day and this one is definitely a keeper. It smells awesome and I'm for sure ordering more herbivore products to try out! It also lasts pretty long. I've had it for a few months and I'm not even half way through it.

I put off buying this for a while because of the hefty price tag... but WOW was it ever worth it!! In just 3 days so far it has been amazing! It helped shrink my acne, it has helped dramatically improve the look of my acne scars... my skin feels so soft and plump after using this. I really love this mask. The smell is strong but the benefits are amazing. I will definitely repurchase this! Although I don't think I'll run out for a while!

I was so hesitant to buy the mask but thank goodness I did! I love that it clears out my pores and minimizes their appearance while not being super harsh on my skin. I used it just like it said for four consecutive nights and then I use it about twice a week - and I have never had better skin. I will always make sure to have a jar of this on hand!

This mask is amazing! It does everything that it claims; clarifying and resurfacing the skin.   As this mask clarifies the skin, your face is expected to purge, which is what mine did. However, the instructions that came with the mask were to use it consecutively for four days proceeding the first time you use it, which I did. The results are simply amazing, my skin was sooo smooth and some of the scars that I got from previous breakouts were diminished significantly!  I definitely recommend this!

This product works so well!! I can see a visible difference in reducing the visibility of my pores and has cleared the spots on my skin whenever I use the mask.   You can feel the product working due to its tingle, has a strong smell but it is not unbearable.

I live in the northeast of the United States where we're currently experiencing a pretty harsh winter. I was skeptical about using a chemical peel during the winter on my dryer skin, but after leaving this mask on for about 20 minutes after getting out of the shower, I was pleasantly surprised to find that my skin didn't feel tight or dry at all! I followed with the Rose Face Mask from Fresh and I swear I've never had more glowing skin in my life. I also struggle with some congested pores on my nose and forehead but after using this product I have seen this symptom decrease after one use. This mask is a must have and I will definitely be keeping it a part of my regimen for years to come.

I've heard a lot of things about this mask. I first took notice of the NEGATIVE reviews: irritating, smelly, temporary results, no change to skin, etc.   Despite the negative comments, I bought the mask to try it out.   My skin is SUPER dry, and I've always had red blotches here and there. I don't struggle with acne, but I get the occasional pimple and my pores also get clogged with white heads.   This is my second night using the mask, and I plan to use it in accordance with the instructions. The container and packaging are really luxurious, which is super nice. The actual product is an interesting blue color, super slimy, so be careful when you open the lid and find its really gooey substance.   The mask goes on clear, and it smells like strong mint. I don't think the smell is unpleasant, but I don't know that it smells great. It's okay, smell-wise. I leave it on 20 minutes, it dries (mostly), and I rinse it off with a pair of exfoliating gloves and warm water.    After using this my skin feels WONDERFUL. It's soft, smooth, cool, and it lasts into the next day. I used a Lancu00f4me toner and moisturizer right after. In the morning, my skin was ready for makeup! And my foundation looks so much better with a smooth surface to work with. I think I found a great product, along with most everyone else.   If you're apprehensive about this product, I'd say give it a try. You might just fall in love.

I did not expect this product to work as well as it did considering the highly natural IL. I am very impressed! I used it two days in a row (leading up to new years) and my skin is feeling amazing!   My primary note is make sure you hydrate very well after otherwise your sin will get tight. I used it 2 days in a row safely but would not recommend a 3rd based on my skin today. It feels a looks lovely but I can tell by the slight dryness one more day would not be great.  So happy I bought this my skin's texture is so smooth, no roughness and so bright. I also like the sticky thick application cause I'm weird like that.  BUY AND ENJOY!
This mask is great! You can see a brighter complexion in just one use. I've been using once a week and see a major difference!

I have combo acne-prone skin with some redness. This mask has completely transformed my face. Upon removal, my skin is noticeably less red and I have noticed a HUGE reduction in my breakouts. My skin feels super soft afterwards and looks very fresh. This is a little pricey, but it is a MUST-HAVE for your skin care regimen. Highly recommend.

I don't say this lightly: this mask is truly the Holy Grail. I have oily skin with really stubborn acne (both cystic and surface blemishes), and I've tried every spot treatment and clarifying mask you can think of in an effort to keep it at bay. Out of everything I've used, this mask has been far and away the most effective, and immediately became a staple in my skincare regimen. It cleared up my acne in about a month, and has worked wonders fading my post acne dark spots. I can honestly say this is the best my skin has ever looked, and this mask gets all the credit. Buy it right now, you won't regret it.

I can't tell you how many products I've read reviews for saying they're the ultimate holy grail, only to been at best disappointed, and at worst even more broken out. I'm oily/normal, very sensitive, and so acne prone that I haven't /not/ been in the midst of a break out in years. Enter Herbivore. I didn't have the instant results some reviewers here have had, but I've been using it every other day for about a month now, and my skin is utterly unrecognizable. I still have the occasional face demon, and still have a long career of scars to work out, but at least to me, the difference is so dramatic. Skin is smoother, calmer, less red, scars are vanishing (must also give partial credit to Tarte Maracuja Oil for that, however), and surviving the winter dryness much more gracefully than usual. Buy this. Love it.

I've used this 3 times and already my pores are noticeable smaller, my face is super soft and my skin looks clearer. I have found AHA/ABA products really make a different with my acne prone/scarred skin and this will definitely be a staple in my nighttime routine a couple nights a week

I rarely find a product I try and immediately review, but it's been 30 minutes and I'm dying to rave about it!  I've suffered from redness for so long, and have tried many different things to alleviate my Rosey cheeks. FINALLY something worked! The mask was pleasant to wear, no stinging I couldn't handle. After 20 minutes I washed off and did a double take on how even my skin tone was! If it keeps working, I'll definitely repurchase.

I love this mask! The results speak for themselves. I use this before bed twice a week and when I wake up, my skin is clear and bright and very soft. The results continue as long as you use the mask. I went on a week-long trip and didn't bring this, and when I got back, my face wasn't in as good shape as it was when I left.   I think I've had my jar for about two months and even at twice-weekly usage, I've still barely made a dent. It has quite an herbal scent and the texture is a very runny, smooth gel that spreads very easily - you get better results, I think, by using a thin layer. It can be a little difficult to wash off (make sure you follow the instructions and use a wet cloth to remove, otherwise you'll be standing over the sink for ages). The first two or so times I used it, it slightly burned my sensitive skin upon application but now it's fine.   Overall, I definitely think this is a good buy for the money. It seems to be lasting me a long time and the results are excellent - just be sure to continue to buy this as you run out, otherwise the results won't last!

I'm obsessed with exfoliation so I thought this would be a little superfluous but after trying a sample I immediately purchased the full size. My skin is so soft and bright after using this, it's ridiculous. Definitely a weekly staple.

reviews.review_title: love everything about it I love
reviews.review_text: Obsessed !!! Love love love this brand

I actually love this product. Okay so I have normal skin.. not oily I may get a TAD dry in the winter but nothing crazy nothing that bothers me. I have clear/smooth skin for the most part and only get hormonal breakouts on my chin occasionally. Even so I know how good my skin is but I KNOW HOW MUCH BETTER my skin is since using this. After the second night I literally woke up and my skin felt like a babys butt. And like I said my skin is normally smooth but that type of smooth ive never experienced

I love this mask. I have very sensitive 40 something combination skin with chronic dryness, especially in the winter. This is the only mask that exfoliates without being caustic. I love the way it smells too. I've been using it regularly since June, about 3-4 times a week. A little goes a long way, I'm just about done with the jar. I was initially put off by the price, but definitely worth it.

All these 5 star reviews say it all. I don't know how this mask works so well but it does. I've used it for 6 days straight and i've had MASSIVE improvement in my skin. I have moderate-severe acne. I have it on my forehead, cheeks and jawline. After using this mask, My forehead is 98% clear. My cheeks are 85% clear and my jawline is 65% clear. Only SIX days did this. I'm going to continue to use everyday until my skin is 100% clearer. I am excited to have found Herbivore products and will continue to buy from them. The texture of the mask is light and goes on easily. The applicator they give you sets the perfect amount you need. A little goes a long way and this mask will last months forsure. The smell is pretty and light. I've tried the DDG peels and they did absolutely nothing for me compared to this mask. So if your unsure as to what might work for you, 1) this herbivore mask is half the cost of the dr. dennis gross and 2) WAY more effective.

I have combination/dry skin, and have used this mask about ten times now. The first thing I want to mention that compared to the price of a lot of other masks, because you only have to use a tiny bit of this it feels like it is going to last forever and you get great value. The other great benefit of this mask: it works! My skin is noticeably smoother, my pores are smaller and my skin looks healthier in general. Even though it is the middle of winter, it is gentle enough to use and it doesnt dry my skin out. It doesn't really help with acne much, but I would say this mask is worth it for the glow it gives!

Oh my gosh I LOVE herbivore. I can't even express how happy I am to have found this brand. Every single product I've tried is amazing. I first tried the brightening mask and I could not believe how much of a difference it made in my skin, however I am also acne prone so I decided to give this a try and I now have PERFECT skin. I rarely ever write reviews on here and I am not the kind of person who normally believes in miracle products but this is just beyond amazing. The best part is it works SO FAST - but you must follow the directions of using it every day for the first 3-4 days.   Please please please don't hesitate to buy this product.

love ituff01all the breaking out just disappeared and I feel fresher. Too strong at the first time apply it on the skin where acned but will soon turn to a smooth texture and you just feel like being healed. Love this brand

Since buying this mask not only have I noticed my face has dramatically improved my friends and family have noticed too! If you have problematic, acne prone skin and are debating on if you should try this product or not I HIGHLY recommend to buy!
Cold, wet gel ish texture, weird smell. Love it!

I'm not sure what percentage AHA's and BHA's this mask has, but it definitely does clear my skin and shrink my pores a little.  I use according to the directions, and my skin looks bright, new, and smooth after every use.  If your skin is prone to dryness, i would recommend following with a moisturizer immediately.  My skin is sensitive to many fragrances and artificial ingredients, so I am thrilled this mask contains none of that.

reviews.review_title: THE BEST MASK IN THE UNIVERSE
reviews.review_text: Believe the hype y'all, this mask has changed my mind about chemical exfoliants. I always thought I was a physical exfoliant girl because anything else would cause me to break out. Fortunately, this mask hands down has changed my skin and my entire beauty routine. Beautiful results! Clearer, smoother skin with dramatically more even skin tone. No irritation and no break outs! Where has it been all my life?!?! Keeping this in my routine basically forever.

I never write reviews, but this mask is AMAZING! I have always seen masks promising to change your skin, well this one does! It has helped my breaks outs and redness more than the 1000s I have spent on other masks promising better skin. This mask WORKS! I will keep buying this, plus a little goes a long way!

After the 1st use I could see and feel skin noticeably smoother. After  3 uses my skin is 98% clear! Most of my little clogged pores are gone!! I think for larger or cystic acne it would take about 6 to 8 uses. This is a miracle worker on my skin. I have been using it with the Cane and Austin exfoliating scrub. Everyone should be using this and their moon fruit cream!

reviews.review_title: A nice addition to the skincare routine
reviews.review_text: I really love herbivore's products. They all work wonderfully and the scents really make applying the products a ritual.   I use this mask in conjunction with my lapis oil and moon moisturizer, and noticed how clear my skin has been. I leave this mask on after showering 2-3 times a week. After washing it off, my skin looks happier.

This is a great mask!   I followed the instruction and used for 3 days straight. There was a noticeable different in my skin. The tone was more even and the skin looked brighter. However the effect started to slowly diminish afterwards.   The mask has a very strong smell, something I don't mind. But I would caution people against it.
Tried this for the first time a few weeks ago.  It's nice.  No crazy results but this is very nice.  I like to use this Sunday nights before a nice bath.  My detailed review is below.

I have been using this for a few weeks now as instructed. Started out using it a few days in a row and then once or twice a week. My pores are smaller and my skin is brighter. I have seen such a big difference in my skin!

This mask is the only product I would ever call HG. I've purchased it three times (one of those times was because I broke a brand new jar on second use, boy was I mad).   I first got it in the S/S 2016 set. I read all about it and was pretty wary about putting it on my face, but my skin was already a total wreck and couldn't have gotten much worse. Last winter I developed full blown acne patches on my cheeks, which had ALWAYS been clear. This mask cleared that right up. Like, instantly. When those patches developed again this fall, this was the first thing I reached for. My skin is smoother, brighter, and any blemishes I have clear up within days.  I have sensitive skin but use this for 20 minutes. I love that it's gentle enough to be used for consecutive days for instant results. When I'm good about using it for four days as directed, then once a week or so for upkeep, my skin stays radiant and clear. When I get lazy, I like knowing that all I have to do is grab this pretty glass jar.  The scent is pretty strong, but I like it. I love blue tansy. This mask smells a lot like Luna oil, but sweeter and sharper? It's easy to apply and a little goes a long way. Even so, I do find I go through it pretty quickly, but it's totally worth it to me. I follow up with Rose Hibiscus spray and Lapis oil (also from the S/S set and repurchased). My skin has never looked better. I will never go without this again.

Hopefully this will not be unavailable for long....I need to stock up!  Hands down this is the best mask I've ever had the pleasure of using. My skin can be pretty picky when it comes to masks (I.e. congestion and breakout-proned), but the combination of AHAs, BHAs and Blue Tansy is just perfect. I find that it is gentle enough to use multiple times during the week.   My skin's tone and texture has vastly improved making no makeup days a more frequent and less terrifying thing. I'm honestly not sure what I did before I came across this product. Believe the hype and scoop it up when you can!

This is one of the best masks I have ever used. I have oily, acne prone skin and this has helped me stay breakout free. I use this in conjunction with the lapis oil and it has done wonders. While they are pricey products, a little goes a long way. It is incredibly calming for my skin and smells amazing

I have fairly dry, sensitive skin that is prone to both redness and flaking in the winter, and this mask is amazing!  It doesn't irritate my skin, and leaves it smoother and flake free.  It smells a bit like grape Koolaid, which is not my favorite scent, but it is not overpowering.  A little goes a long way, as well.

This mask is AMAZING. I have combination acne-prone skin with hyperpigmentation. I use glam glow to help clear up any break outs, but I'm still left with the discoloration and uneven texture. I usually use a salicylic acid toner to aid in clearing up my scars, but if I use it too frequently my skin will become dry and peel. Ewh! This mask is PERFECT. It keeps my acne at bay, clears up any scarring rather promptly, and it isn't drying AT ALL. Even more plus sides? There's so much product in here for a not so terrible price. It's also super easy to apply and wash off. I've used Glam Glow's Super Mud, Peter Thomas Roth's Sulfur Mask, Clinique's Even Better Clinical Dark Spot Corrector, Ole Henriksen's Truth Serum, Boscia Exfoliating Peel Gel, Boscia Luminizing Black Mask, Philosophy Clear Days Ahead Pads, and Dr. Dennis Gross' Alpha Beta Extra Strength Peel... Some of these helped, but they're nothing compared to the miracle that is Blue Tansy. How is this product not on the most popular list? It's like a well kept secret. I forget how I came across it and decided to buy it, but good gosh am I glad I did! I apply it as much as I want, sometimes multiple times a day when my skin is in a terrible state and it fixes it up in a jiff without irritating/drying out my skin at all! BUY BUY BUY! But like... don't buy it so much that it sells out the next time I need to refresh my stash. <3

My combo skin turns pretty bad during pms week leaving my with pretty moderate breakouts. So, I needed something to help combat these breakouts and clear off oil and dead skin cells. I actually use this twice a week instead of a cleanser (cleansers really aren't that great for skin just fyi) and my skin always looks so lovely, more even, and less red afterwards, even on my acne-ridden days. The ingredient list is also very easy to love! I've tried Sunday Riley's good genes treatment, and although that worked just as well as this, the ingredients are kinda ehh and the price is also pretty meh.  I recommend putting it on 10-15 min before you shower and just clean it off when you hop in. It's not the easiest to get off your face, but warm water helps. Don't forget to moisturize afterwards! Also I have been using this 2-3 times a week and still have almost the whole jar left- all you need is a thin layer.

After having an extremely stressful week, my skin has broken out to a level I have never actually seen before. My skin was inflamed, red, and sore. I'm not home and after using some of my skincare to clear up my skin, I noticed my breakout got worse. My cousin recommended this product to me and she let me use some of it. The cooling sensation, instantly began to soothe my sore skin and has significantly lessened the bumps on my face. I had to buy it because it worked so well. It does have a medicinal, herby, smell to it so if you're sensitive to smells you might dislike it but it seems to disappear after a while.
Very disappointing! I got some small pimples in my forehead and my under eye area was dryed after I used this mask, I don't think it worth is price.

So far this is the best resurfacing mask i have used. I have combination skin , this mask doesn't dry my skin out. I follow instruction to use it for 3 continuous days, my skins looks completely bright and healthy after the entire treatment. Happy!

I was pretty stoked to get this mask because of all the sparkling reviews. However, (disclaimer: I don't know if this mask is the direct cause of this problem) after using this mask I developed the most INSANE dryness in my under eye area, even though I didn't apply it to my under eye area. I mean, I am the oiliest person in America and my skin was flaking off like I was suffering from an intense sunburn. To the point where I couldn't even apply concealer or anything because it was just peeling off and extremely patchy. I don't know if the cause is the mask but nothing had changed in my skin care routine otherwise and I am not a dry person what so ever. Also, the smell of this mask is intense and attacks my senses. Wanted to love it but i'm scared to even use it again because I have been dealing with this dry skin problem for a couple of weeks now.

I bought this mask because I was so fed up with having acne at age 24, nothing I bought was helping my skin. After using this mask for a week I am already incredibly impressed. I love that the ingredients are natural, and I found this mask very suitable even for my extremely sensitive skin. It has a slight tingling and minty scent that I love, and a little product goes a long way.   This product is absolutely worth the money, after one week I don't have any active breakouts, just some scarring that I also notice is improving. If you are considering buying this, do it!! I am so happy with my purchase

This is an amazing product that made my skin have a stunning glow. I've always had small cheek acne, nothing i tried really cleared it up, but this product, after one use, cleared it up and made my sin super smooth. I do have dry, textured skin, and sometimes sensitive to AHA and BHA peels. This product just worked wonderfully and I highly suggest it, super worth your money especially because you don't need a lot each time you apply.

I've had eczema all my life, and this year I had the worst eczema breakout. I had terribly dry, crusty, flaky skin all over my body, face, and even my eyelids and neck. My skin is also acne prone and for the past half year I have been struggling to calm my skin down from the combination of acne and severe eczema. This mask is AMAZING. It has a distinct and slightly strong smell, but nothing like strong perfume or artifical. While you leave it on, it makes your skin tingle and red. I almost thought it was too strong because my skin is so sensitive, but no. Almost a minute after removing the mask, I already saw results. My face looked less inflamed and less red. When I woke up the next morning, my skin was free from flakes and acne went down tremendously. GET THIS MASK.

I was in love with Tata Harper's Resurfacing Mask as my HG exfoliant, but it was just too expensive for only one ounce. I bought this instead and now it's my new HG exfoliant. It is twice the size of Tata Harper's Resurfacing mask, has a lower price, requires less product, is just as effective and has less burning! It ate away tiny bits of dead skin on my cheeks and around my nose and left be absolutely glowing. It will last a long time. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Whose got great skin now? This girl!
reviews.review_text: This Is absolutely the best mask I've ever used. And I'm a maskaholic! Usually I have to really try to determine if a mask has a positive effect, but with this mask, I noticed improved skin after one use. Now, 6 uses later, I feel ready to write an honest review. My skin has been pretty good for a few years; I don't get breakouts often at all, my skin tone is relatively balanced, but it's on the drier side. This mask has absolutely improved my skin. It's so soft I can't even help but be amazed when I touch my face even days later. The light exfoliation has done wonders to my little flakes of dry skin. Plus my face oils have been soaking in more easily for days after the mask. The price is really quite affordable as I find I need a surprisingly small amount to get the job done.  This mask is just amazing. I highly recommend it.
Great mask to clarify. I love the smell.

AMAZING. I have (very recently) been struggling with awful hormonal acne brought on my PCOS. It's cystic, very painful and, until this mask, totally unmanageable. I use it all over once a week and on difficult spots every other day. It has made a HUGE difference in my skin and I really can't say enough how pleased I am.  I have used SO many other masks and spot treatments (Kate Summerville, dr Dennis, philosophy, Clinique, origins etc) and this gives the best results the fastest. 10/10.

This was a last minute purchase and I'm so glad I bought it! I love the SKII sheet masks and the Omorovicza Deep Cleansing Mask are two favorites but I was looking for something I could use on a more regular basis.  This mask is AMAZING and even better than the other two.  I have used it three nights in a row (as recommended) and I have seen immediate results. If it wasn't out of stock I would be purchasing a back-up.  Already excited to try other products from this brand.

I don't ever write reviews but this mask is one of the best things I've ever used on my skin. I got it on Friday night and have been using it every night as per the directions for the first 3-4 days and my skin is so much better. It does exactly what it says it does and has my skin feeling so soft I can't stop touching it!  I don't find the smell overwhelming at all. I like it compared to some things I've used in the past that were awful.   I have very oily skin and my makeup typically oxidizes within the first few hours it's on, but not since using this mask!  It should be noted that I bought both the Lapis and Phoenix oil from Herbivore, as well. This little jar is a keeper for me!

Am I missing something? This product did absolutely NOTHING for my skin. It smells amazing. But I tried it several times and nothing happened. A slight tingle, easily washed off, and no difference at all. I would think that if the ingredients were super effective the product wouldn't come in a transparent jar, but I don't know. I returned it.

If it wasn't for the scent of this product, I'd give it four stars. It does have the following Pros: -Resurfaces/Makes skin smoother -Easy to wash off I definitely wouldn't call this a cooling mask by any means. It burns my skin every time I put it on. My skin isn't too sensitive though so it isn't red by the time I take it off. The blue tansy is so strong for me that it physically makes me feel nauseous though. I have an essential oil blend with blue tansy in it that I enjoy, so I bought this mask thinking I would really like the scent. But it's just so strong and overwhelming for me, I would never buy this mask again because of this.
The smell of this product is unreal, and the jar is adorable. A great face mask for weekly use.

Honestly, I love masks and probably have tried every mask ever. BUT nothing compares to this mask. Instantly fell in love after my first use and have noticed consistent improvement after every use. Accidentally fell asleep with it on for 2 hours and woke up with the smoothest softest skin imaginable with no adverse effects. Does not dry out the skin at all.

I absolutely love anything that is resurfacing. I struggle a lot with pesky tiny bumps on my face and this product helps me receive a smooth complexion. It is incredible on my sensitive skin only a tiny tingling sensation happens when I first apply but nothing unbearable!

I've been eyeballing this since it came to sephora and finally got my hands on it, I've been using it about 3 times a week for about 3 weeks & my skin has improved dramatically. I'll be 28 next month and I have fine lines and oily skin, With this I have less acne but best of all my skin looks like baby skin!!!! I've been trying everything and this stuff is hg status. Will keep buying!

I will literally never let myself run out of this mask. After using it 3 nights in a row as suggested by the direction booklet that comes with the mask, I now only use it twice per week and my skin has never looked better. This mask helps keep my skin clear from acne and bright. I've been using this mask for 6 months now and rarely see a pimple and the redness in my skin has really gone down!

This mask... all it took is one try and I fell in love. I had extreme redness on my cheeks and bumps I've never had before b/c i'm religious about monthly facials and morning/evening skincare... my face is usually flawless but I went back into the store to exchange that Kon Gen Do product line for this - allllll natural!!! I tried the mask and then went to bed with the Moon Fruit night cream and this morning, my skin's redness is all GONE!!!! What in the.....   Never run across a product line (high end or lower) that works wonders this fast and naturally.   LOVE. I will be a herbivore loyalist.
Amazing. I never were reviews but this stuff removed my acne scarring and made my face so clear and radiant. Definitely buying again.

Wow, very impressed with this!  A little goes a long ways so if you're not into the price, take that into consideration.   I noticed a visible difference after just one use.  I did not experience any unpleasant sensations or irritation.  The smell was a little off-putting but it went away after a bit.    My skin is clear, normal with slightly noticeable pores and light hypOpigmentation.  I feel that this made a significant difference after one use by evening out my skin, smoothing it w/o stripping it of its natural protective barrier.  Can't wait to see what prolonged use will do!

It does take 4-6 weeks to see results (which is normal in skincare) but it is so worth the wait! I have dull, aging and acne prone skin and this stuff has helped so much! My acne is almost non existent, my smile lines look softer and my skin just glows! A little goes a long way so a jar lasts me a few months, it's worth the investment for great skin!

I have been searching for something like this for years. I like to use mostly natural products, and this is. but what sets this apart from other products i've used is that IT WORKS. With the first use, I knew I had found something great. After the first few days of using it every night, my skin was completely transformed. Even toned, clear, beautiful. Honestly it looks like its been airbrushed in real life. I'll also say that I don't wear makeup, ever. This product makes my skin look so good that I even if I were a makeup girl, i wouldn't need any. I leave it on a bit longer than 20 minutes although I'm not sure it makes a difference.   The smell is intense at first, because theres no chemical fragrances added to cover up the natural scents. It quickly fades and becomes almost scent free within the first minute or so.   I also suspect this little glass jar will last me quite sometime. So for the price, well worth it. Overall, the best product I have ever tried.

My dry skin is acne prone and I have a lot of texture and hard closed comedones. Nothing has helped and salicylic acid has done nothing but dry out my face and make my acne worse. But salicylic acid and aspirin I believe is derived from willow bark. The first time I used this I went and looked in the mirror after I rinsed and many of the hard comedones had come to a head. I couldn't believe it. I have tried so many products and nothing has helped. My skin did not feel dried out after the first week but if I use it more than I need my skin does get quite dry. Grab a sample and try it. It does smell like menthol but it quickly goes away after being applied.

This product has a very strong scent, not horrible but not pleasant. It's a scent I would rather not put on my face. However, not matter how bad a product smells, if it WORKS, then I can totally deal with the smell. This product has done nothing to my skin. I do not notice any difference just after using or after a week of daily use. I have used many skin care products, and the ones worth keeping in your regime typically blow you away within only a few uses. I'm afraid this guy will be going back to the store.

Probably the best mask I've used since SKll sheet Mask.  I'm only on my third day and the change on my skin is drastic.  Not only is my skin texture improving but my lines are fading...truly amazing.  I look forward to continued improvements.  I normally wouldn't write a review so soon after starting a product, but it's truly fantastic when you try something new and see immediate results!  Buy this mask, you'll not regret it.  Oh and the scent is botanical, it smells earthy and shouldn't be a hinderance to purchasing.

I swear by this product. I had this tucked away in my collection of many masks for a while now and found this about 2 weeks ago. My face was ridden with spots and painful cysts that just weren't going away. I got advice that i was overwashing my face, as i was scrubbing it morning and night with harsh acne cleansers. Well i have soon switched to washing it with a mild organic cleanser at night and in the morning i just wash my face off with water using a konjac sponge. With the addition of this mask to my routine every other night i have definitely noticed a change. Within the first use the risen pimples were gone and the cysts were starting to die down. My dark spots and acne scars are fading with each use and my face is looking more clear and plump. Minimal is definitely the key to my routine and i am loving every bit of it. This will be my ride or die for life!

I've been on a skincare product kick lately, and I'm learning that a lot of products do very bad things to my skin. After getting a sample of an AHA product I wanted to find something that had both AHA and BHA and this popped up in my search. After two days of using this product I can see a noticeable difference in my skin. It seems to be clearly up my adult acne which is mostly whiteheads in my forehead and along my hairline. The smell, like everyone else said, is not ideal - but it's not that bad. It just smells like algae or something swampy. It's definitely worth putting up with the smell for the results.
Not a fan of the smell and didn't see much difference from my skin. Does feel more clean and moisturizer a tad bit.

I've been using this product for over a month, and so far my skin looks...the same. I've been searching for a natural clarifying/resurfacing product and thought this might be it, but it's pretty unremarkable. My skin doesn't even feel particularly soft after removing the mask. I  actually like the smell and the tingling feeling, but it doesn't seem to actually be doing anything. This was a splurge for me as far as the cost and I definitely won't be buying it again.

I love everything about this product! I'm using it nightly with no issues; I'm addicted to how soft and glowy it makes my skin.   I have really high cell turnover (read: need LOTS of exfoliation) and haven't needed any physical exfoliation after adding this to my routine.  It's really helping keep my congestion-prone skin clear and is a nice nighttime ritual.  A little goes a long way so I expect this jar to last a while.

reviews.review_title: best mask for acne prone skin
reviews.review_text: saw results after the first use and my skin just kept getting better with each use! really draws out impurities and especially helps with those pimples that sit under the skin but don't come to a head. this is the product that saved my skin!!

My skin felt amazing after the first use and by the 3rd use I could definitely see a difference in my skin tone and texture. Smells usually don't bother me but for some reason this smell did, but that's to be expected with any natural product without added perfumes. Love this stuff overall. Noticeable results

I have severe hyper pigmentation and old acne scars. I bought this after months of wrestling over the price. I wish I would have picked this up sooner! It is seriously life changing. The first day I used it I had two active breakouts and the next morning they were gone. After a week my hyper pigmentation was clearing. I am not kidding I have been using it for a month and I have barley made a dent. Do yourself a favor a run out to get this!
Absolutely love the way this made my skin feel. Unfortunately I couldn't handle the smell; it almost has a liquorice scent. Going to return this product :(

Since using this I have seen such a difference in my skin texture and tone it's incredible. I followed the directions and used it 4 days in a row and now twice a week and I can say 100% I can't live without it. It has changed my skin.

It truly is a resurfacing mask. After two weeks of use results are so clear! Pores are minimized and breakouts are diminished. A little tingling sensation for the first 20 seconds and an odd smell don't bother me. Awesome product!

it works, its gentle yet effective. i use retin a and have been for years, benzoyl peroxide as well in the morning so my skin is acne prone and endures a lot of treatment on a regular basis. I've had this product for 2ish months, and it works, when I see a pimple starting i immediately start this and if i start as soon as i notice it it goes away a lot faster than if i didnt. anyway so why 4 stars? this stuff is expensive.  i dont use it often, i use it 2-3 days in a row (like the instruction says) every 2ish weeks (maybe 2.5 weeks) because 1) its expensive 2) i dont need to do it more than that due to my already sensitive skin. so since i dont use it often, you'd expect I could have this for a while, correct? well.. not in my case. like the other reviews have mentioned they received a milky GREEN color. i didnt experience that right off the bat, mine was a beautiful deep fresh clean jelly blue color. and it was like that for a while, but now that I've been having it for 2 months - and no  I never directly touch the product - i use the little spoon that comes with it and clean it every time after use. its starting to turn an opaque GREEN color, and after only 2 months of having it, and the price its disappointing... its definitely degrading and at an alarming rate now. i barely made a dent in the jar and its already going bad? what a shame.   this would be acceptable if you 1) use it quickly on you or multiple people in your family 2) maybe preserve it in the fridge from the get go? (haven't tried that) 3) dont care for the price.   results are there, its a wonderful mask, but its just disappointing in terms of longevity. my acne scars have lessened over time but i also use vitamin c serum and other products, ACTIVE acne goes away faster, and overall complexion is clearer and smoother.

reviews.review_title: Makes an immediate difference! So worth it!
reviews.review_text: I want to start off by addressing the complaints about the smell: SKINCARE IS NOT SUPPOSED TO SMELL GOOD!! If it smells like perfume, it's going to be bad for your skin. If you're worried about the smell, it's really NOT unpleasant, just unusual. It smells this way because Herbivore doesn't add any unnecessary fragrances to this, which is a GOOD thing for your skin! Anyway, the smell dissipates a few minutes after applying it. I personally think it smells fine.  I would also like to give props to Herbivore for being cruelty-free, which is amazing. It can be hard to find cruelty-free skincare brands but Herbivore proves that it's possible to make amazing products that don't test on animals.  Now, for the effects of this mask. You feel a slight tingle after your put it on, but it's only minimal. After washing the product off, you can IMMEDIATELY tell that it's made a difference. If you don't know what AHAs and BHAs are, they are chemical exfoliants that deeply clean your skin and help with flakiness and blackheads. The AHAs and BHAs in the mask leave your skin feeling SO smooth and SO soft after using it, and it's not just a temporary effect because this product actually improves your skin over time. With continued use I saw a reduction in blackheads. My skin felt smoother and more glowing from within. The blue tansy in it helps with reducing irritation; this product was super gentle on my skin.  I can tell that the amount of product you receive will last quite a long time, which is great. I will definitely repurchase this once I run out.  My only complaint: the packaging is super chic but the fact that it's in a jar (rather than an airtight pump) makes me a little worried about contamination, so I make sure to wash my hands before opening and only leave the lid off for the shortest amount of time possible.

I love this mask!! I notice right away that my skin was exfoliated, soft and it is a gentle mask with AHA and BHA that does not irritate my skin. The next day I got a lot of compliments on how good my skin look.

I was initially sceptical of the product. I have dry dehydrated skin and was worried this might further dry the skin. I contacted Herbivore on Etsy and they assured me I was going to love it. I LOVE the way the product works on me. The product is gel-liquidy , I leave it on for the suggested time and then wipe it off with a warm, damp washcloth. After using it everyday for 2 weeks, I could spot a major difference in the way my skin feels. It absorbs moisturizer better and there certainly is a drop in breakouts. My skin no longer feels dry and flaky. The smell is nothing to die for but I do not find it too unpleasant. This jar will last for quite a while and I will definitely be returning for more.

Amazing product! I used as directed- four nights in a row and I now have been using it once a week. My skin is clear, balanced and glowing. On my first use it did leave me skin slightly red, but it calmed by the morning. Get this mask it's worth every penny!

I tried this product on a whim, and I've been pretty impressed with it. I don't experience acne or large breakouts, and my skin is minimally oily/combination.   This isn't an intense mask, and I didn't even notice any tingling. It has a gel-like consistency, to be applied in a thin layer. I followed the product recommendations, and started by using the mask daily for the first 4 days, then 2-3 times a week afterward.   It's not like other masks, in that the effect is gentle - so you're not peeling or scrubbing something off to get a big reveal. You simply wipe the product off after 20 minutes, and your skin feels clean, taut, and smooth. It definitely feels more effective than your run-of-the-mill sheet mask, and probably has more value for cost, too.   It's only been 2 weeks so far, but the product does what it claims to. I've been using it in conjunction with the Sunday Riley line, so I can't attribute the improved quality of my skin (firmness, clarity, minimized pores, smoothness, brightening/glow) solely to the mask, but I'm happy with the results thus far.   Also, the smell isn't overwhelming, and is gone basically as soon as you clean off the product. It smells like the Sunday Riley Luna Oil due to the blue tansy, but it isn't nearly as strong.

This immediately softened my skin!! I do have fairly normal skin so I can't say that it did much else but if your skin is looking for a pick me up, this instantly softens and brightens your skin!! LOVE it!!
I Started using this mask 3 weeks ago in hopes of it helping my acne. It had a lot of positive reviews so i figured i would try it but it didnt do anything for me. The smell didnt bother me.
I was so excited when I first started using this mask. I really wanted to get rid of my acne. But unfortunately it did the same for my skin as a basic face wash does. I was hoping for a deeper clean.

Seriously. Buy it.  Try it.  This face mask is what you are looking for to help with fine lines, dark spots and decreasing redness.  I am a true believer. It tingles when you first use it but it makes your face feel so incredibly soft after.

reviews.review_title: Can't stand the smell, but otherwise fine
reviews.review_text: This mask has a thin,gel-like consistency that feels nice and a little cooling on the face. After one use, my skin felt softer. It wasn't irritated at all (I have acne-prone, dehydrated skin with some redness). Having said that, I could not get over the scent. It reminded me of the old-school gel toilet freshners :( I have the Sunday Riley Luna oil that also has Blue Tansy in it, but felt that the Herbivore one smelled worse.  I ended up returning this mask. If you're picky about scents, I'd recommend checking this product out in store before purchasing.

I purchased this mask a couple of months ago but have only recently started to use it. I like the blue colour of the product but it does not go on blue to the face. It goes on clear and dries that way, too. The smell of the mask is also quite strong but it does not overpower nor linger once you apply it to your face. So as long as you're not sniffing it straight out of the jar, you'll be okay.   I have very sensitive and acne prone skin and this mask did the trick for me. It didn't break me out and it left my skin feeling smooth and my pores tight. My makeup applied beautifully afterwards and I probably had one of the best makeup days I've had in a while!   I need to use it a while longer to see he full benefits of this mask but I have a feeling it's actually going to work!  I also did a video review of this mask. Feel free to check it out if you want to see how it applies and how my makeup wore afterwards.

I've been having problems with my skin these past couple months since my period has ravaged my face and I was exhausted at the fact that nothing was working. After reading the reviews on this miracle, I decided to give it a try and after using it only 3 times, I'm in love. The smell is unique but somewhat pleasant and you feel like you have a brand new layer of skin after you wipe it off. The tingle can get a little intense in the beginning but tapers off nicely. it definitely resurface and absolutely improves on the clarity of your skin. I just bought the Brightening Herbivore mask that I'm excited to dabble in!

I've never seen a face mask with such a high rating so I decided to give it a try. The smell is intense, yes, but it doesn't bother me. However, this is the only new product I have added in my skin routine and I break out every time I use it. When I don't use it I have no new breakouts. My skin is combination/oily and not sensitive.

I have bought many face masks over the years, and Blue Tansy beats all of them! The smell is absolutely amazing and it feels so great on my skin. I have had the product for about two weeks now and have noticed my skin is glowing like never before. I have sensitive skin and only wore the mask for 10 minutes the first time just to make sure, but I have never had any problems and wear it for the full 20 minutes. I am a herbivore addict now and can't wait to try the rest of their products!

5 out of 5 I AM OBSESSED!!! -08.20.16 Quick Take: effective, skin softening, clarifying, pores appear smaller, smells divine!!, cost effective, blue I got this product on a whim, because it has acids in a combination that can be expensive. I figured, why not? OMG! The blue tansy scent is.. I don't know how to describe it but it's so floral and delicious and it feels and smells SO luxurious. I. Am. Obsessed! I did as instructed and used it daily for the first 4 days and immediately noticed that my skin felt cleaner and softer, which is saying a lot given the scarring, etc, caused by cystic acne. Obviously it's not going to disguise that, but it *has* made my skin look a little bit more even-toned, and using in combination with retinols/retinoids I am noting an obvious improvement. A little goes a VERY long way, which is something else I love about it. I love the little spatula you get with it, I love the scent, I love the color, I love that it's effective and gentle, but that I have to use so little? You just rubbed the Love It button.

I purchased this mask a few months ago and am very pleased with it. My face looks and feels radiant and refreshed after each use.   I used the mask when I recently had a minor breakout on my chin, and it really helped reduce this redness and minimize the bumps (it went away a few days later, but that could also be attributed to other skincare products I use).   Don't let the scent deter you from trying out this product. I've had to completely eliminate most scented products due to my eczema, and as a result, I now find most scented products off-putting. However, the scent of this product does not bother me at all. I apply this mask with a flat face brush, which applies a thin, even coating. This might help with the scent for some, since it won't go all over the place.

Its worth it! Get it! I used it for 4 days straight when I first got this product. It cleared up my face! It tingles at first but it shrinks your pores. A little goes a long way, its like a gentle peel.

reviews.review_title: why this doest have 5 stars i do not know
reviews.review_text: first off. the people on here giving this one star because they don't like the smell are absolutely ridiculous. SKINCARE SHOULD NOT SMELL GOOD! this mask absolutely works. it makes your skin radiant glowing and smooth. i have dry sensitive skin and i have never used a mask that made a noticeable difference after 1 use. does it smell like roses and rainbows? no. but what it does smell like is lots of natural skin changing ingredients. buy it. it works. if all you care about is smell than go rub some perfume on your face.

I wanted to purchase this mask entirely based on it's color. The pictures just looked so beautiful! So after debating for several weeks I finally broke down and bought it. And my gosh I am so glad I did.   At first I was surprised by how tiny the jar was. The product is so liquidy though that just a little goes a LONG way. It also goes on clear and not blue. :( But that isn't anything against the product. LOL Just bummed but because that color is great. HAHHAHAHAHA  I have been using it for a week and I have noticed such a difference in my skin. It goes on so cool and refreshing. And when it comes off my skin is soooo soft and smooth. But it's so gentle it doesn't leave my skin dry. I have also notice the redness going down.   I know some reviews have mentioned concerns about the smell. The first time I opened the jar it was a little overwhelming, but I have gotten used to it and barely notice it now.

reviews.review_title: calming, soothing, dont like the smell
reviews.review_text: i would gave 5 stars, if the smell isnt so unpleasant. me and my hubby we both use this mask, as the instruction told, we used 3days in a row, our skin got smoother, less acne for sure. especially my hubby. may buy again .
Fantastic product. Noticed a huge difference in texture and redness within a few weeks of using it. Will purchase again.

I have seriously dry, sensitive skin, but have recently discovered that my skin LOVES acid exfoliation. Usually I need to be very careful with the strength of the acid, which doesn't always lead to using the most effective products. However, this mask is amazing. It's super gentle (even using it the initial 4 days in a row as recommended didn't cause one single issue), yet still strong enough where I noticed results right away.   It does have a peculiar odor that might be somewhat polarizing. I actually really like it, but can see how it would turn some off. However, I err on the side of disregarding the smell of a product if I am able to see results. And I did see results with this mask!

I can't say enough good things about this product. This has made a significant improvement in my skin in terms of texture and the appearance of old acne scars. I am truly amazed and have received so many compliments on my skin since starting to use this.

It's been a day since my first application and I am truly flabbergasted, my skin feels so clean probably since this takes away dead skin, I have no little bumps when I run my fingers over my face, my skin is the smoothest it has ever been and my skin isn't as red as it always has been. I'm very amazed at how in love with this product I am and I'm only one day in? One thing I personally don't like is the smell, can't explain it I just don't like it but it is bearable! Would highly recommend
Such high hopes after reading so many good reviews about this mask but sadly everytime I used it I broke out badly the next day :(
Didn't think I would love this as much as I do but it's my ultimate go to product! I've already bought it for a second time and plan to continue buying it!
I rarely write reviews, but I love this mask. I use it whenever I start to break out and it calms my skin down overnight.

I have basically resigned myself to the fact that I will consistently keep trying different masks from different brands and consistently be underwhelmed by their results on my skin. That's not to say they are terrible, they just don't often offer any major effect on my oily, acne prone skin. Until this mask! Every time that my skin was starting to act up and break out a little bit I would put this on before bed, leave on at least twenty minutes, wash off, and go to sleep, and without fail every single morning my skin was WAY calmed down and breakouts and redness greatly diminished. I don't think I realized how much I really liked this mask until I noticed one day it was almost gone! Definitely repurchasing.

reviews.review_title: My skin has never been better
reviews.review_text: This mask is a miracle. I've been using it for about two weeks, and my skin has gotten drastically better. I've been struggling with breakouts over the past year, and after using this every night for 5 days all of my existing blemishes were gone. I haven't had a new spot since I started using it, and some of the hyper pigmentation from past blemishes is starting to fade. I now use this and the Herbivore Lapis facial oil religiously. Cannot say enough about this product or the brand.

As instructed I've used this mask after cleansing for 4 days now. I suffer from acne scars that typically take forever to heal, and there has never been a time in my life where my skin has been completely clear. However, after using this mask my acne scars have all visibly lightened and some of the older ones are completely gone! Moreover, a very small amount of this product will cover your entire face meaning it will last longer than some masks where you have to glob it on, so in my opinion it's good value for the money you spend.

I've tried lots of acne prone masks. This mask has done more for my face in one week than entire jars of other masks did. It's got a loose jelly consistency that may throw you off at first, but it didn't run at all on my face, even when wet. Very cooling and tingling at first, but it quickly dissipated. I was left with super smooth skin. I started with 4 days in a row, and now I use it about 3 times a week. I've had it for a month, and have only used about 1/4 of it, so a little goes a long way! It's amazing, it's transformed my skin!

Blue Tansy has a lightweight, gel-like consistency and is cooling to the touch. However, it's slightly runny. Also, is has a fresh herbal-floral chamomile scent. The results that I have experienced using this mask is how really softened and smoothed my skin feels. Since this is not a manual exfoliator, the resurfacing action is gentle enough to use on sensitive skin types like myself. I love using this weekly and it's nice that the fill weight weight is two ounces. Plus, because the formula is a little liquid-y, you're able to use less product which will last you a long time. Comes with a little spatula.
Made my skin super soft even after just 1 use. Easy and non-messy. Can't wait to keep using it!

I will never be w/out this mask now that I've had it for a few months.  I have oily/combo skin and this makes my face noticeably smoother as well as quickly clears up impending acne.  I've recommended it to everyone because it's that good!  And I've tried many many masks-this one leaves you feeling as if you had a professional facial.

SKIN TYPE: Oily/hormonal acne AGE: 20   Okay, so I really like this mask. You can feeeeel it working. I use it 2 times a week and it's definitely helped lighten old acne scars (like really old ones) and helps keep my hormonal acne more in control. I love it and i will definitely repurchase :)

I've been through multiple tubs of the Peter Thomas Roth pumpkin mask and it was my all-time favorite exfoliator. This could be it's replacement because of the great ingredients. It's missing the physical exfoliation but if you remove it with a damp cloth as the instructions suggest, it kind of works the same way. This one is also nice because it's clear once applied. You could wear it on a plane followed by a moisturizing mask, and you would look flawless when you land. It doesn't feel gross or sticky when dry. If you have oily skin and love natural/cruelty-free products, buy it!

I was a little hesitant because of the steep price tag for a mask, but this is seriously worth every penny. Plus, all you need is a thin layer, so the jar will last a while. I don't love the way it smells when you first put it on (and oddly starts smelling like men's cologne once it dries) but this mask has seriously made my skin clear. I normally break out like crazy on my chin before my time of the month and the rest of the month is usually blotchy because of post-acne scars. This is the first time in a while that I've had very little breakouts (almost none). I'll have to see if it works its magic come next month but it's so far been probably the best mask purchase I've made!

By far one of the best masks I've ever used! And I'm a mask junkie. I was able to use this mask every day for 3-4 days and it didn't irritate my skin- just made it glow and made my makeup look smoother!! Anytime my face feels disgusting, I do a 4 day dose of this and I'm good to go.

I have combination skin that is very acne prone, though it's not particularly sensitive. I bought this mask and used it every day for 5 days and now use it every second or third day along with a cream exfoliant. My skin is not perfect yet, but it's the best skin I've had in a while. Also, this brand is available on Etsy but it's more expensive AND they charge you for shipping...just thought you guys should know.

I have been using this for about a month,& i love the results!  I have sensitive, acne prone skin & decided to try this out to unclog my pores.  After a couple weeks the tiny bumps around my face have cleared & my skin feels smooth.  The medicated smell doesn't bother me & i feel very refreshed once it's rinsed off.

For reference: I have normal to oily, acne prone, sensitive skin. I went through a period of about a year where my acne was so bad that I couldn't even look at it. After that passed (I think it was just hormonal, teenage acne) I still had bad skin but not as terrible as it once was. Although I didn't have terrible acne anymore, I still hated my skins texture.   This product is a life saver. It has almost completely erased my stubborn and persistent clogged pores all over my chin, which have been there for years. I thought they'd never go away. I can see it doing a little bit to my acne scars on my cheeks and the over all texture of my skin has improved greatly.   KEEP IN MIND-- this product won't work over night, I've been using it for about a month and a half and have just started seeing the results I was hoping for. I believe this and my philosophy turbo boost C powder in the mornings have saved my skin.

Everything about this is amazing! I have been looking for a mask that will resurface my skin and give it a smooth appearance. After seeing the excellent reviews for this product, I purchased it.. I am SO happy that I purchased this! I used this for 4 days straight (recommends 3-4 days for initial use), and my skin looks and feels BUTTER SMOOTH! I love the tingling sensation, and the way it rinsed off so clean, but didn't dry my face. The smell is a bit powerful, but I am used to herbal smells in products, so it's really not that bad! I would rather an herbal smell than a chemical smell! This product definitely needs to stay in my arsenal! LOL

I have verrrryyy sensitive skin so i was a little nervous going in . This tingles a tiny bit like the instructions mention but then it settles . My skin is so soft . its not something that makes your skin soft and glowy for an hour then fades . My skin is so soft and smooth and the texture has improved and i have only used it a few times . i love this stuff . I will be revisiting the Herbivore section today !

reviews.review_title: I need this mask in my life!
reviews.review_text: I use this mask 2-3 times a week and it visibly reduced my redness and made extractions a breeze. Highly recommend this with the lapis oil. I just ordered my second jar along with their jasmine oil and rose spray!

Although I haven't tried much masks, I trusted the overwhelming response of the reviews and they aren't wrong. I can attest that this mask can brighten, clear, and smooth your face. I'm not talking about smoothing out fine lines, rather this product smoothed out the little bumps I had on my face that were accentuated by my foundation at times. By brightening, I don't mean lighter face, but you face just looks radiant - just bright and not dull looking. I think this jar will last me about a year, because you don't need much product to cover your face.
This is unlike any mask I've used before. My skin feels so soft after I use this product. It does have a smell but it's worth it to get the result.

This mask, along with a few other Herbivore items, have fixed my husbands troublesome skin. Now, I hate to jinx him so I'll be careful with how I proceed.  He tends to mainly breakout on the forehead. For the first week, we used this every day. Now we use this every few days. That first week, we noticed he had less breakouts and his skin was smoother and brighter.   He's the type of guy that when he doesn't see results from a product quickly enough, he gives up on it. So, for the fact that he's still using this, tells me a lot. I've used it as well on my normal/dry skin and have noticed smoother and brighter skin. I love how it feels on and it smells like black tea. very happy with it overall and plan to repurchase when we run out.

Just going to say this mask is amazing! It does everything it claims to do. I haven't been this impressed by a skin care product in a long time. This has really great ingredients and you can really feel it working (no burning or itching). I would by this mask over and over again! I'm definitely going to check out more from Herbivore. I recommend this for every skin type!!!

Packaging: jar, comes with a spatula for application Scent: herbal Texture: thick, honey-like Performance: I feel an instant tingling sensation when I put this on. After leaving it for the recommended 20 minutes I notice my skin is clearer, and breakouts have risen to the surface. I find this works best when used to target a specific problem area, I would feel wasteful applying it all over. This never fully dries down, so be sure to use a thinner later to ensure it doesn't run. A star off for the price.

I rarely leave reviews but this product warranted that. On Sunday I was experience terrible, stress breakouts that actually hurt (both physically and emotionally LOL) I went on Sephora, did some research and ordered this. Got it in the mail on Wed, and used it that night and Thursday. Its now Friday and my skin has completely turned around. NO breakouts, dark marks are fading, I love it! Highly recommend. Cant want to see results after using for the 4 days in a row.
Love this mask. It gives a very gentle tingling sensation when it's applied. Leaves the skin so clear and soft! Will be buying many times!!

reviews.review_title: Best New Mask for Dull Skin
reviews.review_text: I have quite a few masks in my rotation, so to be honest I'm not sure why I even bought this one, but I am glad to have it in my rotation.  This is a smooth, very liquidy gelly mask.  The scent is a little bit fruity and a bit floral, light and pleasant.  I applied with a brush, and it was not too messy.   When first applied there was definitely an intense tingly sensation, not quite burning, but like whoa this is working kind of tingly.  I left it on for 20 minutes. The mask was really easy to remove with a wash cloth, and there were no gritty exfoliating particles or dried clay which can sometimes be so irritating when removing.  I let my face dry before applying moisturizer and I was pleasantly surprised that my skin wasn't tight or overly dried out, but there had definitely been a lot of turnover.  Think that applying a few nights in a row would get really good results without being too irritating, but really only need a few nights a week.    When I woke up the next day, I was very happy with how smooth my skin felt, and it looked bright and radiant.  This really allowed my nighttime skincare routine to sink in.  This is on a similar level with my one or two other favorite exfoliating masks, both which use chemical ingredients to refresh the outer layer of skin. This is a good price, there is enough in the jar for many, many applications, and its only needed a few times a week. The packaging is simple, sleek and sophisticated.  Would definitely recommend.  Not for sensitive skin (or only use for reduced time).  Probably ok for acne, but doesn't have any specific acne fighting ingredients and there are better products out there.  Best for exfoliating dull winter skin.  Good for oily or dry skin.

reviews.review_title: You need this in your life!!!
reviews.review_text: This has made such an improvement in my skin! It hasn't made me break out and it's helped tremendously reduce my acne breakouts. It also makes your skin very soft and I can definitely notice in a weeks time a huge improvement in my skin texture and it also has lightened up my acne scars!

love this mask! I used 4 nights in a row during my normal hormonal breakout cycle and am happy to report to (so far- knock on wood)- I've had no major breakouts. This in conjunction with deeper sulfur treatments (Dr Dennis Gross) while I sleep has been lifesaving.   It smells wonderful, has just the slightest cooling feeling, and I do think it has helped my complexion.   Side note: Love using the lapis oil also!

I read all the glowing reviews for this mask so I decided to try it myself. I used it exactly as directed (3-4x in a one week period and then 1-2x per week after that) and I didn't notice any difference or improvements whatsoever.   The smell was a little too strong for me; smells like jell-o.

Well it's been a while since I last did a review. But wow! This mask gave me instant results. (very few products I've tried give me instant results; hence the slow replies since I actually try before I review). So I wanted a AHA/BHA because of my blackheads (nose) and KP on sides of face. I left this on for 20 minutes and it didn't burn/tingle on my sensitive skin. The smell is strong. Almost like a mix of Vicks Vapor Rub and Apple Cider Vinegar. The colour is beautiful in the jar but a bit translucent when you put it on your face. The first time I think I put too little, the second time I was more generous. And I don't feel guilty being generous since this product is $46/Cnd. It's only 2.3oz but the bottle is filled, almost overflowing (be carefully when you open as it's on the top of the lid as well). The second day I used it (says to use 3-4 days in a row and then reduce to a few times a week) I felt a cooling sensation but again, I put a lot more product on my face. So after I removed the mask with a warm cloth I started my extractions. I have never had an easier time extracting in my life! & to top it off they didn't hurt extracting. Usually the kertosis pilaris on the sides of my face are so far down in the skin that I need a needle to lance them out but not this time. If you want a product that will help you DEEP CLEAN your pores you need this in your life! I'm going to try other products in their line and hope they are as amazing as this mask.

I've had bad acne for the past 6 years of my life (29 years old).  In the past year I finally got a prescription from the derm which has helped some, but not completely. On a whim, I decided to try this mask and I am so happy that I did.  My skin has cleared up significantly over the past week I've been using the product, and my complexion is overall clearer and smoother. I've never seen such an immediate effect from any product I've used, not even prescribed. Obsessed.

This stuff is magical! Not only is it the prettiest ocean blue color, but it calms my skin like nothing else I've tried. It felt like it helped my skin better absorb moisturizer afterwards and it really clarified my skin tone. Truly a unique mask and I'm so happy I purchased.

reviews.review_title: Strong scent but it is a good product
reviews.review_text: I have to agree with other reviews re: the smell, and I also found that if I used it at night, it didn't relax me but did the opposite so now I use it in the morning instead. As far as the product goes, it does do a good job, no miracles though but with consistent use it works, fades blemish spots and improves texture and tone.

I've dealt with acne prone skin ever since I started being a teen. And now I'm in my mid twenties. I've gone through everything seeing the derm, waited it out, I've picked, and picked and picked. The past 14 years have been a struggle. This mask has changed my life. I found out about herbivore through my other favorite skin care company Glossier. Both companies have amazing products that have help transformed my skin. This mask does have a potent smell but it's DO-able reading the reviews about how the smell is the only reason they returned it made me LOL. Get over it!!! With anything it takes time, you can't expect overnight or after one use. I've been using it for 3 weeks and I'm completely shocked. following what they say use everyday for 3-4 days then every 2 days you will notice a difference!! Def is on my top shelf of beauty products!

I bought this mask to help clarify my congested chin/mouth area and it works so well!! I have noticed a huge difference in my skin. I have used it twice a week for about a month now and will definitely continue. It has a menthol/medicinal smell but is not too overpowering. It's cooling and calming which is great for any active blemishes. I would recommend this to anyone with congested skin (blemishes, acne, blackheads etc.) Also, for how well it has worked for me, and how little I use per application, the price point is great.

This mask is ahhhh-mazing. At first, the smell is really off-putting, but after a few uses I got used to it. Right away I can feel my skin sting a little, but not in a painful or uncomfortable way. I have cystic acne flare ups and within three uses I saw so much improvement with my skin and it was much smoother. This was also safe enough to use on my sensitive skin and didn't dry out my combo skin either. I normally wouldn't spend this much on a mask but this is worth the splurge.

It was a month ago I started using this product every 2-3 days and I've never had acne ever since. I used to have horrible breakouts every now and then, and this is the first time I'm finally free from them. Now I have to take care of the acne scars tho... Highly recommended for those who suffer form hormonal acne.
This stuff saved my skin!! I love this mask. I love the way it feels on my face and how it looks after. Do yourself a favor and purchase this stuff!

I stopped using masks years ago due to that one extra step until Blue Tansy peaked my curiosity.  I suffer from clogged pores and blackheads on my nose and chin.  I have sensitive/combo skin.  I tend to suffer dryness from products so I was skeptical.  If you follow the informative instructions properly you will love the immediate results!

This is my second blue tansy-based product and it did not disappoint! I've been using Sunday Riley's Luna oil for a while (worth the splurge) and although I disliked the smell at first, I can't get enough of it now. So when I tried this mask it was love at first session. I've been using it once a week for a month to test my skin's sensitivity (so far so good!) and will kick it up to 2x/month. There's a brightness to my complexion that I like and I'm pretty sure this mask has something to do with getting less random breakouts.This product definitely gets extra points for being preservative and alcohol free! Sephora give me more blue tansy!
