on my second day using this mask. But face turn blue/green color after??? Is anybody had the same issue or its just me turning to a blue man

I never leave reviews, but this stuff is amazing. I have had very problematic skin the last few years of my 20s - hormonal acne flare ups and coming off of birth control after 14 years. I've tried a ton of stuff since my skin stopped breaking out (after 1.5 years of misery) to resurface and exfoliate. This is hands down the best. Sometimes natural products don't always work better then the rest, but this does. And it's relaxing. The scent doesn't bother me at all. I notice my skin is so much more soft, less red and irritable and it almost breathes better. Will be adding as a staple in my regime.

I work at home and like to take advantage of the time and use face masks a lot.  This one is my absolute favorite. The smell is probably a love it or hate it.  I LOVE it.  I want to climb into the jar, it's herbal-ish.  It really refines and makes your skin look perfect and you can feel it working. I started as they instructed, and used it for 3 days back to back and now once a week.  Note: It is very runny and I think it should come with a brush because that is they most effective way to apply it with out making a mess or using too much product.  Also because of the consistency I can see the jar lasting a long time, making it more cost effective.
I love natural products and this one actually works!

Like a few others reviewers, I find the smell of this mask to be absolutely awful. Nothing about it should make it smell gross (it doesn't smell nasty or rotten at all) but the scent is just so off-putting. It's rather unfortunate since it does require you to allow it to dry on your face. There's a lot of time to take in that scent! That said, it's a wonderful mask otherwise. I use this along with the pineapple/gemstone mask and it's been awesome in smoothing my skin, especially in the winter weather. Sephora prices are also quite affordable compared to other sites (Indigo @ $55 and Herbivores own site @ $66).
Wonderful product. Really calms my acne prone skin
This stuff is magic. My face feels so soft and my skin seems brighter after I put this on. I love it!

I bought this mask on a whim and had very little expectations of it. However today is only my third day using this mask and my skin has already transformed more than it ever has with a single product. I have dry, sensitive skin and get the occasional hormonal breakout every now and then. I also had these stubborn bumps on my left cheek that I could never get rid of and they always made my contour/blush/highlight sit weird. But those bumps are completely gone after three uses and I cannot stop touching my skin. Any texture or roughness is gone and my skin feels amazingly smooth. And the bonus is that this mask has not dried out my skin at all like every other AHA/BHA exfoliant. I was skeptical because I have been disappointed by literally every other gel mask I've used but this one is a miracle in a jar. Seriously the results are unbelievable. I have NEVER been this impressed by a skincare item before in my life and I cannot stop raving about it!  Cons: The packaging (beautiful, but I just don't like skin care products to be in jars) The smell is so strong and really strange  However despite the cons I cannot give this mask anything less than five stars. It is that incredible. Basically if you want better skin, you should buy this mask.

I was lured by the product's packaging and its high % of natural ingredients. I have only used it once so far, and it looks like I will need to use it 3-4 days in a row to see a more noticeable result. So can't say too much about its actual effect yet. However, I liked how it felt during and after. The product didn't say it has a tightening effect, but it sure has! My skin was very tightened up from the product (in a good way) once the mask is dried, and the texture of the mask was almost like a sheet of dried glue/thin rubber. I'm describing it poorly but I liked it a lot because the product stayed at where I put it instead of being messy and runny. I didn't really care about the tingly or the cooling sensation though..not obvious for me. It was very easy to wash off, especially when paired with a wet towel, and there's no sticky residue and my skin felt clean without being overly dried. So far so good. I'm excited to see what more it will do after three more consecutive days of use. I want to try that other brightening mask now :)

I'm very happy with this mask. I've used it for about a week and a half now, a few days a week. I've seen a big improvement in my skin's clarity and tone. I have some acne texture scars and pigment scars. It's helping even out my skin all over, possibly even lightening up some pigmentation issues. I have not seen a difference in my texture scars, but I wouldn't really have that expectation from this product, anyways. I'm definitely hooked on this product as a new member of my beauty regimen.  Downside is the strong, sweetish floral smell. It's not bad enough that I won't use it but I'm definitely not a fan. It has a gel texture, so it tightens as it dries but not as hard as a clay mask. It's cooling so I imagine it would feel really nice in the summer.

I'm slightly obsessed with all of the Herbivore products, especially ones with blue tansy. This mask is great to use when I feel my skin getting a little out of control or if a break out is just around the corner. It gives my skin that super tight squeaky clean feeling and on top of that, it feels crazy soft.

reviews.review_title: Effective but has a strong smell
reviews.review_text: I used the mask about 2-3 times but I returned because I couldn't stand the smell of it. It was way too strong and overpowering. The product itself was good though. If you can stand the strong smell of it, go for it!

I'm starting to really love Herbivore! I've been looking into natural beauty a lot lately to help with moderate acne and some hormonal acne. I use the clinique cleanser and toner but I use the Lapis oil (sometimes in conjunction with the Dr. Jart water mask moisturizer) to finish off my routine! I thought I would give this mask a shot and after three uses I can confirm my love!  It's a gorgeous colour, packaging is cute and simple, the mask goes on clear (ish, thicker spots will be blue). The smell was a bit weird for me (same with the oil) but after a little while I get used to it and relax with it on my face :) It tingles a little bit at first but that too goes away! This jar will last me so long, the thin layer needed ensures that I get the most bang for my buck! As instructed, I have been using it every day for the first four days (i'll do another mask today) and then use it 1-2 times per week. I noticed it pulls up existing blockages so I do have a pimple or two from it but they go away so fast! And the existing ones I had when I started my trial with this mask are gone. I have fairly light skin so my acne leaves red spots behind for weeks or even months, but i'm noticing this mask has already started to lighten some!  Definitely found my go to mask, will be repurchasing, and recommend to everyone!

I've used Herbivore's Lapis oil for at least a year now and my problematic combination skin loves it. So I decided to splash out on the matching mask and I'm glad I did. When I use it regularly there is definite improvement in blackheads, skin texture, and complexion. Although it's super effective, it's gentle enough to be used more often than other masks with no negative reaction from my skin.

This mask is very soothing, but the AHA + BHA concentration is too weak for my aging skin. This is the information from Herbivore: The AHA is naturally occurring in the fruit enzymes and the BHA is naturally occurring in the Willow Bark extract. The combined alpha and beta hydroxy accounts for about 2% of the total recipe.
It calms down my skin which is prone to redness and blemishes. After a few uses it kind of improved the texture of my damaged skin. I love it and I think it is an excellent invest.
I have oily/combination skin and this mask paired with Herbivore's Lapis Facial Oil is absolutely amazing. I will continue to repurchase.
I have been using this mask for a couple of weeks, and so far I love it. It has replaced all my other masks. It is smoothing on the skin and gentle enough for me to use 4-5 times a week.

I've used this mask a few times now, and I already can see the difference it is making with my skin. When I first opened it, I was obsessed with the beautiful blue color of the mask (though when you apply it, it goes on and dries clear). The smell is quite strong, but nothing that I can't handle. After cleansing my face, I apply the mask and leave it on for about 20 minutes, and then rinse it off and immediately moisturize my face. What I've noticed so far is that my few blemishes--both the visible ones and the ones forming under the skin--have started to disappear, and my skin looks so much brighter and feels so much smoother. I really like that the treatment ingredients in this mask are naturally-derived, so I feel better using it on my skin. Also, I don't find it to be incredibly drying. Overall, I highly recommend you try the Blue Tansy mask out!

I've only used this product for 3 days but I already see a huge improvement in my face!! I have a lot of deep congestion/blackheads on my chin and with the use of this peel they have all surfaced. I have pretty sensitive skin and have not noticed any irritation like some other users have. I would recommend this to anyone!

After one use I noticed my skin was brighter and smoother, and I received MANY compliments. The gel texture felt cool on my skin, and it was a nice at-home spa treat. I personally feel like it improved the look of my pores, and had to remind myself to keep my hands off my face!

I have very large pores and combination skin. Sometimes it is dry, sometimes oily. I haven't had a facial in a while and have been trying to clear the gunk out of my pores because they were getting bad. I've used this for three nights in a row and after using it would take a pore clearer tool and extract around my nose and cheeks. You'd see so much gunk come up and now on the 3rd night, I'm getting barely anything! This in combination with the Perricone MD pore minimizer duo has really been clearing them out... Minimizing, well we will see.

I have yet to try the product, but I'm not sure if this is a sephora quality issue or Herbivore, but I received my package and the lid was cracked. Very disappointed as this product is very runny and it will now be leaking and the lid won't close as tight

I'm obsessed with this line of products, and this mask is by far my favorite of them all. It goes on clear, and doesn't harden so much that you can still move your face while it sets! I've been using this mask for two weeks in conjunction with the Lapis Facial Oil, and I see a huge difference in the redness of my skin tone, and the acne that I usually struggle with (I also use an exfoliating face wash). I'll continue to buy this forever.
This mask is AMAZING! First of all, you only need a thin layer so it isn't as pricey as you think. It smooths the skin so well. It helps with redness too!

I LOVE this mask. I purchased after discovering my obsession with the Lapis Facial Oil. I use at least once a week and this product has lasted me a long time as you only need a thin layer for the mask to be effective. I wash my face and apply before taking a shower and the mask is easy to remove. I feel a slight sensation when the mask is on letting me know it is working. After removing the mask, I see a difference in the size of my pores and my skintone is more even. This mask exfoliates my skin without harsh beads or other grainy ingredients that can harm the skin. It is a smooth formula that allows for even distribution on the skin. I highly recommend this product!

I've used this 4 nights in a row and this stuff works quick! I have moderate(?) acne - usually 1-2 cysts per month and at any given time I'll have a whitehead or one developing, healing blemishes, general congestion. Each use seems to bring something to the surface which otherwise would grow and grow and take forever to come up & heal. Pores seem to be clearing out a bit, and I definitely GLOW after using this mask. Will see how this goes with continued use, but I'm very pleased so far. Much better/faster results than any clarifying clay masks I've tried.u203a

After trying the Lapis oil and falling in love with the effects of blue tansy, I decided to purchase this mask. I have oily, sensitive skin and this mask does wonders for clearing it up and getting rid of dead skin! I've never used AHA or BHA products before, so I was a little scared of irritation, but this mask delivers very gentle exfoliation. My skin wasn't aggravated during or after use - just refreshed and smooth. It's very cooling and feels great after a long week! I've even gotten my boyfriend to start masking with me because of this!

This is my first time trying a BHA product and its been a great experience! It really helped make my skin feel a lot smoother and did not irritate it much at all (and I have pretty sensitive skin!) The smell is quite herbally but I love it and the blue colour makes it look so pretty in the jar too! a great gentle exfoliator!

I've used various masks that were meant to exfoliate the skin. This is the first one I've tried that is not only natural/with good ingredients but is very effective and gentle on my sensitive skin.  At first the gel consistency was a bit odd but over the past month I have gotten used to it and really enjoy wearing it. It doesn't sting (others may react differently) and it smells very fresh.  I've noticed my skin looks and feels clearer. This mask has helped mitigate congested skin and absolutely LOVE the ingredients that are doing it (all natural!). I had acne years ago and now just use products to maintain clear skinu2026this product is perfect for that. I would recommend this product for anyone dealing with acne too, the ingredients are perfect for that skin type.

I have incredibly sensitive skin so finding a mask that doesn't irritate but still does the trick is so hard to do! I've been using Herbivore's Blue Tansy Mask for months and it's a staple in my beauty routine now. It helps keep my skin clear and I feel comfortable about the ingredients I'm putting on my body. Love love!
It works great, it's all natural and it lasts a long time if you use it right.

I love anything with blue tansy in it - it's hugely helpful at calming my red, irritated skin and so when I found this mask I had to try it. I absolutely love it. It's gentle and doesn't leave my skin feeling like it's been brutalized but it still noticeably clears up any open pores, calms redness and gets rid of the pesky dry patches I have. In love!

I had read about how combining a facial oil with an AHA or BHA could be a powerful but gentle combination for cell turnover and was happy to find this mask. I am a mask junkie but love this one and have incorporated it into my weekly routine. It gives you a glow!

I recently bought this product and have only used it twice and I can already see such a difference. After two uses my pores are clearer and my skin is glowing. As someone who is constantly looking for great, natural skin care products I am so glad I gave this a try. Love it!

This mask is amazing! Not only does it feel refreshing when it's applied, it smells wonderful and it works magic on your skin. Skin is rejuvinated and revived without drying. Easy to apply and remove, too.

I carried this with me while I was traveling, I highly suggest the first thing you do when you get off the plain is use this!! My skin is usually dull & acne prone after flying this made it Glow!! Need I say more

I like to experiment with different brand face masks, so it is rare that I ever stick with one. That is until i came across Herbivore's Blue Tansy. I love how soothing and refreshed my skin feels once the mask is rinsed off. I have pretty dry skin so this product will be a shelf staple all around the cold season!

I found this product to be gentle but very effective for skin texture problems. I also see an improvement with my breakouts and less visible pores. I love it's ingredients and am very picky with what I put on my sensitive skin.

I've used it several times now and I do indeed think my skin looks and feels better. It seems clearer but also less dry even without lotion. Seemed to balance out the sebum on my face. Definitely not bad!

reviews.review_title: not impressive enough for the price
reviews.review_text: I don't know, man. People seem to love these. I returned both this one and the pineapple (although there's nothing noticeably pineapple about it) one. Both gave me minor breakouts, and that was the only result. I have some mild versions of the skin concerns these intend to address, and didn't notice any difference. For the price, I expected actual results.  I don't doubt the other reviewers' great experiences, and I'm glad someone is getting their money's worth from these...but for some of us, the hype is not real. For reference, I have fairly sensitive, combo skin with mild dehydration and visible pores....and after using both this one and the pineapple brightening one, I still have the exact same skin. Be careful not to get this goop all over when you open the lid - very liquid-gel texture. Ingredient list seems great, which is why I was so eager to try these. Wish they were offered in-store so you could try before you buy. If you decide to roll the dice and order online, make sure you keep your receipt just in case.

This is probably my favorite exfoliating mask. It doesn't irritate my skin like many others do. The aloe is very soothing and cooling. I use it weekly to get all the dead skin cells off of my face. I have acne scars and this seems to be improving them. I also love that it has natural ingredients. I will be repurchasing this.

Over the past year or so I've been transitioning to natural and organic skincare/makeup and a good resurfacing mask was something that I had struggled to find. I've tried Tata Harper's and it was ok. Honestly I don't really understand the hype for that product I didn't feel like it didn't do half as well for me as the Herbivore mask did. I feel like for as much product you need and how much you get Herbivore is a great bang for your buck. My skin is easily congested, acne prone, and combination and this mask was great. You definitely get a tingling sensation within the first couple of minutes but is dissipates after a bit. I love the blue tansy in this it reminds me of May Lindstrom's The Blue Cacoon without the $160 price tag. This mask leaves my skin so smooth and bright and afterwards I use Tata Harper's Rejuvinating Serum and my skin feels brand new. I think I'm going to give a few of the other Herbivore products a try specifically their face oil.

I have very fair, sensitive, combination oily skin with lots of redness and acne scars and uneven skintone. I've so far used this mask two days in a row and I already noticed my skin improving. At first I wasn't crazy about the scent of the mask, it smells very herbally. But its not nearly enough to make me not like this mask. I love it. It tingles somewhat (as mentioned on the box) when applied but the sensation does not linger for more than a few seconds. After rinsing it off, my skin feels so smooth and I have no redness. I don't find it to be drying, but because I do it in the evening I like to follow it up with my Jurlique skin balancing oil. In the morning my skin feels and looks so good, I almost dont want to wear makeup! lol. I can't wait for this mask to be back in stock, I will definitely be purchasing a second jar, if not more!

Wow. Where do I even start? I hardly ever write reviews, but felt I really had to for this one. I am 22 years old, and have suffered from acne and severely congested and sensitive skin since I was 7 years old! I've always been made fun of for my skin. I've tried many things from benzoyl peroxide to salicylic acid, Dr Gross peeling pads, GlamGlow masks, Origins masks, Boscia peels, natural and unnatural things. I've over exfoliated my face more times than anyone ever should. I do regular extractions, and my face just ends up the same! So I decided to give this mask a try. I absolutely adore that I can read ALL of the ingredients on the label. It smells really wonderful and isn't over drying. I use this mask daily currently, to get my skin to a state to where I'll probably use it twice a week. This mask gets rid of all the hardened ends on skin congestion so you can very easily extract all blackheads. My nose has never been so smooth! My face is like porcelain to put makeup on. It can be a little drying to use daily, so I exfoliate every couple days and make sure to follow up with the Lapis oil that doesn't seem to clog pores at all. I am now a lifelong customer. Get more Herbivore products in! They're all sold out and I want to give you my money. =]

I have sensitive, acne-prone skin and am always looking for a product that will exfoliate without being irritating or drying. Blue tansy does a great job of exfoliating. It leaves my skin feeling really soft and it's gentle, so my skin is just refreshed, not dry.
